hash.daily.text.bombabonanza: Have the most Bombas and win! Three winners on every sector!
hash.daily.text.20130610pax50buy: Buy three 30% Training Accelerators, get one 50% Accelerator FREE!
hash.promotion.093011.subject: Research Reward!
hash.missions.mutent-phunn-klub-4.name: Mutent Phunn Klub 4
hash.maps.alliancetournamentdialog.desc: Prove your alliance's dominance on Cerulea IV by competing in our map tournaments. The alliance with the highest map score at the end of the tournament will win great prizes!
hash.message.marchsectorresourcewinner.body: Congratulations, Commander! You've been selected as one of 1,000 special winners for your Sector in our Sector Resource Stockpile contest! A 2.5-Day Accelerator has been added to your inventory!
hash.items.ceruleandamagesensor.name: Cerulean Damage Sensor
hash.alliance-territory-reward.body:
Based on the territory your alliance controls, you received the following items:
#ITEM_LIST#
Control more territory to earn even greater rewards.
hash.items.tokenliquidcoolant2.description: Applies a moderate scaling Rate of Fire Boost permanently to an Engineering Lab Part!
hash.daily.text.20130305zootsjackpot: Play today for a chance to win items like Cerulean Armor, Cerulean Damage Sensors, and Cerulean Central Protection + much more! Check your mail for details.
hash.missions.in-memoriam.description: The upgraded barracks can now withstand a direct bombardment from an X-1 Cannon. We confirmed this after several tests. Unfortunately, the first few tests were failures, and there were casualties, so we'll be observing four seconds of silence now... Okay, back to work.
hash.items.mysteryboxl.name: Cerulean Advanced Targeting Box
hash.message.body.20130405c2schematicbundles: The Caldera-2 Schematic bundles are now available in the shop! Make sure to visit the Featured tab of the shop and get yours today!
hash.buildings.goldbuilding.name: Gold Monument
hash.alliance-membership.promoted-to-lieutena: You are now a lieutenant of:
hash.daily.text.20121127lvlup: Gain the most levels between 11/27-11/30 to win 500 Platinum! See mail for details.
hash.missions.fully-upgrade-raider.name: Fully Upgrade Raider
hash.missions.tall-revere.description: The only thing more gung-ho than a Marine is a Marine piloting an armored Titan mech.
hash.items.piercingammotoken.name: Piercing Ammo Token
hash.items.repairall.name: Instant Repairs
hash.missions.shooting-gallery.description: Pick off your enemy’s defenses and they’ll be left picking up the charred and broken pieces.
hash.items.hax24shield.name: 24-Hour Shield
hash.daily.text.spendeventhackerspatch: For every 100 Platinum you spend, you will earn one FREE Hacker’s Patch!
hash.ew.max-level-benefits.title: Max Level Bonus
hash.ai.general.name: General Targeting
hash.auras.slowtroops.name: Slow Troops Aura
hash.message.body.20130226decimatorcoresale: For a limited time only, Decimator Cores will be available for the low price of 15 Platinum and Decimator Racks can be purchased for 60 Platinum! Stock up today and gain that extra edge over your opposition! This sale will only be available for a Limited Time!
hash.missions.increase-gas-production.objecti: Increase Gas Production to 700 per hour
hash.daily.text.easyupgrade7: For a limited time: Upgrading your buildings from level 6 to 7 takes up to 70% less time and fewer resources!
hash.items.incineraptorflag.name: Incineraptor Flag
hash.missions.bigger-barrels.objectives: Upgrade a Gun Turret to Level 2
hash.items.romanianflag.name: Romanian Flag
hash.fte.cutscene.third: Scouts were deployed, but they discovered no sign of the Ceruleans. The alien cities had been abandoned.
hash.itmes.xpsim30.name: Defense XP x30
hash.missions.improved-shields.description: Pulse Tanks are notoriously hard to destroy, but the new tachyon shields will make it even harder.
hash.message.subject.20121121generalskillupev: Gain General Skill Points - Last Day!
hash.daily.text.maylevel11: Win 1000 Platinum for upgrading to level 11 by Friday! Info in your mail!
hash.missions.hax.description: Executrix Scylith's neural spiders have managed to extract a great deal of information from our cortical network. We need to wreck her Command Center before those files are sold to other enemies.
hash.buildings.defensesimulator.name: Defense Simulator
hash.message.body.0926spendevent:
From now until 6pm PDT on September 30th, spending Platinum can earn you a Brand New Armor and/or Piercing Ammo Token 4.0!!
For every 100 Platinum you spend, you’ll receive 2 Guaranteed Token Boxes. These boxes can contain 3.0 Tokens! Limit 10 boxes per Player, per Sector.
Spend 500 Platinum and receive the brand new Armor Token 4.0!
Spend 1000 Platinum and receive the Armor Token 4.0 AND the Piercing Ammo Token 4.0!
Prizes will be paid out by October 2, 2013.
hash.items.scarbiderack.name: Scarbide Rack
hash.missions.fight-or-flight.description: The more streamlined Shrike design required us to remove ejection-seat capabilities and distress signals for the pilots. Personally, I think this just creates an incentive for them to do a better job.
hash.message.subject.antigeneralmysterybox: Strengthen your Defense against Generals with the CNS!
hash.message.shieldupgradewinner.body:
Congratulations, Commander! For upgrading your Shield Generator with remarkable swiftness, you have been awarded an Accelerator.
The Accelerator is based on your Shield Generator level:
Level 10: 7-Day Accelerator
Level 11: 14-Day Accelerator
Thank you for your tremendous contribution to defense!
hash.maps.alliancetournamentdialog.title: MAP TOURNAMENTS
hash.message.123downtimeallsectors.body:
We've updated our maintenance plan, and Boosts are now safe to use! Power up and begin your assault!
There will still be a brief maintenance period on each Sector later today, but you will be notified in advance. We'll send out a message approximately 1/2 hour before the maintenance begins, and send another message to let you know when the maintenance is over.
Activate your Combat Boosts, Warp Boosts, and Troop Energizers now, and conquer your enemies!
hash.message.body.a12ndgatepayout:
You have grown the second Warp Gate in your Aurora-1 mighty in such a short time.
You should be rewarded for your efforts!
Please take a moment to check your inventory for your prize!
hash.message.20120706researchathon.body: Thank you for participating in our recent Defense Lab Research-a-thon. One 2.5 Hour Accelerator has been added to your inventory.
hash.promotion.octfirstbuyerb.subject: First-Time Platinum Bonus!
hash.missions.research-smeasearch.description: I could bore you with all of the advances we are making in xenobiology and selective breeding, but I know you just want these Lancers to shoot more acid. Yes, they’ll do that.
hash.message.subject.maximumforcemb: Win with the Maximum Force Box!!!
hash.ew.train.err.time-min: You must train at least 1 unit
hash.missions.unlock-specter-file-1.descripti: Further Specter training documents are in an encrypted Confederate file with no key. No problem. With a proper Tech Lab, I can crack it.
hash.daily.text.dax30shieldsale: Protect your neck! Pick up a 30-Day Shield for only 75 Platinum!
hash.daily.title.20130529dragoncorebox: New Incineraptor and Core Box on Sale!
hash.daily.text.20121116herobuyevent2: Purchase Platinum and receive Skill Points for your new General! Check your in game mail and the forums for more details
hash.missions.capacity-upgrade.name: Capacity Upgrade
hash.daily.text.20130624forcetournamentlongme:
All Force earned through troop training, building, researching, equipment upgrading, and General Skill upgrading will contribute to your Tournament AND Leaderboard rankings but that's not all! In addition, General SP and GO upgrades as well as Research Force gain will be TRIPLED(x3) for the duration of the tournament!
The 1st place winner in each sector will receive a new Ruby Core for Level 17 building upgrades as well as 600 platinum for their efforts! The next 2nd and 3rd place winners will receive Platinum Prize Boxes which have a chance to provide Ruby Cores!
In addition to these overall prizes, Daily Prizes are now available for the top 3 players a given day as well as Achievement Prizes once you pass certain Force Thresholds! Check the in game leaderboard for more details.
hash.message.body.20130511elitebox:
The Elite Weapons Box will be back in the store for a Limited Time!
Each box guarantees an Engineering Lab Part which possesses three bonuses for your Turrets, so make sure to purchase yours today while supplies last!
hash.missions.x-1-chemistry.objectives: Upgrade an X-1 Cannon to level 3
hash.missions.waste-not-want-not.description: Commander, one of our researchers has found a way to more effectively have our Raiders deliver their nano-machine munitions using spent Disrupter shells. See? We're going green.
hash.message.body.20130222sensorbox:
The Cerulean Damage Sensor is a smart AI equipment that fires ultra high powered beams that incinerate incoming troops. The Smart AI targets troops with weakened defenses to effectively get rid of all vulnerable threats. In addition to this Smart AI, the part itself will also greatly increase your turret's Range and Damage!
Purchase a Sensor Box today for a chance to win one of these rare parts and vanquish your enemies today. Other items in the Sensor Box include Hacker's Patches and Accelerators.
The Sensor Box is only available until 2/25/2013
hash.items.ultrareinforcedliquidcoolant.name: Ultra Reinforced Liquidcoolant
hash.daily.text.20120913labtime: Engineering Lab upgrade times reduced by 95% for a LIMITED TIME. See your mail for more details!
hash.message.body.20130111decimationcraterele:
Decimate the competition with this new premium package! Includes:
3x Decimator Carriers 8x Incendiary Core 5x Vermillion Core 5x Cerulean Core 20x Vulcan Box 5x 14 Day Accelerator 1x Elite Weapons Box
Visit the featured tab of the shop to get yours today!
hash.message.body.chimera:
We are happy to announce the newest addition to your forces, the Chimera!
Chimera are powerful, long range units that put Specters to shame! Additionally, due to their elite training they require far less Uranium for their training time than a normal troop.
Chimera are trained in a new building, called the Fleet Academy, which has its own Training Queue. This means that you can gain Training XP Faster and be more of a force on the Maps!
In order to build your Flight Academy in your HQ, you will need a level 12 Command Center and a level 12 Barracks.
What are you waiting for? Unleash the Chimera and rule the skies of Cerulea IV!
hash.missions.project-x-solar.objectives: Upgrade a Solar Plant to Level 10.
hash.missions.don-t-hate-the-player.name: Don't Hate the Player
hash.message.smuggercratewinner.body: Congratulations, Commander! We appreciate your support of Edgeworld! Our supplies of Erazi Smuggler's Crates have not arrived yet, so we've granted you the even-more-valuable KIRA's Gift! Check your inventory for your new item, and thank you for purchasing Platinum!
hash.message.body.20130427boxoffer100:
Still looking to get your hands on a new Cerulean Fireproof Shield Engineering Lab part which will reduce incoming damage from enemy Bombas?
For every 100 Cerulean Fireproof Shield Boxes you purchase between now and 11:59 PM PDT on April 28th, we'll throw in one Cerulean Fireproof Shield Engineering Lab Part for FREE! That's right! Not only will you have 100 chances to take home this part (as well as other premium prizes), but you will also guarantee yourself one extra of these parts.
There is no limit to the amount of times you can qualify, and with our new Mass Mystery Box opening option you won't have to wait around to see what you've won! Visit the Featured tab of the shop and purchase the New Cerulean Fireproof Shield Box Today!
hash.missions.daily-resource-donation-gas.des:
Admiral Tenmu is hoping you can support him by giving him #AMOUNT# Gas.
TIP: This is a one-time donation and the mission is only claimable if you have banked enough Gas.
hash.missions.safeties-off.description: Our Pyro units are being held back by safety measures in their suits. Yes, it's inhuman to suggest removing them. That's why I'm here.
hash.promotion.factionattack1011.subject: Faction Counterattack!
hash.missions.safety-first.name: Safety First
hash.message.auroraupgradewinner.body: Congratulations, Commander! Your Aurora-1 Command Center has been chosen as a winner in our upgrade contest! We apologize for the delay, and we also discovered that some of our original winners may have received 8-Hour Shields instead of Accelerators. We're re-awarding the prizes now! You've received a number of 8-Hour Accelerators equal to your Aurora-1 Command Center level. Enjoy your newfound speed!
hash.items.bronzetrophy.name: Bronze Trophy
hash.items.rhino250.name: Rhino Platoon
hash.message.body.20130702turrets:
There have been TWO significant improvements made to the turrets in Edgeworld! First, Level 17 turrets have been made MUCH stronger than Level 16 turrets! With impressive boosts to damage and health stats, it is necessary to upgrade all of your turrets to Level 17 in order to maintain your dominance on Cerulea IV!
Second, from now on, turrets do not require an Incendiary Core for Level 1 builds! This means that you can build Level 1 Incendiary Turrets, Sniper Towers, Heavyweight Turrets, Corrosive Turrets and Anti-Tank Turrets without an Incendiary Core!
Start building and upgrading these turrets today to make your base the strongest in all of Edgeworld!
hash.daily.text.marchtrainingcontest: Train the most Specters, Disruptors, Pulse Tanks, or Lancers to win! Details in your mail.
hash.missions.pillager-ai.description: We will enhance Raider gravity guns with an A.I. to separate plunder from junk. I am not jealous at all. Really.
hash.missions.fight-or-flight.name: Fight or Flight
hash.message.body.20130319forcetournament:
A brand new 3 DAY TOTAL Force Tournament has just begun!
Force earned through equipment and General Skill upgrading will contribute to your leaderboard ranking, with the top 40 netting valuable prizes such as Platinum, Trophies, and premium troops!
This Tournament ends on March 21st at 10:00 PM PDT, so make sure to get started today. Good luck!
-- Edgeworld Team
hash.missions.mutant-fun-klub-2.description: As long as you keep building weapons, you need to keep enriching uranium.
hash.ai.damagedunits.description: This Smart AI enables turrets to finish off the lowest health units
hash.missions.core-elevators.description: We can't build our Supply Depots much higher or much wider without making them easy targets. That only leaves one direction for us to go.
hash.message.body.20130212leveluptournament:
Commander,
A level up tournament has begun today, gain the most levels and win up to 500 platinum! Prizes will be tiered as follows:
1st: 500 platinum 2nd: 250 platinum 3rd: 200 platinum 4th: 150 platinum 5th: 125 platinum 6th – 10th: 100 platinum 11th – 20th: 75 platinum 21st – 40th: 50 platinum
Level up between 10:00 AM PST on February 20th and 5:00 PM PST on February 22nd and the winner could be you!
Rankings will be based on the total number of levels gained for each individual player per sector. Levels gained cannot be combined across sectors. Prizes will be distributed by February 25th.
Good luck!
hash.items.charitycrate.description: 100% of the proceeds of this crate will go towards the Doctors Without Borders charity!
hash.missions.train-marine-squad.description:
Select your BARRACKS.
Click TRAIN.
Select the MARINE.
Enter '10' and click TRAIN.
hash.research.antiaircraftturret.name: Anti-Tank Upgrade
hash.missions.ultimate-supercompression.descr: We're about to become a tempting target for space pirates, Commander. With this new technology, one of our supply buildings will house enough raw resources to finance a large-scale war.
hash.daily.title.20130208buildathon: Defense Sim, Lab, and Gate Build-a-thon!
hash.missions.rocketeering-raiders.name: Rocketeering Raiders
hash.missions.horn-section.name: Horn Section
hash.items.mysterybox32.description: Contains the Level 10 Vermillion Advanced Targeting Smart Part!
hash.promotion.twitter7500.subject: Help us reach 7500 Followers!
hash.items.explosiveammotoken.tooltip: Apply to an Engineering Lab part and receive a small scaling Splash Radius Boost permanently!
hash.missions.enigma-file.description: The Maar did more work on the Specter project than we ever suspected. I'd let you read this, Commander, but then I'd have to direct the security drones to kill you.
hash.promotion.23Jan2012.body: Congratulations! You've taken your base up to level 9, and we'll help you take a step into level 10! We've granted you a Cerulean Core and 8-Hour Accelerator. You can find those items in your inventory, accessed through the shop. Thanks for working hard to upgrade your base!
hash.ew.mapinfo.score-tooltip: Your alliance's score is all of your levels of map bases, added together.
hash.missions.snipertower6.objectives: Upgrade Your Sniper Turret to level 6
hash.message.subject.20130412corrosiveturrete: Build Corrosive Turrets Faster - Last Day
hash.items.mysterybox1.description: Open for a chance to win the NEW Cerulean Meteoric Shield, Hacker's Patch or Berserker Troops... among other items!
hash.daily.title.20130404spendevent: Platinum Spend Event, Free Core Boxes!
hash.units.disruptor.name: Disruptor
hash.message.body.20130409forcetournament:
A brand new 3 DAY Troop Training and Engineering Lab Force Tournament has begun!
All Force earned through Troop Training and Engineering Lab Part Upgrades will contribute to your leaderboard ranking but that's not all! Force gained from any of these actions in our newest Outpost Caldera-2 will be TRIPLED (x3) throughout the duration!
The top 40 players on each sector will win valuable prizes such as Premium Troops, Mystery Boxes, Trophies, and much more!
This Tournament ends on April 11th at 10:00 PM PDT, so make sure to get started today. Good luck!
-- Edgeworld Team
hash.daily.text.20130211: Defense Research has been improved. Check your mail for updates.
hash.missions.a-flurry-of-attacks.description: The Aurora-1 Colony seems peaceful for the moment, but we both know that can change. Better upgrade your Colony Warp Gate to be on the safe side.
hash.message.marchtraintroops.subject: Maximize Your Army Event!
hash.ew.event.level-nine.content1: The next level of Edgeworld warfare has arrived!
hash.ew.event.level-nine.content2: Upgrade your buildings to Level 9 and research Level 9 units in the Tech Lab.
hash.daily.text.20130118generalskillupevent: Upgrade one of your General's skills to Level 5 or higher for your chance to win! See your mail for more details.
hash.engineeringlab.unequipconfirmation.oneen:
Resetting a Part will remove all of its active Tokens. The following Token will be added back to your inventory:

#ENHANCEMENT_0#

Are you sure you want to reset this part?
hash.engineeringlab.enhanceinstructions: The effect of a Token is based on the level of the Part. Higher level Parts receive a greater boost.
hash.message.body.20130524forcetournamentremi:
Today is the Last Day to Participate in our latest Building and Engineering Lab Force Tournament!
All Force earned through troop training, building, researching, equipment upgrading, and General Skill upgrading will contribute to your Tournament AND Leaderboard rankings! In addition, Building and Engineering Lab Force Points will be TRIPLED(x3) for the duration of the tournament!
The top 10 players on each sector will each qualify for Tournament Prize Boxes, which contain the following:
Platinum Prize Box - Guarantees a Level 16 Black Market Patch, Generals Order, Incineraptor, Synthetic Control Core, or Onyx Core Gold Prize Box - Chance to win a Level 16 Black Market Patch, Generals Order, Incineraptor, Synthetic Control Core, Onyx Core, Hacker's Patch, Vermillion Core, Cerulean Core, or SP 5000 Silver Prize Box - Decreased chance to win prizes from the Platinum and Gold boxes, plus a 30% Troop Accelerator, SP 1000, Incendiary Core, or Decimator Core Bronze Prize Box - Decreased chance to win prizes from Gold and Silver Boxes plus Troops and Speed Ups
The next 10 players in each sector will receive a variety of great prizes as well! Check the in game leaderboard for more details.
This Tournament ends tonight at 11:00 PM PST, Good luck!
-- Edgeworld Team
hash.promotion.SevenSixteen.body:
Stock up on Platinum! Starting now, every Platinum package you purchase is a chance to win double Platinum!

We're choosing three winners a day on Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday and Thursday. (July 18-21) If you're chosen, one of your Platinum purchases will be doubled! The more packages you buy, the more chances you have to win!

You'll want to have some extra Platinum on hand soon - the Edgeworld team is working on tons of new stuff! Watch for details on new building levels, large-scale Alliance warfare, and more. Buy a Platinum package to be prepared!
hash.missions.expand-warp-capacity.name: Expand Warp Capacity
hash.message.subject.20120913labtimereminder: Engineering Lab Upgrade Promo Ending Soon!
hash.items.xpnanos2.name: 15-Min 8x XP Boost
hash.items.weaponscache.tooltip: Open this for a guaranteed chance to win an elite equipment with three bonuses of varying levels up to level 15!
hash.missions.dream-big.name: Dream Big
hash.message.body.20130217purchaseevent:
Still looking to get your hands on more Smart Parts or General Orders? Here is your chance!
Simply purchase one of the following Platinum Packages to qualify for FREE prizes:
Buy the 400 Platinum Pack and get 20 Generals Orders Boxes and 20 Cerulean Armor Mystery Crates Buy the 1000 Platinum Pack and get 60 Generals Orders Boxes and 60 Cerulean Armor Mystery Crates Buy the 2500 Platinum Pack and get 150 Generals Orders Boxes and 150 Cerulean Armor Mystery Crates!
This unique offer starts on February 17th at 10am PST and will end at 11:59pm PST on February 18th. You will receive free Mystery Boxes only for the first purchase made between these times. The prizes will be distributed by on to the server in which Platinum was purchased and added into your Inventory within 3 business days of this event's conclusion.
hash.promo.ton.title: Kabam Presents: Thirst of Night
hash.fte.tip.placegunstate.mobile: Tap to place the building Tap and hold to move the view
hash.missions.gas-hike.description: Your enemy won't believe how much you just cost them.
hash.daily.text.20130402scarbidesale: Visit the featured tab of the shop and get yours today!
hash.message.body.wednesdaymbevent:
Today you can pick up major rewards just by buying G-Force Mystery Boxes!
This Mystery Box contains 1,000 Troops with a chance to take home 1,000 Incineraptors, Decimators or Battlecruisers among other troops!
Purchase 10 G-Force Mystery Boxes, Get 2 Vermillion Cores!
Purchase 20 G-Force Mystery Boxes, Get 2 Vermillion Cores and 1 99% Accelerator!
Purchase 25 G-Force Mystery Boxes, Get 2 Vermillion Cores and 2 99% Accelerators!
Limit One Prize Per Player, Per Sector. Event ends at 11:59pm PDT on October 17th. Prizes will be paid out by October 19th, 2013.
hash.daily.text.20130401c2buy: Purchase the 1000 Platinum Package or higher and get Caldera-2 Schematics for FREE!
hash.message.body.20130108sprackandcrate: With the release of the newest General, a new General Sp Rack and Mystery Crate have been added to the shop for a limited time! The Sp Rack will provide 30,000 total General Sp, and the Mystery Box will provide a chance to win one for cheap as well as other Sp items! Make sure to visit the featured tab of the store and level your General today!
hash.missions.special-agents.description: Our double agents -- well, I assume they're ours, and not the enemy's, because that would make them triple agents -- wait, what was the question? Look, let's just attack the Confederacy.
hash.daily.text.blackmarketinshop: For only a few hours, the BMP is available in the shop! Click here for more info!
hash.message.pvpassaultwinner2.body:
Congratulations, Commander! As you approach the Cerulean obelisks, they acknowledge your strength, and open up to reveal powerful boosts inside.

You received a 60-Minute Warp Boost for being among the best win/loss ratios in this Sector.
hash.message.body.20130728alloymysterybox:
With the release of our latest Crafting System, players have been able to turn their unused Engineering Lab Parts into valuable items! With our latest Alloy Mystery Box, players will be able to acquire these premium Alloys to recieve even better returns! For only 10 Platinum, you will guaranteed to receive one of the following:
Cerulean Alloy - not available in the store, and used for use in crafting Smart Parts! Platinum Alloy - 100 Platinum Value Common Alloy - 25 Platinum Value Hacker's Patch - 100 Platinum Value Decimator - Over 50 Platinum Value
This box will only be available for a Limited Time, so make sure to stock up today! Check the Featured Tab of the Shop for more details.
hash.items.flag1.description: Banner to be equipped to Banner Monument
hash.items.flag6.name: Banner Design #6
hash.message.body.20120925-aurora1labacademy:
Some of you may have received a message stating that the Engineering Lab and Defense Simulator were being released for Aurora-1. While the Engineering Lab is available, the Defense Simulator is still exclusive to your main base. Any parts acquired from your main base can be used in your Aurora-1 Engineering Lab.
While you are not able to construct an additional Simulator, the Fleet Academy has been unlocked and is now available! This means Chimera and Devastators can now be constructed on Aurora-1! Make sure to check your outpost for more details, or visit the shop to purchase your Aurora-1 Schematic today!
hash.faction.erazi.attack.1: What a lovely base, Commander. It'd be a shame if anything were to happen to it.
hash.message.CapitalLetters.subject: Test
hash.items.weaponscache.description: Open this for a guaranteed chance to win an elite equipment with three bonuses of varying levels up to level 15!
hash.faction.erazi.attack.2: Strength lies in numbers, Commander. All alone, you're dinner.
hash.messages.body.blackmarketinshop:
For a VERY limited time, the Black Market Patch will be available to purchase in the Shop! Visit the featured tab for your chance to pick one up!
The Black Market Patch will GUARANTEE upgrades to your Engineering Lab Parts up to Level 16 and 17!
This item will be featured at the low price of 249 Platinum and there is NO limit to the number you can buy! Stock up today!
hash.missions.maar-com-base.objectives: Destroy the Command Center in a Level 20 Confederate base.
hash.faction.erazi.attack.3: Surrender now, my dear, and you can still save lives -- beginning with your own!
hash.missions.drill-baby-drill.name: Drill, Baby, Drill
hash.items.mysteryboxq.description: Open for a chance to win a Rare 3 Bonus Smart Part or a Zoot's Token
hash.items.shieldedextendedexplosiveammo.name: Shielded Extended Explosiveammo
hash.research.brawler.description: Heavy ballistic armor vulnerable to only Fire and Electricity make Berserkers tough to kill
hash.items.silvertrophy.description: The Silver Trophy rewards strong performance in Tournaments and Contests.

A brand new 3 DAY Total Force Tournament has just begun!
All Force earned through troop training, building, researching, equipment upgrading, and General Skill upgrading will contribute to your Tournament AND Leaderboard rankings! In addition, All gain from Tournament Force Categories will be DOUBLED(x2) for the duration!
The top 10 players on each sector will each qualify for Tournament Prize Boxes, which contain the following:
Platinum Prize Box - Guarantees a Level 16 Black Market Patch, Generals Order, Incineraptor, Synthetic Control Core, or Onyx Core Gold Prize Box - Chance to win a Level 16 Black Market Patch, Generals Order, Incineraptor, Synthetic Control Core, Onyx Core, Hacker's Patch, Vermillion Core, Cerulean Core, or SP 5000 Silver Prize Box - Decreased chance to win prizes from the Platinum and Gold boxes, plus a 30% Troop Accelerator, SP 1000, Incendiary Core, or Decimator Core Bronze Prize Box - Decreased chance to win prizes from Gold and Silver Boxes plus Troops and Speed Ups
The next 10 players in each sector will receive a variety of great prizes as well!
In addition to these overall prizes, Daily Prizes are now available for the top 3 players an a given day as well as Achievement Prizes once you pass certain Force Thresholds! Check the in game leaderboard for more details.
This Tournament ends on May 30th at 11:00 PM PST, so make sure to get started today. Good luck!

hash.message.body.05102013flagmonument:
The new Banner Monument building has been released!
Slow down incoming enemy troops that come near the Banner Monument by building and upgrading this new building! Personalize your base even further by equipping unique banners to the Banner Monument!
Be sure to build the Banner Monument on your base today and equip it with one of the many flags available in the building’s Equip modal!
hash.daily.text.20130125decimatorcoresale: Decimator Cores and Racks will be on Sale for a Limited Time! Check the Featured Tab of the shop to get yours today!
hash.daily.text.allianceforums: Take advantage of alliance-only, private forums and win prizes for every alliance member!

hash.message.body.20130704forcetournamentremi:
Today is the Last Day to Participate in our latest July 4th Engineering Lab and Building Force Tournament!
All Force earned through troop training, building, researching, equipment upgrading, and General Skill upgrading will contribute to your Tournament AND Leaderboard rankings but that's not all! In addition, Engineering Lab Part Upgrades and Building Force Points will be TRIPLED(x3) for the duration of the tournament!
The top 40 players on each sector will each qualify for Prizes, the most ever from any Force Tournament!
Items such as Ruby Cores, Black Market Patches, Generals Orders and other building Cores can be won but that's not all! We will also be introducing brand new 3.0 Enhancement Tokens, offering exponentially greater benefits when attached to your Engineering Lab Parts! Make sure to check the Tournament Leaderboard in game for an exact breakdown on the new prize structure.
In addition to these overall prizes, Daily Prizes will be available for the top 3 players an a given day as well as Achievement Prizes that can be warned once you pass certain Force Thresholds! Check the in game leaderboard for this breakdown as well.
This Tournament ends tonight at 11:00 PM PDT, Good luck!
-- Edgeworld Team

hash.message.body.04022013fireproof: The Cerulean Fireproof Shield is a brand new smart AI equipment that protects your turrets from explosive fire damage from Bombas! This equipment’s defense against explosive fire damage improves rapidly as it is upgraded. In addition to this smart AI, equipping this part will also significantly increase the turret's health as well as the number of targets that it can attack simultaneously! Purchase a Fireproof Shield Box today for a chance to win one of these rare parts and vanquish your enemies! Other items in the mystery box include Hacker's Patches and Accelerators!

hash.message.subject.20130404spendevent:
Still need a few extra Synthetic Control Cores to round out your research and increase the power of your current and future Incineraptors? Spend Platinum and receive FREE Synthetic Control Core Mystery Boxes!
Spend the following amounts of Platinum during the current Total Force Tournament and before the deadline to qualify for your FREE Synthetic Control Core Mystery Boxes which can contain exclusive Synthetic Control Cores, Scarbide Ingots, Bomba's, and other Troop Bundles!
Spend 225 Platinum and get 15 Synthetic Control Core Mystery Boxes Spend 400 Platinum and get 35 Synthetic Control Core Mystery Boxes Spend 1,000 Platinum or greater and get 110 Synthetic Control Core Mystery Boxes!
This unique offer starts today and will end at 11:59pm PST on April 6th. The prizes will be distributed onto the server in which Platinum was spent and added to your Inventory within 3 business days of this event's conclusion.

hash.message.body.tourneyredo:
A 12-hour Tournament just ended, but brand new 4 DAY Generals and Training Force Tournament has just begun! You may have noticed that the last tournament ran only for twelve hours, rather than the usual four. Now you can double your chances at winning great, NEWLY IMPROVED rewards from our Prize Boxes!
The 1st, 2nd and 3rd place finishers will receive the newest Engineering Lab Part, the Cerulean Network Sabotage! This powerful part will help you defeat Battlecruisers AND it comes already upgraded to Level 10!
All Force earned through troop training, building, researching, equipment upgrading, and General Skill upgrading will contribute to your Tournament AND Leaderboard rankings but that's not all! In addition, Generals and Training Force Points will be TRIPLED(x3) for the duration of the tournament!
The top 10 players on each sector will each qualify for NEWLY UPDATED Tournament Prize Boxes, which contain the following awesome new prizes:
Platinum Prize Box - Guarantees numerous Level 16 Black Market Patches, Generals Orders, Incineraptors, Synthetic Control Cores, or Onyx Cores Gold Prize Box - Chance to win several Level 16 Black Market Patches, Generals Orders, Incineraptors, Synthetic Control Cores, Onyx Cores, Hacker's Patches, Vermillion Cores, Cerulean Cores, or SP 5000s Silver Prize Box - Decreased chance to win prizes from the Platinum and Gold boxes, plus 50% Troop Accelerators, SP 1000s, Incendiary Cores, or Decimator Cores Bronze Prize Box - Decreased chance to win prizes from Gold and Silver Boxes plus Troops or Speed Ups
The next 10 players in each sector will receive a variety of great prizes as well! Check the in game leaderboard for more details.
In addition to these overall prizes, Daily Prizes are now available for the top 3 players an a given day as well as Achievement Prizes once you pass certain Force Thresholds! Check the in game leaderboard for more details.
This Tournament ends on September 7 at 11:59 PM PDT, so be sure to get started today. Good luck!
-- Edgeworld Team
hash.items.crystal20m.name: 20,000,000 Crystals
hash.message.body.20121029neutronmine:
Neutron Mines have been rebalanced, receiving buffs to their overall effectiveness!
No longer will your mine detonate on impact, and has become a permanent structure and part of your base defense! The attack power of these Mines has also been increased with each upgrade level, granting you even more bang for your buck above any other single turret in the game!
The requirements for building Neutron Mines will remain the same, so make sure to check them out if you have a Level 9 or higher factory...and if you don't, what are you waiting for? Build and upgrade your mines today before your enemies take advantage!

hash.message.body.20130318charity:
Hey all, We here at Kabam do our best to support great charities around the world. In an effort to bring that opportunity to our players, we will be making a "Doctors Without Borders" charity crate available in the store today and give 100% of the item’s net proceeds to the Doctors Without Borders charity!
The crate will contain the following items:
1x Decimator Rack, 1x Incendiary Rack and 1x 30% Training Accelerators!
This is a 235 platinum value for only 99 platinum! When the sale concludes on Wednesday, March 20, we will make a donation to Doctors Without Borders on behalf of the Kabam Community.
We hope that you will join us in this effort to raise donations for this great organization.
Thank you, The Edgeworld Team Kabam, Inc.

hash.message.body.20130208buildathonreminder:
Today is the last day to participate in our Defense Sim, Defense Lab, and Warp Gate Build-a-thon!
Begin and complete builds for your Defense Sim, Defense Lab, or your Warp Gate before 11:59pm PST tonight (Feb 11th) for a chance to win 1000 Platinum!
Five winners will be randomly selected, and prizes will be awarded within 3 business days of this event's conclusion
hash.message.body.20121031reliefcrate:
Hey all,
We here at Kabam have been watching closely as the destruction and tragedies of Hurricane Sandy have been unfolding on the East Coast. We have also been moved by the compassion and response demonstrated by the efforts to raise money in support of the relief and aid of those affected. In support of these efforts and in response to this disaster, Edgeworld, as well as other Kabam games, will be collecting donations through the sale of Relief items.
We will be making available in the shop a "Sandy Relief Crate" which will contain the following items:
3x Decimator Racks, 3x 30% Training Accelerators, and 5x Zoot's Minigame Tokens!
100% of the net proceeds received from the mystery box sales will go towards the Red Cross for Hurricane Relief Charity.
When all sales are complete, we will make the donation to the Red Cross on the behalf of the Kabam Community and Kabam, Inc., to the victims of Hurricane Sandy. We hope that you will join us in this effort to raise donations for those affected by this tragedy.
Thank you,
The Edgeworld Team Kabam, Inc.

hash.message.body.20130327caldera2backstory:
Our Scouts have uncovered the ruins of an abandoned Cerulean Base located in a previously unknown Barren Landscape on Cerulea IV. Many Craters dot the landscape, but evidence suggests that these were not from celestial impact but from localized explosives.
What was so important that the Celureans destroyed these structures on their way out?
No better way to find out then to claim this Outpost for our own! Simply obtain the Caldera-2 schematic, then you can begin construction in this new location!

Purchase one of the following platinum packages between 10:00am PST today (May 15th) and 11:59pm PST on May 16th, you'll qualify for the following bonus:
Buy the 225 Platinum Pack - Get 2 Hacker's Patches Buy the 400 Platinum Pack - Get 1 Renegade Crate Buy the 1000 Platinum Pack or higher - Get 1 Renegade Crate and 5 Hacker's Patches! (100% Free Value!)
Please keep in mind that you can only qualify for one of these offers, so purchase the right package! Prizes will be distributed after the conclusion of this event.

On 12/11 PST, we will draw 10 lucky winners who will each receive 500 PLATINUM! But wait, we will then draw an additional 50 winners to receive a stack of 5 FROZEN BOXES!
Remember, it just takes one star to win! Good luck, Commander!

hash.message.body.zootantigeneral:
Our scouts have intercepted enemy transmissions about some new Tech approaching Cerulea IV. This defensive technology seems to have an affect on our General’s capabilities and some of their Special Damage-Dealing Attack Skills. We are doing our best to capture this information and harness the power in our E-Lab. This rogue equipment will be extremely powerful and very exclusive. Stay tuned on ways to acquire this tech and Sabotage your opponents!
-Zoot

hash.message.foundersgift.body:
From everyone here on the Edgeworld team, we would like to thank you for helping make this game so awesome over the last year! Together, we’ve come a long way in making this one of Kabam’s greatest games and we have some exciting new features we know you’ll love yet to come! We’re looking forward to sharing another fantastic year with you!
Sincerely,
Daria – Associate Producer

hash.message.body.20130222smartpart2:
Two new powerful parts have been made available for the Engineering Lab, Cerulean Damage Sensors and Cerulean Central Protection Parts!
Cerulean Damage Sensors will greatly increase your turret's Range and Damage but that's not all! These parts come equipped with a "Smart" AI that will cause your turrets to target units with the "lowest" health, almost assuredly finishing them off.
Cerulean Central Protection parts will greatly increase Splash Radius and provide multi-targeting capabilities, but once again there's more. The Central Protection's Smart AI will automatically switch to and target any units that take a shot towards your command center, further aiding in your base defense
The only way to acquire these items are through our new Smart Part Mystery Crate! This crate will not only give you a chance to take home this new premium part, but can also net you other great items like General SP Racks and Hacker's Patches! Visit the featured tab of the store to get yours today!

There has never been a better time to buy! Don't miss out on what your new Outpost has to offer, which includes additional Warp Gates, Bomba Units, and the newly unlocked Fleet Academy and Engineering Labs!

hash.message.body.20130604enhancetokenrelease:
Today we are happy to announce the launch of an exciting new feature, Engineering Lab Part Enhancements! Now you will have the ability to further customize your Engineering Lab Parts and by extension your base defenses to further combat your enemies in Edgeworld.
What exactly are Enhancements?
Enhancements are additional bonuses that can be applied to your existing Engineering Lab Parts through the use of new "Enhancement Tokens". Each Lab part now will have 2 available Enhancement Slots, so if you fill these slots your existing parts will instantly become more powerful!
These Enhancement Tokens will not provide flat bonuses, however, but are tied to the Upgrade level of the Engineering Lab part it is attached to. This means that these bonuses will scale along with the upgrade level of the part, and will increase just like any normal part stat.
Here are the steps to take in order to get started:
1. Visit the "Parts" tab within your Engineering Lab and left click on the desired Engineering Lab Part to bring up the item menu 2. Select the new "Enhancements" option 3. Here you will see a list of Enhancement Tokens you either own or are able to purchase. Click on the desired token and click "Enhance" to add the effect to your Engineering Lab Part! 4. Now you can view the extra stats that have been added to your part, and once equipped will instantly increase your defense!
How can you get your hands on these new tokens? Currently there are 2 ways!
1. 3 basic tokens will initially be available for purchase in the Enhancement Screen of each part. -Armor Token - Applies a small scaling Health Boost -Piercing Ammo Token - Applies a small scaling Damage Boost -Explosive Ammo Token - Applies a small scaling Boost to Splash Radius
2. In addition to these basic tokens, 5 others will be available through the Wheel Game! These following 5 possess a higher power level then the previous 3 listed: -Armor Token 2.0 - Applies a larger scaling Health Boost -Piercing Ammo Token 2.0 - Applies a larger scaling Damage Boost -Explosive Ammo Token 2.0 - Applies a larger scaling Boost to Splash Radius -Scope Token - Applies a bonus to the part's Range -Liquid Coolant - Applies a bonus to the part's Attacks per Minute

hash.message.body.20130828newsector:
Ceti Alpha 7, the newest Sector in Cerulea IV, is now open for battle!
Ceti Alpha 7 is the newest territorial expansion in Edgeworld and is open for players to compete for dominance! Enter this new sector, build up your base, form an alliance and dominate the map to gain control of the sector!
Remember, you have three new Base configurations to choose from on Ceti Alpha 7: Basic, Upgraded and Elite!
Basic: Includes Level 1 Buildings such as the Command Center, Crystal Mine, Gas Refinery, Warp Gate, Staging Area and Defense Simulator!
Upgraded: Includes Level 5 Buildings such as the Command Center, Defense Lab, Tech Lab, Barracks, Warp Gate, Staging Area, Engineering Lab, 18 turrets and much more!
Elite: Includes Level 8 Buildings such as the Command Center, Defense Lab, Tech Lab, Barracks, Warp Gate, Staging Area, Generals Quarters, 36 turrets and much more!
Take advantage of these great offers when joining Ceti Alpha and get ahead of the competition today!

hash.message.body.20130528advancedtargeting:
The New Cerulean Advanced Targeting is a brand new smart AI equipment that will seek out and fire on enemy Generals! This equipment is designed to help neutralize these threats first before they dominate the battlefield.
In addition to this new smart AI, equipping this part will also significantly increase the turret's damage as well as it's range, providing the firepower and cope to target and destroy these tough threats from afar!
Purchase a Cerulean Advanced Targeting Box today for a chance to win one of these rare parts and greatly increase your defense against Generals! Other items within this Box can include Cerulean Cores, Decimater Cores, Spp5000 and more!
This box will only be available for a Limited Time, so stock up today.
hash.message.20120824pyros.body: Thank you for participating in our recent Pyro Training event! A Renegade Crate has been added to your inventory.
hash.ew.error.cannot-train-here: You cannot train this unit at this base
hash.items.marine3000.description: Instantly trains 3000 Marines without using your Factory or any resources.
hash.items.heavyradialscope.name: Heavy Radial Scope
hash.missions.mutent-phunn-klub-4.description: What's that on your forehead? Oh, I see... but not as well as you. My, what a great place for a third eye!

hash.message.subject.08162013mysteryboxred: Train Incineraptors with the SCC Mystery Box!
hash.buildings.crystalmine.name: Crystal Mine
hash.missions.military-isotopics.description: It's been discovered that by manipulating ore at the sub-atomic level, we can drastically boost our production of weapons-grade depleted uranium. I'm rather embarrassed I didn't think of this sooner. My face would be red, if that were one of my UI options.
hash.missions.tesla-optics.name: Tesla Optics
hash.message.100711winner.body: You crushed the Factions, and proved who owns this planet. You’ve been chosen as a winner in our Faction Counterattack Contest! We’ve added 250 Platinum to your account. Thanks for playing Edgeworld!
hash.message.body.20120831pyroevent: Zoot claims to have possibly found an....unsavory....way to reproduce a valuable piece of Cerulean Technology--the Incendiary Core. This involves the remains of a Pyro that has died in a very particular way--Horribly. In order to make this experiment a success, he needs visual evidence in order to confirm which Pyros met the criteria. Respond to this thread with screenshots and video captures of the most savage, gruesome display of...test subjects. Zoot will open up his stockpiles and provide a Cerulean Rack to the five commanders who provide the best material as well as their Name and Sector before Friday, September 7th at 12:00pm PST Disclaimer: Submissions become the property of Zoot in order for research purposes, and possibly an intergalactic pay-per-view event. For full rules and to submit your entry, click here!
hash.items.stromflag.name: General Strom Flag

1x Crystal Nanos (1 Day)
1x Gas Nanos (1 Day)
1x Energy Nanos (1 Day)
1x Uranium Nanos (1 Day)
hash.message.body.05092013bannerbat:
In honor of the Banner Monument's release, upgrade your Banner Monument and win an exclusive, unpurchasable banner!
The first three players to complete a Level 16 Banner Monument building upgrade on one of their colonies between now and 11:00pm PST on May 16th will receive a unique banner that cannot be purchased in the store! An additional five randomly chosen players who successfully complete a Level 10 or higher Banner Monument upgrade in that time will take home a General’s Order to level up their favorite General!
Prizes will be paid out to the winners by Wednesday, May 22nd at 11:00pm PDT.
With the unique opportunity to win an exclusive, unpurchasable banner for your new Banner Monument building, be sure to upgrade your building today!
hash.daily.text.vermillionammodeliverymb: Win the Level 1, 10, or 15 Vermillion Ammo Delivery! Also win Ruby Cores, General’s Orders, Patches and more!
hash.daily.text.20130620forcetournamentlongme:
All Force earned through troop training, building, researching, equipment upgrading, and General Skill upgrading will contribute to your Tournament AND Leaderboard rankings but that's not all! In addition, General SP and GO upgrades as well as Research Force gain will be TRIPLED(x3) for the duration of the tournament!
The 1st place winner in each sector will receive a new Ruby Core for Level 17 building upgrades as well as 600 platinum for their efforts! The next 2nd and 3rd place winners will receive Platinum Prize Boxes which have a chance to provide Ruby Cores!
In addition to these overall prizes, Daily Prizes are now available for the top 3 players a given day as well as Achievement Prizes once you pass certain Force Thresholds! Check the in game leaderboard for more details.
hash.missions.hax8accelerator.description: Shorten Building, Research, or Training time by 8 hours.

hash.items.flag8.description: Banner to be equipped to Banner Monument
hash.missions.tall-revere.name: Tall Revere
hash.daily.text.vermillionarmor: Visit the Featured Tab of the Shop to get your Guaranteed Vermillion Armor Part in the Vermillion Armor Box!
hash.items.calderabox.description: Scavenged from the Caldera-2 planet, these crates could contain Hacker's Patches, Black Market Patch 16s, 10 Berserkers, 10 Decimators, or a coveted Colony Schematic for Caldera-2
hash.missions.molecular-refining.description: By combining Cerulean extractor scarabs with our own technology, we can develop nanomachines that will seek out and destroy impurities at a molecular level.
hash.message.body.07182013craftingfaqshort: In order to access this new feature, click ‘View Equipment’ on your Engineering Lab building and the click the ‘Craft’ tab to find the new crafting recipes that you can use to make new Equipment Parts and Mystery Boxes. The Tier 1 Rare Part Box provides you with the lowest chance to get a Rare Equipment Part with 3 Bonuses, and that chance is increased dramatically through the Tier 3 Rare Part Box that GUARANTEES you a Rare Equipment Part with 3 bonuses! Each Rare Part Box has two crafting recipes, one that uses Basic Equipment Parts and one that uses Rare Equipment Parts, so be sure to check out the Craft tab in the Engineering Lab for more information on these recipes!

hash.promotion.decembertwitter.subject: 12 Alien Holiday Giveaways!
hash.message.body.20130801aurora1sale:
For a limited time only, the Aurora-1 Colony is on sale in the Edgeworld Store!
The Aurora-1 Schematic is on sale for 49 Platinum, the lowest price it has ever been in the store!
Expanding your base into the Aurora-1 Colony helps strengthen your defenses and supports the fight for dominance over Cerulea IV. With additional Training queues and Warp Gates as well as an exclusive Bomba Unit, Aurora-1 is an essential expansion for every Commander.
Make sure to check the featured tab of the store and get yours today!

hash.message.body.20130418level16buildathon:
Level 16 has been released, and with it a new power that will sweep the Universe of Edgeworld. If you haven't yet experienced these new structures, what are you waiting for?
Simply complete a Level 16 build of any structure and you will qualify to receive a FREE Black Market Patch, guaranteeing a successful Level 16 Engineering Lab Part Upgrade!
Each player can qualify multiple times, so every level 16 structure completed between now and 11:59pm PDT on April 21st will guarantee a FREE Black Market Patch!
Winners will be determined and prizes delivered within 3 business days of this event's conclusion. Level your buildings up and experience the awesome power of Level 16 today!

hash.message.body.20121121zootsjackpot:
Thanksgiving is just around the corner, and Zoot's Jackpot will be available again for a Limited Time!
Play today and you can win items like Decimator Cores, Hacker's Patches, Builders Boxes, Annihilator Crates, Platinum, but that's not all! Each play could also be the one that takes home the Jackpot!
Click on the "Z" icon next to your Mailbox to check out this new version of Zoot's Jackpot today! This event will only be available for a Limited Time, so make sure to take advantage before the 11:59pm PST deadline on November 26th!
hash.message.body.20121005purchaseplat: Right now, from 10:00am PST on October 5th until 11:59pm PST on October 8th, for every 100 platinum purchased, you will receive an entry to win 10,000 FREE PLATINUM! There is no limit on the number of entries! Five lucky winners will be chosen on October 9th and platinum prizes will be distributed that same day!
hash.missions.bang-your-head.description: The factory workers enjoy listening to synthetic pulse-metal as they work. Personally, I don't enjoy that genre of music, but I've discovered that if we speed up the BPM, we can make them work faster. But that music is really heavy stuff, and if we speed it up too fast, we risk coronary thrombosis. There's a sweet spot, Commander.
hash.missions.obliteration-protocol.objective: Destroy the Command Center in a Level 2000 Confederate base.

hash.missions.form-pyro-unit.description: Commander, have you ever seen a line of ten humans without a single eyebrow between them? No? Do you want to?

*Kabam.com Exclusive Mission*

Our scouting patrols have been known to intercept cargo shipments from time to time from enemy factions or pirates. It looks like they've brought something back from their latest encounter.

hash.message.body.20130413forcetournamentremi:
Today is the Last Day to Participate in our latest Total Force Tournament!
All Force earned through troop training, building, researching, equipment upgrading, General Skill upgrading and PvP will contribute to your leaderboard ranking but that's not all! Force gained from building, troop training, and equipment upgrading will be DOUBLED (x2) throughout the duration!
The top 40 players on each sector will win valuable prizes such as Premium Troops, Mystery Boxes, Trophies, and most importantly bragging rights for your sector!
This Tournament ends tonight at 11:00 PM PDT, so prepare your final push!
-- Edgeworld Team
hash.missions.compassion.description: Using Scarbide infusions, we've finally found a way to improve the longevity of our Pyro troops! With these involuntary, painful infusions, it will take 18% longer for a Pyro to burn to death.
hash.missions.recover-the-scarbide-ingot.desc: Commander, we have received word that the Erazi have found Cerulean artifact of scientific importance. Let's destroy their base, and recover it for ourselves!
hash.message.body.20120913labtimereminder:
For a short remaining time, Engineering Lab upgrade times are reduced by 95%! If you haven't uncovered the secrets of this building, there has never been a better time to check it out!
The Engineering Lab allows you to attach "parts" to your turrets which will greatly increase their power! Take advantage of this opportunity to upgrade your lab to the max so you can improve the effectiveness of your base defenses!
This event ENDS at 5:00 PM PST September 19th.
hash.missions.spectral-assist.description: The more Specters, the more damage you'll do before your troops are within enemy range.
hash.daily.text.20130715forcetournamentlongme:
All Force earned through troop training, building, researching, equipment upgrading, and General Skill upgrading will contribute to your Tournament AND Leaderboard rankings but that's not all! In addition, Generals and Engineering Lab Part Upgrading Force Points will be TRIPLED(x3) for the duration of the tournament!
The top 40 players on each sector will each qualify for Prizes, the most ever from any Force Tournament!
Items such as Ruby Cores, Black Market Patches, Generals Orders and other building Cores can be won but that's not all! We will also be giving out the brand new 3.0 Enhancement Tokens, offering exponentially greater benefits when attached to your Engineering Lab Parts! Make sure to check the Tournament Leaderboard in game for an exact breakdown on the new prize structure.
In addition to these overall prizes, Daily Prizes will be available for the top 3 players in a given day as well as Achievement Prizes that can be warned once you pass certain Force Thresholds! Check the in game leaderboard for this breakdown as well.
hash.items.decimatorrack.name: Decimator Rack
hash.message.body.08052013onyxcore:
The Onyx Core is in the Store now for 50% OFF, the LOWEST PRICE for them yet!
Onyx Cores are required for offensive research, defensive research and training the new powerful Caldera-2 exclusive Battle Cruiser unit!
These Onyx Cores will only be on SALE for a short time, so be sure to stock up now before it's too late!
hash.daily.text.04112013battlecruiser: Build and Research the Battle Cruiser with the Onyx Core Today!
hash.messsage.body.20130201trooprebalance:
Commander,
Improvements in armor and weaponry have resulted in improvements in troop performance as well as reduced research time to train superior soldiers.
To see new updates check your tech lab to see rebalanced research times as well as your Barracks, Factory and Fleet Academy to see improved stats for existing units.
hash.missions.necrotic-venom.description: The venom we've extracted from the stingers of the Lancer is highly necrotic; by synthesizing it and incorporating the byproduct into their weapons systems, we've successfully merged nature with mad science. Such a nice feeling.
hash.activerecord.errors.models.store-purchas: This item is no longer on sale. Please reload the game to get the most recent prices
hash.message.body.07172013spendevent:
Spend Platinum to win Cerulean Armor Mystery Boxes that may contain the Cerulean Armor Equipment Part, one of the strongest equipment parts in all of Edgeworld!
Every 100 Platinum you spend between now and 11:59pm PST on August 9 will net you 10 FREE Cerulean Armor Mystery Boxes! Each player can qualify and receive up to a maximum of 200 Cerulean Armor Mystery Boxes for this promotion, so be sure to take advantage of this offer before it’s too late!
hash.message.body.forandromeda:
Congratulations! Your Sector has been chosen for an exclusive first look at our Tournament Maps feature.
This is a 24 hour event on a special map in which after the event is over, those who you have fought their way to the top will be rewarded.
You can see the terms of the tournament, as well as the prizes on offer by opening the Map and selecting the available Tournament Map from the tabs at the top.
Please keep in mind that at the end of the Tournament the special Tournament map will be refreshed, so every tournament is a fresh chance to dominate!

hash.message.body.20130418lvl16wheel:
Level 16 has been released, and here is your chance to get your hands on some 99% Building Accelerators to help you get started!
Spin the wheel for your chance to take home one of these highly sought after accelerators, which will help you finish any build almost instantly regardless of level!
Other Premium Wheel Game prizes include Incineraptors, Synthetic Control Cores, Hacker's Patches, and much more!
The Wheel Game will only last for a Limited Time so don't delay. Spin now and stock up before it's too late!

hash.message.body.20130508buyevent:
Want to get your hands on Edgeworld's fastest accelerators? Purchase Platinum today and receive FREE 99% Building Accelerators!
Simply purchase one of the following Platinum Packages before the deadline to qualify for your FREE Accelerators!
Buy the 225 Platinum Pack and get 3 8-Hour Accelerators! Buy the 400 Platinum Pack and get 1 99% Building Accelerator! Buy the 1000 Platinum Pack or greater and get 2 99% Building Accelerators!
This unique offer starts now and will end at 11:59pm PST on May 9th. You will receive your Accelerators only for the largest Platinum purchase made between these times. The prizes will be distributed onto the server in which Platinum was purchased and added to your Inventory by 12:00pm PST on May 11th in time to use for the Force Tournament!

hash.message.body.7-16-upgradecommandcenter:
The Command Center is located in the heart of every base and now you can win Platinum for upgrading this powerful building!
Depending on the level of your Command Center at the end of the event, you'll be entered to win these prizes:
Level 10 - 100 Platinum Level 11 - 250 Platinum Level 12 - 500 Platinum
But hurry-- this event ends at 12:00 PM PST on July 23rd, 2012.
A total of 10 lucky winners from each Commander Center level will be chosen. Prizes will be awarded by July 26th, 2012.
Good luck, Commander!

hash.message.body.20130524iavacharitycratesho:
In an effort to honor Memorial Day in the U.S., we will be making a *limited edition* charity bundle to benefit Iraq and Afghanistan Veterans of America (IAVA) available in the store starting today. The bundle will contain the following items:
1 x Vermillion Core 1 x Scarbide Rack 1 x 30% Training Accelerator
This is a savings of nearly 200%!
When the sale concludes on Sunday June 2nd, 100% of the IAVA Charity Bundle’s net proceeds will be donated to Iraq and Afghanistan Veterans of America on behalf of the Kabam community! Thank you for your support!

hash.message.body.20121207content:
Congratulations, Commander! It has been weeks of hard-fought battles, but we have finally put down the rampaging Terraknor. It should go without saying that between us and almost every other force on this planet that the Terraknor have been taken to extinction. No matter, as they were far too unstable for long term military application. That said, we have been able to re-purpose the Cerulea Controller items to be more general purpose, and I’ve already identified another specimen of Cerulean fauna that can be suitably….."weaponized":
I call it the Lancer!
hash.deconstructor.dialog.description: Deconstructing buildings will recover half of their build resources.

hash.items.mysteryboxred.description: Open for a chance to win the following: 1x Synthetic Control Core 1x Incineraptor 2x Battle Cruiser 200x Bombas 100x Bombas 100x Shrikes 100x Titans
hash.message.720apology.body:
Edgeworld has run into a few rough spots this week. Many players are ending up with upgrades or research stuck, receiving blank messages in their mail, or being forced to refresh the game every time they load.

The Edgeworld team really appreciates the patience of all our players, and the helpful and informative messages you've been sending us through our help desk. Our engineers have prepared a fix for the problem, and you should be seeing dramatic improvements by the end of the week. If you're still having problems, please send us a message using the 'Help' link beneath the game window.

As a gesture of thanks while we work through this, we're giving three Zoot Tokens to every player. Those Tokens will be added to your inventory automatically. Good luck, and thank you for playing Edgeworld!
hash.message.subject.04022013fireproof: Win a Cerulean Fireproof Shield Part!
hash.missions.snipertower3.description: A few minutes' worth of adjustments and a barrel or two of uranium and we can squeeze some additional firepower out of these turrets.
hash.items.max15equipmentboost.name: Modder's Patch
hash.playerfeedback.invite.body:
As one of our valued players, we'd like your feedback on how Edgeworld can serve'you better. Your comments and suggestions are very important to us, so we’d love to hear from you! Please help us by taking a short survey and participating in a moderated chat session.

If you are able to participate, you will receive a $50 Amazon gift card and be entered into a sweepstakes for another $50 Amazon gift card.

To begin, please click on the link below. If this does not work, please cut and paste the address into your web browser.

http://survey.confirmit.com/wix/p1752505458.aspx?SAM=2

Thank you for your participation. Your insight is invaluable to us.

Sincerely,

James Holloway
Executive Producer
hash.message.body.20120830platpurchase:
Only a short while remains on this offer! Purchase any Platinum package of 1000 Platinum or greater and receive 3 FREE Incendiary Cores AND 3 FREE Modder’s Patches for the brand new Engineering Lab before 12:0 PM PDT August 31st!
Don’t miss your chance at claiming this great offer! Act now and receive this bonus pack valued at over 150 Platinum! This package will be distributed on Friday August 31st.
hash.message.body.tokenspendevent:
Starting now, spending Platinum will earn you even more rewards! We have amazing prizes to give out just for spending Platinum!
For every 100 Platinum you spend, you’ll get one Guaranteed Token Mystery Box! This box is filled with 1.0, 2.0 and 3.0 tokens and could contain our newest Token, the Cerulean Network Sabotage Token! Limit 20 per Player, per Sector.
Spend 1,000 Platinum and get a Level 10 Cerulean Meteoric Shield!
Spend 2,000 Platinum and get our biggest and baddest part, the Cerulean Network Sabotage at Level 10!
This deal will only be available for the next 24 hours so make those purchases count! Prizes will be awarded by August 31, 2013.
hash.message.subject.researchbuilding:
Build the NEW Resource Converter, and use it to transform any resource into another resource!
Find yourself running low on Uranium or Energy? Holding a huge stockpile of Crystal or Gas? Use the Resource Converter to transform your unwanted inventory into valuable assets!
hash.missions.rocketeering-raiders.descriptio: In order to more effectively obtain resources, we've used some of our Scarbide material to improve the jet packs on our Raiders. That should help them get in there and get us those resources!
hash.missions.horn-section.description: Rhinos are already hardened soldiers. The more you train them, the more devastation they deal.
hash.missions.punish-the-weak.description: Pulse Tank upgrades are nearly finished. This devastating engine can take (and deliver) a great deal of punishment, which means that it can be used to single-handedly destroy the poorly-defended bases of novice Commanders. Just a thought.

This is an extremely limited time offer valid ONLY on your first Platinum purchase - so act now if you haven't already! Cerulean Cores will be distributed by December 10th.

For ONE MORE DAY, until 11:59 PM PDT December 7th, make any purchase of 65 Platinum or more from the store and receive 15 FREE Cerulean Cores, a 600 Platinum Value!

hash.message.body.07182013craftingfaq:
The BRAND NEW Equipment Part Crafting system has been released! By taking your Basic and Rare Equipment Parts and combining them with the new Crafting Alloys, you can get even stronger Rare and Cerulean Equipment Parts like the Cerulean Armor!
In order to access this new feature, click ‘View Equipment’ on your Engineering Lab building and the click the ‘Craft’ tab to find the new crafting recipes that you can use to make new Equipment Parts and Mystery Boxes. The Tier 1 Rare Part Box provides you with the lowest chance to get a Rare Equipment Part with 3 Bonuses, and that chance is increased dramatically through the Tier 3 Rare Part Box that GUARANTEES you a Rare Equipment Part with 3 bonuses! Each Rare Part Box has two crafting recipes, one that uses Basic Equipment Parts and one that uses Rare Equipment Parts, so be sure to check out the Craft tab in the Engineering Lab for more information on these recipes.
Start crafting Equipment Parts in your Engineering Lab today!

hash.message.body.hackerspatchmb:
Get Ready for the upcoming 12-Hour FLASH E-Lab Force Tournament with the Hacker’s Patch Mystery Box!
You could win 10 Hacker’s Patches for the price of one!
This box guarantees you 1 Hacker’s Patch, but there is also a chance to win 2, 3, 5 or 10 Hacker’s Patches!
Get your Smart Parts upgraded in a flash!
This FLASH Force Tournament will begin at 12:00am PDT on October 15th and will end at 12:00pm PDT AND feature QUADRUPLED E-Lab Force Points!

hash.message.body.03212013hale:
Introducing General Hale! This new general was the result of Maar experimentation, a human implanted with Cerulean bionics and technology. She has the power to wreak havoc in a technology-driven battlefield!
Her Sabotage ability allows her to rip apart the circuitry of buildings and turrets at a distance, damaging them by a percentage of their health.
Hale's ultimate ability, Psionic Hack allows her to seize control of enemy turrets, turning the base's defenses against itself!
Hale will lend her calamitous power any Commander who has a General's quarters of level 12 or higher.
Check our official forums for more details including a full backstory!

Tesla Tower build times have been reduced by 30% and levels 10-15 will not require Incendiary cores in order to upgrade, so act now! There has never been a better time to power up these Towers and increase your base defenses.
This event will only last until 11:59pm PST tonight, so make sure to get started.

To find out when the next Tournament in your Sector is scheduled, please click HERE!

hash.message.body.20130628defsimbat:
In honor of the newly released Defense Simulator Campaigns for Levels 16 and 17, upgrade your Defense Simulator to Level 16 or 17 today to win Platinum and Ruby Cores!
Five randomly selected players that complete a Level 16 or higher Defense Simulator building upgrade between now and 11:00pm PST on June 30th will receive a Ruby Core! Players that have already upgraded their Defense Simulator to Level 16 will be included in this drawing as well.
Three randomly selected players that complete a Level 17 Defense Simulator building upgrade between now and 11:00pm PST on June 30th will receive 1,000 PLATINUM! Players that have already upgraded their Defense Simulator to Level 17 will be included in this drawing as well.
Prizes will be paid out to the winners within three business days. Don’t wait to upgrade your Defense Simulator to get a chance to win Platinum and Ruby Cores today!

In addition to having a great chance to win a Level 1 Cerulean Advanced Targeting part, you will also have a chance to win both Level 5 and Level 15 versions of the part! Other items within this Box include Cerulean Cores, Decimator Cores, Spp5000 and more!

Zoot's inviting everyone to his Platinum giveaway party! He's giving away TWO 1,000 PLATINUM PRIZES ON EVERY SECTOR!

To win, you just have to play Zoot's Loot! Every time you play Zoot's Loot this weekend or use a Zoot Token, you've got another chance to win!

Zoot's giving out OVER 50,000 PLATINUM IN PRIZES, and we'll announce the winners Monday! Visit the shop and get your Zoot Tokens NOW!
hash.message.body.20130430forcetournamentremi:
Today is the Last Day to Participate in our latest Troop Training and General SP Force Tournament!
All Force earned through Troop Training and General SP and orders upgrades will contribute to your leaderboard ranking but that's not all! All Force gained from these methods have been TRIPLED(x3) for the duration of the tournament!
The top 10 players on each sector will each qualify for new and increased payouts of valuable prizes in the form of Tournament Prize Boxes, which contain the following:
Platinum Prize Box - Guarantees a Level 16 Black Market Patch, Generals Order, Incineraptor, Synthetic Control Core, or Onyx Core
Gold Prize Box - Chance to win a Level 16 Black Market Patch, Generals Order, Incineraptor, Synthetic Control Core, Onyx Core, Hacker's Patch, Vermillion Core, Cerulean Core, or SP 5000
Silver Prize Box - Decreased chance to win prizes from the Platinum and Gold boxes, plus a 30% Troop Accelerator, SP 1000, Incendiary Core, or Decimator Core
Bronze Prize Box - Decreased chance to win prizes from Gold and Silver Boxes plus Troops and Speed Ups
This Tournament ends tonight at 11:59 PM PDT, Good luck!
-- Edgeworld Team

hash.message.body.20121116herobuyevent:
Generals are just around the corner, get a head start by winning some skill points!
From now until 11:59pm PST on November 18th, every 200 Platinum purchased will qualify you to receive an exclusive Heroes Mystery Box which will guarantee to contain at least 100 Skill Points for your General but that's not all! Each box also comes with a chance to contain an item which can grant 1000 or even 5000 Skill Points!
Skill Points can be used to level up your General's abilities which can range from passive boosts to your base to more active boosts to your troops in combat. More information on this feature can be found on the forums, so check our official announcement for more details:
<link>
This event will end at 11:59pm PST on November 18th, so make your purchases now before these Skill Point items are released to the public! Results from this event will be compiled and mystery boxes delivered on the day of this new release next week!
hash.message.body.20130410dragonbox:
The Might of the Incineraptor was showcased with their release within the latest Defense Sim Campaign, here is your chance to win one and employ it on your side of the Battlefield!
Simply purchase one of our new Incineraptor Mystery Boxes for a chance to take home this exclusive, new, and untrainable troop!
Other premium Troop Bundles featuring Sentinels, Berserkers, and Devestators can be won as well!
The Incineraptor can not be trained, and this Mystery Box is one of the only ways to get one! This box will only be available for a Limited Time, so visit the featured tab of the shop and pick yours up today!

hash.message.body.2012junealliancecontest:
Win prizes for strengthening your Alliance!
From 12:00pm PDT on July 2nd until 12:00pm PDT July 5th, prizes will be distributed to the highest power gaining Alliances!
The top gaining alliance will win a Cerulean Core for each of its members. The 2nd best performing Alliance will win an Incendiary Core for each member. Finally, the 3rd place Alliance will win a 2.5-Hour Accelerator for each member.
Please note this contest is limited to Alliances with at least 250 Power as of 12:00pm PDT July 2nd.
May the best Alliance prevail!

hash.promotion.octfirstbuyerfridaygoogle.body:
We're extending a special offer to our experienced Edgeworld players!

Purchase a Platinum Package for the first time this weekend, and you'll receive additional bonus Platinum! This is the first time ever that you'll be able to receive bonus Platinum for our low-cost 65 and 155 Platinum Packages!

Visit the Platinum Store through the 'Get Platinum' button at the top of the Edgeworld window.

You have until 2:00 PM PST on Monday, October 24 to make your purchase!

65 Platinum Package / Normal Bonus: 0 / Additional Weekend Bonus: 20 / Total Platinum: 85

155 Platinum Package / Normal Bonus: 0 / Additional Weekend Bonus: 50 / Total Platinum: 205

225 Platinum Package / Normal Bonus: 15 / Additional Weekend Bonus: 75 / Total Platinum: 315

400 Platinum Package / Normal Bonus: 25 / Additional Weekend Bonus: 100 / Total Platinum: 525

1000 Platinum Package / Normal Bonus: 100 / Additional Weekend Bonus: 200 / Total Platinum: 1300

2500 Platinum Package / Normal Bonus: 500 / Additional Weekend Bonus: 500 / Total Platinum: 3500

5000 Platinum Package / Normal Bonus: 1000 / Additional Weekend Bonus: 1000 / Total Platinum: 7000

Platinum is key to your success in Edgeworld! You can use Platinum to speed up your upgrades, instantly train units, earn more XP, and much more!

Full Rules:

Packages must be purchased between 2:00 PM Friday (October 21) and 2:00 PM Monday (October 24), PST.

2:00 PM PST is 9:00 PM GMT and 11:00 PM in Europe.

This bonus is only being offered to players whose accounts are more than 7 days old, and who have never purchased Platinum before. Accounts less than 7 days old can take advantage of our Beginner's Sale to get a similar discount.

The additional bonus Platinum will only apply to your first Platinum purchase. Make it a good one!

hash.message.body.20120824pyros:
It seems like a simple idea, but who is going to do it for you? Marines just have pulse rifles. Lancers spit acid. Pulse Tanks fire ionic explosives, but only one brings power of flame to bear—the Pyro!
Build up your pyro forces! The 10 players who train the most Pyros in a single Sector between August 27th at 12:00pm PST and August 29th at 12:00pm PST will win a Renegade crate! Crates will be distributed by August 31st
Build your Pyros, and win!
hash.buildings.silverbuilding.name: Silver Monument
hash.outage.08312011b.body:
The Edgeworld team continues to investigate issues caused by our maintenance Wednesday. Due to the widespread nature of these issues, all players on all sectors will be compensated fully for their potential time and resource losses.

Each player will receive, in each sector they play in:
Two 2.5-Day Accelerators
4 Million each of Crystal, Gas, Energy, and Uranium, as items
These items should already be in your inventory.

These items should allow you to regain any lost resources and advance any lost research or upgrades back to where they should be.

If you have any continuing problems, please use the Help buttons to send a message to our support team, and we'll respond to you as quickly as possible.

As a side effect of this incident, some players at random may have experienced doubled building upgrades or unit training. We will not be attempting to reclaim these accidental benefits.

Thank you once again for your patience.

Still haven't maxed out your defenses? Still need a few levels of your Sniper, Incendiary, Heavyweight, or your Anti Tank turrets? Now is your chance to purchase Incendiary Cores and Racks at a discounted price! Make sure to check the Daily Update and featured tab of the shop to stock up today!
Build up your turrets and teach those attackers a lesson!

hash.message.sectormaps.body:
Your Sector has been selected as the next Sector to receive the territorial map! The map will be active in your Sector within the next day.

The map is still a work in progress, and as such, there may still be bugs and issues to work through. Please send us your bug reports with the 'Help' link above the game window.

We're still working on the rules of the territorial map, and testing the results. There may be numerous changes over the next few weeks, and we appreciate your patience and your feedback!

Because the map is still under development, it's possible that we'll need to take the map down temporarily to fix issues or improve features. We don't expect to have any map downtime, but if we do, we'll make it as short as possible.

Visit our forums to give us your feedback!

hash.message.body.updatedforcetournament:
A Brand New Force Tournament has begun! This Tournament features a 4x Boost to all Force Points earned through Building and the Engineering Lab!
The Top 4 Finishers will get Prizes, Platinum and Trophies! Additional prizes all the way to 40th place! Check out the Leaderboard to see the updated Prizes!
This Tournament will end on October 20th, 2013 at 11:00pm PDT. Prizes will be paid out within the next business day.
Also, be on the lookout for a new kind of Tournament coming on Tuesday: The Sweet Spot Flash Tournament! We will announce one random, predetermined place between 2nd and 40th that will also receive the 1st Place Prizes! Can you out scheme and outmaneuver your competition and land in the Sweet Spot? Find out on Tuesday, October 22nd!

Level 14 has arrived! With it, you can build more buildings; the size of your Base will increase further, and enjoy new Campaign levels in the Defense Simulator!
Additionally, The Heavyweight Turret has had its health increased to allow it to better protect your base. The Incendiary Turret has experienced an increase in both Damage and Health to make it comparable to the Heavyweight and Sniper Turrets.
