hash.message.allianceforumsbeta.body:
Thank you for being a part of one of the most powerful Alliances in Edgeworld!
We'd like to invite you and your Alliance members to a special preview of our newest feature on Kabam.com! Alliance Forums give you a private venue to communicate with your Alliance, plan attacks, and track your membership.
https://www.kabam.com/edgeworld/alliances/forum
Please share this information with your Alliance, and invite all your members to join us on Kabam.com!
We want your feedback and ideas about this new feature! Send your feedback to us through MOD Alpha, at ChatModAlpha@gmail.com!
This is a beta feature, and is subject to change as we receive your feedback. It's possible that we may need to clear our database before making this feature widely available, and as a result, your Alliance forums may be wiped at the end of the beta period.

hash.message.globalchat.body:
Edgeworld has launched in French, Italian, German, and Spanish!
You may have seen players in your Sector chat speaking in various languages. To give you more control over your Edgeworld chat experience, we created the "Global Chat" and "My Language" chat channels.

By default, My Language is ON and Global Chat is OFF. Global Chat goes to all players in your sector who have Global Chat turned on, regardless of language.

Here are all of our current Chat channels. You can change your settings by clicking on the wrench next to the chat window.

Global Chat Color: Orange
Access Code: /w
Function: Communicates with all players in your Sector who have Global Chat enabled, regardless of language.

My Language
Color: White
Access Code: None
Function: Communicates with all players in your Sector who share your language. Note: English is a language. Currently this feature supports French, Italian, German, and Spanish; any other languages default to English.

Alliance Chat
Color: Blue
Access Code: /a
Function: Communicates with all players in your Alliance.

Group Chat
Color: Green
Access Code: /g
Function: Communicates with all players in your chat group. Click on a name in chat to invite them to your group.

Moderators
Color: Yellow
Access: Work for Kabam
Function: Moderator accounts have bright yellow text. If a Mod talks, you should listen!

hash.promotion.seveneighteen.subject: Monday Winners!
hash.missions.research-marines.description: Marines are a "humans only" outfit who love to be first into combat. This matches my files on human bravery and human stupidity.
hash.missions.enhanced-gravity.description: Raider rifles use gravity to tear down buildings and suck up enemy goods. More g-force equals more loot!

hash.message.body.20130302forcetournamentremi:
Today is the Last Day to Participate in our latest Building and Research Force Tournament!
All Force earned through Building and Research will contribute to your leaderboard ranking with the top 40 netting fabulous prizes such as Platinum, Trophies, and even premium troops!
This Tournament ends on March 4th at 1:00 PM PDT, and if you have any questions on the new force system make sure to visit our forums for more details. Good luck!
-- Edgeworld Team
hash.items.permanentadvancedarmor.promo: Permanently boost the health of your units and turrets!
hash.message.buildforbomba.winner: Congratulations, Commander! We've placed 40 Bomba units in the Staging Area of your main base from our Level 10-11 Building for Bomba contest! Good luck and good hunting!
hash.hero.skills.healthweak.description: Small health boost multiplied by unit transport size
hash.message.body.vermillionammodeliverymb:
The Vermillion Ammo Delivery Smart Part has arrived! This powerful addition will make sure Maximum Damage is dealt by your Defense!
When upgraded to Level 17, this Part will add 225,000 Health AND 18,000 Damage! The Smart AI targets the Unit or General they can hit the hardest and strikes!
Open the Special Delivery Mystery Box for a chance to win the Level 1, 10 or 15 Vermillion Ammo Delivery! This box can also contain these prizes:
1x Generals Order 1x Ruby Core 1x Black Market Patch 1x Hacker’s Patch 1x Modder’s Patch 40x Sentinels 100x Bombas 5x Decimators 1x 8 Hour Accelerator
hash.message.body.20130129purchaseplat: Starting Today, every 100 platinum purchased will enter you for a chance to win 5,000 FREE PLATINUM! There is no limit on the number of entries you can receive but act fast! All purchases must be made before 11:59pm PST on January 31st in order to qualify. Five lucky winners will be chosen and platinum prizes distributed within 3 business days after the conclusion of this event.
hash.activerecord.errors.models.alliance-memb: That player is already in an alliance. They must leave their current alliance before you can invite them.
hash.items.lotterytoken.name: Zoot Token
hash.daily.text.febflashsale: 2.5-Hour Accelerators are 35% off, but only for a few hours! ACT NOW - this deal ends TODAY!
hash.message.body.20130719wheelgame:
With the release of the Crafting system, Zoot's latest Wheel Game now includes the new and exclusive "Cerulean Alloys", necessary for crafting some of the most Rare and powerful Equipment!
Other premium items can be won as well including Hacker's Patches and the newly Cerulean Fireproof Token which can be enhanced onto an engineering Lab part and provide extra resistance from Bombas! Try stacking these tokens on current Fireproof Shield Parts to really solidify your defenses.
Visit the "craft" tab within the Engineering Lab for more information on the "Crafting Feature", and remember that each Grand Prize Box will guarantee a Cerulean Alloy, Fireproof Token, or 2 Hacker's Patches!
hash.missions.whoops.description: The sagalium rods in the warp gate were corroding, and most of the wiring was pretty much shot. Which explains why we inadvertently sent a few Shrikes into the center of the sun last week. All better now.
hash.battlereport.defense.xp: XP is not gained while defending your base.
hash.missions.loot-over-1-000-crystals.name: Loot over 1,000 crystals
hash.fte.panel.faction.content: Can you stop them from destroying Cerulea?

hash.message.body.20120713Purchase1000:
Right now, from 11:00am PDT on July 13th until 11:00am PDT on July 16th, earn five Mystery Carriers for every 1,000 platinum purchased from the store! Use Mystery Carriers to train 3,000 Marines or between 1 and 80 Pulse Tanks without using your Factory or any resources!
Please note that all prizes will be paid out to the Sector in which the Platinum was purchased, and each Sector will be counted individually for Platinum purchased, so you cannot combine purchases across multiple Sectors. Prizes will be distributed by July 19th.
hash.missions.adrenaline-boost.description: Adrenaline boosts will make our Rhinos even angrier. The med staff know not to make sudden moves near them.
hash.items.concussionflag.name: Concussion Turret Flag
hash.missions.solar-plasma.description: The only object that can withstand the heat of this new Solar Plasma is the canister holding it. Even that isn't a sure thing.

hash.research-defense.battlecruiser.name: Battle Cruiser Defense

hash.missions.the-ruthless-helio.description:
The Helio Legion produces enough Uranium to train enormous, bloodthirsty armies.

Click the Combat icon at the bottom of the screen.
Select FACTIONS.
SCOUT a Level 3 HELIO base.
ATTACK the base.

If we have any Rhinos in our army, send them into battle with our marines!
hash.message.subject.20130423spendevent:
Still need a few extra Synthetic Control Cores to round out your research and increase the power of your current and future Incineraptors? How about some of the new Onyx Cores, allowing you to research or construct more of the new Battle Crusier? Check out this latest offer!
Purchase one of the following Platinum Packages and receive FREE Troop Research Core Boxes! These new and Improved Boxes come with a chance to win a Synthetic Control Core but that's not all! Win other premium items such as an Onyx Core, Decimator Core, Scarbide ingot and more! Round out your troop offensive and defensive research today with this special offer!
Purchase the 225 Platinum Package and get 10 Troop Research Core Mystery Boxes Purchase the 400 Platinum Package and get 25 Troop Research Core Mystery Boxes Purchase the 1,000 Platinum Package or greater and get 55 Troop Research Core Mystery Boxes!
This unique offer starts today and will end at 11:59pm PST on April 24th. The prizes will be distributed onto the server in which Platinum was spent and added to your Inventory within 3 business days of this event's conclusion.
hash.items.mysteryboxu.description: Open to win one of the following: Armor Token 2.0 or 3.0 Piercing Ammo Token 2.0 or 3.0 Explosive Ammo Token 2.0 or 3.0 Berserkers Sentinels Shrikes Decimators
hash.deconstructor.dialog.title: NANO DECONSTRUCTOR
hash.missions.perfect-simulators.description: This isn't your grandfather's virtual reality training, Commander. We'll build simulators so lifelike, they'll cause PTSD! Which I concede is a shortcoming of the program.
hash.ew.error.sync: Edgeworld is out of sync with the server. Try refreshing the page and contact customer support if the issue continues.
hash.missions.tank-carapace.description: After five design reviews, we've finally managed to incorporate Cerulean structure and weapons advantages without making each tank look like a big, ugly beetle.
hash.promotion.092311weekend.body:
Our events just keep getting better and better! We've got big Platinum prizes for every Sector available this weekend!

Zoot's Platinum Giveaway Party!

Zoot is giving away two 1,000 Platinum prizes to every Sector! All you have to do is play Zoot's Loot or use a Zoot Token, and you could win big!

Alliance Pride Event!

Give us your Alliance motto, your origin story, or show us your flag! The best entry will win a 2.5 Hour Speedup for every member in the Alliance, and the runner-up entry will receive 2 Zoot Tokens for the entire Alliance!

Visit the forums now to enter!

Boost your Level and Win!

Fight hard and level up! One player in each Sector who gains the most Levels from Friday to Monday will win a Master's Kit!

We're giving away nearly 100,000 PLATINUM WORTH OF PRIZES this weekend! We'll announce the winners Monday. Will you be a big Platinum winner?
hash.daily.text.purchase-tokenbox: Purchase Platinum Packages to qualify for Free 3.0 Enhance Token Boxes and the Cerulean Network Sabotage!

For the next 24 hours, Cerulean cores are on sale for 35% off! Now is your chance to purchase Cerulean Cores for the low price of 25 Platinum!
There has never been a better time to buy! Make sure to get your cores today before its too late!

hash.message.body.20121228alliancelottery:
Win big for you and your Alliance!
Starting today, every 100 Platinum purchased will enter you and your Alliance for a chance to win! The Lucky Winner will receive 10,000 Platinum but that's not all! Each member of the winner's alliance will each take home 100 Platinum!
This event ends on 11:59pm PST (UTC-8) on January 1st. The Winner and their alliance will be selected and announced within 3 business days of this event's conclusion.

hash.message.body.20130208buildingevent:
Starting today, all XP earned through Building has been increased by 4x its normal values!
There has never been a better time to upgrade your base and increase your power throughout the sector! Don't forget about Aurora - 1, for this boost will affect your builds everywhere!
This Bonus will only last until 3:00pm PST on Feb 11th, so make sure to begin and complete some builds today and take advantage!
hash.message.body.20130716troopspend:
Commander, we have an incoming message from Zoot's black market network:
Hello my friend!
My people have located something that might interest you.
We found a platoon of mercenaries who's previous commander is how you say...Kaput. They are looking for a new employer, and I could give you a recommendation...if you can make it worth Zoot's while!
Purchase some Platinum and I could be convinced to send them your way!
Buy the 225 Platinum Pack and get 500 Devastators and 10 Berserkers Buy the 400 Platinum Pack and get 1000 Devastators and 25 Berserkers Buy the 1000 Platinum Pack and get 3000 Devastators and 75 Berserkers Buy the 2500 Platinum Pack and get 8000 Devastators and 200 Berserkers!
This unique offer will end on July 16th at 11:59pm PDT. You will get the additional troops only for the first Platinum purchase you make between now and the deadline, so make sure to choose wisely! Prizes will be distributed within 3 business days to the server in which Platinum was purchased and added to your Inventory.
hash.message.foundersgift2.body:
From everyone here on the Edgeworld team, we would like to thank you for helping make this game so awesome over the last year! Together, we’ve come a long way in making this one of Kabam’s greatest games and we have some exciting new features we know you’ll love yet to come! We’re looking forward to sharing another fantastic year with you!
Sincerely,
Daria – Associate Producer

hash.message.body.usetheforceboxevent:
Use the Force... Box! Win your Wars in the Stars with this out-of-this-world Box!
The Use the Force Box contains 10, 20 or 80 of the following Premium Troops: Pulse Tanks, Berzerkers, Decimators, Battlecruisers, Incineraptors!
BONUS: Starting Now until 11:59pm on 10/6/2013, you can earn additional prizes by purchasing Use The Force Boxes!
Purchase 10 Use The Force Boxes and receive 2 Hacker’s Patches!
Purchase 25 Boxes and receive 2 Hacker’s Patches and 1 General’s Order!
Purchase 50 Boxes and receive 2 Hacker’s Patches, 1 General’s Order and 1 Renegade Crate!
Limit One Prize per Player, per Sector. Prizes will be paid out by October 8th, 2013.

hash.promotion.09192011.body:
Congratulations to ZombieKing! They won 1100 Platinum for upgrading their Command Center to Level 9!

KillZoneUK, Que, Garrek, Boilermaker and Avatar have won a Master's Kit for their Level 9 research and buildings!

glp, Alex David, marcel2003, TAFF, purp121, MURPH81, dr. doom, Ghozt, Empo, Ala Perizada, METOCA, pepe001, Lindber, Moemm and Grakon will receive a Warrior's Kit because they instantly upgraded their buildings and research!

Finally, Porzer, Avatar, mamme, Cosmic Death, Eosrali, Raduran, kingshawn, Het, sgt, WICKDWARLORD, PompusTwit, Scoop, RedSox, meat-puppet, bullhead, Trojan, Rebus, HydraSpy and acidmilk earned 5 Combat Strategy items! They'll be gaining levels and moving up the ranks!

Congratulations to all our winners, and thanks again for playing Edgeworld!

hash.message.body.20130514forcetournament:
A brand new 3 DAY Research and Engineering Lab Force Tournament has just begun!
All Force earned through troop training, building, researching, equipment upgrading, General Skill upgrading and PvP will contribute to your Tournament AND Leaderboard rankings! In addition, Researching and Engineering Lab Force Points will be TRIPLED(x3) for the duration of the tournament!
The top 10 players on each sector will each qualify for Tournament Prize Boxes, which contain the following:
Platinum Prize Box - Guarantees a Level 16 Black Market Patch, Generals Order, Incineraptor, Synthetic Control Core, or Onyx Core Gold Prize Box - Chance to win a Level 16 Black Market Patch, Generals Order, Incineraptor, Synthetic Control Core, Onyx Core, Hacker's Patch, Vermillion Core, Cerulean Core, or SP 5000 Silver Prize Box - Decreased chance to win prizes from the Platinum and Gold boxes, plus a 30% Troop Accelerator, SP 1000, Incendiary Core, or Decimator Core Bronze Prize Box - Decreased chance to win prizes from Gold and Silver Boxes plus Troops and Speed Ups
The next 10 players in each sector will receive a variety of great prizes as well! Check the in game leaderboard for more details.
This Tournament ends on August 15th at 11:59 PM PDT, so make sure to get started today. Good luck!
-- Edgeworld Team
hash.missions.orichalcum.description: We've found a new material on Cerulea IV that defies all metallurgy. It could be an important scientific discovery. We're going to weaponize it as soon as we can.

hash.message.body.20130604forcetournament:
A brand new 4 DAY Engineering Lab Force Tournament has just begun!
All Force earned through troop training, building, researching, equipment upgrading, and General Skill upgrading will contribute to your Tournament AND Leaderboard rankings, but that's not all! All Force gained from Engineering Lab Part Upgrades will be QUADRUPLED(x4) for the duration!
The top 10 players on each sector will each qualify for Tournament Prize Boxes, which contain the following:
Platinum Prize Box - Guarantees a Level 16 Black Market Patch, Generals Order, Incineraptor, Synthetic Control Core, or Onyx Core Gold Prize Box - Chance to win a Level 16 Black Market Patch, Generals Order, Incineraptor, Synthetic Control Core, Onyx Core, Hacker's Patch, Vermillion Core, Cerulean Core, or SP 5000 Silver Prize Box - Decreased chance to win prizes from the Platinum and Gold boxes, plus a 30% Troop Accelerator, SP 1000, Incendiary Core, or Decimator Core Bronze Prize Box - Decreased chance to win prizes from Gold and Silver Boxes plus Troops and Speed Ups
The next 10 players in each sector will receive a variety of great prizes as well!
In addition to these overall prizes, Daily Prizes are now available for the top 3 players an a given day as well as Achievement Prizes once you pass certain Force Thresholds! Check the in game leaderboard for more details.
This Tournament ends on June 7th at 11:00 PM PDT, so make sure to get started today. Good luck!
-- Edgeworld Team

hash.message.body.07252013lifetimeforce:
Increase your Lifetime Force Rankings to become the Overlord and Admiral of your Sector!
Lifetime Force now provides every player with a ranking and typically an associated bonus. The Rankings and Bonuses based on your Lifetime Force in your sector are listed below:
Rank 1: Admiral; XP Boost 10% and all prior boosts Rank 2-10: Vice Admiral; 5% Building Speed Boost and all prior boosts Rank 11-30: Commodore; 5% Research / Training Speed Boost and all prior boosts Rank 31-50: Captain; 4% Research / Training Speed Boost and all prior boosts Rank 51-100: Lieutenant Commander; 3% Research / Training Speed Boost and all prior boosts Rank 101-200: Lieutenant; 2% Research / Training Speed Boost and all prior boosts Rank 201-300: Lieutenant Junior Grade; 1% Research / Training Speed Boost and all prior boosts Rank 301-400: Ensign; 5% Resource Gain Boost Rank 401-600: Chief Warrant Officer; 4% Resource Gain Boost Rank 601-800: Warrant Officer; 3% Resource Gain Boost Rank 801-1000: Chief Petty Officer; 2% Resource Gain Boost Rank 1001-5000: Crewman; 1% Resource Gain Boost Rank 5000-End: Recruit; No Boost
The Lifetime Force leaderboard rankings and associated boosts will be updated hourly.
Additionally, at 12:01am PST on the 1st of every month, the player with the highest Lifetime Force in each sector becomes Overlord of the Sector until the 1st of the next month! Besides getting designations on the Lifetime Force leaderboard, the Overlord of the Sector also gets a special Banner to display on their base and show off this distinction to any player that scouts their base. The first Overlord of the Sector will be designated at 12:01am PST on August 1st, so be sure to have the most Force in your sector by then!
hash.missions.solar-leech.name: Solar Leech
hash.daily.text.june2012platsale: For a limited time ALL platinum packages are up to 35% off! Details in your mail!
hash.daily.text.20130624forcetournament: Earn force for your chance to win valuable prizes! 2x Boost!
hash.missions.dax7shield.description: Gives you 7 days of protection. Removed if you attack another player.
hash.ew.campaign.xmas12.name: Red Sleigh Down
hash.research.pulsetank.description: In Beast Mode, Pulse Tanks fire huge explosives. They go into Beast Mode for 12 seconds when a friendly unit dies.
hash.missions.you-look-weak.name: You look weak
hash.items.guaranteedequipmentboost16.descrip: This Black Market mod chip allows you to take your weaponry to Level 16 and above without risk of breaking.
hash.missions.recover-the-cerulean-core.name: Recover the Cerulean Core
hash.missions.sting-like.description: These new Hornet munitions will stick to what they are fired at, emitting a low level EMP wave and injecting various viruses into the circuitry of the machine.
hash.daily.text.tourneymapsale: Race your way to the top of the Tournament Maps with these items!
hash.message.body.20130518anniversaryflag:
It’s been two years since Edgeworld was released!
On May 18 Edgeworld will celebrate its second anniversary, and we want you to celebrate it with us! If you login to complete the special anniversary mission by 12:00pm PST on May 20, you will receive a special crate that includes an exclusive, one-of-a-kind banner for your Banner Monument as well as other items commemorating this great day!
Don’t forget to complete the anniversary mission and claim your free Edgeworld 2nd anniversary gift!
hash.items.researchtoken.description: Semi-organic material originally developed for Cerulean troops. Required for each level 10 (or higher) research upgrade.
hash.daily.text.20120824purchaseplat: Earn FREE Speed Ups for purchasing platinum! See your mail for details.
hash.missions.killer-genes.name: Killer Genes
hash.daily.text.deluxetimetravelerbonus: For a limited time, earn a BONUS 4-Day Accelerator when you purchase a Deluxe Time Traveler’s Crate!
hash.map.fte.no-territory: Your alliance has no territories. Claim an Outpost to start.
hash.missions.ablative-carapace.name: Ablative Carapace
hash.message.body.firsttourneyintro:
Congratulations! Your Sector has been chosen to take part in the Tournament Maps feature.
This is a several day event on a special map in which after the event is over, those who you have fought their way to the top will be rewarded.
100 Players in each Sector will win, and the top prize is 2500 Platinum!
The tournament is slated to end Thursday, May 24th. Check your Sector's Map for the exact time of end.
You can see the terms of the tournament, as well as the prizes on offer by opening the Map and selecting the available Tournament Map from the tabs at the top.
Please keep in mind that at the end of the Tournament the special Tournament map will be refreshed, so every tournament is a fresh chance to dominate!
For more details on how to dominate on the Tournament Maps, click here: http://community.kabam.com/forums/showthread.php?90955-New-Feature-Tournament-Maps!
hash.message.body.20130618equipmentlevel17:
We have changed the requirements for Level 17 guaranteed Equipment Part upgrades to the Black Market Patch! Now you can use Black Market Patches to upgrade your Equipment Parts to BOTH Levels 16 and 17!
Use your existing Black Market Patches or win them in events to upgrade your equipment parts to Level 17 and have the strongest base in all of Cerulea IV!
hash.items.mysteryboxx.name: Decimator Mystery Box
hash.missions.research-rhinos.name: Research Rhinos
hash.items.simdef50.description: Increases your level for a Simulator battle by 50.
hash.missions.research-titans.description: Titans are heavy armor suits designed to take punishment. I call them "FILE X37-C". The Marines call them "walking tanks".
hash.fte.panels.hail.content-2: GOVERNOR MALICK: Insolent rogue! You are occupying Maar territory. Prepare to be reduced to a pile of smoldering rubble.
hash.promotion.quadplatinum.body:
Want to win double Platinum? Triple? How about quadruple Platinum prizes, every day!

Each day, Friday through Monday (October 17), we're choosing two players and giving out quadruple Platinum on all their purchases that day!

More Platinum Packages means more chances to win - and you'll score quadruple Platinum for every Package you purchased that day!

Want to give a Platinum Gift instead? Even better! If chosen, both you AND your friend will receive 4x the Platinum value of your gift!

Two winners every day!

To enter, just purchase a Platinum Package from Friday through Monday. You'll automatically be entered to win!
hash.message.terraknorboxdisabled.body:
Earlier today we released errant code which allowed some Kabam.com players of Edgeworld to get daily rewards multiple times. We have corrected the error, but some players exploited the error to get multiple extra Salvage Boxes. As part of the correction, we've temporarily disabled Salvage Boxes so that they are removed from the store, but they will be restored tomorrow including restoration of those legitimately acquired. Control Devices still work and are still available from the store at a discounted price.
We apologize for the error and hope to have everything back to normal shortly. We'll have a further update by noon tomorrow (Monday) Pacific time.
hash.missions.legion-camp.objectives: Destroy the Command Center in a Level 15 Legion base.
hash.message.marcharmyterraknor.body: Your Lancer army is enormous and terrifying! We've granted you a Erazi Smuggler's Crate in recognition of your military expansion! You can find this new item in your inventory.
hash.message.body.20130117troopqueuelimitremi: Today is the last day to take advantage of our increased troop training limit of 1,000 days! Make sure to queue these trainings up before 11:59pm PST tonight and get the most out of your Training Accelerators!
hash.items.dragoncore.tooltip: Neural implant to control and research synthetic lifeforms such as the Incineraptor.
hash.items.mysterybox18.name: Vermillion Armor Mystery Box
hash.daily.text.20130222smartpart2: New Engineering Lab Smart Parts are now available in the Smart Part Mystery Crate! Check your mail for details.
hash.ew.mobile.login-error.pw-too-short: Password has to be longer than 7 characters
hash.research.shrike.description: Light, fast vehicles driven by marines and equipped with laser cannons.
hash.daily.text.aprillevels: Win 500 Platinum and an Hour of Power Crate by gaining the most levels in a single Sector! Rules in your mail!
hash.message.body.intromines:
Temporary but devastating, Mines come to the battlefields of Cerulea IV. Place Mines around your base and they will be invisible to your enemies, but when attacking troops approach, they will explode for massive damage!
Mines are only good for one use, and any that have exploded will need to be rebuilt. However, Mines triggered during Defense Simulations will not need to be rebuilt. The number of Mines that can be built on your base at any time is determined by the level of your Factory!
Build your Mines, and give your enemies a surprise they won’t soon forget!
hash.fte.mobile.combat.add.all.marines.max: Drag the slider and double tap on the base to send troops into battle

For a limited time only, you will receive one FREE Renegade Crate for each one that you purchase! Players can receive up to 20 FREE Renegade Crates in this way during this promotion.
This great deal will end at 11:59pm PST on August 6th, so be sure to stock up on Renegade Crates today!

hash.items.calderabronze.description: 1x Caldera-2 Schematics 1x Cerulean Cores 10x 15-Min Accelerators 5x 1-Hour Accelerators 3x 2.5-Hour Accelerators 5x 8-Hour Accelerators 2x Decimator Cores

hash.promotion.octfirstbuyerfridayfacebook.bo:
We're extending a special offer to our experienced Edgeworld players!

Purchase a Platinum Package for the first time this weekend, and you'll receive additional bonus Platinum! This is the first time ever that you'll be able to receive bonus Platinum for our low-cost 65 and 155 Platinum Packages!

Shop for Platinum now to take advantage of this deal!

You have until 2:00 PM PST on Monday, October 24 to make your purchase!

65 Platinum Package / Normal Bonus: 0 / Additional Weekend Bonus: 20 / Total Platinum: 85

155 Platinum Package / Normal Bonus: 0 / Additional Weekend Bonus: 50 / Total Platinum: 205

225 Platinum Package / Normal Bonus: 15 / Additional Weekend Bonus: 75 / Total Platinum: 315

400 Platinum Package / Normal Bonus: 25 / Additional Weekend Bonus: 100 / Total Platinum: 525

1000 Platinum Package / Normal Bonus: 100 / Additional Weekend Bonus: 200 / Total Platinum: 1300

2500 Platinum Package / Normal Bonus: 500 / Additional Weekend Bonus: 500 / Total Platinum: 3500

5000 Platinum Package / Normal Bonus: 1000 / Additional Weekend Bonus: 1000 / Total Platinum: 7000

Platinum is key to your success in Edgeworld! You can use Platinum to speed up your upgrades, instantly train units, earn more XP, and much more!

Full Rules:

Packages must be purchased between 2:00 PM Friday (October 21) and 2:00 PM Monday (October 24), PST.

2:00 PM PST is 9:00 PM GMT and 11:00 PM in Europe.

This bonus is only being offered to players whose accounts are more than 7 days old, and who have never purchased Platinum before. Accounts less than 7 days old can take advantage of our Beginner's Sale to get a similar discount.

The additional bonus Platinum will only apply to your first Platinum purchase. Make it a good one!
hash.missions.attack-legion-base.description: To prepare, have units in your Staging Area. Use the Map, select Legion Level 1, Scout that base, then Attack!

hash.message.body.20130604tokensinshop:
While Premium Enhance Tokens can be won via the current Wheel Game, other basic ones are available for purchase for 100 Platinum. Simply visit the Enhancement Modal (by selected Enhancement after clicking on the desired Engineering Lab Part) to purchase one of the following Tokens:
Armor Token Piercing Ammo Token Explosive Ammo Token
For more information on the new Enhancement System, make sure to check your in game messages or our Official Forums for more details.

hash.units.raider.name: Raider
hash.promotion.20120314.newusers.body:
Welcome to Edgeworld, Commander!

A leader of your caliber will go far in the battle to dominate Cerulea IV!

To aid you in these first days, we are pleased to offer a special bonus for new Commanders only: take advantage of Edgeworld Platinum and we will give you a bonus FREE Beginner's Kit with the purchase of our 155 platinum package!

The Beginner's Kit contains a variety of Accelerators to speed your building construction and troop training, tokens for the always-popular Zoot's Loot chance game and XP boosting Combat Tactics to help you level up faster and grow your power! Get your FREE bonus gift before its too late. This offer expires within 7 days of joining Edgeworld!

Click Here to get some Platinum and claim your FREE Beginner's Kit!

Once you've made your purchase, keep an eye on your in-game mail in the coming days for your FREE Beginner's Kit!
hash.items.ultraradialliquidcoolant.name: Ultra Radial Liquidcoolant
hash.message.body.20130124generals:
General Mako, the Engineer has arrived. With the ability to slow down enemy Turret's rate of fire, temporarily disable Turrets and multiply troop damage output, General Mako is a new force to be reckoned with.
Additionally, General Strom and Vukice have earned top tier abilities allowing Strom to inflict massive damage from afar and Vukice to shield units from munitions based Turrets. A new age of combat has arrived so power up your Generals to lead your armies to victory.
hash.promotion.factionattack1011.body:
It’s time to rally and show the Factions who’s boss of Cerulea IV!

We’re keeping track of who destroys the most Maar, Helio, and Erazi Command Centers. If you destroy the most Command Centers of a Faction in your Sector, you’ll win 250 Platinum!

Three players per Sector will win, one for each Faction! We’ll also choose two more random winners per Sector who have attacked at least 50 Faction Bases!

You have until Friday (10/8) to score those victories and crush the Factions! Fight hard to win!

Raiders collect twice as many resources as other units.

Select your TECH LAB.
Click RESEARCH.
Select the RAIDER.
Click RESEARCH.

Commander, I have given you a 15 minute speedup which can be applied here.
hash.message.body.20121121generalskillupevent:
Haven't had a chance to check out our newest "Generals" release? What are you waiting for!
From now until 11:59pm PST on November 26th, all players who get upgrade one of their General's skills to Level 5 and you'll be entered in for a chance to take home 100 SP for free!
Players who get one of their General's skills to Level 10 or higher will enter in for a chance to take home 5,000 Skill Points!
5 Players will be chosen at random to win 100 Skill Points, and 5 additional players will also be chosen who achieve a level 10 or higher General Skill after the conclusion of this event!
hash.message.body.20130426scarbidesale: Scarbide Ingots and Racks will be on Sale for 50% OFF for a Limited Time! Visit the featured tab of the shop and get yours today to take full advantage of the latest 3x Force Boost to Research during the latest Force Tournament!
hash.message.marchbuildathon10.body: Your level 10+ building has been chosen as a winner in our upgrade contest! A Pulse Rack and an Hour of Power Crate have been added to your inventory. Congratulations!

hash.items.generalsorder.description: A rare and prestigious combat recognition. Allows General's to use their highest tier abilities.
hash.promotion.erazi50.body:
Commander, your devotion to crushing the Erazi Syndicate is commendable. The Maar Confederacy has sent Gas and Crystal to our base. They call it a 'Tax Rebate,' but I think they're just afraid of us destroying all their bases again!

Check your inventory using the Shop button to access these items.

You have received 100,000 Crystal and Gas.

hash.message.body.20120717tankturret:
Every player that has at least 1 Heavyweight Turret in their main base by 11:59am PST 7/20 will get entered to win a Cerulean Rack! 25 Lucky winners will be selected and awarded.
Additionally, every player that has 6 Heavyweight Turrets in their main base by 11:59am PST 7/20 will get entered to win a Deluxe Time Travel Kit! 10 Lucky winners will be selected and awarded.
Prizes will be distributed by 7/23!

hash.message.marchlevel7winner.body: That's a good-looking base, Commander. We appreciate your efforts at upgrading your buildings to level 7 or above, and you have been awarded two Pulse Cores in our level 7 upgrade event! Check your inventory for these items.

hash.missions.hive-program.description: This new enhancement for our Hornets will add tougher armor, more powerful cannons, and integrated A.I. combat assistance.
hash.items.trainingbox.description: Open this special mystery box for a chance to win a 50% Troop Accelerator or other valuable combat items!
hash.items.mysterybox21.name: Lethal Force Box
hash.message.body.20130420dragoncorebox:
The Troop Research Core Box contains the best troop research cores in all of Edgeworld! This box will supply you with the Synthetic Control Cores and Onyx Cores you need to research your Incineraptor and Battle Cruiser units! Other items in this box include Scarbide Ingots, Decimator Cores, Pulse Cores and Control Devices!
Getting the troop research cores from this box is the best way for you to increase the power of your units, so visit the shop to pick up this great box today!
hash.message.body.20130104buildingxpeventremi:
Today is the Last Day to take advantage of the significant BOOST to Building XP!
This Bonus will only last until 11:59pm PST tonight, so make sure to complete your builds before time runs out!
hash.message.body.valentine2013start:
Commander,
Thanks to Vukice’s understanding of the Erazi communications network, I’ve been able to intercept high level Syndicate communications. I have something you'll be quite interested in.
Scyllith has a secret meeting with Grod of the Helio Legion coming up soon. It appears they've been having regular meetings for the past two months. There is no word on what they will be meeting to discuss, only that they will be in person, and alone. We need to find out what this meeting is about! If the Helio and Erazi were to combine forces, it could change the landscape of the war and not in a way we'd like.
The Secret Location is being monitored for security by an unspecified Erazi Base. We have only one option: Hit every Erazi Base we can, and plunder their Datastores until we find the right one!
hash.message.body.20130422ccoresale:
For a Limited Time, Cerulean Cores and Racks are on sale for 50% off their normal price! This item is required to level up certain buildings from level 10 -- 14, so there has never been a better time to stock up!
Visit the featured tab of the shop to get yours today!
hash.messages.mass-assignment.body:
Maps are now available again on all sectors except Orion and Cygnus, which we expect to restore within 12-24 hours.
Sorry for the interruption of service. We'll have a more comprehensive report by noon tomorrow Pacific time.
Thank you for your patience.
hash.message.20120824purchaseplat.body: Thank you for participating in our recent Platinum Purchase event! 24 Hour Speed Up(s) have been added to your inventory.

hash.missions.project-x-emp.description: I have good news, Commander. The extended, base-wide power failure we experienced wasn't Erazi sabotage. It was a successful weapons test. *Very* successful.
hash.missions.increase-crystal-production.des: Build another Crystal Mine, or upgrade your existing one.
hash.promotion.platinumgifting.body:
A strong Commander needs strong allies. Help your allies by sending them Platinum!

From our Platinum Packages screen, you can now buy Packages for your Alliance members or Facebook friends. You'll receive the bonus items, but they'll get all the Platinum!

A powerful Alliance can send you resources and attack your enemies, even when you're not playing. Help your allies grow!

Check out Platinum Gifts now!

Platinum Gifts are currently not available on Google+.
hash.missions.commander-conquered.objectives: Destroy the Command Center in a Level 1000 Confederate base.
hash.message.body.20120708researchathon:
Win prizes for conducting Defense Lab research!
All players who complete level 3 or higher Defense Lab Shrike research by 12:00pm PDT July 10th will receive one FREE Incendiary Core. Additionally, all players who have completed level 6 or higher Defense Lab Shrike research will be entered into a random sweepstakes to win 500 platinum! 10 lucky winners will be chosen!
Start researching now and crush those Shrikes!
hash.missions.gas-giant-1.name: Gas Giant 1
hash.message.body.vermillionblastshieldmb:
Defend your base against Decimators with the new Vermillion Blast Shield!
The Vermillion Blast Shield will increase your Turrets’ Health and Damage and deal extra damage to invading Decimators!
Open this Mystery Box for your chance to be one of the first to win this exclusive E-Lab Smart Part! Other Prizes include the Cerulean Blast Shield, 30- Day Shields, Generals Orders, Accelerators, Cerulean Cores, Vermillion Cores and Troop Bundles!
This Box will also contain a chance to take home a LEVEL 10 or LEVEL 15 Vermillion Blast Shield saving you time and patches!
Upgrade your Vermillion Blast Shield to Level 17 and your Health will increase by 225,000 and your Damage will increase by 18,000!!
hash.missions.enigma-file.name: Enigma File
hash.missions.maar-border-post.description: The Maar Codex (Article 34a, Section 113) requires that Maar soldiers receive permission for each munition fired. Conclusion: They respond slowly to ambushes.
hash.missions.ultra-payload.description: We've optimized the tritanium plates on the Hornet's undercarriage, and we've managed to increase the weapons payload.

For a limited time only, spending Platinum will get you Black Market Patches that will GUARANTEE your Level 16 and 17 equipment part upgrades!
Every 500 Platinum you spend between now and 11:59pm PST on June 20th will net you one Black Market Patch! Each player can qualify and receive up to a maximum of 5 Black Market Patches, so be sure to take advantage of this great deal before it’s too late!

hash.message.body.7-27-xp-boost:
Looking to start this week off with a few more levels? Earning XP just got easier!
Starting at 1:00 PM PST on July 31st to 5:00 PM PST on August 3rd, all XP gained is DOUBLED!
As every powerful Commander knows, XP can be earned in a lot of different ways including: Training Troops, Upgrading Map Nodes, Attacking Enemies and Upgrading Buildings.
And remember-- you can also earn XP from using the Defense Simulator!
What are you waiting for? Don't miss this extremely limited special opportunity to increase your level!
-- Edgeworld Team
hash.activerecord.errors.models.player-messag: Your messaging privileges have been suspended.
hash.missions.demolition.description: The upgrade was complicated by the fact that many of our troops were inside the old building while it was being demolished. Little miscommunication there. But everyone's fine. Well, you and I are fine. That's what matters.

For the next 24 hours, Decimation Crates will be discounted and available for an all time low price of 4000 Platinum! These has never been a better time to maximize the value of this item which contains over 8000 Platinum worth of items including:
160x Decimators! 8x Incendiary Cores 5x Vermillion Cores 5x Cerulean Core 5x 14-Day Accelerators plus much more!
Go to the shop and stock up today before its too late!

Still looking for a little more punch to go along with your Generals? Look no further then our newest exlusive unit, the Battle Cruiser!
Every 100 Platinum you spend between now and 11:59pm PDT on May 23rd will net you one powerful Battle Cruiser Bundle, which will provide the user Experience and Force!
Each player can qualify and receive up to a max of 10 Battle Cruisers, so make sure to make your purchases now before it's too late! Battle Cruisers will be delivered within 3 business days of this event's conclusion.

Looking to start this week off with more level ups?

hash.missions.don-t-hate-the-player.descripti: The changes to your Command Center will make us the envy of all the other bases, Commander. They'll feel a surge of envy just before they see a surge of lethal energy.

hash.message.body.20130702buyevent:
Purchase one of the following platinum packages before 11:59pm PDT on July 3rd to qualify for one of the following bonus packages:
Buy the 400 Platinum Pack - Get 1 General's Crate Buy the 1000 Platinum Pack - Get 2 General's Crates Buy the 2500 Platinum Pack or above - Get 5 General's Crates! (75% Free Value!)
Please keep in mind that you can only qualify for one of these offers, so make sure you purchase the right package! Prizes will be distributed within 3 business day after the conclusion of this event.

hash.missions.eight-legged-tweaks.description: If the Lancer ever figure out how to get free of those collars, we're in deep trouble. But just to make that eventuality more interesting, we've augmented their armor and weaponry.

hash.message.body.20130326spspend:
Hale has taken the World of Edgeworld by storm, so make sure her skills are up to snuff with this latest Spend Event!
For every 100 Platinum you spend between now and 11:59pm PDT on March 31st you will qualify to receive 5,000 FREE General SP! Use this SP to level up your General's Skills now, or stock up for a future Force Tournament!
The General SP will be delivered on April 1st so don't delay! Each player can qualify up to a maximum of 10 times for this event, so make sure to spend at least 1000 Platinum to ensure you'll receive the highest payout!
Thank you for playing Edgeworld, and we wish you luck out there on the Battlefield!
hash.message.body.20130117troopqueuelimitv2: For a limited time, the troop training queue limit of 400 days will be increased to 1,000 Days for each individual training! This Limit will return to normal on January 21st, so make sure to take advantage of this opportunity and get the most out of your Training Accelerators!

hash.missions.mutant-fun-club-1.objectives: Increase Uranium Production to 700 per hour
hash.daily.text.bogopulsecores: Ends at midnight 3/13. Buy one Pulse core and get one FREE! FREE items awarded 3/14.

hash.units.hornet.description: Quick gunships, whose shots slow the rate of fire of a tower to 50%.
hash.promotion.factionattackend.body:
Thousands of Maar bases lie in ruins. The Confederacy rose up in pride, and you smashed them back into humility.

The bases and dens of the Erazi Syndicate have been cracked open, and their energy stolen. They'll have a long fight to recover from this.

The Helio Legion has retreated, unable to gain any ground against your massive counterattack. Now they watch and wait for another opportunity.

The Cerulean obelisks pulse with a powerful energy. The strongest Commanders in this sector have been identified. The challenge is complete.

The results have been tallied, and reward packages are being delivered to the strongest Commanders in this Sector. You'll have a message in your mail if you're a winner!

The planet is at peace now...surely this can last forever, right?
hash.promotion.pvpassault.body:
A mysterious challenge has gone out across Cerulea IV. The most powerful Commanders will win Energizers and Boosts!

Think you can win it? Read about the challenge here, and how to win!
hash.lf.tooltip.jackpot: Land on this for Zoot's Jackpot!

hash.message.marchalliancewinner.body: Congratulations! Your Alliance is exceptionally powerful, and you've won a Pulse Core for every member in our Alliance Dominance Tournament!
hash.message.body.20130726corespend:
For a limited time only, spend Platinum between now and 10:00am PST on September 21st to earn the following:
Tier 1: Spend 50 Platinum, Get a Decimator Core to train & research your Decimators! Tier 2: Spend 100 Platinum, Get an Onyx Core to train & research Battle Cruisers! Tier 3: Spend 150 Platinum, Get a Synthetic Control Core to train & research Incineraptors!
PRIZES ARE CUMULATIVE! Also, Players can qualify for each of these tiers a maximum of 5 times, providing them with 5 of each core. For example, if a player spends 500 platinum during this period, the player will receive a total of 4 Decimator Cores, 3 Onyx Cores and 3 Synthetic Control Cores!
Cores will be paid out within 3 business days from the conclusion of the event. Be sure to take advantage of this great deal before it’s too late!
hash.items.spacedragon20.name: Incineraptor Swarm
hash.items.decimationcrate.name: Decimation Crate
hash.message.body.HWTBuildathon:
Take advantage of Supercharged Defenses and level up your Heavyweight Turrets!
Supercharged Defenses have hit Cerulea IV, and now you can upgrade your Heavyweight Turrets to take advantage of this new defensive technology!
For each Heavyweight Turret upgraded to Level 17, you will win a Turret Defense Prize Box that guarantees you one of the following items: a Level 1, 5 or 15 Cerulean Blast Shield, a Level 1, 5 or 15 Cerulean Meteoric Shield, or 1.0 and 2.0 Tokens! Limit 5 boxes per player.
On top of that, for every Turret you upgrade to Level 17, you will be entered in a Platinum Sweepstakes.
10 Lucky Players will win 100 Platinum each! 3 Really Lucky players will win 500 Platinum each!
This event ends tomorrow August 30th, 2013 at 3:00pm PDT. Prizes will be awarded within 3 business days of the end of this event.
hash.message.body.20130720renegadecratesale:
Renegade Crates are now on Sale for an ALL-TIME LOW PRICE of 249 Platinum!
Make sure to check the featured tab of the shop and pick yours up before it's too late! This discount is only be available for a LIMITED TIME, so stock up today.
hash.daily.text.20130425bunkerrelease: Garrison Troops within to boost its strength!
hash.message.body.debrismysterybox:
During a recent shipment of Black Market Items on their way to Cerulea, we took heavy fire resulting in all the Mystery Boxes becoming damaged and unrecognizable. Now we are selling the Debris Mystery Box at one low discounted price!
Open this box for a chance to win: Builders Boxes, SCC Boxes, Meteoric Mystery Boxes, General’s Orders Mystery Boxes, Black Market Patch Mystery Boxes, Use the Force Boxes, Anti-General Mystery Boxes or valuable Renegade Crates!
The three players who purchase the most boxes from me will get an additional bonus of 1 Annihilator Crate!
This deal will not last long, Commander! Visit the shop and stock up today!
-Zoot
(Contest ends at 12:00am PDT on 10/5/2013)

hash.message.body.20130222spacedragons:
Commander,
We have just received an urgent warning transmission from a nearby galaxy. It appears that a new synthetic species, known only as the Incineraptor, has been destroying colony after colony as it makes its way across the universe. The Incineraptors attack in large numbers and are extraordinarily dangerous. Unfortunately, they are now headed directly at us and show no sign of slowing down.
Our only chance for survival is to attack them head-on through the defense simulator, sir. These may be the most challenging battles that we have ever fought, but I have faith that we will be victorious in the end.

Try our new and Improved Zoot's Jackpot today for a chance to take home premium items like Ruby Cores, General's Orders, Hacker's Patches and much more! Each play also could net you the Jackpot, which can range from hundreds to even possibly thousands of Platinum!
Click on the "Z" icon next to your Mailbox to check out Zoot's Jackpot today! This event will only be available until 11:59pm PDT on June 30th so don't delay! Take advantage today before someone else wins big!

hash.message.body.08162013incineraptors:
For a Limited Time Only, Synthetic Control Cores are on SALE in the Store. Pick them up in time for our Incineraptor Train-a-Thon for a chance at big Platinum wins!
Incineraptors are the strongest units in all of Edgeworld! They can turn formidable bases into barren wastelands in seconds, especially at the highest levels of offensive research! These extremely rare Items are on Sale for the first time ever; pick some up to train Incineraptors now!
Synthetic Control Cores will only be in the store until August 19, so be sure to stock up and start training these ultra-powerful Incineraptors today!

hash.message.body.spendpulsetanks:
For a limited time, spending platinum can earn you an army of Pulse Tanks!
Right now, from 1:00pm PDT on June 25th until 12:00pm PDT on June 28th, all players who spend at least 500 platinum will receive 2 FREE Pulse Racks. For the most ambitious Commanders, any player who spends at least 1,500 platinum during the period will receive one FREE Pulse Carrier. The Pulse Carrier is a 2,000 PLATINUM item and includes 80 Pulse Tanks!
Act now to level up quickly and dominate your Sector with FREE pulse tanks!
Please note that all prizes will be paid out to the Sector in which the Platinum was spent, and each Sector will be counted individually for Platinum Spent, so you cannot combine spend across multiple Sectors. Prizes will be distributed by June 29th.

Parts are rewarded at the end of successful defense simulation battles.

hash.message.body.20121204ceruleannonpayer:
Starting now, until 11:59 PM PDT December 7th, make any purchase of 65 Platinum or more from the store and receive 15 FREE Cerulean Cores, a 600 Platinum Value!
This is an extremely limited time offer valid ONLY on your first Platinum purchase - so act now! Cerulean Cores will be distributed by December 10th.

hash.message.body.20120822acceleratorboxzoot:
Zoot has managed to secure a rare shipment of Accelerator Boxes and is now sharing these valuable items with his customers!
These special mystery boxes contain a random Accelerator and are capable of helping Commanders of every level quickly build up their base-- and starting now, you have a chance to win one from Zoot's Loot!
But hurry-- Accelerator Box supplies are very limited and this item will only be available to win until 12:00 PM PST on August 27th.
Act fast, Commander!

hash.promotion.09012011.body:
Labor Day is upon us, and the show must go on! Celebrate the hardworking laborers of Cerulea IV this weekend!

Visit our Event Page to RSVP! One player who RSVPs will win 50 Platinum!

Platinum Sale

Help your workers do their jobs with Accelerators, Nanos, and Shields! Platinum is on sale!

The 225 Platinum Package is 5% OFF!
The 400 Platinum Package is 10% OFF!
The 1,000 Platinum Package is 15% OFF!

Platinum Gifting Event

You can also give this discounted Platinum to your allies!

Three players who give gifts this weekend will win twice as much Platinum for themselves, and a 24-Hour Shield for every member of their Alliance! Every gift is a chance to win!

Alliance Level Up Contest

The 5 Alliances who gain the most total levels will win an 8-Hour Accelerator for every member of the Alliance! The clock starts now!

The Labor of the Future

This Labor Day, we want to know: what will your job be like in the future? Will you be a space Marine, a Tech Lab researcher, or maybe a Crystal Miner?

Visit the Forums to share your story, and win 150 Platinum!

All winners will be announced Tuesday, 9/6. Good luck!

hash.missions.lady-on-deck.description: I took a personal tour of the barracks this morning. In addition to the standard wolf-whistles and marriage proposals, I gathered quite a bit of information about structural deficiencies we can remedy during our next upgrade.
hash.items.heavyburstarmor.name: Heavy Burst Armor
hash.missions.section-8.description: Now, our Marines recognize only two things - the enemy, and authority. I'm closer to human than they are. The irony isn’t lost on me.

hash.message.body.20121009labchallenge:
With the release of the new Hacker's Patch, it's time for an Engineering Lab Challenge!
Between 1pm PST on Oct 10th and 11:59pm PST on Oct 12th, we will be keeping track of Engineering Lab Upgrades.
Ten (10) Players who upgrade any Engineering Lab Part to Level 5 or higher between the above event dates will qualify for a chance to take home 250 Platinum!
If you Upgrade an Engineering Lab Part to Level 8 or higher, you'll also enter yourself for a chance to take home 500 Platinum! Ten (10) Winners in this bracket will also be randomly selected!
Make sure to check your Engineerling Lab for more details, and make sure to take advantage of the power these upgrades provide!
hash.message.body.20121009ceruleansale:
Still haven't built your Level 14 Command Center, Fleet Academy or unlocked all the levels of your Defense Simulator and Engineering Lab? Now is your chance to purchase Cerulean Cores for the low price of 25 Platinum until 12:00pm PST (noon) on October 15th!
There has never been a better time to buy! Make sure to get yours today before its too late!

hash.message.body.20130405forcetournament:
A brand new 4 DAY Total Force Tournament has just begun!
All Force earned through troop training, building, researching, equipment upgrading, General Skill upgrading and PvP will contribute to your leaderboard ranking but that's not all! Force gained from any of these actions in our newest Outpost Caldera-2 will be TRIPLED (x3) throughout the duration!
The top 40 players on each sector will win valuable prizes such as Premium Troops, Mystery Boxes, Trophies, and bragging rights!
This Tournament ends on April 8th at 10:00 PM PDT, so get started today. Good luck!
-- Edgeworld Team

hash.message.body.blackmarketpatchmysterybox:
We’ve TRIPLED the chance of winning a Black Market Patch in this new and improved box!
Upgrade your Engineering Lab Parts to Levels 16 and 17 with the Black Market Patch!
Use this Patch to guarantee your Part Upgrades after Level 15 and unleash the true power of your Parts and Turrets!
Open this box for an increased chance to win a Black Market Patch. Other prizes include Hacker’s Patches and Troop Bundles!
This box will only be available for a limited time, so check out the featured tab to pick some up!

Play Kira’s Wheel Game for a chance to win a newly released Vermillion Core!
Vermillion Cores are necessary to unlock the power of Level 15 buildings so spin the wheel and try your luck today!
The Wheel Game ends on Friday January 4th PST, so make sure to spin today!
hash.faction.erazi.win.1: If only you'd surrendered, my dear, we could have skirted this mess. Did you really think you stood half a chance?
hash.faction.erazi.win.2: Don't take it so hard, Commander. Defeat is something you should get used to.
hash.faction.erazi.win.3: Oh, Commander. You only see me as the villain because you're on the wrong side.

hash.message.body.20130608forcetournamentremi:
Today is the Last Day to Participate in our latest Training and Research Force Tournament!
All Force earned through troop training, building, researching, equipment upgrading, and General Skill upgrading will contribute to your Tournament AND Leaderboard rankings! In addition, Training and Research Force Points will be TRIPLED(x3) for the duration of the tournament!
The top 10 players on each sector will each qualify for Tournament Prize Boxes, which contain the following:
Platinum Prize Box - Guarantees a Level 16 Black Market Patch, Generals Order, Incineraptor, Synthetic Control Core, or Onyx Core Gold Prize Box - Chance to win a Level 16 Black Market Patch, Generals Order, Incineraptor, Synthetic Control Core, Onyx Core, Hacker's Patch, Vermillion Core, Cerulean Core, or SP 5000 Silver Prize Box - Decreased chance to win prizes from the Platinum and Gold boxes, plus a 30% Troop Accelerator, SP 1000, Incendiary Core, or Decimator Core Bronze Prize Box - Decreased chance to win prizes from Gold and Silver Boxes plus Troops and Speed Ups
The next 10 players in each sector will receive a variety of great prizes as well! Check the in game leaderboard for more details.
In addition to these overall prizes, Daily Prizes are now available for the top 3 players an a given day as well as Achievement Prizes once you pass certain Force Thresholds! Check the in game leaderboard for more details.
This Tournament ends tonight at 11:00 PM PDT, Good luck!
-- Edgeworld Team

All Force earned through troop training, building, researching, equipment upgrading, and General Skill upgrading will contribute to your Tournament AND Leaderboard rankings! In addition, Building and Engineering Lab Force Points will be TRIPLED(x3) for the duration of the tournament!
The top 10 players on each sector will each qualify for Tournament Prize Boxes, which contain the following:
Platinum Prize Box - Guarantees a Level 16 Black Market Patch, Generals Order, Incineraptor, Synthetic Control Core, or Onyx Core Gold Prize Box - Chance to win a Level 16 Black Market Patch, Generals Order, Incineraptor, Synthetic Control Core, Onyx Core, Hacker's Patch, Vermillion Core, Cerulean Core, or SP 5000 Silver Prize Box - Decreased chance to win prizes from the Platinum and Gold boxes, plus a 30% Troop Accelerator, SP 1000, Incendiary Core, or Decimator Core Bronze Prize Box - Decreased chance to win prizes from Gold and Silver Boxes plus Troops and Speed Ups
The next 10 players in each sector will receive a variety of great prizes as well! Check the in game leaderboard for more details.
This Tournament ends on May 27th at 11:59 PM PST, so make sure to get started today. Good luck!
-- Edgeworld Team

hash.message.body.20120830engingeeringlabrela: Based on player feedback, we would like to announce an exciting change to Engineering Lab! Starting today, all Parts Upgrade probabilities in the Lab have been increased dramatically. This means that all modification parts will be easier to level up! Use these upgrades to increase the strength of your entire fleet of turrets and keep your invaders at bay. As a token of our appreciation for your dedication and support, we'd like to offer assistance to all that have purchased and used a Chance Increase item. Please contact Support for more information. In the meanwhile, for full details on the Engineering Lab, click Here

hash.promotion.octfirstbuyersundayfacebook.bo:
We have a special deal available right now for our experienced Edgeworld players! Lots of players are taking advantage of this bonus Platinum, and you can too!

Purchase a Platinum Package for the first time this weekend, and you'll receive additional bonus Platinum! This is the first time ever that you'll be able to receive bonus Platinum for our low-cost 65 and 155 Platinum Packages!

Shop for Platinum now to take advantage of this deal!

You have until 2:00 PM PST on Monday, October 24 to make your purchase!

This table shows exactly how much additional Platinum you'll receive!

65 Platinum Package / Normal Bonus: 0 / Additional Weekend Bonus: 20 / Total Platinum: 85

155 Platinum Package / Normal Bonus: 0 / Additional Weekend Bonus: 50 / Total Platinum: 205

225 Platinum Package / Normal Bonus: 15 / Additional Weekend Bonus: 75 / Total Platinum: 315

400 Platinum Package / Normal Bonus: 25 / Additional Weekend Bonus: 100 / Total Platinum: 525

1000 Platinum Package / Normal Bonus: 100 / Additional Weekend Bonus: 200 / Total Platinum: 1300

2500 Platinum Package / Normal Bonus: 500 / Additional Weekend Bonus: 500 / Total Platinum: 3500

5000 Platinum Package / Normal Bonus: 1000 / Additional Weekend Bonus: 1000 / Total Platinum: 7000

Platinum is key to your success in Edgeworld! You can use Platinum to speed up your upgrades, instantly train units, earn more XP, and much more!

Full Rules:

Packages must be purchased between 2:00 PM Friday (October 21) and 2:00 PM Monday (October 24), PST.

2:00 PM PST is 9:00 PM GMT and 11:00 PM in Europe.

This bonus is only being offered to players whose accounts are more than 7 days old, and who have never purchased Platinum before. Accounts less than 7 days old can take advantage of our Beginner's Sale to get a similar discount.

The additional bonus Platinum will only apply to your first Platinum purchase. Make it a good one!

hash.message.body.20121116herobuyevent2: Generals are just around the corner, get a head start by winning some skill points! From now until 11:59pm PST on November 18th, every 200 Platinum purchased will qualify you to receive an exclusive Generals Mystery Box which will guarantee to contain at least 100 Skill Points for your General but that's not all! Each box also comes with a chance to contain an item which can grant 1000 or even 5000 Skill Points! Skill Points can be used to level up your General's abilities which can range from passive boosts to your base to more active boosts to your troops in combat. More information on this feature can be found on the forums, so check our official announcement for more details: CLICK HERE --> General's Announcement! This event will end at 11:59pm PST on November 18th, so make your purchases now before these Skill Point items are released to the public! Results will be compiled and mystery boxes delivered on the day of this new release next week!

The Rhino Rampage has started! Break your enemy's defensive line with these mighty troops!

Train your offensive squad, and get on the field!

Don't miss any announcements - Like our Fan Page!

hash.message.body.20130131zootsjackpotreminde:
Today is the Last Day to play our latest version of Zoot's Jackpot!
Play the Jackpot today and you can win items like General's Orders, Cerulean Armor, Hacker's Patches, Builders Boxes, Decimation Crates and Platinum but that's not all! Each play you make could also be the one that takes home the Jackpot!
Click on the "Z" icon next to your Mailbox to check out Zoot's Jackpot today! This event will only be available until 11:59pm PST deadline tonight (February 2nd, so don't delay! Take advantage today before someone else claims the Jackpot!
hash.message.body.20130704forcetournament:
July 4th is here, and we have decided to celebrate this day with a special Force Tournament! This tournament will be a 4 DAY Engineering Lab Part Upgrade and Building Force Tournament, but we have included a special set of improved prizes!
All Force earned through troop training, building, researching, equipment upgrading, and General Skill upgrading will contribute to your Tournament AND Leaderboard rankings but that's not all! In addition, Engineering Lab Part Upgrades and Building Force Points will be TRIPLED(x3) for the duration of the tournament!
The top 40 players on each sector will each qualify for Prizes, the most ever from any Force Tournament!
Items such as Ruby Cores, Black Market Patches, Generals Orders and other building Cores can be won but that's not all! We will also be introducing brand new 3.0 Enhancement Tokens, offering exponentially greater benefits when attached to your Engineering Lab Parts! Make sure to check the Tournament Leaderboard in game for an exact breakdown on the new prize structure.
In addition to these overall prizes, Daily Prizes will be available for the top 3 players an a given day as well as Achievement Prizes that can be warned once you pass certain Force Thresholds! Check the in game leaderboard for this breakdown as well.
This special Tournament ends on July 7th at 11:00 PM PDT, so be sure to get started today. Good luck!
-- Edgeworld Team

This Tournament ends on May 2nd at 11:59 PM PDT, so make sure to get started today. Good luck!

Looking to start this week off with a few extra levels? Earning XP just got easier!
Starting today at 11:00 AM PST (September 20th) all XP gained will be DOUBLED! This bonus will only last for a limited time, and will end on Monday September 24th at 5:00 PM PST.
You can take advantage of this event and gain double XP when Training Troops, Upgrading Map Nodes, Attacking Enemies, Upgrading Buildings, and even using your Defense Simulator!
Don't miss out on this extremely limited opportunity to greatly increase your level!

hash.message.body.20130122spreduction:
For the next 24 hours, General Strom's and Vukice's skills will cost only half the amount of SP per upgrade! Make sure to take advantage of this opportunity, as this bonus will only be available until 3:00:00 PM PST on January 23rd.
Upgrade now before it's too late!
hash.research.thor.description: These elite artillery units outrange every other unit and almost all turrets. They also pack a fearsome punch.
hash.items.mysterybox25.name: Red Fireproof Mystery Box
hash.missions.erazi-bandit-post.objectives: Destroy command centers in Level 6 Syndicate bases.
hash.message.body.20120807newunit:
There’s a new graduate of the Fleet Academy, and he’s ready for action!
This unit is lightly armored, but compensates with an arm-mounted missile launcher that’s deadly at ranges further than any other troop can reach!
The only thing this new troop is missing is a proper name! Check your ingame mail for details as to how YOU can help give this powerful new troop a name!
What are you waiting for? Build your Fleet Academy and train this new troop today!
hash.message.body.20130416keysale:
For the first time ever, Decrytption Keys will be on Sale! Decryption Keys are necessary to open up Encrypted Boxes which drop from various Defense Sim campaigns. If you routinely do these campaigns, check your inventory and your sure to have at least a few!
Make sure to hurry and stock up now, this discount will only be available for the next 24 hours! Don;t miss out your chance to win great items from your Encrypted Boxes like Hacker's Patches, Cerulean Armor, Cerulean Cores, Incendiary Cores, and even Vermillion Cores as well as much more!
Visit the Featured Tab of the shop for more details.
hash.missions.snipertower7.description: Increasing the damage output is a given, but this upgrade will also extend the turret's range, increasing the chance that enemy units will be obliterated before getting close enough to pose a threat.
hash.missions.build-x-1-cannon.name: Build X-1 Cannon
hash.message.subject.updatedforcetournament: NEW Force Tournament - 4x E-Lab and 4x Building Bonus!!
hash.items.decimatorflag.description: Decimator Flag to equip to Flag Monument
hash.daily.text.20130124hackerspatchsale: For the next 3 hours, Hacker's Patches will be available for only 65 Platinum! Make sure to take advantage of this FLASH SALE before it's too late!
hash.daily.text.07032013onyxcore: Buy 25% OFF Onyx Cores in the Store Today to Build and Research Battle Cruisers!
hash.message.body.purchase-tokenbox:
Purchase one of the following platinum packages between now and 12:00pm PDT on August 28th and you'll qualify for the following bonus:
Buy the 225 Platinum Pack - Get 4x 3.0 Enhance Token Box Buy the 400 Platinum Pack - Get 10x 3.0 Enhance Token Boxes Buy the 1000 Platinum Pack - Get 20x 3.0 Enhance Token Boxes Buy the 3000 Platinum Pack - Get 20x 3.0 Enhance Token Boxes, a Level 10 Cerulean Network Sabotage and 2 Black Market Patches!
Please keep in mind that you can only qualify for one of these offers, so make sure you purchase the right package! Prizes will be distributed within 3 business day after the conclusion of this event.
hash.missions.legion-camp.description: We can't beat the Helio in a conventional war- they specialize in that. We have to pick our battles and hit their lightly defended camps.

hash.missions.project-x-mining.description: The scientists have devised a new large-scale crystal extraction process that will change everything. In just 100 years, we'll be able to hollow out Cerulea IV and live inside it.

hash.missions.build-a-tech-lab.description: The Tech Lab researches new combat units.

For a Limited Time only, the following Engineering Lab Enhance Tokens will be discounted by 25% and in the shop for 75 Platinum:
Armor Token Piercing Ammo Token Explosive Ammo Token
Select the desired Engineering Lab Part and select "Enhance" to get started!
hash.message.body.24hoursofpower:
Free Hour of Power for Platinum purchase!
Purchase any Platinum Package of 1000 Platinum or larger between 12:00 pm PST 5/9/2012 and 12:00 pm PST 5/10/2012 and you will receive a FREE Hour of Power Crate.
Hour of Power Crates contain 60 Minutes of XP, Warp, and Troop Boosts, as well as 60 minutes in Accelerators!
Payout guaranteed within 12 hours!
hash.missions.dax4accelerator.description: Shorten Building, Research, or Training time by 4 days.

hash.missions.tesla-expansion.description: My translation data shows the phrase "lightning never strikes the same place twice" is shared galaxy-wide. Also, its completely untrue.
hash.message.body.20130715forcetournamentremi:
Today is the Last Day to Participate in our latest Generals and Engineering Lab Tournament!
All Force earned through troop training, building, researching, equipment upgrading, and General Skill upgrading will contribute to your Tournament AND Leaderboard rankings but that's not all! In addition, Generals and Engineering Lab Part Upgrading Force Points will be TRIPLED(x3) for the duration of the tournament!
The top 40 players on each sector will each qualify for Prizes, the most ever from any Force Tournament!
Items such as Ruby Cores, Black Market Patches, Generals Orders and other building Cores can be won but that's not all! We will also be giving out the brand new 3.0 Enhancement Tokens, offering exponentially greater benefits when attached to your Engineering Lab Parts! Make sure to check the Tournament Leaderboard in game for an exact breakdown on the new prize structure.
In addition to these overall prizes, Daily Prizes will be available for the top 3 players in a given day as well as Achievement Prizes that can be warned once you pass certain Force Thresholds! Check the in game leaderboard for this breakdown as well.
This Tournament ends tonight at 11:00 PM PDT, Good luck!
-- Edgeworld Team

hash.daily.text.20121102troopqueuelimit: Troop Training queue has been raised to 1000 days for a Limited Time! Check your mail for details!

hash.promotion.102811.body:
Halloween is almost here, and the terrors of Cerulea IV are rising. A powerful Alliance will protect you from the things that go bump in the night, and let you give some bumps of your own!

On Monday, we're picking the 3 most powerful Alliances in each sector, and awarding a 1-Hour Accelerator to each member of those Alliances!

You can have bases and Alliances on multiple sectors. Try starting an Alliance in a newer Sector, and fight your way to the top!

Prizes are awarded Monday, October 31. Ghoulishly good luck!

With the release of Level 17 and our graphical overhaul, buildings and turrets have never been stronger!
If you're still looking to get your hands on more Ruby Cores, look no further then our latest Mystery Box! Within you have a chance to win one of the newly released Ruby Cores, but that's not all! Other great items can be had such as Vermillion Cores, 15 Hour Accelerators, as well as other great items like Troop Bundles!
This box will only be available for a Limited Time, so visit the featured tab of the shop and stock up today!

with a Grand Prize of 100 Incineraptors!!!

hash.missions.build-fusion-reactor.definition: Fusion technology would have given us a huge advantage a few millennia ago. As it stands, we'lll need it just to keep a level playing field. You were simply born too late, Commander.

hash.message.body.zootsjackpotintroduction:
Introducing Zoot’s Jackpot!
Zoot’s Jackpot allows you to use platinum to win fantastic prizes including Cerulean Cores, Incendiary Cores, Mystery Boxes, ANNIHILATOR CRATES and even PLATINUM! Every play also has a chance of hitting the Zoot’s Progressive Jackpot, a huge supply of platinum sure to supercharge even the most advanced Commanders in their quest for domination!
Every new line offers more enticing prizes in addition to significantly higher Jackpot odds. But beware, each new line also bears a higher chance of losing your prize!
Will you be the first Commander to win HUGE? There's only one way to find out – click on the Zoot’s Jackpot icon and play!

Greetings Commander! Here are the current leaders in the Sector Tournament. Remember, the Sector Level Up Tournament ends at 11:59 PM PST tonight! Good luck and keep up the good work!

hash.message.body.20130515googleupdate: Commander, Google has recently confirmed that they will be discontinuing their Google+ Games platform. Sadly, once this occurs, Kabam Games will no longer be available on the Google+ platform. Our Team is currently formulating the best way to accommodate our Google+ Players through this transition. Please know that facilitating this as smoothly and effectively as possible is of utmost importance to us. In the meantime, we have enabled the ability to link your Google+ game account to Kabam.com. For more information on how to do this, click HERE Check back for updates to this announcement. We will let you know as soon as our plan for Google+ Players has been finalized. Thank you for your patience and your continued support of Edgeworld. - The Edgeworld Team
hash.research.tankturret.description: Each Heavyweight Turret receives a boost to their Attack and Health based on each Heavyweight Turret level across all bases. The more you build the more powerful the boost.
hash.message.body.20121026cratereminder:
Haven't had a chance to check out one of the new 3 Mystery Crates yet? They are only available for a Limited Time so don't delay! The New Gatling, Stasis, and Advanced Weapons Mystery Crates can yield premium and powerful Engineering Lab Equipment that can multi-target and even concuss enemy troops with each shot!
Items like Hyper Liquid Coolants, Reinforced Explosive Ammo, and Frozen Dual Barrels are all possibilities and can be yours, but only if you act fast!
These 3 Mystery Crates will only be available until 12:00pm PST (Noon) on October 29th, so make sure to get yours today!
hash.missions.attack-syndicate-base.name: Attack Syndicate base
hash.faction.helio.lose.1: Like every sun, Helio will rise again!
hash.faction.helio.lose.2: You've only succeeded in making me angry. For Grod, anger is energy!
hash.faction.helio.lose.3: I promise you, I'll be back -- with a plaque for your head!

hash.missions.automated-loadouts.description: Part of a key operation, but lost your helmet? Every grunt knows that sinking feeling. I've always said that putting combat prep in the hands of machines is the way to go.

hash.message.body.20120908buildingxpextension:
Due to popular demand, our Building XP Boost event has been EXTENDED! All XP earned through building will remain at their current levels for a limited time!
There has never been a better time to level up your Command Centers, Barracks, Fleet Academies and Turrets. Better yet, now is the best time to bring your Aurora 1 bases up to spec!
What are you waiting for? Don't miss this special opportunity to increase your Level!
hash.message.subject.tournamentmap: Tournament Maps available in select Sectors NOW!!!
hash.message.body.20130428blackmarketpatchbox:
With the release level 16 Engineering Lab Parts, your turrets and defenses have never been stronger! Leveling up to Level 16 can be done naturally through the Engineering Lab, but if you need any help then look no further then the Black Market Patch Mystery Box! This new Patch will guarantee an upgrade from Level 15 - 16, and can only be found inside this box!
Open one of these to take home this exclusive item, but that's not all!
This box can also contain Hacker's Patches to help get your lab parts up to level 15, Berserkers and other troop bundles that all will provide XP when opened!
This box will only be available for a Limited Time so don't miss out! Visit the featured tab of the store and get yours today!
hash.items.burstferociousarmor.name: Burst Ferocious Armor
hash.daily.text.20130503resourceconverter: Resource Converter build times all reduced by 80%!
hash.message.body.20130418lvl16wheelreminder:
Today is the Last Day to participate in the latest Wheel Game!
Spin the wheel for your chance to take home one of these highly sought after accelerators, which will help you finish any build almost instantly regardless of level!
Other Premium Wheel Game prizes include Incineraptors, Synthetic Control Cores, Hacker's Patches, and much more!
Spin now and stock up before this game is gone!
hash.message.body.newsim: Commander, The defense simulator campaigns are now better than ever! The level 10 - 14 defense simulator campaigns have just been redesigned to provide you with battles that will push your base to the limit! The Incineraptor Invasion campaign has also been updated as the new level 15 defense simulator campaign that will provide you with the most rewarding challenge yet. In addition, you will be rewarded with a special mystery box the first time you get 3 stars on each defense simulator battle! Use the defense simulator now to test your base against the toughest attacks in all of Cerulea IV!

hash.missions.train-the-bomba.description: A fighter until the very end, the Bomba will explode once they are defeated-- giving other Units a unique advantage against the enemy. I suggest training a Bomba as soon as possible so we may see this powerful new beast for ourselves.
hash.message.body.aurora1sale:
For a limited time only, the Aurora-1 Colony is on sale in the Edgeworld Store!
The Aurora-1 Schematic is on sale for 99 Platinum, over 65% off the normal price! To give yourself a head start in your new colony, the Aurora-1 Kits (which include helpful Speed Ups and Cores) are also on sale!
Expanding your base into the new Aurora-1 Colony helps strengthen your defenses and supports the fight for dominance over Cerulea IV. With additional Training queues and Warp Gates as well as an exclusive Bomba Unit, Aurora-1 is an essential expansion for every Commander.
But hurry-- this sale ends at 2:00 PM PST on July 11th, 2012.
See you in Aurora-1, Commander!
hash.items.mysteryboxh.description: Chance to win prizes from the Platinum and Gold Prize Boxes as well as Generals SP 1,000, 30% Training Accelerators, Incendiary Cores and Decimator Cores!
