Today is the Last Day to Participate in our latest Training and Engineering Lab Tournament!
All Force earned through troop training, building, researching, equipment upgrading, and General Skill upgrading will contribute to your Tournament AND Leaderboard rankings but that's not all! In addition, Generals and Engineering Lab Part Upgrading Force Points will be TRIPLED(x3) for the duration of the tournament!
The top 40 players on each sector will each qualify for Prizes, the most ever from any Force Tournament!
Items such as Ruby Cores, Black Market Patches, Generals Orders and other building Cores can be won but that's not all! hash.buildings.engineeringlab.description: The Engineering Lab increases turret system performance by enabling equippable Parts. Collect, upgrade and equip Parts to enhance defense tactics. Upgrade to unlock more turret slots.
hash.daily.text.spend-blackmarket: Between 11am and 11:59pm PDT today (August 29st), get a FREE Black Market Patch for every 300 Platinum you spend!
hash.message.body.20130624forcetournament:
A brand new 3 DAY Total Force Tournament has just begun!
All Force earned through troop training, building, researching, equipment upgrading, and General Skill upgrading will contribute to your Tournament AND Leaderboard rankings and will also be DOUBLED (x2) for the duration!
The 1st place winner in each sector will receive a new Ruby Core for Level 17 building upgrades as well as 600 platinum for their efforts! The next 2nd and 3rd place winners will receive Platinum Prize Boxes which have a chance to provide Ruby Cores! The Tournament Prize Boxes for the top 10 players contain the following:
Platinum Prize Box - Guarantees a Ruby Core, Black Market Patch, Generals Order, Incineraptor, or Synthetic Control Core Gold Prize Box - Chance to win a Black Market Patch, Generals Order, Incineraptor, Synthetic Control Core, Onyx Core, Hacker's Patch, Vermillion Core, Cerulean Core, or SP 5000 Silver Prize Box - Decreased chance to win prizes from the Platinum and Gold boxes, plus a 30% Troop Accelerator, SP 1000, Incendiary Core, or Decimator Core Bronze Prize Box - Decreased chance to win prizes from Gold and Silver Boxes plus Troops and Speed Ups
In addition to these overall prizes, Daily Prizes are now available for the top 3 players a given day as well as Achievement Prizes once you pass certain Force Thresholds! Check the in game leaderboard for more details.
This Tournament ends on June 26th at 11:00 PM PDT, so be sure to get started today. Good luck!
-- Edgeworld Team

hash.missions.mallick-s-revenge.description: We did worse than kill Malick - we embarrassed him. He's gathering troops at a new Maar base, hoping to destroy us and save face with the Confederate bureaucracy.

Deluxe Time Travelers Crates contain 1200 Platinum worth of Accelerators and will be available for a limited time at only 450 Platinum!
SPECIAL BONUS: Purchase a Deluxe Time Traveler’s Crate before 11:59pm PDT today and receive a Bonus 4-Day Accelerator!!

hash.missions.the-simplest-solutions.descript: "I'm sure you're anxious to hear about our latest round of ridiculous technological advances to improve our Warp Gates. Well, we made it bigger. Yep, that's it. That said, it's surprisingly effective.

1x 60-Min Troop Energizer

hash.message.body.spendevent100813:
From now until 12:00am PDT on October 9th, 2013, Spending Platinum will earn you Epic Engineering Lab Prizes!
Spend 10 Platinum and receive 2 Software Backups (LIMIT 10 per player) Spend 50 Platinum and receive 1 Modder’s Patch (LIMIT 10 per player) Spend 100 Platinum and receive 1 Hacker’s Patch (LIMIT 5 per player) Spend 300 Platinum and receive 1 Black Market Patch! (LIMIT 3 per player)
Prizes will be paid out by October 10th, 2013. Don’t miss out on this opportunity to upgrade your Vermillion Smart Parts!
We’ve added a BONUS TIER to today’s spend event!
Spend 500 Platinum in the Shop and receive 1 Level 10 Vermillion Advanced Targeting Smart Part!
hash.daily.text.20130508buyevent: Purchase Platinum, receive Accelerators to help you win the Force Tournament!
hash.missions.shrike-strike.description: One Shrike is dangerous, but 10 of them can cut through enemy defenses like a hot knife through cartilage.

hash.promotion.08012011.body:
It's time for our next event: the Level 7 Building Blitz!

Upgrade your buildings to Level 7, and you could win a HAX-8 Speedup! Every Level 7 building is another chance to win!

25 players will win on Wednesday. Start your upgrades now!


Get yourself up to Level 7, because we're just about ready to take your base to the next level!
hash.missions.candy-from-a-baby.description: It's a harsh world, Commander. Show some poor noob the ropes… or the door.

Open this Mystery Box for a chance to win the newest and most powerful Defensive Engineering Lab Part, Cerulean Network Sabotage! hash.promotion.08262011.body:
Take advantage of Zoot's generosity, send Platinum to your friends, and help us name the next sector! It's another exciting weekend in Edgeworld!

Zoot's Double Down

Zoot's inventory is overstocked, and he's just giving it away! This weekend, you can play Zoot's Loot twice a day!
Visit often to win!

Name the Next Sector!

Visit the forums to give us your ideas for the next Sector name!
Any names we use will win 100 Platinum!

Visit the contest thread here!

And don't forget about Platinum Gifting! You can buy Platinum for other members of your Alliance, and your Facebook friends, from our Platinum Page!

Platinum Gifts are currently not available on Google+.

hash.message.body.20130227forcetournamentremi:
Today is the Last Day to Participate in our latest Force Tournament!
All Force earned through troop training, building, researching, equipment upgrading, General Skill upgrading and PvP will contribute to your leaderboard ranking, with the top 40 netting fabulous prizes such as Platinum, Trophies, and even premium troops!
This Tournament ends on March 4th at 10:00 AM PDT, and if you have any questions on the new force system make sure to visit our forums and check your in game mail for more details. Good luck!
-- Edgeworld Team

hash.message.body.20121105labmaint:
This coming Wednesday November 7th, we will be performing a maintenance on the Engineering Lab to address the amount of excess parts that are now present within the game. We will be deleting all duplicate and excess (and non-equipped) Level 1 Basic Lab parts, then instituting a cap of 100 max parts within Engineering Labs.
This change should not only address an error that has affected many users within their labs, but should also improve overall game performance as well!
Again, we will be performing this maintenance on Wednesday November 7th, so make sure to get your Engineering Lab in order! This action will not require any server downtime, so your gameplay shouldn't be interrupted.
Thank you for your patience during this maintenance, and we apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

hash.message.body.20120723purchase1000:
Right now, from 11:00am PDT on July 23rd until 11:00am PDT on July 26th, all players that purchase at least 500 platinum in the store will get one FREE Time Traveler's Crate! These crates include 186 platinum worth of Speed Ups! Players are limited to one free Time Traveler's Crate over the event period.
Additionally, during the event period, players will receive one FREE Renegade Crate for EVERY 2,000 platinum purchased! These crates include 47 items including Accelerator Boxes, Builder's Boxes, Incendiary Boxes and Training Boxes! There is no limit on the number of Renegade Crates earned.
Please note that all prizes will be paid out to the Sector in which the Platinum was purchased, and each Sector will be counted individually for Platinum purchased, so you cannot combine purchases across multiple Sectors. Prizes will be distributed by July 28th.

hash.promotion.erazi75.body:
Commander, your devotion to crushing the Erazi Syndicate is commendable. The Maar Confederacy has sent Gas and Crystal to our base. They call it a 'Tax Rebate,' but I think they're just afraid of us destroying all their bases again!

Check your inventory using the Shop button to access these items.

You have received 250,000 Crystal and Gas.
hash.missions.gimme-your-lunch-money.name: Gimme your lunch money
hash.message.body.20130124generalrelease:
The Helio Defector, General Mako has joined your cause, and with it comes his technical prowess. Each General’s Power Armor has been augmented with new abilities!
General Strom gets the Plasma Cannon, a devastating AoE explosion that can eventually be fired at range.
General Vukice gets the Magnetic Shield, a Buff for himself and troops that provides a temporary resistance to munitions based weapons, similar to a Berserker.
Mako himself gets the Overdrive ability, giving the affected troops a short term, but sizable upgrade in damage.
These abilities aren’t part of a general’s normal repertoire, and thus require a General’s Order to be able to train and upgrade. Keep an eye out for opportunities to get your hands on this valuable item!
For more details on Mako's backstory, make sure to visit our forums!
hash.fte.kira.outro:
Attacking enemies, training troops and expanding your base will all give you essential experience and help you on your path to dominating this sector!
That's all for now, Commander. Good luck!

hash.player-feedback.invite.body:
As one of our valued players, we’d like your feedback on how Edgeworld can serve you better. Your comments and suggestions are very important to us, so we’d love to hear from you! Please help us by taking a short survey and participating in a moderated chat session.

If you are able to participate, you will receive a $50 Amazon gift card and be entered into a sweepstakes for another $50 Amazon gift card.

To begin, please click on the link below. If this does not work, please cut and paste the address into your web browser.

http://survey.confirmit.com/wix/p1752505458.aspx?SAM=2

Thank you for your participation. Your insight is invaluable to us.

Sincerely,


James Holloway
Executive Producer

Want to get your hands on Edgeworld's newest unit and its Onyx Cores? Purchase Platinum today and receive these items and troops for FREE!
Simply purchase one of the following Platinum Packages before the deadline to qualify for the following payouts:
Buy the 225 Platinum Pack and receive 2 Onyx Cores! Buy the 400 Platinum Pack and receive 3 Onyx Cores and 2 Battle Cruisers! Buy the 1000 Platinum Pack or greater and receive 5 Onyx Cores and 10 Battle Cruisers!
This unique offer starts today (April 15th) and will end at 11:59pm PST on April 16th. Only your first Platinum purchase made between these times will qualify. The prizes will be distributed onto the server in which Platinum was purchased and added to your Inventory within 3 business days of this event's conclusion.

hash.missions.concussion-expansion.descriptio: If we add more Concussion Turrets to our base, enemies will look like they're standing still out there. That is, until they drop dead.
hash.campaign.erazi.hint100: Holes in defenses are not always holes. Look for where a type of troop might be especially useful!
hash.daily.text.20120717tankturret: Win valuable prizes for building Heavyweight Turrets! See your mail for additional details.
hash.items.mysteryboxy.description: Guaranteed to contain a Cerulean Alloy, Platinum Alloy, Common Alloy, Hacker's Patch or Decimator!

hash.missions.target-detected.name: Target Detected
hash.promotion.09192011.subject: Build and Battle Winners!
hash.message.body.06182013thrax:
Introducing General Thrax! This new general is a bloodthirsty Pirate Captain that spends his days traversing the universe in search of his next bounty. He has the firepower to lay waste to anything that gets in his way and powerful leadership abilities to direct his troops to attack his primary targets!
Thrax’s Focus Fire ability allows him to direct the troops nearest to him to specific spots on an enemy’s base, overcoming the magnetic effects of Trophy Buildings and turret fire!
His ultimate ability, the Energy Beam, allows him to cut straight through an enemy’s base and obliterate everything in his path!
Thrax will join the battle against your foes as long as you have a Level 17 Generals Quarters.
Check our official forums for more details including a full backstory!
hash.missions.recover-the-cerulean-core.descr: Commander, the Maar have uncovered a Cerulean artifact which could boost our construction tremendously. Let's seize it!
hash.message.body.20121221holidaybox: What's inside? Open up to find out!
hash.items.tokenscope2.description: Applies a moderate scaling Range Boost permanently to an Engineering Lab Part!
hash.items.mysterybox26.description: Open for a chance to win the Armor Token 4.0 or the Piercing Ammo Token 4.0! Other Prizes Include: 1x Hacker's Patch 1x Incendiary Rack 1x 8 Hr Accelerator 1x 15 Hr Accelerator 1x Decimator 2x Berserker 1x Incineraptor
hash.message.body.20130628rubycore:
The Ruby Core will be in the store for a limited time only! This core allows you to upgrade your buildings to Level 17, which gives you access to a larger base size, more levels of research, a brand new General and much more!
This core will only be in the store for a limited time, so don’t wait to stock up! Start upgrading your buildings to Level 17 today!!
hash.message.body.20130625ammodelivery:
The Cerulean Ammo Delivery is a brand new smart AI Lab Part that will cause your turrets to always target the Unit or General that they will deal the maximum damage to, greatly increasing your maximum efficiency! In addition to this smart AI, equipping this part will also significantly increase the turret's health as well as its overall damage!
Purchase an Ammo Delivery Box today for a chance to win one of these rare parts and vanquish your enemies! Unlike other Mystery Boxes in the past, this one boasts much higher odds to win and much better consolation prizes like Cerulean Cores, Spp5000 and much more at a discounted rate!
Check the featured tab of the shop for more info, and stock up while supplies last!
hash.promotion.sevensixteen.body:
Stock up on Platinum! Starting now, every Platinum package you purchase is a chance to win double Platinum!

We're choosing three winners a day on Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday and Thursday. (July 18-21) If you're chosen, one of your Platinum purchases will be doubled! The more packages you buy, the more chances you have to win!

You'll want to have some extra Platinum on hand soon - the Edgeworld team is working on tons of new stuff! Watch for details on new building levels, large-scale Alliance warfare, and more. Buy a Platinum package to be prepared!
hash.missions.research-spider.name: Research Lancer
hash.items.exploder1.name: Bomba
hash.message.body.04112013battlecruiser:
The Battle Cruiser, a brand new, extra powerful unit, has been launched exclusively on Caldera-2!
This new unit can shoot up to 4 lethal bullets at once and fires at a rate of more than once per second! Check the forums now for more information on this great new addition to your army!
The Battle Cruiser requires Onyx Cores to research and train, and these cores are available in the store right now! However, the Onyx Core will be purchasable for a limited time only, so be sure to stock up today!
hash.missions.greater-extractor-scarabs.descr: Our tech lab is close to replicating the tunneling nanomachine colonies that Ceruleans used to extract natural gas. They're insectoid -- you might say we've worked all the bugs out.
hash.items.troopbox.description: Take a chance and hire some mercenaries! Instantly Trains 3000 Marines or between 1 and 80 Pulse Tanks without using your Factory or any resources.
hash.daily.text.spendeventvermillionblastshie: For the next 24 hours, spending Platinum will earn you Patches, Crates and the Vermillion Blast Shield!
hash.message.body.20121213trainingaccelerator: For the next 24 hours, 30% Training Accelerators will be available for 20% Off their normal price! Visit the in-game shop and stock up today!
hash.missions.playing-with-fire.name: Playing with Fire
hash.message.body.cerulean50:
Still haven't built your 2nd Warp Gate, Fleet Academy or unlocked all the levels of your Defense Simulator? Now is your chance to purchase Cerulean Cores for the low price of 20 Platinum until 12:00pm Pacific Time, June 19.
Act now, because this special limited time sale won't be back soon!
hash.daily.text.20120914level14: Announcing the release of Level 14 and newly upgraded turrets & troops! Check your mail for details.
hash.items.flag18.description: Banner to be equipped to Banner Monument
hash.items.zootsmysterybox.description: Win between 1 and 500 Zoot's Loot tokens in this special mystery box!
hash.items.platinumalloy.name: Platinum Alloy
hash.missions.depleted-uranium.description: By burning depleted uranium with some of the energy from the inital reaction, we can improve efficiency. This will let us draw more energy from the uranium ore that we've gathered. I expect a hefty holiday bonus, Commander.
hash.message.incendiarywinner.subject: Incendiary Core Winner!
hash.items.indianflag.name: Indian Flag
hash.message.body.guaranteedtokenboxfrozen: For a limited Time Only, the Guaranteed Token Box will be available in the Shop! Open this box for a GUARANTEED Token 1.0, 2.0, or 3.0 Tokens include: Piercing Ammo, Fireproof, Armor, Blast Shield, Meteoric Shield, Sky Shroud and the brand new Network Sabotage Token! BONUS: Purchase 10 Guaranteed Token Boxes between now and 9:00am PDT on September 18, 2013 and get the brand new Frozen Token! Limit 2 per Player, per Sector. The Frozen Token has the power to add a Concussive Effect to any Turret!
hash.missions.tesla-expansion.name: Tesla Expansion
hash.items.mysterybox29.name: Liquid Scope Mystery Box
hash.message.body.20130215generalsordermyster:
With the release of the new and powerful addition of the Premium Skills, your Generals have never been stronger! Leveling up these new skills requires a Generals Order, and here is your chance to win some!
Simply purchase our new Generals Orders Box for a chance to take home this exclusive item, but that's not all!
You will also have a small chance to win 5 Generals Orders, and also can receive other troop items like Berserkers, Disruptors, Chimeras, and Hornets that all will provide XP when opened!
The only way to get these Generals Orders currently is through this Mystery Box, which will only be available for a Limited Time! Visit the featured tab of the store to get yours today!
hash.message.bombatraining.winner: Thank you for your patience as we worked out the kinks on our Bomba contest! You've been selected as a winner, and a Warrior's Kit has been added to your inventory. Congratulations!
hash.activerecord.errors.models.faction-battl: Commander, you caused much more damage than your troops could deal. Please contact EW customer service.
hash.activerecord.errors.models.faction-base-: Sorry Commander. You have already commenced an attack on a faction base. Faction warps will be available again in 5 minutes.
hash.daily.text.20121207alliancemobile: Join an Alliance by next Friday for a chance to win a 24 Hour Accelerator! Check your in game mail for more details.
hash.daily.text.20130704forcetournamentlongme:
All Force earned through troop training, building, researching, equipment upgrading, and General Skill upgrading will contribute to your Tournament AND Leaderboard rankings but that's not all! In addition, Engineering Lab Part Upgrades and Building Force Points will be TRIPLED(x3) for the duration of the tournament!
The top 40 players on each sector will each qualify for Prizes, the most ever from any Force Tournament!
Items such as Ruby Cores, Black Market Patches, Generals Orders and other building Cores can be won but that's not all! We will also be introducing brand new 3.0 Enhancement Tokens, offering exponentially greater benefits when attached to your Engineering Lab Parts! Make sure to check the Tournament Leaderboard in game for an exact breakdown on the new prize structure.
In addition to these overall prizes, Daily Prizes will be available for the top 3 players an a given day as well as Achievement Prizes that can be warned once you pass certain Force Thresholds! Check the in game leaderboard for this breakdown as well.
hash.missions.research-hornet.name: Research Hornet
hash.message.body.outage2413:
We will be taking Edgeworld down temporarily for Server Maintenance tonight at 9:00pm PST
We anticipate having the game available to play again by 10:00pm PST
Thank you for your patience.
hash.daily.text.20130115antitankturret: The schematics for a new defensive structure has arrived! Check your mail for more details!
hash.message.092611.body:
Our scientists merged Cerulean artifacts with advanced technology, and created the Pulse Tank and the Incendiary Turret! Learn more about these new weapons in our video on YouTube.

The Incendiary Turret ignites a target, burning it away until the battle ends or the target is destroyed!

The Pulse Tank transforms during combat, entering Beast Mode for extra power!

This weekend, build Incendiary Turrets and research Pulse Tanks to win! The higher your building/research level, the more chance you have to win!

Ten players in each sector who build Incendiary Turrets will win 10 Incendiary Cores!

Ten players in each sector who research Pulse Tanks will win 10 Pulse Cores!

You don't need Cores to start building these weapons, so try them out - anyone can win! We’ll announce the winners on Tuesday, October 11. Good luck!
hash.missions.research-rhinos.description:
Rhino's are heavy-duty units that can take higher damage.

Select your TECH LAB.
Click RESEARCH.
Select the RHINO.
Click RESEARCH.
hash.missions.profane-in-the-membrane.name: Profane in the Membrane
hash.daily.text.forceboxes: Try your luck with the Use the Force Box, or open our guaranteed 50K or 100K Force Boxes!
hash.message.body.dax4sale:
For a limited time only, 4-Day Accelerators will 50% OFF in the Shop!
Visit the featured tab to pick one up today for only 150 Platinum!
hash.daily.text.20130619spendevent: Spend Platinum to get Black Market Patches and upgrade your equipment parts to Level 16 and 17 today!
hash.buildings.bunker.description: Defensive Building where you can Garrison Troops in order to increase its power!
hash.items.spiderchip.name: Control Device
hash.message.body.04302013generals:
All of the Generals are stronger than ever before!
From now on, each time that you apply a General’s Orders to a General, the General will get an increase in health and damage along with an improvement in the effectiveness of its premium active ability! Additionally, Generals that have at least 10 General’s Orders applied to them can now be deployed into battle simultaneously! Please check the forums for more information on this exciting new feature.
The General’s Orders mystery box is currently in the store, so be sure to get a few and try out these new features today!
hash.message.20120717tankturret6.body: Thank you for participating in our recent Heavyweight Turret Build event. One Deluxe Time Travel Kit has been added to your inventory

hash.message.body.20130530sniperturretevent:
For a limited time only, Sniper Turret build times have been reduced by 50% at all levels! Make sure to take advantage and finish these builds to greatly increase your base defenses!
Build times will return to normal on June 3rd, so take advantage of these lowered build times and increase your base defenses before its too late!

hash.message.body.20130808gunturret:
For a Limited Time Only, your Gun Turret build times have been reduced by 50% for each level! This reduction is in effect across your HQ, Aurora-1 and Caldera-2 bases!
This reduction in build times will end at 12pm PDT on August 14, so upgrade your Gun Turrets today!
hash.missions.dax28shield.description: Gives you 28 days of protection. Removed if you attack another player.
hash.daily.text.bomba: The Bomba unit has arrived! Build yours now!
hash.message.body.20121102frozenbox:
Still looking to unlock more powerful equipment for your Engineering Lab? Here's your chance to win some powerful Frozen Parts with our newest addition, the Frozen Box!
Frozen parts have a chance to "freeze" enemy units on hit. Multiple turrets with Frozen upgrades provide an unparalleled level of control over enemy movements and eliminate huge forces with the greatest of ease!
Check the featured tab of the shop to purchase your Frozen Box today but don't delay! This item will only be available for a Limited Time!
hash.message.body.05242013barracksbatreminder:
Today is the last day to upgrade your Barracks to win 99% Building Accelerators!
Seven randomly selected players that complete a Level 15 or higher Barracks building upgrade on any of their colonies by 11:00pm PST on May 27th will receive a 99% Building Accelerator! Prizes will be paid out to the winners by Wednesday, May 29th at 11:00pm PST.
Don’t wait to upgrade your Barracks buildings to get a chance at winning a 99% Building Accelerator!
hash.message.body.20121002labupgradeincrease:
Starting at 10:30 AM PST on October 3rd, all Engineering Lab Upgrade Rates have been greatly increased for a LIMITED TIME!
There has never been a better time to take advantage of the Bonuses the Engineering Lab has to offer! Engineering Parts can add a multitude of effects to your turrets such as Splash Damage, increased Rate of Fire, Increased Damage, and so much more!
This Event will end at 5:00pm PST on October 5th, so head to your Engineering Lab and get started today!

hash.message.body.20130125firsttimepurchaseev:
Between now and 11:59 PM PDT on January 28th, make any purchase of 65 Platinum or more from the store and receive 10 FREE Cerulean Cores, a 200 Platinum Value!
This is an extremely limited time offer valid ONLY if this was your first Platinum purchase - so act now if you haven't already! Cerulean Cores will be distributed within 3 business days of the conclusion of this event.

hash.daily.text.20130427fireproof: Buy a Cerulean Fireproof Shield Box for your chance to win this new equipment!
hash.message.body.20121116herobuyeventreminde:
Today is the Last Day to participate and take advantage of our latest event!
From now until 11:59pm PST tonight (November 18th), every 300 Platinum purchased will qualify you to receive an exclusive Heroes Mystery Box which will guarantee to contain at least 100 Hero Skill Points but that's not all! Each box also comes with a chance to contain an item which will grant your Hero 1000 Skill Points!
Skill Points can be used to level up your hero's abilities which can range from passive boosts to your base to more active combat abilities. More information on this feature can be found on the forums, so check our official announcement for more details:
<LINK>
This event will end at 11:59pm PST on November 18th, so make your purchases now before these items are released to the public! Results from this event will be compiled and mystery boxes delivered on the day of this new release next week!
hash.items.crystal80k.name: 80,000 Crystals
hash.missions.scientific-madmen.description: The new upgrades in the Tech Lab are kind of a necessity at this point, as the researchers feel that they're not being treated as well as the soldiers -- or the automated turrets. They're currently circulating a petition asking that we stop calling them mad scientists, and start referring to them as scientific madmen. Anyhow... upgrade. Yes.

hash.daily.text.spend-ceruleanblastshield: From 9am - 12pm, Spend 100 Platinum to receive a Cerulean Blast Shield! Limit 3 per Player, per Sector.
hash.message.body.20130520spspend:
Hale has taken the World of Edgeworld by storm, so make sure her and the rest of your General's skills are up to snuff with this latest Spend Event!
For every 100 Platinum you spend between now and 11:59pm PDT on May 21st you will qualify to receive 5,000 FREE General SP! Use this SP to level up your General's Skills now, or stock up for a future Force Tournament!
The General SP will be delivered within 3 business days of this event's conclusion so don't delay! Each player can qualify up to a maximum of 10 times for this event, so make sure to spend at least 1000 Platinum to ensure you'll receive the maximum payout!
Thank you for playing Edgeworld, and good luck out there!
hash.missions.where-are-they.name: Where Are They?
hash.message.body.20130504premiumtroopbox:
Purchase the New Premium Troop Box to guarantee yourself a high end troop that normally requires a core to train or an Incineraptor, which can't be trained!
Here are the possible prizes:
1 x Incineraptor (highest chance ever to win!) 1 x Battle Cruiser 1 x Decimator 2 x Berserkers 10 x Pulse Tanks
Make sure to check the featured tab of the shop and stock up today!

hash.message.body.20130208buildathon:
With the release of the new Encrypted box's from the defense sim and the re-balancing of various troops and turrets in the recent past, its time to make sure your base is up to date! Begin and complete builds for your Defense Sim, Defense Lab, or your Warp Gate for a chance to win 1000 Platinum!
Make sure you are prepared for these latest additions as well as future releases before you're left behind!
This event ends at 11:59pm PST on February 11th with every completed upgrade of your Defense Simulator, Defense Lab, and Warp gate granting you an entry. Five winners will be randomly selected, and prizes will be awarded within 3 business days of this event's conclusion.

Need extra help defending your base from your enemies and their Generals? Help is on the way!
Now you can construct an additional Shield Generator, doubling its effect on your base and greatly boosting its defense! Make sure to check it out and begin constructing today to take advantage of this increased defensive potential!

hash.message.body.20130514forcetournamentremi:
Today is the Last Day to Participate in our latest Research and Lab Force Tournament!
All Force earned through troop training, building, researching, equipment upgrading, General Skill upgrading and PvP will contribute to your Tournament AND Leaderboard rankings! In addition, Researching and Engineering Lab Force Points will be TRIPLED(x3) for the duration of the tournament!
The top 10 players on each sector will each qualify for Tournament Prize Boxes, which contain the following:
Platinum Prize Box - Guarantees a Level 16 Black Market Patch, Generals Order, Incineraptor, Synthetic Control Core, or Onyx Core Gold Prize Box - Chance to win a Level 16 Black Market Patch, Generals Order, Incineraptor, Synthetic Control Core, Onyx Core, Hacker's Patch, Vermillion Core, Cerulean Core, or SP 5000 Silver Prize Box - Decreased chance to win prizes from the Platinum and Gold boxes, plus a 30% Troop Accelerator, SP 1000, Incendiary Core, or Decimator Core Bronze Prize Box - Decreased chance to win prizes from Gold and Silver Boxes plus Troops and Speed Ups
The next 10 players in each sector will receive a variety of great prizes as well! Check the in game leaderboard for more details.
This Tournament ends tonight at 11:59 PM PDT, Good luck!
-- Edgeworld Team

hash.missions.project-x-two-stage-reaction.de: A fusion reaction can be powered-up exponentially with the aid of a matter-antimatter reaction. Upgrade the reactor and I'll have the lab show you what I mean. From a safe distance, of course. Like maybe from orbit.

hash.message.body.20130801mapupdate:
Players have asked for updates to the Alliance map, and so we are bringing them to you! Starting today, the following changes will be in effect on the Alliance map:
1. Map nodes can now be upgraded to a maximum level of 50,000. Map nodes that are captured by an opposing player will only lose 25% of their levels.
2. Alliances can now hold a maximum of 10,000 nodes. Alliances that currently control more than 10,000 nodes cannot take control of more nodes until they fall below this 10,000 node maximum.
3. The Alliance doubling bonus from holding the maximum number of nodes has been removed.
4. All level requirements for attacking nodes have been removed.
Enjoy these new updates to the map as your Alliance vanquishes the competition!

hash.missions.eradication-procedure.descripti: This is one of the most heavily-fortified Legion positions I've ever seen. If you can destroy Grod's Command Center, then you'll have cemented your reputation as one of the greatest military leaders in this galaxy.

hash.message.body.20130604forcetournamentremi:
Today is the Last Day to Participate in our latest Engineering Lab Force Tournament!
All Force earned through troop training, building, researching, equipment upgrading, and General Skill upgrading will contribute to your Tournament AND Leaderboard rankings, but that's not all! All Force gained from Engineering Lab Part Upgrades will be QUADRUPLED(x4) for the duration!
The top 10 players on each sector will each qualify for Tournament Prize Boxes, which contain the following:
Platinum Prize Box - Guarantees a Level 16 Black Market Patch, Generals Order, Incineraptor, Synthetic Control Core, or Onyx Core Gold Prize Box - Chance to win a Level 16 Black Market Patch, Generals Order, Incineraptor, Synthetic Control Core, Onyx Core, Hacker's Patch, Vermillion Core, Cerulean Core, or SP 5000 Silver Prize Box - Decreased chance to win prizes from the Platinum and Gold boxes, plus a 30% Troop Accelerator, SP 1000, Incendiary Core, or Decimator Core Bronze Prize Box - Decreased chance to win prizes from Gold and Silver Boxes plus Troops and Speed Ups
The next 10 players in each sector will receive a variety of great prizes as well!
In addition to these overall prizes, Daily Prizes are now available for the top 3 players an a given day as well as Achievement Prizes once you pass certain Force Thresholds! Check the in game leaderboard for more details.
This Tournament ends tonight at 11:00 PM PDT, so make sure to get started today. Good luck!
-- Edgeworld Team
hash.message.marchdoubleplatinumwinner.body: Your Platinum purchase has been chosen as a winner in our Double Platinum contest! We've randomly chosen a Platinum purchase between 3/16 and 3/20, and doubled it! Refresh the game to see your updated Platinum total!

hash.items.mysteryboxo.description: Open for a chance to win a Ruby Core, Vermillion Core, and other great prizes like Troop Bundles and Speed Ups!
hash.promotion.120211.body:
The Maar Confederacy was once a mutually beneficial alliance between the sovereign world governments. But when the Cerulean threat nearly destroyed civilization, the Confederacy changed from a benevolent partnership to a martial dictatorship.

The Maar Confederacy still believes that every base on Cerulea IV is rightfully part of the Confederacy, and owes them loyalty and taxes. Their aggression is a threat to the societies and economies of planets across the galaxy.

The Helio Legion and the Erazi Syndicate don't deny the growing Maar threat. In fact, they're willing to provide some 'assistance' to three Commanders in each Sector who prove the most disruptive to Maar operations.

One Commander Level 1 to 100: 250,000 Energy, 250,000 Uranium, 1 Combat Strategy

One Commander Level 101 to 500: 1 million Energy, 1 million Uranium, 2 Combat Strategies

One Commander Level 501 and up: 4 million Energy, 4 million Uranium, 3 Combat Strategies

To win, launch as many attacks as possible against Maar bases between 12:00 Saturday morning to 12:00 Monday night (PST)!

Picking on weaklings isn't sporting - only battles against bases that are at least 1/2 your level will count!

Details and full rules are in the forums! Let the battle begin!
hash.missions.hornet-s-zest.description: The buzzing around base is that Hornets at their zenith are the bee’s knees.
hash.missions.enhanced-armor.description: Enhancing the Disruptor's osmium shell with reflexive armor plates will increase its damage capacity on the field. You'll also want to make sure you don't bump into one by accident, as the results will be messy.
hash.missions.things-that-go-boom-3.name: Things that Go Boom 3
hash.missions.mutant-phun-klub-4.objectives: Increase Uranium Production to 150,000 per hour.
hash.message.body.20130904forcetournament:
A brand new 4 DAY Training and E-Lab Force Tournament has just begun!
The 1st place finisher will receive a Platinum Prize Box and the 2nd-20th place finishers will receive Gold and Silver boxes!
All Force earned through troop training, building, researching, equipment upgrading, and General Skill upgrading will contribute to your Tournament AND Leaderboard rankings but that's not all! In addition, Training and E-Lab Force Points will be QUADRUPLED (x4) for the duration of the tournament!
The top 20 players on each sector will each qualify for NEWLY UPDATED Tournament Prize Boxes, which contain the following awesome new prizes:
Platinum Prize Box - Guarantees Level 16 Black Market Patches, Generals Orders, Incineraptors, Synthetic Control Cores, or Onyx Cores Gold Prize Box - Chance to win Level 16 Black Market Patches, Generals Orders, Incineraptors, Synthetic Control Cores, Onyx Cores, Hacker's Patches, Vermillion Cores, Cerulean Cores, or SP 5000s Silver Prize Box - Decreased chance to win prizes from the Platinum and Gold boxes, plus 50% Troop Accelerators, SP 1000s, Incendiary Cores, or Decimator Cores Bronze Prize Box - Decreased chance to win prizes from Gold and Silver Boxes plus Troops or Speed Ups
Additional Prizes all the way to 40th place!
Check the in game leaderboard for more details.
In addition to these overall prizes, Daily Prizes are now available for the top 3 players an a given day as well as Achievement Prizes once you pass certain Force Thresholds! Check the in game leaderboard for more details.
This Tournament ends on October 1st at 12:00 PM PDT, so be sure to get started today. Good luck!
-- Edgeworld Team
hash.missions.daily-item-hax-1-accelerator.de:
*Kabam.com Exclusive Mission*

Hostilities are increasing all around, and some enemy commanders are beginning to question whether they're on the winning team. Occasionally, we'll get a small shipment from a nervous Captain, afraid his base will be the next one we flatten. We get something useful and, if he someday ends up in our custody, we go easy on 'em.

Play today for a chance to win items like Cerulean Armor, Cerulean Damage Sensors, and Cerulean Central Protection parts along with other favorites like Hacker's Patches, Builders Boxes, Decimation Crates and Platinum at an accelerated rate! Each play you make could also net you the Jackpot, which grows with every play!
Click on the "Z" icon next to your Mailbox to check out Zoot's Jackpot today! This event will only be available for the next 24 hours so don't delay!

Looking to add a Concussive Effect to your turrets? The new Frozen Token will stop attacking troops in their tracks! Enhance your Turrets with the Frozen Token to add the Concussive Effect to any of your turrets!
Open this Mystery Box for a chance to win the Frozen Token! Prizes also include Level 5 Frozen E-Lab Parts, Black Market Patches, Hacker’s Patches, Incendiary Cores, Generals SP 1000 and Troop Bundles!
This box will only be available for a limited time so be sure to pick one up and start freezing your enemy attacks today!

hash.message.body.20130129smartpart1:
A new and powerful addition has come to the Engineering Lab, Cerulean Armor! This new part will provide your turrets a health boost but that's not all! This part will also update your turret's IFF systems to automatically target higher priority units who have the highest attack damage!
The only way to get this item is through the new Cerulean Mystery Crate! This crate will not only will give you a chance to take home this new premium part, but can also net you other great items like General SP Racks and Hacker's Patches! Visit the featured tab of the store to get yours today!

hash.missions.titan-overdrive.description: The strength of our Titan frames is sufficient to install better engines. At the Staging Area, they're already arguing about who will get the first upgrade.
hash.message.body.20121029terraknor:
Commander,
Remember when I told you that we had a safe and environmentally sound way of disposing of our research chemicals? About that...
The Terraknor may or may not have all died off due to some sort of chemical induced illness. We're lucky that the chemicals had a different effect on one of the other local creatures. They've become huge, and aggressive.
I call them "Lancers".
We should be able to use our old Control Devices to weaponize these new creatures, assuming we survive their initial assault. Get to the Defense Simulator. Break them.

Congratulations, Commander! The Helio Legion rose up, and you shut them down. Admiral Tenmu thanks you.

Use your new items to wage war in the name of peace, and look forward to our next event!

hash.message.body.lootforgeintroduction:
Introducing the Loot Forge!
The new Loot Forge game allows you to use platinum to win fantastic prizes including Cerulean Cores, Incendiary Cores, Mystery Boxes, ANNIHILATOR CRATES and even PLATINUM! Every play also has a chance of hitting the Loot Forge progressive jackpot, a huge supply of platinum sure to supercharge even the most advanced Commanders in their quest for domination!
Every new line played increases the jackpot for all players! Moreover, each successive line in the game offers more enticing prizes in addition to significantly higher jackpot odds. But beware, each successive line also bears a higher chance of losing your prize!
Will you be the first Commander to bring home the jackpot? There's only one way to find out - get out there and play!
hash.message.123downtimecomplete.body:
Thank you for your patience today during our scheduled downtime! We'll publish a list of updates and changes shortly, in our Announcements forum: http://community.kabam.com/forums/forumdisplay.php?
Now that this maintenance is over, all Boosts are safe to use! Activate your Combat Boosts, Warp Boosts, and Troop Energizers, and destroy the competition!

hash.message.body.20130207lockedboxes:
-Incoming Message from Zoot-
My Spies have intercepted some enemy cargo, and its contents are ours for the taking! What's the catch you may ask Commander? It's information is encrypted, and guess who has the key?
Zoot, of course!
Starting today, you'll begin to see various encrypted boxes start dropping from the Defense Sim. If you snag one of these boxes bring it to me and I can unlock its contents...for a small fee of course!
Make sure to visit the Defense Sim today and begin your hunt for these powerful boxes! They can contain some premium items like Incendiary Cores, Vermillion Cores, Cerulean Cores, and even rare Engineering Lab Equipment and patches.
The key to these boxes can be purchased from the store, so visit the featured tab for more information.

All Force earned through troop training, building, researching, equipment upgrading, and General Skill upgrading will contribute to your Tournament AND Leaderboard rankings but that's not all! In addition, Troop Training and Building Force Points will be TRIPLED(x3) for the duration of the tournament!
The top 10 players on each sector will each qualify for Tournament Prize Boxes, which contain the following:
Platinum Prize Box - Guarantees a Level 16 Black Market Patch, Generals Order, Incineraptor, Synthetic Control Core, or Onyx Core Gold Prize Box - Chance to win a Level 16 Black Market Patch, Generals Order, Incineraptor, Synthetic Control Core, Onyx Core, Hacker's Patch, Vermillion Core, Cerulean Core, or SP 5000 Silver Prize Box - Decreased chance to win prizes from the Platinum and Gold boxes, plus a 30% Troop Accelerator, SP 1000, Incendiary Core, or Decimator Core Bronze Prize Box - Decreased chance to win prizes from Gold and Silver Boxes plus Troops and Speed Ups
The next 10 players in each sector will receive a variety of great prizes as well! Check the in game leaderboard for more details.
In addition to these overall prizes, Daily Prizes are now available for the top 3 players an a given day as well as Achievement Prizes once you pass certain Force Thresholds! Check the in game leaderboard for more details.
This Tournament ends tonight at 11:00 PM PDT, Good luck!
-- Edgeworld Team

hash.message.body.20121113corrosiveturret:
Revolutionize your base defenses with the new Corrosive Turret!
These new structures:
- Specialize in sustained damage, providing strong continuous damage! - Slow any enemy hit by its blasts, providing extra crowd control on attacking forces! - Allow you to earn 3 stars on Defense Simulator missions more effectively!
The only prerequisite for this Turret is a Level 7 Command Center, so begin construction today!

hash.missions.new-tech-integration.descriptio: Before we roll out our new tech to the rest of the base, we first have to integrate Cerulium alloys into our command bunker, and Cerulium cores into our networks.

hash.missions.cerulean-valves.description: The best thing about improving Pyros is getting a new set of safety standards to ignore. Just when you thought plasma couldn't get any hotter...

For a Limited Time Only, your Command Center buildings do not require Cerulean Cores to upgrade to Levels 10-14! Command Center build times have also been reduced by 20% for each level!
This reduction in core requirements and build times will end at 11AM PST on June 28, so upgrade your Command Center today!

From everyone on the development team, thank you again for playing Final Eden.
Your purchase history of Rivets has been transferred to Platinum in your Edgeworld account.
hash.message.body.05092013bannerbatreminder:
Today is the last day to upgrade your Banner Monument building to win an exclusive, unpurchasable banner!
The first three players to complete a Level 16 Banner Monument building upgrade on one of their colonies between now and 11:00pm PST on May 16th will receive a unique banner that cannot be purchased in the store! An additional five randomly chosen players who successfully complete a Level 10 or higher Banner Monument upgrade in that time will take home a General’s Order to level up their favorite General!
Prizes will be paid out to the winners by Wednesday, May 22nd at 11:00pm PDT.
With the unique opportunity to win an exclusive, unpurchasable banner for your new Banner Monument building, be sure to upgrade your building today!

hash.message.body.defenselab:
Build the NEW Defense Lab building, and use it to research defensive tactics that reduce the effectiveness of attacking troops!
Defensive Research decreases the damage attacking troops deal when attacking your turrets and buildings. Defensive Research applies to attacks against both your Base and Aurora-1 Colony, as well as attacks in the Defense Simulator.
Build a Defense Lab now and turn your base into an impregnable fortress!

hash.message.body.08162013mysteryboxred:
Try your luck with the SCC Mystery Box and you could find Synthetic Control Cores for your Incineraptors at a low, low price!
Incineraptors are the strongest units in all of Edgeworld! They can turn formidable bases into barren wastelands in seconds, especially at the highest levels of offensive research! These Boxes give are a great way to get Synthetic Controls Cores; pick some up to train and research Incineraptors now!
SCC Mystery Boxes will only be in the store for a limited time, so be sure to stock up and start training your ultra-powerful Incineraptors today!

This Limit will return to normal on November 5th, so make sure to take advantage of this opportunity and get the most out of your Training Accelerators!

hash.daily.text.20130720forcetournamentlongme:
All Force earned through troop training, building, researching, equipment upgrading, and General Skill upgrading will contribute to your Tournament AND Leaderboard rankings but that's not all! In addition, Training and Engineering Lab Part Upgrading Force Points will be TRIPLED(x3) for the duration of the tournament!
The top 40 players on each sector will each qualify for Prizes, the most ever from any Force Tournament!
Items such as Ruby Cores, Black Market Patches, Generals Orders and other building Cores can be won but that's not all! We will also be giving out the brand new 3.0 Enhancement Tokens, offering exponentially greater benefits when attached to your Engineering Lab Parts! Make sure to check the Tournament Leaderboard in game for an exact breakdown on the new prize structure.
In addition to these overall prizes, Daily Prizes will be available for the top 3 players in a given day as well as Achievement Prizes that can be warned once you pass certain Force Thresholds! Check the in game leaderboard for this breakdown as well.
hash.messages.eu20130513forum.body: Greetings Commanders, The Edgeworld Community Team would like to remind all our fellow players that we have been working on the forum features: new content have been posted recently and there’s a lot more to come. Our intention is to treat the player community with the deserved care and attention, in order to get your involvement not only as gamers, but also as community participants. We will be giving answers to your troubles when needed, adding more useful information and posting new funny events to make the whole experience of playing Edgeworld something even more awesome! We sincerely hope to see you participating in these events and contests, there will be rewards and achievements for those who will join the forum activities. Commanders, this is the beginning of a new era in Edgeworld’s Forum! These are the links of the dedicated forums for each language: ENGLISH For more information click here GERMAN Für mehr informationen klicken sie hier SPANISH Para más información click aquí ITALIAN Per saperne di più clicca qui FRENCH Pour plus d'informations clique ici Regards, Edgeworld Community Team
hash.missions.slash-and-burn.description: The Syndicate's preparing for an offensive against our base of operations, Commander. The best offense is to blast your opponent into subatomic particles and then salt the ground so that nothing ever grows there again.

hash.message.body.20130718craftathon:
Craft Equipment Parts in the Engineering Lab today and win!
Each time you craft a Tier 1, 2 or 3 Rare Part Box in the Engineering Lab between now and 11:00pm PST on July 20th gives you a chance to take home a Cerulean Alloys! FIVE randomly chosen players who successfully craft a Rare Part Box will receive one Cerulean Alloys that allows them to directly craft a powerful Equipment Part!
Prizes will be paid within 3 business days from the conclusion of the event.
This new Equipment Part crafting system is live in the Engineering Lab, so be sure to craft some new Equipment Parts today!
hash.ew.chat.warn.spam: Please do not spam the same message in chat multiple times.
hash.message.body.20130531forcetournamentremi:
Today is the Last Day to Participate in our latest Research and Building Force Tournament!
All Force earned through troop training, building, researching, equipment upgrading, and General Skill upgrading will contribute to your Tournament AND Leaderboard rankings, but that's not all! All Force gained from Research and Building will be TRIPLED(x3) for the duration!
The top 10 players on each sector will each qualify for Tournament Prize Boxes, which contain the following:
Platinum Prize Box - Guarantees a Level 16 Black Market Patch, Generals Order, Incineraptor, Synthetic Control Core, or Onyx Core Gold Prize Box - Chance to win a Level 16 Black Market Patch, Generals Order, Incineraptor, Synthetic Control Core, Onyx Core, Hacker's Patch, Vermillion Core, Cerulean Core, or SP 5000 Silver Prize Box - Decreased chance to win prizes from the Platinum and Gold boxes, plus a 30% Troop Accelerator, SP 1000, Incendiary Core, or Decimator Core Bronze Prize Box - Decreased chance to win prizes from Gold and Silver Boxes plus Troops and Speed Ups
The next 10 players in each sector will receive a variety of great prizes as well!
In addition to these overall prizes, Daily Prizes are now available for the top 3 players an a given day as well as Achievement Prizes once you pass certain Force Thresholds! Check the in game leaderboard for more details.
This Tournament ends tonight at 11:00 PM PDT, so make sure to get started today. Good luck!
-- Edgeworld Team
hash.items.trainingoverdrive10.name: 10x Training Overdrive
hash.daily.text.20130521forcetournamentlongme:
All Force earned through troop training, building, researching, equipment upgrading, and General Skill upgrading will contribute to your Tournament AND Leaderboard rankings! In addition, Force Points gained by upgrading your General through the use of SP or Generals Orders will be QUADRUPLED(x4) for the duration of the tournament!
The top 10 players on each sector will each qualify for Tournament Prize Boxes AND the next 10 players will receive a variety of great prizes as well!

hash.message.body.20121026zootsjackpot2:
For a limited time only, Zoot's Jackpot has been enhanced and will now provide increased odds to take home premium items!
-New winnable prizes have been added such as Decimator Cores, Annihilator Crates, and Hacker's Patches! -Consolation Prizes have been upgraded as well, and include great items such as Incendiary and Builders Boxes! -The amount of Platinum you can win during the Bonus Round has also been SIGNIFICANTLY increased! Never before have Platinum payouts reached these current heights!
Click on the "Z" icon next to your Mailbox to check out this new and improved version of Zoot's Jackpot today! This limited time event will only be available until October 29th before being removed as a permanent feature. Make sure to check out Zoot's Jackpot Blowout before its too late!
hash.missions.amplified-force.description: Disruptors are brutally powerful, but that brutality -- like all that is good in life -- can always be amplified somehow.
hash.message.body.hubblerubble:
For only 2 Platinum you can win a Level 17 Vermillion Armor, a Level 17 Verm. Fireproof Shield, a Level 17 Verm. Advanced Targeting or the NEW Level 17 Verm. Blast Shield!
Other prizes include: Hacker’s Patches, Accelerators, Deconstructors, Software Backups, Zoot Tokens, XP Boosts and Troops!
The Hubble doesn’t crash into Cerulea every day - don’t miss this opportunity to steal a MAXED-OUT Vermillion Smart Part!
BONUS: The 3 players who purchase the most Hubble Rubble Mystery Boxes between now and 11:59pm PDT on October 17th, 2013 will receive a Level 17 Verm Ammo Delivery Smart Part AND an Explosive Ammo Token 4.0! Prizes will be paid out on October 18th, 2013.

hash.message.body.spend-blackmarket: Our next deal has arrived! Spend 300 Platinum between 11am and 11:59pm PDT and receive 1 FREE Black Market Patch! Use these patches to GUARANTEE your upgrades to Level 16 and 17. This deal won’t last long so be sure to stock up now! Limit of 5 Black Market Patches per Player, per Sector.
hash.daily.text.20130817pax50sale: The 50% Training Accelerator is now Available in the Store! Stock up today and prepare yourself for battle!
hash.commander-message.welcome.body:
This is a difficult missive for me to write, for I am all that remains of the Galactic Union. I’ve kept my enemies close, and now they’re closing in on me.

To ensure your own survival, it’s imperative that you gather resources to fuel your expansion, build an impenetrable defense grid to protect your base, and mobilize a formidable battalion to strike at your enemies.

I’ll help whenever and wherever possible, providing I make it out alive. For now, there’s little I can do -- other than shield your base with a reality distortion field. This won’t be permanent, but it should prevent enemies from finding you for the next 3 days.

Good luck, Commander.

Respectfully,
Admiral Tenmu

hash.missions.enhance-solar-cells.description: Solar energy isn't as volatile as fusion, or as flammable as gas, or as destructive as crystal mining, but it still deserves some attention. We need more of that energy, even if it isn't as exciting (or lethal) as the others.

hash.kira-message.contest.six-ten-eleven.body:
Commander, I’ve received information that Zoot is holding a special event this weekend!

Every Zoot’s Token you purchase on Saturday and Sunday will automatically enter you into a contest to win up to 750 Platinum! The more Zoot’s Tokens you buy, the more chances you have to win.

We’ll award prizes to five lucky players on Monday!
1st - 750 Platinum
2nd - 250 Platinum
3rd - 100 Platinum
4th - Combat Strategy item
5th - Nano Canister item

And you’ll still be winning great items from Zoot’s Loot, too! Pick up some tokens and play now!

*Exact event times: 12:01am Saturday to 11:59pm Sunday, Pacific Standard Time, June 11-12.

hash.message.foundersgift3.body:
From everyone here on the Edgeworld team, we would like to thank you for helping make this game so awesome over the last year! Together, we’ve come a long way in making this one of Kabam’s greatest games and we have some exciting new features we know you’ll love yet to come! We’re looking forward to sharing another fantastic year with you!
Sincerely,
Daria – Associate Producer

hash.missions.read-it-for-the-articles.descri: During this upgrade, we'll be removing all illicit materials from under the soldiers' mattresses, and bolting foampads to their bunks. Admittedly, this might diminish morale, but it will make their sleeping quarters more secure.

hash.daily.text.20130604enhancetokenreleaselo:
Here are the steps to take in order to get started:
1. Visit the "Parts" tab within your Engineering Lab and left click on the desired Engineering Lab Part to bring up the item menu 2. Select the new "Enhancements" option 3. Here you will see a list of Enhancement Tokens you either own or are able to purchase. Click on the desired token and click "Enhance" to add the effect to your Engineering Lab Part! 4. Now you can view the extra stats that have been added to your part, and once equipped will instantly increase your defense!

hash.missions.gas-giant-4.objectives: Increase Gas Production to 80,000 per hour.
hash.message.body.05212013generalscrate: There’s a brand new General’s Crate in the store for a limited time only! The General’s Crate contains 7,500 Generals SP and a General’s Order! Be sure to pick up a few crates and level up your Generals today!
hash.missions.the-10-000-club.objectives: Dish out more than 10,000 points of damage in an attack
hash.items.pulsetank80.name: Pulse Carrier
hash.message.body.07112013incineraptors:
For a Limited Time Only, train the previously untrainable Incineraptors with Synthetic Control Cores from the Synthetic Control Crate!
Incineraptors are the strongest units in all of Edgeworld! They can turn formidable bases into barren wastelands in seconds, especially at the highest levels of offensive research! Though previously available exclusively through tournaments and event prizes, you can now buy Synthetic Control Cores in the Synthetic Control Crate to train and research Incineraptors in the Store!
Synthetic Control Crates will only be in the store until July 14th, so be sure to stock up and start training these ultra-powerful Incineraptors today!
hash.daily.title.20130624forcetournament: Total Force Tournament – Win Ruby Cores!
hash.items.advancedweaponscrate.description: Open this special mystery box for a chance to win a variety of double-effect equipment of various levels!
hash.ew.siege.ended: The siege on your base has ended. There will be a battle report in your inbox with more details.
hash.items.tokenmeteoricshield2.description: Applies a moderate scaling Incineraptor Defense to an Engineering Lab Part!
hash.items.buildtoken3.description: Discovered in ancient Cerulean ruins, these cores enable level 17 and higher building upgrades.
hash.suggestion.train-troops: Train some troops in your Factory and Barracks.
hash.items.fieryburstpiercingammo.name: Fiery Burst Piercing Ammo
hash.missions.grod-s-haven.objectives: Destroy the Command Center in a Level 50 Legion base.
hash.fte.kira.construction.speed: Let's just cut to the chase.
hash.missions.the-road-less-traveled.descript: Commander, our Titans have been upgraded with auxiliary thrusters and rotating stabilizers for enhanced maneuverability. We could have just made the suits more flexible, but that seemed too...easy.
hash.items.mysterybox19.description: Open for a chance to win rare Cores! Cores available: Ruby, Vermillion, Cerulean, Decimator, Onyx, Incendiary & Synthetic Control!
hash.missions.warp-factor-nein.description: With this upgrade, we'll be able to deliver a small army of soldiers and mechs. Our foes won't know what hit them.
hash.error.need-more-units: Train more units to do that
hash.dialog.speedup-suggest.description: You are already building a structure which needs to finish before you can start a new build.
hash.message.body.20130510forcetournament:
A brand new 3 DAY Total Force Tournament has just begun!
All Force earned through troop training, building, researching, equipment upgrading, General Skill upgrading and PvP will be DOUBLED (x2) throughout the duration!
The top 10 players on each sector will each qualify for Tournament Prize Boxes, which contain the following:
Platinum Prize Box - Guarantees a Level 16 Black Market Patch, Generals Order, Incineraptor, Synthetic Control Core, or Onyx Core Gold Prize Box - Chance to win a Level 16 Black Market Patch, Generals Order, Incineraptor, Synthetic Control Core, Onyx Core, Hacker's Patch, Vermillion Core, Cerulean Core, or SP 5000 Silver Prize Box - Decreased chance to win prizes from the Platinum and Gold boxes, plus a 30% Troop Accelerator, SP 1000, Incendiary Core, or Decimator Core Bronze Prize Box - Decreased chance to win prizes from Gold and Silver Boxes plus Troops and Speed Ups
The next 10 players in each sector will receive a variety of great prizes as well! Check the in game leaderboard for more details.
This Tournament ends on May 13th at 11:59 PM PDT, so make sure to get started today. Good luck!
-- Edgeworld Team
hash.missions.trainingoverdrive6.description: 6x the speed of all Training for 1 hour.
hash.message.subject.20130729zootsreminder: Last Day – 2x Odds in Zoot's Jackpot!
hash.missions.transformation-boost.descriptio: This improvement to our energy transfer technology yields a more powerful Pulse Tank transformation. The operators are calling it "Beast Mode". I wish *I* had a "Beast Mode."
hash.message.march1hour24hourwinner.body: The Cerulean storm has had a powerful effect on your used-up 1-Hour Accelerator, recharging it with the power of a 24-Hour Accelerator! This item has been added to your inventory!
hash.promo.doa.moredetailstooltip: Find out more in our Forum!
hash.missions.double-or-nothing.description: We can increase our supply capacity by replacing the anti-radiation shielding with crystal lattice structures, effectively storing uranium and crystals in the same location. Don't ask about the side-effects.
hash.message.sectorwinnerheliosalvage.body: Well done, Commander! You're on the top of the level charts, and your high-speed XP earning has earned you a Helio Salvage Crate. Check your inventory for this item!
hash.items.sandyreliefcrate.description:
Includes:
3x Decimator Rack 3x 30% Training Accelerator 5x Zoot Token
hash.message.body.purchase-pax99part:
Purchase one of the following platinum packages between now and 9:00am PST on August 24th and you'll qualify for the following bonus:
Buy the 225 Platinum Pack - Get 1 99% Accelerator Buy the 400 Platinum Pack - Get 2 99% Accelerators Buy the 1000 Platinum Pack - Get 5 99% Accelerators Buy the 3000 Platinum Pack - Get 5 99% Accelerators, a Level 10 Cerulean Network Sabotage and 2 Black Market Patches!
Please keep in mind that you can only qualify for one of these offers, so make sure you purchase the right package! Prizes will be distributed within 3 business day after the conclusion of this event.
hash.message.inviteafriendwinner.body: Commander, thank you for inviting your friends to play Edgeworld! They've shown great success building and improving their base. You've been chosen as a winner in our Invite a Friend contest, and you have been granted 100 Platinum!

hash.missions.players-and-hose.description: The more gas you syphon, the more your enemies are left stranded in your dust.

hash.units.rhino.description: Armored alien that uses its powerful horn as a battering ram.

hash.missions.preemptive-strike.description: The Maar Confederacy is gearing up for an all-out assault on our Command Center. It's kill or be killed, and I usually favor the former.

hash.items.dax30shield.description: Gives you 30 days of protection. Removed if you attack another player.

hash.ew.campaign.pulse1.name: Tank Maneuver (1-100)
hash.missions.the-jaunt.description: We've determined that the warping process can be sped up if we disable the consciousness inhibitors, leaving the troops awake through the entire warp process. Sure, it traumatizes them, but it's not like they've got futures anyhow.
hash.message.body.20121219decimatorcoresale: For a limited time only, Decimator Cores will be availablde for the low price of 20 Platinum and Decimator Racks can be purchased for 80 Platinum! Stock up on Brawlers and Decimators to gain that extra edge over the new faction bases but don't delay! This sale will only be available until 3pm PST on December 19th!
hash.daily.text.20130108sprackandcrate: Earn 30,000 Sp for your General! Check your in game mail for more details
hash.message.body.level13buildings:
The old adage is true, bigger is better!
Advances in the integration of Cerulean technology to the Command Center have allowed for the first time, a bigger base!
Introducing level 13!
In addition to all the bonuses you normally enjoy, upgrading your Command Center to level 13 will increase the size of your base by over 23% and give it an awesome new look!
Finally, you will have more room for more Turrets, Mines, and the infrastructure you will need to rule your Sector! All of these can now be upgraded to level 13 as well!
Upgrade your buildings to level 13 today!
hash.daily.text.debrismysterybox: On sale for just 12 platinum! Click for more info!
hash.message.body.20121121generalskillupevent:
Today is the Last Day to participate in our latest event, and level up your General Skills for Skill Points!
Players who get upgrade one of their General's skills to Level 5 by 11:59pm PST tonight (November 26th) will be entered for a chance to take home 100 SP for free but that's not all!
Players who get one of their General's skills to Level 10 or higher will be entered for a chance to take home 5,000 Skill Points!
5 Players will be chosen at random to win 100 Skill Points, and 5 additional players will also be chosen who achieve a level 10 or higher General Skill after the conclusion of this event!
hash.message.body.smartpartsellout:
Need Smart Parts? Check out the Daily Update and the Featured Tab for different deals featuring the following Smart Parts:
Cerulean Network Sabotage Frozen Token Cerulean Meteoric Shield NEW Vermillion Armor NEWEST Vermillion Fireproof Shield!!!
Keep checking back, we'll have different Smart Part Mystery Boxes and Sales for you throughout the day!
hash.colony.slides.schematic.title: AURORA-1 SCHEMATIC
hash.daily.text.shieldupgrade: Take your Shield Generator to level 10 or 11 and win a 7-Day or 14-Day Accelerator!
hash.ew.gps.cmd: Enter the player name you want to scout
hash.missions.cerulium-plating.description: Cerulium walls are ultra-dense and near-impenetrable. Our troops will not only survive the impact of Disruptor fire, they'll sleep through it.
hash.missions.big-bulb.description: This time, we just changed a lightbulb. Admittedly, it's a single Cerulean crystal the size of a Disruptor, lit by a sustained five-gigaton fissile reaction.
hash.missions.smash-and-grab.description: They do all the drilling, and you reap all the rewards. Remember to send a “thank you” note!
hash.message.body.20121126cybermonday: Cyber Monday is upon us, and Renegade Crates are now on Sale for an all time low of 399 Platinum! This sale will only be available for the next 24 hours, so make sure to check the featured tab of the shop and stock up today!
hash.message.body.08162013trainathon:
A new Incineraptor Challenge is set to begin! We will be tracking Incineraptors trained between 12:00pm PDT on August 16th and 11:59pm PDT on Monday, August 19!
Top Player (1) who trains the most Incineraptors will win 2,500 Platinum! The Next ten (10) players will each win 1,000 Platinum, and we'll also select Ten (10) additional players at random who trained at least one Incineraptor to each receive 100 Platinum!
That's a total of 21 prizes and 13,500 total Platinum up for grabs so don't miss out! Make sure you load up on Synthetic Control Cores, then visit your Fleet Academy and begin training today!
Winners will be announced and paid out by Thursday, August 22.

hash.message.body.maysectorlevel:
Boost your way to the top of your Sector, and win!
The player on each Sector who gains the most levels in that Sector between 1pm, May 8 Pacific Time (8pm UTC) and 1pm Friday, May 11, Pacific Time (8pm UTC) will win 1000 Platinum!
One player per Sector will win! Additionally, 5 random players across the whole game who level up at least once will win!
Every level is a chance to win!
To aid you in this competition, the 24-Hour Accelerator and the 30% Training Accelerator are 25% off in the store for the duration of the tournament!

hash.missions.cold-shoulder.description: The new Staging Area features a cryostasis chamber where soldiers are frozen in blocks and thawed out upon deployment. We had a little difficulty calibrating the temperature during the reheating process, but everything's better now.
hash.missions.increase-crystal-production-3.o: Increase Crystal Production to 6,000 per hour.

hash.message.body.buyevent0909: Starting now until 9:00 am on September 10th, 2013, you can earn free 99% Building Accelerators just for buying Platinum! For every 200 Platinum you purchase, receive 1 99% Building Accelerator!  There is a 10 LIMIT on the amount of Accelerators you can earn! hash.items.frozenarmor.name: Frozen Armor
hash.gsatsurvey.20110630.body: Dear Commander: We’d like to get your feedback on how Edgeworld can serve you better. Your comments and suggestions are very important to us, so we’d love to hear from you! We will take your input very seriously, so please take a few minutes to fill out our customer feedback survey. Click here to take the survey now! Thank you! The Edgeworld Team
hash.missions.the-pandora-file.description: The final Specter upgrade file can't be decrypted. We can run it, but there's no telling what it will do. Hold on - I am backing myself up.
hash.activemodel.errors.models.jobs.move-map-: This is a popular spot! There are players fighting for this node right now. Come back later.
hash.message.body.20130412corrosiveturreteven:
Today is the Last Day to take advantage of the 80% reduced build times on Corrosive Turrets!
Build times will return to normal at 2:00 PM PDT today, so get building before its too late!
hash.missions.supercompression.description: We're about to become a pirate's jackpot, Commander. With this technology, each of our Supply Depots will house enough resources to finance a war.

hash.promotion.081211.body:
Have you read about our latest update yet?

In celebration of Alliance resource gifting, we're announcing our Alliance Expansion Event! One Alliance per Sector with the largest growth* by Monday will win a HAX-1 Speedup for every member of the Alliance!

*We're looking at percentage growth for this one. This means that smaller Alliances actually have a great chance to win this event! Can you grow more than 1000%?

We have more events happening this weekend!

Give us a 5-Star Review! Five users who give us reviews will win 50 Platinum!

Show off your base! Our favorite base will win 200 Platinum (and 100 for the runner-up!)

All the winners will be announced on Monday. Will you be one of them? Play Edgeworld!

Your Barracks passed inspection with flying colors! You've been awarded an item for each Barracks, based on its level:

hash.message.body.20121022partsbox: The Gatling, Stasis, and Advanced Weapon Crates have been added to the store, each with a chance to net you powerful Engineering Lab Equipment! Check the store now for your chance to take home rare items such as multi target and frozen parts!
hash.missions.offensive-capabilities.name: Offensive Capabilities
hash.message.body.05232013barracksupgrade:
The Barracks buildings now reduce troop training time!
Like the Constructor building, your Barracks buildings now reduce training times for all troops trained at the Barracks! Each level of each Barracks across all of your colonies contributes to your total troop training time reduction! Your Barracks buildings must be upgraded in order to receive this new effect.
Upgrade Barracks buildings across all of your colonies today to decrease your Barracks training times!

hash.recipes.rarebox3b.description: Open for a GUARANTEED 3 Bonus Rare Engineering Lab Part!
hash.message.body.20130411c2sale:
For a limited time only, the Caldera-2 Colony is on sale in the Edgeworld Store for 499 Platinum!
Don't miss out on exciting and exclusive new additions such as the Turret Control Building and new Battle Cruiser Unit, available only within this new Outpost!
If you haven't already experienced this new content and Outpost what are you waiting for? Make sure to pick up your schematics and begin building today!
hash.message.downtime.body:
In a few minutes, the Edgeworld servers will briefly be taken down for maintenance and updates.

Please check our Twitter feed for more information, and the exact time that we expect to start the update!

Try not to have any Combat Boosts active during the update, as you will lose valuable boost time.

If you are in the middle of combat when the update starts, you may be unable to attack when you return to the game. This should pass within a half hour.

Send us a support ticket with the "Help" button above the game window if you have any issues or questions!

hash.units.spider.description: Massive Cerulean wasp-like lifeforms. They do 10x damage against Tesla towers, and are immune to Incendiary burning.

Starting now until 10:00pm PDT, Purchasing Special Delivery Mystery Boxes will earn you special bonuses!
For every 4 Special Delivery Mystery Boxes you purchase, you will receive 1 Maximum Force Box! There is no limit to the amount of Bonus Boxes you can win!
For every 20 Special Delivery Mystery Boxes you purchase, you will receive 3 99% Building Accelerators!
Bonus Prizes will be paid out by October 18th, 2013.

hash.missions.war-swarm.description: Hornets were named after stinging insects from Earth. They traveled in groups called swarms. Commander, your forces will be much better off if reinforced with a swarm of these Hornets.

hash.message.body.20120403newusers:
Welcome to Cerulea IV, Commander!

You have been randomly selected to receive a special offer: Make your first Platinum purchase within 7 days of joining Edgeworld and you will be awarded 50% more Platinum, FREE.

During your first week in Edgeworld, you will also have access to a special, beginner's discount on Platinum packages.

The 155 Platinum Package is now 25% off!

Also for new Commanders only, the 400 Platinum Package is 20% off and comes with an extra FREE KIRA'S GIFT!

KIRA's Gift is one of our highest-value and most desired mystery crates, granting you a random high-value item when opened.

These special offers are only good for 7 days from the date you first started playing Edgeworld. Act now and click 'Get Platinum' to make sure you don't miss out on big discounts and powerful items!

FREE bonus Platinum will be awarded within 7 days of your qualifying, first purchase.

Take advantage of this limited-time offer before its too late!
hash.fte.kira.good.place: I guess that's as good a place as any.

hash.daily.text.incendiaryturret: Incendiary Turrets have solid range, even at low levels, incinerating enemy units with a stream of blazing fire.

hash.message.body.07042013flagsale30:
30% OFF Banners for the Banner Monument for a Limited Time Only!
Buy a country Banner to display the country of your choice, or buy a special Banner design that makes your base look unique! Alliances can band together around a single Banner design to show players scouting their bases that they are part of one of the best alliances in Edgeworld!
Banners can be bought from the Banner Monument’s View Banners dialogue. These Banners will only be on SALE for a short time, so be sure to stock up now before it's too late!

hash.engineeringlab.otherpartrepairing: Repair Queue Active. You may only repair one part at at time.

hash.message.maypower.body: Congratulations, Commander! As a member of the highest-growing Alliance in your Sector, you have earned a free Hour of Power Crate for every member of your Alliance! Check your inventory in the Shop to open your Crate and get your items!
hash.missions.cerulium-cores.description: We've salvaged Cerulean computers which surpass anything we've ever designed. Fifty septillian operations per second? I feel old.
hash.hero.skills.empgrenade.description: Temporarily disables nearby turrets from firing. At level 10 click and hold to charge detonation and disable a larger area.
hash.message.Eutournament1.body:
Commander,
a very limited tournament is running! The tournament is available for 3 hours only, from 7AM to 10AM PST. The winner of this tournament is truly the strongest Commander among the galaxy!
1st place: Annihilator Crate 2nd - 3rd: Cerulean Rack
-Kira
hash.daily.text.purchase225: Purchase the 225 Platinum Package and receive the Level 10 Vermillion Fireproof Shield AND a Level 10 Vermillion Armor!
hash.missions.grod-s-avengers.description: You're not going to believe this, Commander, but an assault base commanded by one of Grod's sons just came down via orbital drop. Can you guess who they're after?

hash.daily.text.shieldandaurora: Shield Generator now available: upgrade your defense! For a limited time, get Aurora-1 for 25% off!
