hash.message.body.20130625defensesimulator:
New Defense Simulator Campaigns have been released for Levels 16 and 17!
Test your base defenses with new Defense Simulator battles that will push your base to the limit! With more Incineraptors, Decimators and Battle Cruisers than ever before, these campaigns will be your biggest challenge yet!
For your efforts, you will be rewarded with a special prize the first time that you get 3 stars on each of these new defense simulator battles!
Use the defense simulator now to test your base against the toughest attacks in all of Cerulea IV!
hash.items.ceruleanammodelivery.name: Cerulean Ammo Delivery
hash.message.body.20121024advancedweaponscrat:
The New Advanced Weapons Mystery Crate contains some of the most powerful basic and premium Engineering Lab Parts such as Hyper Armor, Reinforced Explosive Ammo, and Frozen Dual Barrels!
The Engineering Lab part "Frozen Dual Barrels" will allow any equipped turret to target and concuss multiple troops with each shot fired!
The Advanced Weapons Mystery Crate can be purchased for 50 Platinum and will only be available for a LIMITED TIME, so make sure to visit the featured tab of the store to get yours today!
hash.daily.text.20121019spendfordecimator: Every 100 Platinum spent will enter you for a chance to win 100 Decimators!
hash.items.tokenfrozen.tooltip: Apply to an Engineering Lab part and receive a permanent boost which will slow enemy units!

hash.hero.skills.healthstrong.description: Large health boost multiplied by unit transport size
hash.colony.slides.schematic.desc1: Excellent work, Commander! You have acquired the schematic for the Aurora-1 Colony Command Center!
hash.campaign.helio.description3: This is General Grod. Don't be fooled by his talk of honor. He's a dangerous opponent. We need to take him down.
hash.colony.slides.schematic.desc2: Expand your empire with advanced new weaponry on Aurora-1 NOW!
hash.campaign.helio.description6: While the Erazi bombard Helio Legion territory from orbit, we should strike at this outpost!

hash.items.guaranteedequipmentboost17.descrip: This Black Market mod chip allows you to take your weaponry up to Level 17 without risk of breaking.
hash.message.body.redsleighbegin:
Commander,
We have spotted an unidentified aircraft near our borders. This craft bears no resemblance to any current Union technology. Historical records show greatest semblance to an earth land vessel known as a “sleigh”.
This craft was shot down by Maar forces, but our troops were able to rescue the pilot. Our troops couldn’t identify the pilot due to extensive injuries, but the pilot was reported as being…rotund…and wearing a peculiar red hat. We have placed the pilot in a regeneration chamber, but we will be unable to learn more about the pilot until they are fully healed.
Faction forces are advancing on our position. I believe they want to capture the pilot! Get to the defense simulator and protect the base!

hash.message.body.incendiaryspend:
Right now, from 12:00pm PST on June 14 to 12:00pm PST on June 15 you can receive FREE Incendiary Cores just for spending Platinum!
Spend 500 to 999 Platinum to receive 2 FREE Incendiary Core! Spend 1000 to 1999 Platinum to receive 4 FREE Incendiary Cores! Spend 2000 or more Platinum to receive 8 FREE Incendiary Cores!!
Use the Cores to build and upgrade your Sniper Towers to the max! A Level 12 Sniper Tower deals 2500 damage per shot, and has a health of 8750.
Please note that the Incendiary Cores will be paid out to the Sector in which the Platinum was spent, and each Sector will be counted individually for Incendiary Spent, so you cannot combine Spend across multiple Sectors.
hash.missions.big-and-ugly.name: Big and Ugly
hash.faction.maar.lose.1: Most impressive, Commander, but I was only testing your weaknesses. Let me assure you, I found plenty.
hash.message.body.20130719spreadfirebox:
Cerulean Spread Fire is a new Smart part that has been added to your Engineering Lab Arsenal!
The Cerulean Spread Fire Smart Part is equipped with a brand new Smart AI, aimed at spreading various status effects (like Concussion and burning) to troops and Generals that are currently unaffected by these ailments. Applying this Smart part to the right turret can grant you an unprecedented amount of Crowd Control and help strengthen your defense against even the deadliest of foes!
The Spread Fire also comes with an increase to Splash Radius and Targets, further helping you spread status effects to the maximum number of units.
Simply purchase the Cerulean Spread Fire Box for a chance to take home this powerful new item. This box will only be available for a Limited Time, so make sure to act now before it's too late!
hash.faction.maar.lose.2: Smile while you may. Nothing lasts forever, least of all your teeth.
hash.ew.campaign.dragon3.name: Raining Fire (20k-400k)
hash.faction.maar.lose.3: Revenge is best served cold. Rest assured, I'll soon have you frozen in carbonite.
hash.missions.x-file.name: X-File
hash.missions.nukes-ftw.description: It probably sounds counterintuitive to detonate nukes under the crust in order to force more uranium ore to the surface, but we're running low on time. This is our safest bet. Well, not our safest -- it's our best bet.

Click the Combat icon at the bottom of the screen.
Select FACTIONS.
SCOUT a Level 3 ERAZI base.
ATTACK the base.

I'd recommend sending in 2 Rhinos with some Raiders or Marines, Commander.

hash.message.body.20130427fireproof:
The Cerulean Fireproof Shield is a powerful smart AI equipment that protects your turrets from explosive fire damage from Bombas! This equipment’s defense against explosive fire damage improves rapidly as it is upgraded. In addition to this smart AI, equipping this part will also significantly increase the turret's health as well as the number of targets that it can attack simultaneously!
Purchase a Fireproof Shield Box today for a chance to win one of these rare parts and vanquish your enemies! Other items in the Sensor Box include Hacker's Patches and Accelerators!

hash.message.body.20130109gunturretevent: For a limited time only, Gun Turrets build times will be reduced by 20% and levels 10-15 will not require Incendiary cores in order to upgrade. Hurry and power up these Turrets which can achieve up to 1600 attack power at level 15. This event will only last for the next 2 days, so take advantage of these build times now!

hash.fte.faction.outro-2: Rest assured Commander, I won't soon forget this insolence.
hash.missions.project-x-spiders.description: With no living Ceruleans around to interrogate, only the secrets of the Salvage Box can help us unlock the highest combat control functions of a Control Device.

hash.message.body.04112013tcbuildathon:
Today is the last day to participate in the Turret Control Build and Research Showdown!
By 11:00pm PFT today, upgrade your Turret Control building and complete turret researches for a chance to take home great prizes! The first five players who upgrade the Turret Control Building to level 15 during the competition will win a Black Market Patch #16 allowing them to upgrade a single Engineering Lab Part beyond the normal level cap of 15!
Ten other random players who successfully complete a Turret Research to level 5 or higher will each take home 500 Platinum!
Prizes will be paid out to the winners by Friday, April 12th at 11:00pm PDT.
Complete your Turret Control building upgrades and turret researches today for a chance to win these great prizes!

hash.message.body.20121221zootsjackpot:
With Christmas just around the corner, what better way to ring in the Holiday Season then with a new and Improved Zoot's Holiday Jackpot!
Play the Jackpot today and you can win items like Decimator Cores, Hacker's Patches, Builders Boxes, Annihilator Crates, Platinum, but that's not all! Each play you make could also be the one that takes home the Jackpot!
Click on the "Z" icon next to your Mailbox to check out the Holiday version of Zoot's Jackpot today! This event will only be available for a Limited Time, so don't wait and take advantage today!

hash.message.body.20130516troopresearchcorebo:
This Troop Research Core Box contains the best troop research cores in all of Edgeworld! It has significantly increased chances to supply you with the Synthetic Control Cores and Onyx Cores you need to research your Incineraptor and Battle Cruiser units! Other items in this box include Scarbide Ingots, Decimator Cores and Pulse Cores!
Getting the troop research cores from this box is the best way for you to increase the power of your units, so visit the shop to pick up this great box today!
hash.message.body.flashforcetournament:
A New 12 Hour Flash Tournament starts NOW!
All Force Points earned in the Engineering Lab will be QUADRUPLED for the duration of this Tournament!
This Tournament will feature awesome prizes with the Top 5 finishers winning Platinum and Prizes! Additional Prizes will be awarded for 6th through 25th place. Please check the Tournament Rankings for more info!
This Special Tournament will run between 12:00am PDT on 10/15 to 12:00pm PDT on 10/15! Show your Sector you have what it takes to get to the Top!
hash.missions.bigger-barrels.name: Bigger Barrels
hash.hero.skills.destabilize.name: Destabilize
hash.message.20120713Purchase1000.body: Thank you for participating in our Platinum Purchase Event. Mystery Carriers have been added to your inventory!
hash.message.body.mysterybox18:
The Vermillion Armor is now available inside this mystery box!
The Vermillion Armor is the newest Smart Part with 8X the Damage and 2X the Health of the Cerulean Armor! Upgrade this Part to possess the most powerful Part in the Engineering Lab!
This box has a chance to obtain the Vermillion Armor and is also stocked with other valuable items! Other possible prizes include Black Market Patches, Hacker’s Patches, Generals Orders, Pulse Tanks, Incendiary Cores, Sentinels, Berzerkers and even Level 10 Cerulean Smart Parts (Meteoric Shield, Sky Shroud and Network Sabotage).
At only 19 Platinum this is the most valuable Mystery Box ever! Don’t miss your chance to be one of the first to own the Vermillion Armor!
hash.message.body.20130715forcetournament:
There is a new Force Tournament starting today with AMAZING prizes! It will last for 4 DAYS and provide you with a 3x boost to Generals and Engineering Lab!
All Force earned through troop training, building, researching, equipment upgrading, and General Skill upgrading will contribute to your Tournament AND Leaderboard rankings but that's not all! In addition, Generals and Engineering Lab Part Upgrading Force Points will be TRIPLED(x3) for the duration of the tournament!
The top 40 players on each sector will each qualify for Prizes, the most ever from any Force Tournament!
Items such as Ruby Cores, Black Market Patches, Generals Orders and other building Cores can be won but that's not all! We will also be giving out the brand new 3.0 Enhancement Tokens, offering exponentially greater benefits when attached to your Engineering Lab Parts! Make sure to check the Tournament Leaderboard in game for an exact breakdown on the new prize structure.
In addition to these overall prizes, Daily Prizes will be available for the top 3 players in a given day as well as Achievement Prizes that can be warned once you pass certain Force Thresholds! Check the in game leaderboard for this breakdown as well.
This Tournament ends on July 18th at 11:00 PM PDT, so be sure to get started today. Good luck!
-- Edgeworld Team

In addition to this Smart AI, equipping this Part will also significantly increase the Turret's Health as well as the number of targets that it can attack simultaneously!

Buy the 225 Platinum Pack and get 500 Devastators and 10 Berserkers Buy the 400 Platinum Pack and get 1000 Devastators and 25 Berserkers Buy the 1000 Platinum Pack and get 3000 Devastators and 75 Berserkers Buy the 2500 Platinum Pack and get 8000 Devastators and 200 Berserkers!

hash.promotion.heliowinner2.body: Thank you for your dedication in battling the Helio! The Helio Assault event ended a few weeks ago, but we missed the 60-Minute Troop Energizers you were supposed to receive. As thanks for your patience, we've added TWO 60-Minute Troop Energizers to your inventory! Have fun with your powered-up troops!

hash.missions.war-cannon.description: The gorgeous new cannon design allows the Disruptor to deal even more damage to an enemy that will be too badly burned to see the elegant beauty of it all.

hash.missions.erazi-hideout.name: Erazi Hideout
hash.message.body.ceruleanmeteoricshield:
The Cerulean Meteoric Shield is now available in the shop for a limited time! This Cerulean Smart Part increases your defenses against Incineraptors when equipped! This Part will only be available for purchase for a limited time so don’t miss out! Pick up your Cerulean Meteoric Shield today!
This Box could also contain a Level 5, Level 10 or Level 15 Meteoric Shield! Don’t miss this opportunity to get an upgraded Cerulean Meteoric Shield!
hash.missions.singularity-engine.name: Singularity Engine
hash.items.hyperexplosiveammo.name: Hyper Explosive Ammo
hash.missions.headless-foreman.description: We can attack Maar bases while our city is building or researching. It's a great way to maintain our supply of crystal and gas resources.
hash.message.body.mysterycarrier:
Want to make a move in the Map Tournament? Call in a few Mystery Carriers! Mystery Carriers will provide a random number of Troops when Opened. You can win 3000 Marines, 1 Pulse Tank, 4 Pulse Tanks, or even 80 Pulse Tanks!!!
Pulse Tanks are powerful units that can help you capture otherwise inaccessible outposts and provide a heavy boost when fortifying Map Nodes.
You will even get the XP for the troops!
Mystery Carriers will be available in the Shop for a limited time at the low price of 20 Platinum.
Details: The Mystery Carrier will grant troops in the form of a Crate which contains your troops. To add the troops to your staging area, go to your inventory and use the Crate. When the crate is opened you will also receive experience equivalent to if you had trained the troops in your Barracks or Factories.
hash.missions.super-soldiers.description: In response to your question, Commander, this project focuses on new equipment and advanced training for *existing* soldiers. We won't need any "growth tubes."
hash.message.body.20130430forcetournament:
A brand new 3 DAY Troop Training and General SP Force Tournament has just begun!
All Force earned through Troop Training and General SP and orders upgrades will contribute to your leaderboard ranking but that's not all! All Force gained from these methods have been TRIPLED(x3) for the duration of the tournament!
The top 10 players on each sector will each qualify for new and increased payouts of valuable prizes in the form of Tournament Prize Boxes, which contain the following:
Platinum Prize Box - Guarantees a Level 16 Black Market Patch, Generals Order, Incineraptor, Synthetic Control Core, or Onyx Core Gold Prize Box - Chance to win a Level 16 Black Market Patch, Generals Order, Incineraptor, Synthetic Control Core, Onyx Core, Hacker's Patch, Vermillion Core, Cerulean Core, or SP 5000 Silver Prize Box - Decreased chance to win prizes from the Platinum and Gold boxes, plus a 30% Troop Accelerator, SP 1000, Incendiary Core, or Decimator Core Bronze Prize Box - Decreased chance to win prizes from Gold and Silver Boxes plus Troops and Speed Ups
This Tournament ends on May 6th at 11:59 PM PDT, so make sure to get started today. Good luck!
-- Edgeworld Team
hash.daily.text.20121225winpulsetanks: Spend Platinum and receive free Pulse Tanks! Check your in game mail for more details.
hash.items.heavyextendeddualbarrels.name: Heavy Extended Dualbarrels
hash.items.tokenexplosiveammo3.description: Applies a large scaling Splash Radius Boost permanently to an Engineering Lab Part!
hash.missions.big-and-ugly.objectives: Destroy the Command Center in a Level 750 Legion base.
hash.daily.text.20121126cybermonday: Renegade Crates will be on Sale for the next 24 hours! Check the featured tab of the shop to get yours today!
hash.message.body.20130719spendevent:
Want to get your hands on Edgeworld's fastest accelerators? Spend Platinum today and receive FREE 99% Building Accelerators! These items will reduce the time remaining on any current build by 99%, effectively making build times instantaneous!
For every 200 Platinum that you spend between now and 11:59pm PST on July 21 you will get one 99% Building Accelerator! You can qualify for a maximum of 5 99% Building Accelerators that will be added to your Inventory within three business days of this event's conclusion.
Start spending Platinum for these great items today!
hash.missions.tectonic-shift.objectives: Increase Gas Production to 75,000 per hour.
hash.missions.100k-club.description: For that sad excuse for an enemy, the apocalypse came early this year!
hash.missions.bad-trip.name: Bad Trip
hash.message.body.20130425bunkerrelease:
Want new and exciting ways to increase your defensive power? Look no further then the new Attack Bunker!
This new building will function like a Turret, but will also allow you to garrison troops within in order to raise it's attack power! Troops will remain inside the building until it is destroyed, so make sure to protect it!
The Attack Bunker can be built at your main base and within each of your colonies. Check it out today!
hash.items.permanentadvancedweapons.promo: Permanently boost the damage dealt by your units and turrets!
hash.missions.eradication-procedure.name: Eradication Procedure
hash.missions.cerulium-grafts.name: Cerulium Grafts
hash.message.body.20130614decimationcratesale:
For the next 24 hours, Decimation Crates will be discounted and available for an all time low price of 2500 Platinum! These has never been a better time to maximize the value of this item which contains over 8000 Platinum worth of items including:
160x Decimators! 8x Incendiary Cores 5x Vermillion Cores 5x Cerulean Core 5x 14-Day Accelerators plus much more!
Go to the shop and stock up today before its too late!
hash.daily.text.20121221holidaybox:
Exclusive for the 2012 Holidays, pick up the Holiday Gift Bag for a great deal on some of Edgeworld's most popular mystery boxes! Opening one of these grab-bags will reveal ONE of the following boxes:

Builders Box
Elite Weapons Box
General Box
Accelorator Box
Mystery Carrier
Incendiary Box

Happy Holidays from all of us at Team Edgeworld!

hash.daily.text.06132013graphics: Empty your browser’s cache to enjoy new turret and background art!
hash.itmes.xpsim15.name: Defense XP x15
hash.message.body.20130730newsector:
Genesis II, the newest sector in Cerulea IV, just opened today!
Genesis II is the newest territorial expansion in Edgeworld and is open for players to compete for dominance! Enter this new sector, build up your base, form an alliance and dominate the map to gain control of the sector!
hash.daily.text.20130528forcetournamentlongme:
The top 10 players on each sector will each qualify for Tournament Prize Boxes, which contain the following:
Platinum Prize Box - Guarantees a Level 16 Black Market Patch, Generals Order, Incineraptor, Synthetic Control Core, or Onyx Core Gold Prize Box - Chance to win a Level 16 Black Market Patch, Generals Order, Incineraptor, Synthetic Control Core, Onyx Core, Hacker's Patch, Vermillion Core, Cerulean Core, or SP 5000 Silver Prize Box - Decreased chance to win prizes from the Platinum and Gold boxes, plus a 30% Troop Accelerator, SP 1000, Incendiary Core, or Decimator Core Bronze Prize Box - Decreased chance to win prizes from Gold and Silver Boxes plus Troops and Speed Ups
Daily and Achievement Prizes are available as well, make sure to check the Leaderboard for more details.
hash.missions.sensory-augmentation.name: Sensory Augmentation
hash.message.marchtrainingspecterwinner.body: Your specter army is enormous and terrifying! We've granted you a 60-Minute Troop Energizer in recognition of your military expansion! You can find this new item in your inventory.
hash.missions.fully-upgrade-rhino.name: Fully Upgrade Rhino
hash.message.marchheliosalvagewinner.body: Your Platinum has attracted the interest of Cerulean scavengers, and they've rewarded your patronage with stolen Helio supplies. You've received one Helio Salvage Crate for every 100 Platinum spent during the last week! Check your inventory for these prizes!
hash.message.subject.20130124wheelgamereminde:
Today is the Last Day to spin the Wheel in our Kira's improved-odds Wheel Game for a chance to take win a General's Orders!
General's Orders are pivotal to a powerful army so spin the wheel and try your luck today!
The Wheel Game ends today (January 27th PST), so make sure to play now before you miss out!

hash.message.body.05072013hackathon:
Upgrade your equipment parts now and get a chance to win a Black Market Patch #16!
For a limited time only, each successful Equipment Part upgrade to Level 13 or greater between now and 11:00pm PDT on May 9th will give you a chance to take home a Black Market Patch #16! TWENTY randomly chosen players who successfully complete an equipment upgrade to Level 13 or higher will take home a Black Market Patch #16!
Prizes will be paid out to the winners by Monday, May 13th at 11:00pm PDT.
There has never been a better time to upgrade your equipment than right now!

hash.message.body.05242013barracksbat:
In honor of the new reduction in build times for units trained at the Barracks, upgrade your Barracks today and win 99% Building Accelerators!
Seven randomly selected players that complete a Level 15 or higher Barracks building upgrade on any of their colonies between now and 11:00pm PST on May 27th will receive a 99% Building Accelerator! Prizes will be paid out to the winners by Wednesday, May 29th at 11:00pm PST.
Don’t wait to upgrade your Barracks buildings to get a chance at winning a 99% Building Accelerator!

hash.promotion.gift120911.body:
'tis the season for giving, and for winning! Give a Platinum Gift, and you could receive an equal amount of Platinum the next day!

We'll choose one Platinum Gift each day, and award the same amount to the player who sent the gift - including bonus Platinum!

Send 6000 Platinum, and get 6000 Platinum for yourself. Every gift you give is another chance to win!

One winner each day, every day, from now until Saturday, December 31! Full rules and details are on the forums. Naughty or nice - who's on your list?

hash.message.body.05212013generallatreminder:
Today is the last day to level up your Generals and win!
Every time that you level up a General with a General’s Order between now and 11:00pm PST on May 23th, you will get a chance to take home an Incineraptor! TEN randomly chosen players who successfully level up one of their Generals will receive an exclusive, untrainable Incineraptor!
Prizes will be paid out to the winners by Monday, May 27th at 11:00pm PST.
The new General’s Crate and General’s Orders mystery box are in the store right now, so be sure to level up your Generals today!

A Tech Lab allows you to research more powerful troop types.

Click BUILD.
Select the COMBAT tab.
Select the TECH LAB.
Click BUILD.
hash.campaign.helio.description15: Time to test General Grod's defenses. Sweep this Helio Legion outpost and seize as much uranium as possible.
hash.items.onyxcore.description: Salvaged from the Caldera Ruins, these advanced Cores are the only items capable of powering the Battle Cruiser

Upgrading your Tech Lab will enable you to research and train even better troops.

Select the TECH LAB.
Click UPGRADE.
Click UPGRADE again.
hash.message.sectorwinneronekira.body: Well done, Commander! Your rapid level 8 deployment has earned you a KIRA's Gift. Check your inventory for this item!
hash.missions.daily-item-hax-8-shield.descrip:
*Kabam.com Exclusive Mission*

Admiral Tenmu is in constant need of resources collected on Cerulea IV, but he knows that battles are raging on the surface just as they are in space. The Admiral tries to send useful supplies down to the surface whenever he can.
hash.daily.text.20130720forcetournament: Earn force for your chance to win new and improved prizes!
hash.missions.research-titans.name: Research Titans
hash.missions.a-flurry-of-attacks-2.descripti: Every attack that leaves the Aurora-1 Colony should be prepared for any situation. Soldiers may fight the battle, but it's up to their Commander to equip them with the best technology.
hash.warning.online-player-too-low: This player is currently online and you must be at least level 10 to attack an online player.
hash.daily.text.warpgate2: Launch more attacks - build your second Warp Gate! Free Accelerators for upgrading - check your mail!
hash.items.buildtoken2.name: Vermillion Core
hash.message.body.20121004disruptortrain:
A new Disruptor Challenge is set to begin! We will be keeping track of the amount of Disruptors trained between 10:00am PST on October 4th and 11:59pm PST on Friday October 5th!
Top Player (1) who trains the most Disruptors will win 2500 Platinum! The Next ten (10) players will each win 1000 Platinum, and we'll also select Ten (10) additional players at random who trained at least one disruptor to each receive 1000 Platinum!
That's a total of 21 prizes and 22,500 total Platinum up for grabs so don't miss out! Visit your Factory and begin training today!
hash.message.body.20130524iavacharitycrate:
Here at Kabam we do our best to support highly effective charities around the world. In an effort to bring that opportunity to our players and to honor Memorial Day in the U.S., we will be making a *limited edition* charity bundle to benefit Iraq and Afghanistan Veterans of America (IAVA) available in the store starting today.
The bundle will contain the following items:
1 x Vermillion Core 1 x Scarbide Rack 1 x 30% Training Accelerator
This is a savings of nearly 200%!
When the sale concludes on Sunday June 2nd, 100% of the IAVA Charity Bundle’s net proceeds will be donated to Iraq and Afghanistan Veterans of America on behalf of the Kabam community to support IAVA's healthcare, scholarship and job training programs!
Thank you for your support, and we hope you have a great Holiday!
Edgeworld Team
hash.research.marine.name: Marine
hash.message.body.guaranteedforcebox: Open this box to GUARANTEE 50,000 Force Points for use in the Force Tournament! This box contains Troop Bundles that, when opened, will provide you with over 50,000 Force Points! This box will also give you the chance to win 100,000 Force Points and the grand prize is 250,000 Force Points to help your Tournament Ranking! This Brand New Box will only be available for a limited time, so grab them while you can and solidify your spot atop the Force Tournament Leaderboard today!

hash.message.body.20130510forcetournamentremi:
Today is the Last Day to Participate in our latest Total Force Tournament!
All Force earned through troop training, building, researching, equipment upgrading, General Skill upgrading and PvP will be DOUBLED (x2) throughout the duration!
The top 10 players on each sector will each qualify for Tournament Prize Boxes, which contain the following:
Platinum Prize Box - Guarantees a Level 16 Black Market Patch, Generals Order, Incineraptor, Synthetic Control Core, or Onyx Core Gold Prize Box - Chance to win a Level 16 Black Market Patch, Generals Order, Incineraptor, Synthetic Control Core, Onyx Core, Hacker's Patch, Vermillion Core, Cerulean Core, or SP 5000 Silver Prize Box - Decreased chance to win prizes from the Platinum and Gold boxes, plus a 30% Troop Accelerator, SP 1000, Incendiary Core, or Decimator Core Bronze Prize Box - Decreased chance to win prizes from Gold and Silver Boxes plus Troops and Speed Ups
The next 10 players in each sector will receive a variety of great prizes as well! Check the in game leaderboard for more details.
This Tournament ends on May 13th at 11:59 PM PDT, so make sure to get started today. Good luck!
-- Edgeworld Team
hash.daily.title.meteoricmysterybox: Get Meteoric Mystery Boxes and Defeat Incineraptors!
hash.message.body.liquidscope:
More BRAND NEW Tokens have arrived in the Liquid Scope Mystery Box! These Tokens will provide superpowers to your Turrets when equipped!
The Scope Token 2.0 DOUBLES your Range (each upgrade is 2x the Scope Token 1.0 stats)
The Liquid Coolant Token 2.0 rapidly increases your Attacks Per Minute!
Also win HUGE speedups, Incendiary Racks, Troops and Hacker’s Patches!

hash.message.body.20130517forcetournamentremi:
Today is the Last Day to Participate in our latest Training and Building Force Tournament!
All Force earned through troop training, building, researching, equipment upgrading, General Skill upgrading and PvP will contribute to your Tournament AND Leaderboard rankings! In addition, Training and Building Force Points will be QUADRUPLED(x4) for the duration of the tournament!
The top 10 players on each sector will each qualify for Tournament Prize Boxes, which contain the following:
Platinum Prize Box - Guarantees a Level 16 Black Market Patch, Generals Order, Incineraptor, Synthetic Control Core, or Onyx Core Gold Prize Box - Chance to win a Level 16 Black Market Patch, Generals Order, Incineraptor, Synthetic Control Core, Onyx Core, Hacker's Patch, Vermillion Core, Cerulean Core, or SP 5000 Silver Prize Box - Decreased chance to win prizes from the Platinum and Gold boxes, plus a 30% Troop Accelerator, SP 1000, Incendiary Core, or Decimator Core Bronze Prize Box - Decreased chance to win prizes from Gold and Silver Boxes plus Troops and Speed Ups
The next 10 players in each sector will receive a variety of great prizes as well! Check the in game leaderboard for more details.
This Tournament ends tonight at 11:59 PM PDT, Good luck!
-- Edgeworld Team

All Force earned through troop training, building, researching, equipment upgrading, and General Skill upgrading will contribute to your Tournament AND Leaderboard rankings but that's not all! In addition, Engineering Lab Part Upgrade and Building Force Points will be TRIPLED(x3) for the duration of the tournament!
The top 10 players on each sector will each qualify for Tournament Prize Boxes AND the next 10 players will receive a variety of great prizes as well!
In addition to these overall prizes, Daily Prizes are now available for the top 3 players an a given day as well as Achievement Prizes once you pass certain Force Thresholds! Check the in game leaderboard for more details.

hash.missions.preemptive-strike.objectives: Destroy the Command Center in a Level 1500 Confederate base.
hash.hud.unithealthinfo.title: Unit Health
hash.missions.things-that-go-boom-8.descripti: Increasing the health of the Bomba Unit means decreasing the likelihood of an enemy victory. Spend the time to upgrade this beast and you'll notice the difference in no time.
hash.message.body.hackersandcratebuyevent:
With the release of the new and improved Renegade Crate, now is the perfect time to stock up and earn rewards for purchasing Platinum!
Purchase one of the following Platinum packages between now and 11:59pm PST on August 30th and you'll qualify for the following bonus:
Buy the 225 Platinum Pack - Get 2 Hacker's Patches Buy the 400 Platinum Pack - Get 1 Renegade Crate and 2 Hacker's Patches Buy the 1000 Platinum Pack - Get 2 Renegade Crates and 5 Hacker's Patches! (150% Free Value!) Buy the 2500 Platinum Pack - Get 2 Renegade Crates, 5 Hacker’s Patches, 2 Black Market Patches and the Cerulean Skyshroud!
Please keep in mind that you can only qualify for one of these offers, so make sure you purchase the right package! Prizes will be distributed within 3 business day after the conclusion of this event.
hash.message.body.20130612tokenmysterybox:
With the release of Enhancement Tokens, Engineering Lab Parts and your base defenses have never been stronger. If you still haven't gotten your hands on some of the more powerful Tokens, or still need a few of the basic variations look no further then our New Enhancement Token Mystery Box!
Within lies all previously released tokens, providing you a great chance to acquire 1 or more of these items at a discounted rate. Make sure to visit the featured tab of the shop and check it out.
Don't take too long, however, this box is only available for a Limited Time!
hash.daily.text.maycarriersale: Purchase Select Platinum Packages and receive FREE Mystery Carriers! Details in your mail!
hash.message.subject.20130125firsttimepurchas: First Time Purchase Event - Last Day
hash.fte.kira.mission.rewards: Each time you complete a mission you will be given rewards. Clicking the missions button will let you claim the rewards and show you what missions are available.
hash.message.body.forcetournament:
A brand new 4 DAY Training and PvP Tournament has just begun!
The 1st place finisher will receive a Platinum Prize Box and the 2nd-20th place finishers will receive Gold and Silver boxes!
All Force earned through troop training, building, researching, equipment upgrading, and General Skill upgrading will contribute to your Tournament AND Leaderboard rankings but that's not all! In addition, Training and PvP Force Points will be QUADRUPLED (x4) for the duration of the tournament!
The top 20 players on each sector will each qualify for NEWLY UPDATED Tournament Prize Boxes, which contain the following awesome new prizes:
Platinum Prize Box - Guarantees Level 16 Black Market Patches, Generals Orders, Incineraptors, Synthetic Control Cores, or Onyx Cores Gold Prize Box - Chance to win Level 16 Black Market Patches, Generals Orders, Incineraptors, Synthetic Control Cores, Onyx Cores, Hacker's Patches, Vermillion Cores, Cerulean Cores, or SP 5000s Silver Prize Box - Decreased chance to win prizes from the Platinum and Gold boxes, plus 50% Troop Accelerators, SP 1000s, Incendiary Cores, or Decimator Cores
Additional Prizes all the way to 40th place!
In addition to these overall prizes, Daily Prizes are now available for the top 3 players in a given day as well as Achievement Prizes once you pass certain Force Thresholds! Check the in game leaderboard for more details.
This Tournament ends on October 13th at 11:00 PM PDT, so be sure to get started today. Good luck!
-- Edgeworld Team

A brand new Troop Training and General SP Force Tournament has just begun!
All Force earned through Troop Training and spending General SP (leveling up their skills) will contribute to your leaderboard ranking, with the top 40 netting prizes such as Platinum, Trophies, and even premium troops!
This Tournament ends on March 11th at 11:20 AM PDT, Good luck!

hash.campaign.helio.description65: General Grod has saluted your skill on the battlefield. You should acknowledge the compliment by attacking.
hash.message.body.token40box:
The brand new 4.0 Tokens have arrived! These tokens will provide superpowers to your Turrets when equipped!
The Armor Token 4. 0 can increase your Turret’s Health up to 225,000 when at Level 17!
The Piercing Ammo Token 4.0 will increase Damage by up to 18,000 when fully upgraded!
Also win HUGE speedups, Incendiary Racks, Troops and Hacker’s Patches!
hash.daily.text.06202013generalscrate: Check out the improved General’s Crate that contains 5,000 Generals SP and a General’s Order!
hash.daily.text.20130327forcetournament: Earn force for your chance to win Platinum, Trophies, and premium Troops! 3x gain in Caldera-2!
hash.missions.snipertower1.name: Nest of Snipers
hash.daily.text.20130401acceleratorcrateflash: For 24 hours only, the Time Traveler's Crate and Deluxe Time Traveler's Crate are on sale for 25% off!
hash.faction.helio.attack.1: The destiny of any sun is to expand. And as Helio grows, so must the body count.
hash.items.hyperarmor.name: Hyper Armor
hash.faction.helio.attack.2: Give up hope, or have it wrenched from your broken fingers!
hash.faction.helio.attack.3: Bow to your new overlord! Kneel before Grod!
hash.missions.the-100-000-club.objectives: Dish out more than 100,000 points of damage in an attack

hash.daily.text.20130801forcetournamentlongme:
All Force earned through troop training, building, researching, equipment upgrading, and General Skill upgrading will contribute to your Tournament AND Leaderboard rankings but that's not all! In addition, Generals and Training Force Points will be TRIPLED (x3) for the duration of the tournament!
The top 40 players on each sector will each qualify for Prizes, the most ever from any Force Tournament!
Items such as Ruby Cores, Black Market Patches, Generals Orders and other building Cores can be won but that's not all! We will also be giving out the Grand Prize Box from the last Wheel Game event that may contain Cerulean Alloys or new Fireproof Shield Tokens that protect your turrets against damage from Bomba units! Make sure to check the Tournament Leaderboard in game for an exact breakdown on the new prize structure.
In addition to these overall prizes, Daily Prizes will be available for the top 3 players in a given day as well as Achievement Prizes that can be warned once you pass certain Force Thresholds! Check the in game leaderboard for this breakdown as well.
hash.message.body.usetheforcebox:
Use the Force... Box! Win your Wars in the Stars with this out-of-this-world Box!
The Use the Force Box contains 10, 20 or 80 of the following Premium Troops:
Pulse Tanks Berzerkers Decimators Battlecruisers Incineraptors!
This box will only be available for a limited time, so take advantage of this great deal while you can!
hash.message.monocerosmaps.body:
Thanks to your vocal support in the forums, Monoceros has been selected as the next Sector to receive the territorial map!

The map is still a work in progress, and as such, there may still be bugs and issues to work through. Please send us your bug reports with the 'Help' link above the game window.

We're still working on the rules of the territorial map, and testing the results. There may be numerous changes over the next few weeks, and we appreciate your patience and your feedback!

Because the map is still under development, it's possible that we'll need to take the map down temporarily to fix issues or improve features. We don't expect to have any map downtime, but if we do, we'll make it as short as possible.

Visit our forums to give us your feedback!
hash.items.reinforcedliquidcoolant.name: Reinforced Liquid Coolant
hash.message.body.20120713purchase1000:
Right now, from 11:00am PDT on July 13th until 11:00am PDT on July 16th, earn five Mystery Carriers for every 1,000 platinum purchased from the store! Use Mystery Carriers to train 3,000 Marines or between 1 and 80 Pulse Tanks without using your Factory or any resources!
Please note that all prizes will be paid out to the Sector in which the Platinum was purchased, and each Sector will be counted individually for Platinum purchased, so you cannot combine purchases across multiple Sectors. Prizes will be distributed by July 19th.
hash.items.tokenexplosiveammo3.name: Explosive Ammo Token 3.0
hash.items.wormholecrate.description: Special crate of items for players in merged sectors!
hash.ew.campaign.shrike1.name: Bullet Storm (1-100)
hash.missions.inappropriate-workplace-humor.d: You will doubtless recall the memorandum I prepared regarding the plans for a new Shrike design, including an extended fuselage. They were the subject of many off-color jokes in the barracks. At any rate, the upgrades are ready. Let us not speak of this again.
hash.missions.more-phat-loots.description: To store more stuff, make more room.

hash.research.sentinel.description: Sentinel's are equipped with hyper-ablation armor that can withstand large amounts of damage and punishment.
hash.missions.project-x-refining.description: We're on the verge of a major breakthrough, Commander. One barrel of this hyper-efficient fuel will take a Shrike fifteen times around the Cerulean equator.

hash.missions.extirpation-sequence.descriptio: This is the heart of Executrix Scylith's operations. If we destroy the Command Center, we destroy much of her offensive capability in this sector.
hash.recipes.ceruleandamagesensor.description: Crafting Formula for one Cerulean Damage Sensor Smart Part!
hash.items.tokenliquidcoolant2.tooltip: Apply to an Engineering Lab part and receive a moderate scaling Rate of Fire Boost permanently!
hash.daily.text.20130129smartpart1: This new Engineering Lab Part will target higher priority targets! Win it in Zoot's Blowout Jackpot!

hash.message.body.20130817pax50sale: The 50% Training Accelerator is now available in the Store! Stock up today and prepare yourself for battle! They will only be available for a limited time so be sure to take advantage of this amazing deal!
hash.campaign.helio.description80: The Legion and the Maar Confederacy have declared a truce. While Grod's guard is down, you should strike.
hash.missions.gimme-a-hand.description: The streamlining process has identified several superfluous mechanisms, like safety protocols, that we can eliminate during this upgrade. Incidentally, a little-known fact about workers with prosthetic limbs: they're very careful, which makes them more efficient.
hash.items.basicpiercingammo.name: Basic Piercing Ammo
hash.message.body.20130426forcetournament:
A brand new 3 DAY Research and Lab Force Tournament has just begun!
All Force earned through Engineering Lab Part Upgrades and from Offensive, Defensive, and Turret Control Research will contribute to your leaderboard ranking but that's not all! All Force gained from Engineering Lab Part Upgrade has been DOUBLED(x2) and Force gained from Research has been TRIPLED(x3)!
The top 40 players on each sector will each qualify for new and increased payouts of premium items, troops, and trophies!
This Tournament ends on April 29th at 11:59 PM PDT, so make sure to get started today. Good luck!
-- Edgeworld Team
hash.items.tokenarmor.name: Armor Token
hash.missions.crystal-method-2.name: Crystal Method 2
hash.daily.text.20130507forcetournament: Earn force for your chance to win valuable prizes! 3x Boost!
hash.daily.text.20130113trainingacceleratorsa: Stock up today and be prepared for the trials to come!
hash.error.inactive-player: Are you still in command? Reboot comm link to continue.
hash.message.shieldupgradewinner11.body:
Congratulations, Commander! For upgrading your Shield Generator with remarkable swiftness, you have been awarded an Accelerator.
The Accelerator is based on your Shield Generator level:
Level 10: 7-Day Accelerator
Level 11: 14-Day Accelerator
Thank you for your tremendous contribution to defense!
hash.daily.text.febattack24h: Win PvP battles to receive a Salvage Box or KIRA's Gift! Check your mail for the rules!
hash.missions.rook-shields.description: It’s not just the factions. Countless renegades splintered from the Union as well. Be prepared!
hash.missions.advanced-refining.description: Commander, Cerulea IV has sufficient natural gas reserves to fuel our war effort for the next 2,000,000 years. I'll be around then, because I'm an AI. You, however, will need to hurry.
hash.message.body.chimerarush:
Dominance on the battlefield is all about having the newest technology available. Now that the Fleet Academy has arrived and introduced the Chimera, the race is on to be one of the first to control this powerful new weapon of war!
Every player who has constructed their Fleet Academy by noon PST on Monday, June 4 will receive a FREE 30% Troop Accelerator.
In addition, the player who has the most Chimera in each Sector at noon PST Monday, June 4th will receive an additional FIVE 30% Troop Accelerators!
Get ahead of the competition. Build your Fleet Academy today!
hash.missions.destructive-transformation.desc: Our scientists have invented a new tank, which powers up in battle. We can easily research it.
hash.daily.text.05102013flagmonument: Slow down incoming enemies with the Banner Monument building and personalize your base with unique banners!
hash.daily.title.debrismysterybox: Zoot’s Debris Mystery Box is here!
hash.message.body.20130612forcetournamentremi:
Today is the Last Day to Participate in our latest Engineering Lab Part Upgrade and Building Force Tournament!
All Force earned through troop training, building, researching, equipment upgrading, and General Skill upgrading will contribute to your Tournament AND Leaderboard rankings but that's not all! In addition, Engineering Lab Part Upgrade and Building Force Points will be TRIPLED(x3) for the duration of the tournament!
The top 10 players on each sector will each qualify for Tournament Prize Boxes, which contain the following:
Platinum Prize Box - Guarantees a Level 16 Black Market Patch, Generals Order, Incineraptor, Synthetic Control Core, or Onyx Core Gold Prize Box - Chance to win a Level 16 Black Market Patch, Generals Order, Incineraptor, Synthetic Control Core, Onyx Core, Hacker's Patch, Vermillion Core, Cerulean Core, or SP 5000 Silver Prize Box - Decreased chance to win prizes from the Platinum and Gold boxes, plus a 30% Troop Accelerator, SP 1000, Incendiary Core, or Decimator Core Bronze Prize Box - Decreased chance to win prizes from Gold and Silver Boxes plus Troops and Speed Ups
The next 10 players in each sector will receive a variety of great prizes as well! Check the in game leaderboard for more details.
In addition to these overall prizes, Daily Prizes are now available for the top 3 players an a given day as well as Achievement Prizes once you pass certain Force Thresholds! Check the in game leaderboard for more details.
This Tournament ends tonight at 11:00 PM PDT, Good luck!
-- Edgeworld Team

hash.message.activitylog.body:
Open your Alliance menu to access the new Alliance Activity Log!

Monitor your Alliance activity, including attacks, defenses, diplomacy changes, and new members.

The Log is color-coded so you can instantly tell your Alliance's status at a glance! Coordinate your attacks and dominate your Sector!
hash.missions.10k-club.objectives: Dish out more than 10,000 points of damage in an attack against another player

hash.message.spendpulsetanks2.body: Thank you for participating in our Pulse Tank spend event! One Pulse Carrier has been added to your inventory.
hash.campaign.helio.hint15: Uranium is the resource needed for training troops. Be sure to collect as much as you can!

Sorry, Commander. You need to be at least Level 10 to attack an online player.
hash.message.body.20130602buyevent:
Still need a few extra Cerulean Blast Shields to shore up your defense against Decimators and round out your collection? Purchase Platinum and receive FREE Cerulean Blast Shield Mystery Boxes!
Simply purchase one of the following Platinum Packages before the deadline to qualify for your FREE Cerulean Blast Shield Mystery Boxes which can contain exclusive Cerulean Blast Shield Engineering Lab Parts, as well as Cerulean Cores, General Spp 5000, Decimator Cores and more!
Buy the 225 Platinum Pack and get 5 Cerulean Blast Shield Mystery Boxes Buy the 400 Platinum Pack and get 10 Cerulean Blast Shield Mystery Boxes Buy the 1000 Platinum Pack or greater and get 25 Cerulean Blast Shield Mystery Boxes!
This unique offer starts today and will end at 11:59pm PDT on August 12th. You will receive free Mystery Boxes only for the first Platinum purchase made between these times. The prizes will be distributed onto the server in which Platinum was purchased and added to your Inventory within 3 business days of this event's conclusion.
hash.message.marchplatinumpromo.body:
Edgeworld Platinum Events!
A small Platinum purchase this week could turn into a massive Platinum windfall!

First Purchase Promo!
Pick up your first Platinum Package this week, and you could win 5000 Platinum! We'll choose 3 random winners!

Every Purchase Promo!
You can win even if it's not your first purchase! Every Platinum Package purchased this week is a chance to win 2500 Platinum! We'll choose 5 random winners!

Act fast - this contest ends at 1:00pm PST on Friday, March 30! (8:00pm UTC)
hash.message.body.20130525buyevent:
Purchase one of the following platinum packages between now and 11:59pm PST on May 27th, you'll qualify for the following bonus items:
Buy the 225 Platinum Pack - Get 2 15-Hour Accelerators! Buy the 400 Platinum Pack - Get 4 24-Hour Accelerators! Buy the 1000 Platinum Pack or higher - Get 1 Deluxe Time Traveler Kit (1,180 Platinum worth of Accelerators)!
Please keep in mind that you can only qualify for one of these offers, so purchase the right package! Prizes will be distributed after the conclusion of this event.
hash.message.body.mobile20121116:
Greetings Commander!
On behalf of the Edgeworld: Shattered Universe team, we wanted to take a moment to thank you for being a part of our growing community. For your contributions to Edgeworld, please accept this Time Traveler’s Crate as a token of our gratitude. You will be able to find it in “My Items”.
Sincerely,
Edgeworld: Shattered Universe team
hash.missions.research-pyro.name: Research Pyro
hash.message.body.20120821barrackstime:
For a very limited time, Barracks upgrade times have been reduced by 95%! If you've been holding out, now is the time to upgrade this building and unlock the powerful Fleet Academy. Act now, because this special promotion ends at 12:00 PM PST on August 23rd!
Now get out there and start building!

hash.units.pyro.name: Pyro
hash.items.anniversarycrate2.tooltip: Open for your Special Anniversary Gift from the Edgeworld Team!
hash.daily.text.spendevent100813: For a limited time, Spend Platinum and earn FREE Backups and Patches!!!
hash.missions.aurora-1.description: I have incoming reports of a new base available for colonization. The Aurora-1 Colony is brimming with resources and undiscovered technology -- sounds like a suitable outpost for your second base, Commander.
hash.skill.empgrenade.unlock: At level 10, click and hold to unleash a wider blast!
hash.message.marchspendplatinum.subject: Spend Platinum, win KIRA's Gift!
hash.message.body.eu20130513forum: Greetings Commanders, The Edgeworld Community Team would like to remind all our fellow players that we have been working on the forum features: new content have been posted recently and there’s a lot more to come. Our intention is to treat the player community with the deserved care and attention, in order to get your involvement not only as gamers, but also as community participants. We will be giving answers to your troubles when needed, adding more useful information and posting new funny events to make the whole experience of playing Edgeworld something even more awesome! We sincerely hope to see you participating in these events and contests, there will be rewards and achievements for those who will join the forum activities. Commanders, this is the beginning of a new era in Edgeworld’s Forum! These are the links of the dedicated forums for each language: ENGLISH For more information click here GERMAN Für mehr informationen klicken sie hier SPANISH Para más información click aquí ITALIAN Per saperne di più clicca qui FRENCH Pour plus d'informations clique ici Regards, Edgeworld Community Team
hash.message.coloniesinyoursector.body:
The Aurora-1 Colony is now available in your Sector! Get your Aurora-1 Schematic, break ground on your first colony, and start your upgrades!

Give us your feedback and report any issues with the 'Help' or 'Support' button above the game window, or post in the forums!
hash.campaign.helio.hint20: Resources are often heavily guarded. Use caution when placing your attack!
hash.missions.the-plural-of-bomba.description: Bomba work best when they're able to regularly clear a path for your Marines and Specters. Train additional Bomba so there are plenty to go around when the time comes-- 50 should suffice.
hash.ew.mobile.trainingcomplete: Training is now complete. Your army grows stronger! Train more soldiers and conquer the universe!
hash.fte.faction.provoke: Meaning, your base lies in Confederate territory.
hash.fte.kira.work: If we're going to survive, we have a lot of work to do, commander.
hash.items.annihilatorcrate.name: Annihilator Crate
hash.campaign.helio.hint25: Try different mixes of troops, drop zones, and wave timing to find the winning combo!
hash.items.guaranteedEquipmentBoost16.descrip: This Black Market mod chip allows you to take your weaponry to Level 16 and above without risk of breaking.
hash.items.mysteryboxblue.name: Sensor Box
hash.buildings.gunturret.name: Gun Turret
hash.items.mysterybox16.description: Open this box for a chance to win up to 20 Onyx Cores among other prizes!
hash.research.shrike.name: Shrike
hash.missions.keeping-up-with-the-xuatiacs.de: Time to upgrade our factory if we're going to compete with the other factions, Commander. At this rate, they're more productive than we are, and that's just not acceptable.
hash.missions.unlock-specter-file-3.descripti: We got lucky. Specter File 3 was programmed to open on the last day of the Cerulea IV invasion. The Maar expected that to be tomorrow. They always were overconfident.
hash.missions.mallick-s-revenge.objectives: Destroy the Command Center in a Level 50 Confederate base.
hash.message.body.4xfridayspendevent:
For the next 24 Hours, we are giving out 4x the prizes just for spending Platinum!
Spend the qualifying amount to earn the Following prizes:
Spend 100 Platinum to receive 4 Special Delivery Mystery Boxes! Spend 300 Platinum to receive 4 Hacker’s Patch Mystery Boxes + above prizes! Spend 500 Platinum to receive 4 Maximum Force Boxes, 4 Use The Force Boxes, 4 G Force Boxes + above prizes! Spend 1000 Platinum to receive 4 Renegade Crates + above prizes! Spend 2000 Platinum to receive 1 Level 15 Vermillion Ammo Delivery Smart Part, 1 Annihilator Crate + above prizes!
This deal will only be available for the next 24 hours so make sure you reach your Tier in time!
NOTE: Prizes will be awarded by October 20th, 2013. Limit 1 Prize per Tier.
hash.missions.erazi-net-node.description: The Erazi love to steal information. They even tried to copy my source code and sell me! Blowing up this base is the best way to insure our own network security.
hash.research-defense.pyro.name: Pyro Defense
hash.missions.enhanced-projectiles.descriptio: Will it improve them? The long answer is that we’ll upgrade Marine pulse rifles to fire inert Cerulium. The short answer is ‘yes’.
hash.missions.train-specter-squad.name: Train Specter Squad
hash.missions.dont-hate-the-player.name: Don't Hate the Player
hash.missions.shift-command.description:
Upgrading the Command Center unlocks brand new buildings, and space for more buildings.

Select the COMMAND CENTER.
Click UPGRADE.
Click UPGRADE again.
hash.colony.slides.welcome.desc2: From here, we can really take the fight to the Maar.
hash.colony.slides.welcome.desc3: First, build out your base and gain access to:
hash.missions.solar-cell-tuning.name: Solar Cell Tuning
hash.campaign.helio.hint30: Some turrets are powerful but have short ranges. Focus long range units on these towers.
hash.items.mysteryboxorange.description: Chance to win Incineraptors in this box! This box also contains Synthetic Control Cores for Incineraptors as well as other troop bundles
hash.units.michael.description: A bloodthirsty Privateer on the run from a mutual enemy.
hash.missions.rook-shields.name: Rook Shields
hash.items.gasbox.description: These crates contain between 250,000 and 20,000,000 Gas.
hash.message.body.tieredspendevent:
All day today (August 24th) between 12:00 am and 11:59pm, spending Platinum will earn you even more rewards! We have 5 tiers of prizes to give out just for spending Platinum!
Spend 100 Platinum to receive 1 Hacker’s Patch (Limit 1) Spend 300 Platinum to receive 1 Ruby Core + above prizes (1 Hacker’s Patch) Spend 500 Platinum to receive 1 Black Market Patch + above prizes (1 Ruby Core, 1 Hacker’s Patch) Spend 1000 Platinum to receive 1 Deluxe Time Travelers Crate + above prizes (1 Ruby Core, 1 Hacker’s Patch & 1 Black Market Patch) Spend 2000 Platinum to receive our newest and most powerful defensive part, a Level 10 Network Sabotage Part + above prizes (1 Ruby Core, 1 Hacker’s Patch, 1 Black Market Patch, 1 Deluxe Time Travelers Crate).
This deal will only be available for the next 24 hours so make sure you reach your tier in time! Prizes will be awarded by August 26, 2013.
hash.items.ceruleaninflammableshieldbox.name: Cerulean Fireproof Shield Box
hash.hero.skills.speednormal.description: Medium increase in troop movement speed
hash.daily.text.maycoresale: For a limited time only, Cerulean Cores are on SALE! Get yours now!
hash.research.titan.name: Titan
hash.missions.project-x-supply.description: Storing supplies in a secure location is such old-school thinking. How about a secure *dimension*? No? Okay, then what about counterkinetic projectile armor? Ah, now I have your attention.
hash.items.crystalnanos1w.description: Increase Crystal production by 4x for 7 days.
hash.missions.erazi-mainframe.description: No matter how many Erazi we defeat, they'll crawl back into Cerulean affairs as long as their networks are active. We need to destroy their infrastructure on this planet.
hash.items.masterkit1.promo: You've made it this far, but things are heating up. Ensure your survival with more Energy and Boosts.
hash.suggestion.attack-level-too-low: You must be level #LEVEL# to attack this player.
hash.items.reinforceddualbarrels.name: Reinforced Dual Barrels
hash.missions.haze-forged-obdurium.name: Haze-Forged Obdurium
hash.campaign.maar.description3: Governor Mallick wants to use Cerulean technology to eradicate humanity. Time for a pre-emptive attack on his base.
hash.engineeringlab.partsdescription: View all Parts in inventory, repair damaged or broken Parts, upgrade Parts or destroy unwanted Parts. Collect Parts from victorious Defense Simulations.
hash.units.spacedragon.name: Incineraptor
hash.campaign.maar.description6: Mallick's scientists in the Maar Confederacy have begun work on tachyon cannons. Strike before they're deployed.
hash.research.gunturret.name: Gun Turret Upgrade
hash.message.body.20121109mobilefirstpurchase:
Starting now, until 11:59 PM PDT December 20th, make any purchase of 100 Platinum or more from the store and receive FREE Accelerators!
The rewards will be set as follows:
Buy 100-299 Platinum - 10 FREE 15 Minute Accelerators
Buy 300-499 Platinum - 10 FREE 1 Hour Accelerators, 10 FREE 15 Minute Accelerators
Buy 500 or more Platinum - 10 FREE 2.5 Hour Accelerators, 10 FREE 1 Hour Accelerators, 10 FREE 15 Minute Accelerators
This is an extremely limited time offer valid only on your FIRST Platinum purchase during the promotion period - so act now! Free Speed Ups will be rewarded within 24 hours of purchase.
hash.daily.text.20130402forcetournament: Earn force for your chance to win Premium prizes and Trophies! 3x gain in Caldera-2!
hash.missions.adra-development.description: I'm tired of working overtime, Commander. Developing a dedicated research assistant A.I. will help our tech lab work more efficiently and free me up to do what I do best -- help you.
hash.message.ryantestwinner.subject: Test
hash.hero.skills.rangenormal.name: Telescopic Sight
hash.daily.text.platinumalloysale: Stock up on Platinum Alloys today at the low price of 50 Platinum!
hash.campaign.helio.hint40: That’s a lot of Tesla towers. Good thing Specters can shoot them from afar!
hash.daily.text.05242013barracksbat: Build and upgrade your Barracks buildings today to win a 99% Building Accelerator!
hash.missions.the-archive.description: Before retreating, Grod's son tried to make contact with an elite Helio unit guarding a hidden Cerulean computer core. It must hold secrets- and I think we're both the curious type.
hash.missions.legion-fleet-beacon.description: Grod's files show he placed a beacon on Cerulea IV in case of defeat, to aim a "sore loser" orbital strike. Is he crazy enough to use it? It doesn't take an A.I. to answer that.
hash.lf.results.lose.description: You didn't win this time. Here's a consolation prize for your efforts! Try again to win Zoot's Jackpot!!
hash.message.body.20130510zootsjackpot:
Zoot's Jackpot payouts have been adjusted to give you the best chance at success!
For a limited time only, the odds of getting the Jackpot have doubled at each level! Your chances to reach the Bonus Play feature have also been significantly increased! Play today for a chance to win items such as Black Market Patch #16, Hacker's Patches, Builders Boxes, Vermillion Cores, Decimation Racks and more! Each play you make could also net you the Jackpot, which grows with every play!
Click on the "Z" icon next to your Mailbox to check out Zoot's Jackpot today!
hash.missions.neutralize-agents.description: Commander, I've detected an outpost containing a large number of Maar elite military specialists. These are Maar "problem solvers", and your name is #1 on their problem list.
hash.missions.build-tesla-tower.description: Tesla Towers are our most advanced defensive structures. They project fields of electrical energy, causing severe damage to multiple targets.
hash.message.body.acceleratorboxzoot:
Zoot has managed to secure a rare shipment of Accelerator Boxes and is now sharing these valuable items with his customers!
These special mystery boxes contain a random Accelerator and are capable of helping Commanders of every level quickly build up their base-- and starting now, you have a chance to win one from Zoot's Loot!
But hurry-- Accelerator Box supplies are very limited and this item will only be available to win until 2:00 PM PST on July 18th.
Act fast, Commander!
hash.message.body.20121011patchupdate:
With the release the new "Hacker's Patch", we are phasing out the old "Manufacturer's Patch". Since these patches can no longer be used, we have inserted "Modder's Patches" onto your account for each Manufacturer's Patch you had in your inventory.
We apologize for any inconvenience this has caused, and make sure to put your new "Modder's Patches" to use!
--Edgeworld Team
hash.message.body.20130311buyevent:
Still need a few extra Cerulean Armor Smart Parts to round out your base defense? Look no further then our Smart Part purchase event!
Simply purchase one of the following Platinum Packages before the deadline to qualify for FREE Cerulean Armor Mystery Crates with new and improved payouts (including double the chances to win the Cerulean Armor Smart Part!):
Buy the 225 Platinum Pack and get 20 Cerulean Armor Mystery Crates Buy the 400 Platinum Pack and get 40 Cerulean Armor Mystery Crates Buy the 1000 Platinum Pack or greater and get 120 Cerulean Armor Mystery Crates!
This unique offer starts today (March 11th) at 11:00am PST and will end at 11:59pm PST on March 12th. You will receive free Mystery Boxes only for the first Platinum purchase made between these times. The prizes will be distributed onto the server in which Platinum was purchased and added into your Inventory within 3 business days of this event's conclusion.
hash.items.mysterybox34.description: Contains the Level 10 Vermillion Fireproof Shield!
hash.items.tokenskyshroud.description: Applies a small scaling Battle Cruiser Defense to an Engineering Lab Part!
hash.missions.warp-gate-optimization.descript: It may be time to invest in a more advanced Warp Gate. Your unit commanders are tired of my "Get out and walk!" joke, and it's the only one I have in my databanks.
hash.campaign.maar.description100: This is it, Commander. If we can smash through their defenses, we can neutralize the Maar threat in this region.
hash.missions.flare-captures.description: By deploying magnetic warheads, we've opened up a new coronal hole in the sun. The ensuing solar windstorm has amplified our energy output. But we've also halved our life expectancies. Well, yours, anyhow. I'm ageless.
hash.missions.game-over.name: Game Over

hash.missions.yams.objectives: Increase Energy Production to 12,000 per hour.

hash.message.body.20121114corrosivebuildathon:
Every player that builds at least 1 Corrosive Turret in their main base by 11:59pm PST on November 16th will be entered for a chance to win an Incendiary Rack! 10 Lucky winners will be selected and awarded.
Additionally, every player that has at least 6 Corrosive Turrets in their main base by 11:59am PST on November 16th will be entered for a chance to win 500 Platinum! 5 Lucky winners will be selected and awarded for this tier!
Make sure to check out the new Corrosive Turret, and get started building today! Winners be be chosen and prizes awarded after the conclusion of this event.
hash.items.dax28shield.description: Gives you 28 days of protection. Removed if you attack another player.
hash.missions.research-specter.name: Research Specter
hash.campaign.helio.hint50: Supply Depots contain resources on other player bases. Try attacking a fellow player!
hash.items.incendiaryrack.name: Incendiary Rack
hash.buildings.stagingarea.description: Staging Areas house combat-ready units. Upgrade to increase how many units you can train.
hash.message.body.20121129newunit:
Berserker troops are ready for their close up!
Boasting immunity to bullet attacks, these war machines are prepped for the vanguard of your offense. Though bullet-proof, these units greatly fear elemental attacks as found in the Incendiary, Corrosive & Telsa towers.
Unlock this new troop type in the Tech Lab for a smashing fun time!
hash.message.marchkclub.body: Thank you for being a valued member of the K Club! We have granted you a Helio Salvage Crate for every $40 spent on Kabam.com between March 6 and March 11. Check your inventory for these powerful items!
hash.daily.title.ceruleanskyshroud: Odds Improved 3x: Sky Shroud Mystery Box!!!
hash.promo.tgf.title: Kabam Presents The Godfather: Five Families
hash.missions.come-fly-away.name: Come fly away
hash.items.max15equipmentboost.description: Prevents breaking a Part and moderately increases the chance of a successful upgrade.
hash.missions.daily-battle-helio.description: Legion soldiers love victory parades, even when they haven't won yet. Let's put a dent in their morale by destroying their parade grounds. Defeat a Helio base of level #AMOUNT# or higher.
hash.daily.text.juneceruleanspend: -just for spending Platinum! Details in your mail!
hash.recipes.rarebox1a.description: Open for a chance to win a Rare 3 Bonus Smart Part or a Zoot's Token
hash.missions.legion-war-depot.description: I am indexing war crimes committed by the Helio Legion. It would be faster to index ones they haven't committed. To avoid being their next victim, we have to strike quickly.

hash.hero.skills.ballisticmissile.name: Ballistic Missile
hash.missions.research-specters.description: The Maar Confederacy has a network of special operatives. They even the told us how to train them! Well, not really "told". I stole the documents from their servers.
hash.missions.solar-flair-3.objectives: Increase Energy Production to 6,000 per hour
hash.daily.text.20130521forcetournament: Earn force for your chance to win valuable prizes! 4x Boost!
hash.ai.sniperthreat.name: Sniper Targeting
hash.message.body.tuesdayspendevent:
Win DOUBLE the prizes for the Two For Tuesday spend event!
Be the first to grab the Vermillion Advanced Targeting Smart Part! This Powerful Part will add 2400 to your range and 18000 damage when fully upgraded to Level 17! Also, the AI will target and attack enemy Generals first to neutralize your enemies most powerful units!
Spend the qualifying amount to earn the Following Prizes:
Spend 100 Platinum to receive 2x 8-Hour Accelerators! Spend 500 Platinum to receive 2x Black Market Patches + above prizes! Spend 1,000 Platinum to receive 2x Generals Crates and 2x Renegade Crates + above prizes! Spend 2,500 Platinum to receive a Level 2 Vermillion Anti-Targeting E-Lab Part AND a Level 2 Vermillion Armor + above prizes!
This deal will only be available for the next 24 hours so make sure you reach your Tier in time!
NOTE: Prizes will be awarded by October 3rd, 2013. Limit 1 Prize per Tier.
hash.missions.flare-plasma.description: I just wanted to explain this morning's explosion. It turns out that a few of our Pyros got excited when they heard about the new upgrades, and in their glee, they detonated a few kilograms of red phosphorus, incinerating a few civilians in the process. So, in other words, nothing unusual.
hash.missions.exquisite-corps.description: Fully optimized Specters are otherworldly and unparalleled in their long-distance range.
hash.campaign.helio.hint65: Shrikes are powerful on the battlefield. Their speed and rapid fire tears through defenses!
hash.message.body.maybombabuildup: Bombas are a strong unit that does heavy splash damage in a massive explosion when they die. They are absolutely devastating in large groups. How large? As large as you can build them! Between now and Thursday, May 17th at 3:00 pm PST (10:00pm UTC) Build
hash.missions.nano-mining.name: Nano-Mining
hash.items.flag3.description: Banner to be equipped to Banner Monument
hash.research.corrosiveturret.description: Each Corrosive Turret receives a boost to their Attack and Health based on each Corrosive Turret level across all bases. The more you build the more powerful the boost.
hash.message.body.20130624forcetournamentremi:
Today is the Last Day to Participate in our latest Total Force Tournament!
All Force earned through troop training, building, researching, equipment upgrading, and General Skill upgrading will contribute to your Tournament AND Leaderboard rankings and will also be DOUBLED (x2) for the duration!
The 1st place winner in each sector will receive a new Ruby Core for Level 17 building upgrades as well as 600 platinum for their efforts! The next 2nd and 3rd place winners will receive Platinum Prize Boxes which have a chance to provide Ruby Cores! The Tournament Prize Boxes for the top 10 players contain the following:
Platinum Prize Box - Guarantees a Ruby Core, Black Market Patch, Generals Order, Incineraptor, or Synthetic Control Core Gold Prize Box - Chance to win a Black Market Patch, Generals Order, Incineraptor, Synthetic Control Core, Onyx Core, Hacker's Patch, Vermillion Core, Cerulean Core, or SP 5000 Silver Prize Box - Decreased chance to win prizes from the Platinum and Gold boxes, plus a 30% Troop Accelerator, SP 1000, Incendiary Core, or Decimator Core Bronze Prize Box - Decreased chance to win prizes from Gold and Silver Boxes plus Troops and Speed Ups
In addition to these overall prizes, Daily Prizes are now available for the top 3 players a given day as well as Achievement Prizes once you pass certain Force Thresholds! Check the in game leaderboard for more details.
This Tournament ends tonight at 11:00 PM PDT, Good luck!
-- Edgeworld Team
hash.promotion.levelnine.subject: Level 9 Contests!
hash.missions.research-shrike.description: The Shrike is fast, tough, and dishes out lots of damage.

hash.items.encryptedboxb.name: Encrypted Cerulean Box
hash.missions.you-look-very-weak.name: You look very weak

Message encryption in progress.

Sorry for this message. It appears to be some corrupted data stuck in the message system, and we're not sure who put it here. Thanks for your patience.

Barry

hash.buildings.bronzebuilding.description: A badge of Galactic strength, Commander's with this building are beginning their ascent to power. Building this monument draws enemy gunfire.
hash.promotion.09162011.body:
Take your base and your XP to new heights this weekend, and earn prizes and Platinum!

Battle Cry!

Every Combat Boost you use this weekend (Skill, Tactics, or Strategy) will automatically enter you to win 5 Combat Strategy items! Will you be lucky enough to win the huge boost? One winner will be chosen in each sector!

Level 9 Upgrade Contests!

Our Level 9 contests continue! Upgrade your Command Center to Level 9, and you're entered to win 1100 Platinum! One player will win!

Once your CC is at Level 9, keep upgrading! Every building or research that reaches level 9 will give you a chance to win a Master's Kit! Five players will be chosen!

Instant Upgrade Bonus!

Build up your base! Use the 'Buy Now' button to instantly upgrade your buildings or research new units! Use instant upgrade this weekend, and you're instantly entered to win a Warrior's Kit! Fifteen players will win!

Winners will be announced Monday, 9/19! Good luck, Commander!
hash.missions.max15accelerator.description: Shorten Building, Research, Warp Gate or Training time by 15 minutes.

hash.items.mysterybox12.name: 50K Elite Force Box
hash.missions.crossfire-project.description: Combat A.I.s are great at coming up with perfect firing angles. The better the turret, the more angles they can choose from.
hash.missions.nuclear-beatdown.objectives: Loot over 5,000 uranium from any faction's base
hash.daily.text.20121030turretbuildathon: Upgrade any turret to level 10 or higher, for a chance to win 500 Platinum! Full details in your mail!
hash.fte.panel.welcome.header: KIRA here. I've been assigned to assist you in the occupation.

hash.message.body.20121108allianceshieldgener:
Commander, the battle for the Territory map is heating up!
With the Alliance Shield generator, you can increase the effectiveness and defenses of all nodes your Alliance controls on the Territory map. This will allow nodes to go well beyond their current limit of level 10,000!
Every player who builds and upgrades their Alliance Shield Generator builds the power of their entire Alliance, based on their player level and the level of the Alliance Shield Generator.
Reach for the top tier rewards, and defend what you have, with the Alliance Shield Generator. Build yours today!
Please Note that Alliance Shield Generator Nodes will update once every 24 hours, reflecting any completed upgrades from your Alliance at this time.
hash.message.body.20130620forcetournament:
A brand new 4 DAY General and Research Force Tournament has just begun!
All Force earned through troop training, building, researching, equipment upgrading, and General Skill upgrading will contribute to your Tournament AND Leaderboard rankings but that's not all! In addition, General SP and GO upgrades as well as Research Force gain will be TRIPLED(x3) for the duration of the tournament!
The 1st place winner in each sector will receive a new Ruby Core for Level 17 building upgrades as well as 600 platinum for their efforts! The next 2nd and 3rd place winners will receive Platinum Prize Boxes which have a chance to provide Ruby Cores! The Tournament Prize Boxes for the top 10 players contain the following:
Platinum Prize Box - Guarantees a Ruby Core, Black Market Patch, Generals Order, Incineraptor, or Synthetic Control Core Gold Prize Box - Chance to win a Black Market Patch, Generals Order, Incineraptor, Synthetic Control Core, Onyx Core, Hacker's Patch, Vermillion Core, Cerulean Core, or SP 5000 Silver Prize Box - Decreased chance to win prizes from the Platinum and Gold boxes, plus a 30% Troop Accelerator, SP 1000, Incendiary Core, or Decimator Core Bronze Prize Box - Decreased chance to win prizes from Gold and Silver Boxes plus Troops and Speed Ups
In addition to these overall prizes, Daily Prizes are now available for the top 3 players a given day as well as Achievement Prizes once you pass certain Force Thresholds! Check the in game leaderboard for more details.
This Tournament ends on June 23rd at 11:00 PM PDT, so be sure to get started today. Good luck!
-- Edgeworld Team
hash.daily.text.spend-generalsorders: From 6pm to 9pm PDT, you can earn 1 FREE General’s Order for every 200 Platinum you spend! Limit 5 per Player, per Sector.
hash.missions.fix-whats-broken.name: Fix whats broken
hash.message.body.20120711upgradefactory:
Mines are a great way to defend your base from attackers and are now available for construction! The number of mines you can build depends on the level of your Factory, so prepare yourself now by upgrading this building.
Not only will upgrading your Factory allow you to train more mines, but you'll also be entered to win the following prizes!
Level 9 - Cerulean Core Level 10 - 3x Accelerator Box Level 11 - Pulse Rack Level 12 - 150 Platinum
But hurry-- this event ends at 7:00 PM PST on July 13th, 2012.
A total of 20 lucky winners from each Factory level will be chosen. Prizes will be awarded by July 16th, 2012.
Good luck, Commander!
hash.message.body.thursdayspendevent:
For the next 24 hours, Spending Platinum will earn you bonuses!
For every 50 Platinum you spend you will receive 1 Master Blaster Mystery Box (chance to win the Vermillion Blast Shield!) For every 100 Platinum you spend you will receive 2 Liquid Scope Mystery Boxes (chance to win Liquid Coolant or Scope Token 2.0!!) For every 200 Platinum you spend you will receive 1 99% Building Accelerator!
There is NO LIMIT to the amount of prizes you can earn!
This deal will only be available for the next 24 hours so make sure you reach your Tier in time!
NOTE: Prizes will be awarded by October 5th, 2013.
hash.message.subject.20130507forcetournament: Building and Lab Force Tournament - 3x Boost!
hash.items.flag12.description: Banner to be equipped to Banner Monument
hash.message.body.20130415c2schematic: The Caldera-2 Schematic is now available in the shop! Make sure to visit the Featured tab of the shop and get yours today!
hash.message.body.20130206bombabox:
While the release of Aurora 1 ushered in the Bomba, it wasn't until General Strom arrived that this unit finally hit its stride and has never been stronger! For a LIMITED TIME only, the Bomba Box will allow you to fill your Staging Areas and supplement your ranks with this explosive troop!
For 10 Platinum, you will be guaranteed at least 50 Bomba's but that's not all! Groups of 100, 200, and 500 can also be won fairly often, and each box also holds the possibility of taking home a whopping 100,000 Bombas!
Visit the featured tab of the store and stock up today!
Each box is guaranteed to net you Bombas, so make sure to stock up today before this mystery box disappears!
hash.campaign.helio.hint80: Try different attack tactics in combination for a more powerful strike!

hash.message.body.20130616incendiarysale:
Incendiary Cores and Racks are 50% OFF for a Limited Time Only!
To upgrade your turrets to Level 17 you now need TWO Incendiary Cores! At this HIGHLY discounted price, there has never been a better time to upgrade your turrets to the highest level!
Make sure to stock up on Incendiary Cores today!
hash.missions.crystal-mine.description: Time to increase the output of our crystal mines if we're going to outlive our enemies. Push harder!
hash.campaign.erazi.description3: This is Executrix Scyllith, leader of the Erazi. She's built a new outpost in this sector. We need to destroy it!
hash.missions.snipertower8.description: This turret has performed well, but it is certainly capable of picking off targets faster. This upgrade will increase the turret's damage by a whopping 50%!
hash.recipes.rarebox3b.name: Tier 3 Rare Part Box
hash.missions.not-on-my-watch.objectives: Attack a player who has attacked your base
hash.campaign.erazi.description6: The Erazi Syndicate's flank is exposed. This is the time to strike their westernmost base of operations.

hash.suggestion.same-player: Upgrade this outpost from the map.
