hash.message.body.20121128mobile:
Spin the Wheel for a chance to win fabulous prizes such as Cerulean Racks, Incendiary Racks, Builder's Boxes and Speed-ups but that's not all! Collect all 5 Zoot Chips and you'll take home an Aurora-1 Gold Kit (a 660 Platinum value)!
Check the Wheel for more details but don't delay! This game will only be available for an extremely limited amount of time, so spin today before its too late!
**If you do not see the Wheel icon in the lower right corner of your screen, please download the latest version of Edgeworld from the App Store!**
hash.message.body.20130710forcetournament:
There is a new Force Tournament starting today with AMAZING prizes! It will last for 3 DAYS and provide you with a 3x boost to Training and Research!
All Force earned through troop training, building, researching, equipment upgrading, and General Skill upgrading will contribute to your Tournament AND Leaderboard rankings but that's not all! In addition, Training and Research Force Points will be TRIPLED(x3) for the duration of the tournament!
The top 40 players on each sector will each qualify for Prizes, the most ever from any Force Tournament!
Items such as Ruby Cores, Black Market Patches, Generals Orders and other building Cores can be won but that's not all! We will also be giving out the brand new 3.0 Enhancement Tokens, offering exponentially greater benefits when attached to your Engineering Lab Parts! Make sure to check the Tournament Leaderboard in game for an exact breakdown on the new prize structure.
In addition to these overall prizes, Daily Prizes will be available for the top 3 players in a given day as well as Achievement Prizes that can be warned once you pass certain Force Thresholds! Check the in game leaderboard for this breakdown as well.
This Tournament ends on July 12th at 11:00 PM PDT, so be sure to get started today. Good luck!
-- Edgeworld Team
hash.missions.tesla-array.description: Trust your A.I. on this - from now on, when you wake up smelling burnt flesh and ozone, it will be good news.

hash.resource-refund.xcheck.body:
Commander,

Our support team is examining a recent attack on your base. We have determined that this attack was using exploits that violate our terms of service in order to gain an unfair advantage.

We have refunded the resources that were lost in this attack and will monitor this situation carefully. Thank you for your continued support!

Refunded Resources:
Crystal: #CRYSTAL_AMOUNT#
Gas: #GAS_AMOUNT#
Energy: #ENERGY_AMOUNT#
Uranium: #URANIUM_AMOUNT#
hash.missions.battle-uplink.description: A Pulse Tank is too much machine for most non-A.I. brains to handle. Providing each operator a dedicated satellite uplink will boost combat performance across the board.

Congratulations! These winners have recieved a HAX-8 Speedup in our Level 7 Building Blitz!

bryce, Scotticus, TOTO, Dracon_X, Morphling, Deoxis, robbie hart, Mica, Opus, Gareth1971, Cyni-Kul, Birdie, Bu, jelloshepard, Degredon, TanaBanana, Capt. Kirk, Camccormick, Mandar, italiaking, Benny Ha Ha, Lightyear, Omega, Toadious, and Izorion.

These users are ready to upgrade to the next level! Will you be ready, too? Our next event starts this weekend!

hash.message.body.20130721token3mb:
The Enhance Tokens 3.0 Mystery Box is now in the store for a LIMITED TIME only! The new 3.0 Enhance Tokens are significantly more powerful than both the 1.0 and 2.0 tokens and provide intense boosts to your Turrets!
This Mystery Box gives you a chance to win the Armor, Piercing Ammo and Explosive Ammo 3.0 Enhancement Tokens as well as the 2.0 versions of the same tokens! Additional prizes include troop bundles that will also help you skyrocket up the Leaderboard in the next Force Tournament!
The Enhance Tokens 3.0 Mystery Box will only be in the store for a limited time, so check out the Featured Tab and enhance your Turrets!
hash.items.tokenblastshield2.description: Applies a moderate scaling Decimator Defense to an Engineering Lab Part!
hash.daily.text.20130211sppflashsale: All General SP items have been discounted for the next 24 hours! Check your mail for more details
hash.missions.the-more-the-merrier.descriptio: The improvements to our Staging Area will make it possible to prepare a larger number of troops for combat. The enemy will be overrun in short order, Commander.
hash.itemupsell.key.title: Key Needed
hash.missions.empire-strikes-out.description: Don't let your guard down, Commander. Show your enemies you're a force to be reckoned with.
hash.missions.yams.description: We must improve efficiency in our solar collection systems and increase energy production.
hash.missions.energynanos1d.description: Increase Energy production by +300% for 24 hours.
hash.promotion.rhinowednesday.body:
Their favorite sport is back on TV, and the Rhinos are pumped up for this weekend!

Visit Edgeworld this weekend to try out the boosted Rhinos!

Don't miss any announcements - Like our Fan Page!
hash.items.armortoken2.description: Applies a moderate scaling Health Boost permanently to an Engineering Lab Part!
hash.items.logisticalbox.description: Stolen items from the enemy which can include Incendiary Cores!
hash.message.body.newmysteryboxes:
From now until 10:00am PDT July 6th, limited edition mystery boxes will be available in the store.
Open the Builder’s Box to win Cerulean Cores! Open the Accelerator Box to win speed ups of up to 14 days! Open the Troop Box to win 30% Training Accelerators! Open the Incendiary Box to win Incendiary Cores!
Act now before these boxes are gone!
hash.daily.text.marchalliance: Pulse Cores for top Alliances in each Sector on the leaderboard and the map! Full details in your mail!
hash.message.body.eldrazibounty:
You've been working hard to build up your defenses, Commander, but this weekend it's time to take the offensive and attack the Factions.
Right now, from 10:00 AM PST on July 5th to 12:00 PM PST on July 8th, defeat 75 faction bases and you will win a Builder's Box!
A Builder's Box contains the chance to win a Cerulean Core, a Speed Up or a Zoot's Token!
Please note that all prizes will be paid out to the Sector in which the faction bases were defeated. Prizes will be distributed by July 11th.
Have a good weekend, Commander!

hash.items.charitycrate.name: Doctors Without Borders
hash.common.unit.size.staging.area: Space used in the Staging Area
hash.missions.staging-expansion.description: I was programmed with anti-Cerulean propaganda to play for our troops in the Staging Area -- but the Ceruleans aren’t here anymore. I’ll delete the "Crack Their Ugly Carapaces!" speech.
hash.message.body.20130211teslatowerevent:
For a limited time only, Tesla Tower build times will be reduced by 30% and levels 10-15 will not require Incendiary cores in order to upgrade! There has never been a better time to power up these Towers and increase your base defenses.
This event will only last for the next 2 days, so take advantage of these build times now and finish your builds before it's too late!

hash.items.incendiarycore.name: Incendiary Core
hash.missions.man-machine-interface.descripti: A neural interface means that our operators will no longer face input delays. A two-ton war machine with the reaction time of a trained assassin is awesome.
hash.missions.the-new-hires.description: Unfortunately, the picotech nanites in the Tech Lab escaped containment and killed most of the research staff. However, they then became self-aware and tried to make up for their crimes by developing a new schematic for our communications grid. We're putting them on the payroll.
hash.missions.increase-energy-production-4.ob: Increase Energy Production to 2,000 per hour.

hash.message.body.20121016terraknorsale:
With Halloween just around the corner, Control Devices are now on Sale!
For the next 24 hours, these Controls can be had for only 5 Platinum! Make sure to check the "Featured" or "Combat" section of the shop to get yours and stock up today!
hash.items.flag11.name: Banner Design #11
hash.message.body.20130319blackmarketpatchbox:
With the release level 16 Engineering Lab Parts, your turrets and defenses have never been stronger! Leveling up to Level 16 can be done naturally through the Engineering Lab, but if you need any help then look no further then the Black Market Patch Mystery Box! This new Patch will guarantee an upgrade from Level 15 - 16, and can only be found inside this box!
Open one of these to take home this exclusive item, but that's not all!
This box can also contain Hacker's Patches to help get your lab parts up to level 15, Decimators, and other troop bundles that all will provide XP when opened!
This box will only be available for a Limited Time so don't miss out! Visit the featured tab of the store and get yours today!
hash.outage.09012011.body:
After sending out our compensation package Wednesday to all players, we decided that high-level players should receive additional compensation for their losses.

We will be granting an additional four 4 Million Resource items each of Crystal, Gas, Energy, and Uranium to each player with a level 7 or 8 Command Center, a total of 64 million resources.

This should allow you to refill your Storage Depots and restart any upgrades, training, and research which were interrupted by this event. Thank you for your understanding and patience during this time.
hash.missions.headless-foreman.objectives: Destroy command centers in a level 6 Confederates base.

hash.message.body.04132013level15buildathon:
Now is the perfect time to upgrade your buildings to Level 15 and prepare for what the future holds!
For a limited time, each completed Level 15 building upgrade on one of your colonies between now and 11:00pm PDT on April 15th gives you a chance to take home great prizes! Ten randomly chosen players who successfully complete a Level 15 building upgrade will take home a Hacker’s Patch AND a General’s Order!
Prizes will be paid out to the winners by Wednesday, April 17th at 11:00pm PDT.
There has never been a better time to upgrade your buildings to Level 15 and quickly catch up with other players!

hash.message.body.20130315dragoncorebox:
With the unveiling of the new and powerful Incineraptors, many players inquired about their research. Here is your chance to take home some Synthetic Control Cores, necessary to power up your Incineraptors and enable their Research! Other items and Troop Bundles can be won as well such as large amounts of Bombas, Shrikes, Titans as well as Scarbide Ingots that each will help you during this latest Force Tournament!
The only way to get Synthetic Control Cores currently is through this Mystery Box, and will only be available for a Limited Time! Visit the featured tab of the shop to get yours today!

This great mystery box will only be available for a Limited Time, so visit the featured tab of the shop to get yours today!

hash.message.body.20130227forcetournament:
With the release of our new "Force System Mechanic", a brand new 5 DAY Force Tournament has just begun!
All Force earned through troop training, building, researching, equipment upgrading, General Skill upgrading and PvP will contribute to your leaderboard ranking, with the top 40 netting fabulous prizes such as Platinum, Trophies, and premium troops!
This Tournament ends on March 4th at 10:00 AM PDT, and if you have any questions on the new force system make sure to visit our forums and check your in game mail for more details. Good luck!
-- Edgeworld Team

For a limited time only, the Caldera-2 Colony is on sale in the Edgeworld Store for all-time low price of 299 Platinum!
Don't miss out on exciting and exclusive new additions such as the Turret Control Building and new Battle Cruiser Unit, available only within this new Outpost!
If you haven't already experienced this new content and Outpost what are you waiting for? Make sure to pick up your schematics and begin building today!

hash.message.body.20130610mobileshutdown:
Commander,
We would like to thank you very much for playing Edgeworld Mobile, but regret to inform you that we will not be continuing to support the game. As a result, Edgeworld Mobile will be concluding on June 24th, 2013. Sadly, after a long and arduous trek, the Campaign for Cerulea IV is coming to a close.
We hope you enjoyed your time within the game and that you will continue to play other Kabam games, current and future!
For more information regarding the closure of Edgeworld Mobile, check out our FAQs located here:
General FAQ
http://community.kabam.com/forums/showthread.php?181521-Edgeworld-Mobile-Closure-FAQ
Paying Player FAQ
http://community.kabam.com/forums/showthread.php?181519-Edgeworld-Mobile-Paying-Player-FAQ
We also have a General Discussion section of the Edgeworld Mobile Message Boards available where you can discuss or ask any questions you may have:
http://community.kabam.com/forums/forumdisplay.php?793-General-Discussion
Thanks again for supporting Edgeworld Mobile and we hope to see you again very soon!
Best wishes,
-The Edgeworld Mobile Team

hash.message.resourcecrategift.body:
Thank you for being a valued Edgeworld player!
We'd like to invite you to try one of our NEW Resource Crates! These Crates can contain anywhere from 250,000 to 20 million of a resource, and can quickly fill up your Supply Depots!
We've added an Energy Crate to your inventory. Try it out now!
hash.missions.gas-giant-4.description: This war isn't going to end anytime soon. Fuel your base accordingly.
hash.message.body.20130726forcetournamentremi:
Today is the Last Day to Participate in our latest Training and Building Tournament!
All Force earned through troop training, building, researching, equipment upgrading, and General Skill upgrading will contribute to your Tournament AND Leaderboard rankings but that's not all! In addition, Training and Building Force Points will be TRIPLED (x3) for the duration of the tournament!
The top 40 players on each sector will each qualify for Prizes, the most ever from any Force Tournament!
Items such as Ruby Cores, Black Market Patches, Generals Orders and other building Cores can be won but that's not all! We will also be giving out the Grand Prize Box from the last Wheel Game event that may contain Cerulean Alloys or new Fireproof Shield Tokens that protect your turrets against damage from Bomba units! Make sure to check the Tournament Leaderboard in game for an exact breakdown on the new prize structure.
In addition to these overall prizes, Daily Prizes will be available for the top 3 players in a given day as well as Achievement Prizes that can be warned once you pass certain Force Thresholds! Check the in game leaderboard for this breakdown as well.
This Tournament ends tonight at 11:00 PM PST, Good luck!
-- Edgeworld Team

hash.promotion.rhinosaturday.body:
Rhinos are on offense this weekend, and they're unstoppable!

Rhinos are free and fast to train, hit twice as often, and take up less space in your Warp Capacity! Click on your Barracks and train a team of Rhinos!

Rhinos revert to normal on Monday, so get out there and attack!

Come back Monday for our next event: The Level 7 Building Rush! Upgrade to level 7, because level 8 is just around the corner!
hash.ew.mobile.buildingupgradecomplete: Building upgrade is now complete. Build more and conquer the universe!
hash.message.advancedrestock.body:
An accidental change on our end has caused Advanced Armor and Advanced Ammunition to return to the Edgeworld store!
These items will give a permanent increase to your troop strength and building health. They were removed from the store in December, and have been unavailable since then.
To be fair and give all our players a chance to take advantage of the error and get these unavailable items, we've decided to leave these items in the store until the end of the month. We'll remove Advanced Armor and Ammunition at the start of April.
Thanks for playing Edgeworld!
hash.message.body.20120701researchathon:
Win prizes for conducting Defense Lab research!
All players who complete Level 2 Defense Lab Disruptor research by 12:00pm PDT July 6th will receive a 2.5-Hour Accelerator. Additionally, all players who have completed level 5 or higher Defense Lab Disruptor research will be entered into a random sweepstakes to win 500 platinum! 10 lucky winners will be chosen!
Start researching now and crush those Disuptors!

hash.message.body.newrenegadecrate:
Greetings Commander,
We have made some updates to the Annihilator Crate and the Renegade Crate so now you can get even better prizes inside!
We’ve changed the contents of the Builders Box to include Vermillion Cores, Ruby Cores and 8 Hour Accelerators! We’ve also added 50% Training Accelerators to the Training Box and added Incineraptors and SCC Mystery Boxes to the Salvage Box! Plus the Mystery Carrier now contains better and bigger troops!
We’ve also replaced the 3 Pulse Carriers in the Annihilator Crate with 3 50K Force Boxes. These boxes contain troops that will grant a MINIMUM of 50,000 Force Points, and could contain troops worth 100,000 or 250,000 Force Points! AND we’re including a Ruby Core and 5 Meteoric Mystery Boxes in the Crate as well!
Be sure to check out the shop and pick up a new and improved Crates today!
hash.message.body.20130312buildathon:
With the release of the new and improved Defense Sim campaigns, make sure your base is up to date! For every Level of your Defense Sim your successfully finish will enter you for a chance to win 1000 Platinum!
Make sure you are prepared for these latest additions as well as future releases before you're left behind!
This event ends at 11:59pm PST on March 15th with every completed upgrade of your Defense Simulator granting you an entry. Five winners will be randomly selected, and prizes will be awarded within 3 business days of this event's conclusion.

hash.missions.tenmu-gift.description:
Commander, a message arrived from the fleet. It states:
"Commander, today is a special day, it is the day that humans such as me reclaimed our world, and the tide turned in our war with the Ceruleans.
Now we are here, fighting to protect our homes from the Cerulean threat.
Please accept this gift, and remember to keep the faith—we are fighting for more than just glory or power."
-Admiral Tenmu
hash.missions.this-is-my-rifle-this-is-my-arm: The biggest part of a Specter’s training is teaching them to become one with their rifle. With our new Scarbide Grafting technology, we can literally make that happen!

hash.message.body.04042013tcbuildathon:
With the release of the new Turret Control Building on Caldera-2, the race is on in a Turret Control Build and Research Showdown!
For a Limited Time, upgrade your Turret Control building and complete turret researches between now and 11:00pm PDT on April 11th for a chance to take home great prizes! The first five players who upgrade the Turret Control Building to level 15 during the competition will win a Black Market Patch #16 allowing them to upgrade a single Engineering Lab Part beyond the normal level cap of 15!
Ten other random players who successfully complete a Turret Research to level 5 or higher will each take home 500 Platinum!
Prizes will be paid out to the winners by Friday, April 12th at 11:00pm PDT.
Check out the new Turret Control building on Caldera-2 today and get started!

hash.message.body.07222013buyevent:
Buy Platinum today for a Chance to Win up to 10,000 Platinum!
Every 100 Platinum that you buy between now and 11:59pm PST on July 23rd will give you one entry into a drawing for up to 10,000 Platinum! The prizes will be awarded in the following way:
One randomly chosen player will receive 10,000 Platinum! Two randomly chosen players will each receive 5,000 Platinum! Four randomly chosen players will each receive 2,500 Platinum!
Payouts will be distributed onto the server in which Platinum was purchased and added to your Inventory within three business days of this event's conclusion. Good luck!

hash.message.body.20130616forcetournament:
A brand new 4 DAY Troop Training and Building Force Tournament has just begun!
All Force earned through troop training, building, researching, equipment upgrading, and General Skill upgrading will contribute to your Tournament AND Leaderboard rankings but that's not all! In addition, Troop Training and Building Force Points will be TRIPLED(x3) for the duration of the tournament!
The top 10 players on each sector will each qualify for Tournament Prize Boxes, which contain the following:
Platinum Prize Box - Guarantees a Level 16 Black Market Patch, Generals Order, Incineraptor, Synthetic Control Core, or Onyx Core Gold Prize Box - Chance to win a Level 16 Black Market Patch, Generals Order, Incineraptor, Synthetic Control Core, Onyx Core, Hacker's Patch, Vermillion Core, Cerulean Core, or SP 5000 Silver Prize Box - Decreased chance to win prizes from the Platinum and Gold boxes, plus a 30% Troop Accelerator, SP 1000, Incendiary Core, or Decimator Core Bronze Prize Box - Decreased chance to win prizes from Gold and Silver Boxes plus Troops and Speed Ups
The next 10 players in each sector will receive a variety of great prizes as well! Check the in game leaderboard for more details.
In addition to these overall prizes, Daily Prizes are now available for the top 3 players an a given day as well as Achievement Prizes once you pass certain Force Thresholds! Check the in game leaderboard for more details.
This Tournament ends on June 19th at 11:00 PM PDT, so be sure to get started today. Good luck!
-- Edgeworld Team

hash.message.zootslotswinner.body: Ding ding ding, winner! Your bad luck has been turned to good, as Zoot is awarding you a Combat Strategy for winning three Base GPS items in Zoot's Loot! Congratulations!
hash.daily.text.20130726forcetournament: Earn force for your chance to win new and improved prizes!
hash.ew.mobile.blue-light-special.detail: Get a free crate when you reach the goal below
hash.items.liquidcoolanttoken2.description: Applies a moderate scaling Rate of Fire Boost permanently to an Engineering Lab Part!
hash.hero.skills.magneticshielding.descriptio: Temporary damage reduction to all Turrets except for energy based guns such as Teslas, Incendiaries and Corrosive Turrets.
hash.message.body.lethalforcembbonus:
From now until 11:00pm PDT, purchasing Lethal Force Mystery Boxes can earn you Hacker's Patches!
For every 20 Lethal Force Boxes you purchase, you will receive 1 FREE Hacker's Patch! There is NO LIMIT to the amount of FREE Patches you can earn!
Prizes will be paid out on October 14th, 2013.
hash.daily.text.20130301spacedragonbox: Buy for a chance to win one of these untrainable and exclusive troops as well as a new Synthetic Core!
hash.itemupsell.shields.title: Defend Yourself!
hash.items.hax15accelerator.description: Shorten Building, Research, or Training time by 15 hours.
hash.message.body.20120824purchaseplat:
Right now, from 12:00pm PDT on August 24th until 12:00pm PDT on August 27th, players will receive a FREE 24 Hour Speed Up for EVERY 500 platinum purchased! Use Speed Ups to accelerate troop training, building and research! There is no limit on the number of 24 Hour Speed Ups earned!
Prizes will be distributed by August 30th.
hash.missions.darned-crystal.name: Darned Crystal
hash.daily.text.2xxp-final-notice: The Double XP event is nearly over! Don’t miss out on gaining those extra levels before 5:00 PM PDT on 7/3!
hash.daily.text.20130514forcetournamentlongme:
All Force earned through troop training, building, researching, equipment upgrading, General Skill upgrading and PvP will contribute to your Tournament AND Leaderboard rankings! In addition, Researching and Engineering Lab Force Points will be TRIPLED(x3) for the duration of the tournament!
The top 10 players on each sector will each qualify for Tournament Prize Boxes AND the next 10 players will receive a variety of great prizes as well!
hash.items.tokenskyshroud.tooltip: Apply to an Engineering Lab part and receive a small scaling Battle Cruiser Defense!
hash.items.advancedalloy.name: Advanced Alloy
hash.missions.more-armor.description:
With this new, exciting material, our researchers have used the Scarbide to add another layer of armor to our Titans.
Do you ever get the feeling that some days our researchers are just phoning it in?
hash.missions.concussion-expansion.name: Concussion Expansion
hash.fte.panel.warp.content.a:
Your Warp Gate Capacity appears directly below when you attack.

The bar shows how many units you can warp to the battlefield and how much time remains before the gate closes at the end of the battle.
hash.daily.text.xpfortraining: New! Train infantry or mechs, and earn XP! Grow your army and level up!
hash.daily.text.20130415c2schematic: Visit the Featured Tab of the shop to get yours today!
hash.daily.text.20130625vcoresale: Vermillion Cores are on Sale for an ALL TIME low price!
hash.items.ultraextendedliquidcoolant.name: Ultra Extended Liquidcoolant
hash.message.body.20121024gatlingcrate:
Don't miss out on your chance to acquire rare Multi-Target premium Engineering Lab Equipment of various levels within the new Gatling Mystery Crate such as Hyper Explosive Ammo, Hyper Liquid Coolant, and Frozen Dual Barrels!
The Engineering Lab part "Frozen Dual Barrels" will allow any equipped turret to target and concuss multiple troops with each shot fired!
The Gatling Crate can be purchased for 250 Platinum and will only be available for a LIMITED TIME, so make sure to visit the featured tab of the store to get yours today!
hash.items.exploder100.name: Bomba Platoon
hash.missions.crystal-castles.description:
Crystal and gas are vital for upgrading your base and defenses. The more you collect, the more you can build.

Click any resource building and select COLLECT ALL.
hash.daily.text.7-16-upgradecommandcenter: Upgrade your Command Center and enter to win Platinum! Details in your mail!
hash.missions.tesla-array.name: Tesla Array
hash.items.fieryreinforcedpiercingammo.name: Fiery Reinforced Piercing Ammo
hash.message.moreturrets.body: Congratulations, Commander! Your base has been chosen as a winner in our turret upgrade contest. You have been awarded 500 Platinum and a Cerulean Core!
hash.ai.commandthreat.shortdescription: Attack units targeting the Command Center
hash.missions.project-x-miniaturization.name: Project X: Miniaturization
hash.items.hax24shield.description: Gives you 24 hours of protection. Removed if you attack another player.
hash.dialog.speedup-suggest.hint: Would you like to speed up your current build?
hash.daily.text.20121121zootsjackpot: Play Zoot's Jackpot for a chance to take home premium items and platinum!

hash.missions.reach-for-the-heap-leach.object: Increase Uranium Production to 3000 per hour.
hash.items.encryptedboxa.description: Stolen items from the enemy which can include Incendiary Cores!
hash.message.body.20130128triplexpevent:
Starting today, all XP earned through Training and Combat has been DOUBLED for the next two days!
There has never been a better time to gain experience from Training your Troops and sending them into battle!
This Boost will only last until January 30th, so make sure to take advantage while there is still time!
hash.missions.necrotic-venom.name: Necrotic Venom
hash.message.body.20130720decimatormysterybox:
For a Limited Time only, guarantee yourself Decimators through our new Decimator Mystery Box! Each box will net you at least 1 Decimator, but bigger payouts are available leading all the way up to a possible 1,000! Purchase the Decimator Mystery Box for your chance to never have to train Decimators again!
Visit the featured tab of the shop to get yours today!
hash.missions.optimized-rifles.description: The Cerulean atmosphere plays havoc with weapons. We can counteract the effect. It's times like this I'm glad I don't breathe.
hash.missions.project-x-tech-lab.description: Commander, we require additional funds and materials. Our lab techs are discovering new elements so rapidly, they have to update the periodic table in realtime.
hash.daily.text.20130531forcetournament: Earn force for your chance to win valuable prizes! 3x Boost to Research and Building Force!
hash.fte.combat.scout: I've narrowed down the location. Let's do some recon!
hash.daily.title.20130715forcetournament: 3x Generals and Engineering Lab Force Tournament!
hash.buildings.corrosiveturret.name: Corrosive Turret
hash.missions.solar-skillet.objectives: Increase Energy Production to 24,000 per hour.
hash.daily.text.07042013flagsale30: Buy your favorite Banners today at 30% OFF from the Banner Monument!
hash.items.gas20m.name: 20,000,000 Gas
hash.promotion.seveneighteen2.body:
Get those workers moving!

Do you have a level 7 building yet? Upgrade your base, and you could win twenty Zoot Tokens! We're choosing 5 winners a day, Tuesday through Friday. Every level 7 building you have is another chance to win!

Use speedups to finish multiple upgrades and get more level 7 buildings and turrets by the end of the contest!

Reminder: Our Platinum Package Daily Double event is still in progress! Purchase a Platinum Package for your chance to win double Platinum! Get the full rules here!
hash.promotion.alliancemapjanuary1.body: Congratulations! Your Alliance became the strongest in your Sector, with the highest map Score for our Alliance Map Tournament! Every member of your Alliance receives an 8-Hour Accelerator!
hash.daily.text.resourceconverter: Make your Resources work for you with this new building! Details in your mail!
hash.promotion.octfirstbuyersundaygoogle.body:
We have a special deal available right now for our experienced Edgeworld players! Lots of players are taking advantage of this bonus Platinum, and you can too!

Purchase a Platinum Package for the first time this weekend, and you'll receive additional bonus Platinum! This is the first time ever that you'll be able to receive bonus Platinum for our low-cost 65 and 155 Platinum Packages!

Visit the Platinum Store through the 'Get Platinum' button at the top of the Edgeworld window.

You have until 2:00 PM PST on Monday, October 24 to make your purchase!

This table shows exactly how much additional Platinum you'll receive!

65 Platinum Package / Normal Bonus: 0 / Additional Weekend Bonus: 20 / Total Platinum: 85

155 Platinum Package / Normal Bonus: 0 / Additional Weekend Bonus: 50 / Total Platinum: 205

225 Platinum Package / Normal Bonus: 15 / Additional Weekend Bonus: 75 / Total Platinum: 315

400 Platinum Package / Normal Bonus: 25 / Additional Weekend Bonus: 100 / Total Platinum: 525

1000 Platinum Package / Normal Bonus: 100 / Additional Weekend Bonus: 200 / Total Platinum: 1300

2500 Platinum Package / Normal Bonus: 500 / Additional Weekend Bonus: 500 / Total Platinum: 3500

5000 Platinum Package / Normal Bonus: 1000 / Additional Weekend Bonus: 1000 / Total Platinum: 7000

Platinum is key to your success in Edgeworld! You can use Platinum to speed up your upgrades, instantly train units, earn more XP, and much more!

Full Rules:

Packages must be purchased between 2:00 PM Friday (October 21) and 2:00 PM Monday (October 24), PST.

2:00 PM PST is 9:00 PM GMT and 11:00 PM in Europe.

This bonus is only being offered to players whose accounts are more than 7 days old, and who have never purchased Platinum before. Accounts less than 7 days old can take advantage of our Beginner's Sale to get a similar discount.

The additional bonus Platinum will only apply to your first Platinum purchase. Make it a good one!
hash.message.body.hardcoremysterybox: The Hard Core Mystery Box has arrived! Open this Mystery Box for a chance to take home some of Edgeworld’s rarest Cores! This box contains a chance to win Ruby Cores, Vermillion Cores, Cerulean Cores, Incendiary Cores, Decimator Cores, Onyx Cores and Synthetic Control Cores! This Box also contains the chance to win 5 Ruby Cores or 5 Vermillion Cores! Pick up a few boxes and stock up on Cores today!
hash.items.chimera50.name: Chimera Platoon
hash.promotion.erazi100.body:
Commander, your devotion to crushing the Erazi Syndicate is commendable. The Maar Confederacy has sent Gas and Crystal to our base. They call it a 'Tax Rebate,' but I think they're just afraid of us destroying all their bases again!

Check your inventory using the Shop button to access these items.

You have received 1 million Crystal and Gas.
hash.message.aprilfactions.body: You have received 500 Platinum and an Hour of Power Crate in our Warlord's Tournament! Thanks for launching a ferocious number of attacks!
hash.items.heavystabilizedliquidcoolant.name: Heavy Stabilized Liquidcoolant
hash.message.subject.20121121generalskillupev: Gain General Skill Levels and Win!
hash.daily.text.generalmodal: Gain levels, upgrade your base, conquer the map...what will you achieve today?
hash.common.also.in.store: This item can also be bought from the store at any time.
hash.daily.text.levelathon: Upgrade your buildings to level 10 or higher and WIN!
hash.missions.mutant-fun-klub-2.objectives: Increase Uranium Production to 1,500 per hour
hash.buildings.concussionturret.name: Concussion Turret
hash.missions.increase-energy-production.desc: Build two Solar Plants, or upgrade one Solar Plant.
hash.items.indianflag.description: Indian Flag to equip to Banner Monument
hash.units.spacedragon.description: Flying synthetic beasts that unleash an unrelenting torrent of fireballs upon their prey.
hash.message.body.heavyweightturret:
Revolutionize your base defenses with our new Heavyweight Turret! Heavyweight Turrets: - Specialize in absorbing massive amounts of damage, luring invaders away from your other turrets! - Fire on multiple targets simultaneously, creating a "snare/agro" effect! - Allow you to earn 3 stars on Defense Simulator missions more easily!
Begin building Heavyweight Turrets today if you have at least a Level 7 Command Center!
Also, don't forget to participate in our Heavyweight Turret Buildathon to win Cerulean Racks and Deluxe Time Travel Kits! Check your mail for details.
hash.missions.daily-resource-donation-gas.dec:
Admiral Tenmu is hoping you can support him by giving him #GASDONATION# Gas.
TIP: This is a one-time donation and the mission is only claimable if you have banked enough Gas.
hash.promotion.102711.body:
Daily Missions have arrived! These missions can be completed once each day, for bonus resources, XP, or items.

Your first mission is to get these Lancer under control. They're tearing up the whole planet! Our scientists have created a huge number of Salvage Boxes, and you can receive 8 Boxes for FREE each day!

All you have to do is log in and check your Daily Missions each day, now through Monday! (Oct 31) Celebrate Halloween with your own horde of Terraknor, and get ready to chow down on some bases!
hash.activerecord.errors.models.outpost-base-: Sorry Commander, your level is too low to attack this base.
hash.missions.things-that-go-boom-5.descripti: A poorly trained Bomba is an ineffective Bomba. If you want these beasts to make a big impact on our enemies, make sure you're sending them out prepared.
hash.missions.smelting-accident.description:
We’re going to try using Scarbide metal to reinforce the Rhinos’ horns. It couldn’t hurt, right?
Actually, it will probably hurt them a lot. Good thing they’re expendable.
hash.missions.sunspots.name: Sunspots
hash.daily.text.20130622dragoncorespend: Spend Platinum and qualify to receive FREE Incineraptors and Synthetic Control Cores!
hash.items.stasiscrate.name: Stasis Crate
hash.missions.6-finger-discount.name: 6 Finger Discount
hash.buildings.turretcontrol.description: The Turret Control enables defensive satellite uplink with your Headquarters so that the more powerful all colony Turrets grow, the more powerful your main base Turrets will become.
hash.research-defense.chimera.name: Chimera Defense
hash.items.mysterybox33.name: Level 10 Vermillion Armor
hash.message.body.20130124wheelgame:
Play Kira’s improved-odds Wheel Game for a chance to win an exclusive General's Orders!
General's Orders allow you to unlock the true power of your Generals top tier abilities so spin the wheel and try your luck today!
For this Wheel Game odds have been improved as well as the prizes. Don't miss out, the Wheel Game ends on Sunday January 27th PST and General's Orders will not be purchaseable in stores so make sure to try your luck!
hash.message.body.20130513blastshield:
The Cerulean Blast Shield is a brand new smart AI Lab Part that lessens the damage your turrets will take from Decimators! This equipment’s defense against the explosive splash damage improves rapidly as it is upgraded. In addition to this smart AI, equipping this part will also significantly increase the turret's health as well as its overall damage!
Purchase a Blast Shield Box today for a chance to win one of these rare parts and vanquish your enemies! Unlike other Mystery Boxes in the past, this one boasts much higher odds to win and much better consolation prizes like Cerulean Cores, 15 Hour Accelerators, Decimator Cores and much more!
Check the featured tab of the shop for more info, and stock up while supplies last!
hash.items.ceruleanalloy.name: Cerulean Alloy
hash.buildings.techlab.name: Tech Lab
hash.items.energybox.name: Energy Resource Crate
hash.Message.body.20130426buildtimes: For a Limited Time Only, all Unit offensive & defensive research times as well as Turret Control research times have been reduced by 75%! Take this opportunity to bring your Unit and Turret researches up to Level 16 today!
hash.message.body.20130418forcetournamentremi:
Today is the Last Day to Participate in our latest Force Tournament!
All Force earned through Building and Upgrading your Generals will contribute to your leaderboard ranking but that's not all! Force gained from these methods will also be DOUBLED (x2) throughout the duration!
The top 40 players on each sector will win valuable prizes such as Trophies, premium items, troops, and bragging rights over your enemies!
This Tournament ends tonight at 11:00 PM PDT, so keep pace with the leaders!
-- Edgeworld Team
hash.daily.text.shieldgenerator: Build and upgrade your Aurora-1 Shield Generator to increase the defense of your colony AND main base!
hash.daily.title.spendevent100813: Spend Platinum and Earn E-Lab Rewards!
hash.message.body.20130720forcetournament:
There is a new Force Tournament starting today with AMAZING prizes! It will last for 4 DAYS and provide you with a 3x boost to Training and Engineering Lab!
All Force earned through troop training, building, researching, equipment upgrading, and General Skill upgrading will contribute to your Tournament AND Leaderboard rankings but that's not all! In addition, Training and Engineering Lab Part Upgrading Force Points will be TRIPLED(x3) for the duration of the tournament!
The top 40 players on each sector will each qualify for Prizes, the most ever from any Force Tournament!
Items such as Ruby Cores, Black Market Patches, Generals Orders and other building Cores can be won but that's not all! We will also be giving out the brand new 3.0 Enhancement Tokens, offering exponentially greater benefits when attached to your Engineering Lab Parts! Make sure to check the Tournament Leaderboard in game for an exact breakdown on the new prize structure.
In addition to these overall prizes, Daily Prizes will be available for the top 3 players in a given day as well as Achievement Prizes that can be warned once you pass certain Force Thresholds! Check the in game leaderboard for this breakdown as well.
This Tournament ends on July 23rd at 11:00 PM PDT, so be sure to get started today. Good luck!
-- Edgeworld Team
hash.daily.title.20121128mobile: Wheel Game - Win a second base!
hash.activerecord.errors.models.alliance-memb: Sorry, your invitation to this alliance has been revoked. You will need to receive a new invitation.

hash.missions.barracks-expansion.description: My database indicates that an additional Barracks means each soldier has more personal space, which can reduce the incidence of personnel "bugging out" and "blowing the commanding officer's head off." I hope you appreciate this information.
hash.daily.text.eldrazibounty: Successfully defeat 75 Faction bases this weekend to win a Builder's Box!
hash.colony.slide.title: COLONIES
hash.missions.profane-in-the-membrane.descrip: The new Pulse Tank variant features high-grade explosive rounds. Though not technically an upgrade, it's worth noting that we've taken the liberty of decorating each warhead with expletives in the languages of our enemies.

hash.message.body.sniperbuild:
Every player that has at least 1 Sniper Turret in their main base by 11:59am PST, Friday, 6/15 will get entered to win 500 Platinum and a Cerulean Core! Each Sniper Turret is a chance to win, so someone with 6 Turrets is 6 times as likely to win!
10 Lucky winners will be selected and awarded on June 15.

hash.message.body.ewanniversary:
To celebrate the one-year since Edgeworld’s Beta launch, we are hosting a number of events.
We will be launching an updated UI, giving away ingame items, physical gifts, and for one lucky player, a chance to leave their personal mark on the game forever.
For more details, and for a chance to leave your mark on the game, click HERE

hash.message.body.20130319level16parts:
After much research, our scientists have finally unlocked a new level of power for all Engineering Lab Parts! Each Part can now be improved up til level 16, seeing a significant upgrade over their level 15 counterparts!
Make sure to to visit your Engineering Lab for more information on this new level, and also make sure to visit the featured tab of the shop to view the details of the Black Market Mystery Box. This box contains a new Black Market Patch which can be used to guarantee a successful upgrade from 15 - 16!
hash.message.body.20130218zootsjackpot:
Zoot's Jackpot has been adjusted and improved, now paying out the Jackpot at 2x the normal rate!
Play today and you can win items like General's Orders, Smart Parts, Hacker's Patches, Builders Boxes, Decimation Crates and Platinum at an accelerated rate but that's not all! Each play you make could also be the one that takes home the Jackpot and all of the Platinum it contains!
Click on the "Z" icon next to your Mailbox to check out Zoot's Jackpot today! This event will only be available for the next 24 hours so don't delay! Take advantage today before someone else claims your Jackpot!

hash.items.heliosalvage.description: Scavenged from wrecked Helio ships, these crates could contain anything from Scarbide Ingots to massive Accelerators.
hash.missions.project-x-training.description: These new facilities will allow us to turn even sleep into a form of intense training. Our fresh troops will perform like seasoned veterans.

hash.missions.tanks-a-lot.description: One Disruptor can take out a target in a single shot. 10 Disruptors – you see where this is going...
hash.daily.text.disruptor: Disruptors are sturdy, powerful and quick! A level 7 Tech lab unlocks this essential heavy hitter.

hash.missions.theatre-of-pain.description:
Please build another staging area so we have room for more Raiders and other soldiers.

Click BUILD.
Select the COMBAT tab.
Select the STAGING AREA.
Click BUILD.

hash.campaign.erazi.description20: Mallick, Governor of the Maar, has sent a peace offering in the form of a map to a secret Syndicate base.

hash.campaign.erazi.description25: General Grod, leader of the Helio Legion, wants a cease-fire. But first, we have to strike the Erazi.

hash.message.aprilpulserack.body: Congratulations, Commander! Your Platinum purchase has been recognized, and we've added a Pulse Rack to your inventory! Use these Pulse Cores to build up your army and gain the advantage in our Level Gain Tournament!

hash.promotion.internationalsectors.august201: The population of international players in Edgeworld is increasing! Our international players are important to us, and we're currently adding new Sectors exclusively for non-English chat. Our new Sectors will be active by the end of August!

hash.missions.grod-s-haven.description: Grod used the spoils of war to build a lavish emergency bunker. He can run the entire Helio military operation from a control room inside. Up for a "black ops" mission, commander?

hash.message.body.20130327forcetournament:
A brand new 5 DAY Total Force Tournament has just begun!
All Force earned through troop training, building, researching, equipment upgrading, General Skill upgrading and PvP will contribute to your leaderboard ranking but that's not all! Force gained from any of these actions in our newest Outpost Caldera-2 will be TRIPLED (x3) throughout the duration!
Make sure to check out our Caldera-2 Wheel Game for your chance to win the schematic!
The top 40 players on each sector will win valuable prizes such as Platinum, Trophies, and other premium items troops!
This Tournament ends on April 1st at 11:00 PM PDT, so get started today. Good luck!
-- Edgeworld Team
hash.message.body.redsleighend: I swear, you try to do ONE marketing promotion, and that schmuck Mallick decides to turn the AA guns on you. This is why he doesn’t get the deals that you do. Ah, well. You know what they say. He knows when you’re sleeping, he knows when you’re awake. He knows if you’ve been bad or good, and he also knows WHETHER or NOT you bothered to lift a finger to protect him while he was in the regeneration tank! If ya did, you’re a real mensch, and you should check your inventory, because I left ya a gift. There it is. Don’t ever let it be said that old Zoot never gave you anything. You know, except for a random item EVERY. FREAKING. DAY. Anyway, when you’re done kicking some poor sod’s teeth in, you should swing by my place. I might have something special for you…or not! You’ll just have to see. Your pal Santa Zoot
hash.items.silverbox.name: Silver Prize Box
hash.not-available-for-instant-build: This building is currently not eligible for instant build
hash.instant-build.update.time: You can only build or upgrade one building at a time.
hash.missions.twice-as-bright.description: We have found a way to improve deadliness of our Pyros by making their own bodies combustible! It lowers their life expectancy to a matter of days, but let?s be frank: you kind of like watching them burn.
hash.campaign.erazi.description40: Be warned, Commander. The Erazi have installed an Incendiary Turret at this Command Center. That'll cost us.

hash.missions.further-resonance-mining.descri: Dance music? No, those are subsonic vibropulses. We're using them to accelerate the crystal mining process. Admittedly, it's got a pretty good beat, until your eardrums burst.

hash.message.body.20121109ceruleansale:
Still haven't built your Level 14 Command Center, Fleet Academy or unlocked all the levels of your Defense Simulator and Engineering Lab? Now is your chance to purchase Cerulean Cores for the low price of 25 Platinum!
There has never been a better time to buy! Make sure to get your cores today before its too late!

hash.missions.the-criminal-erazi.description: After the Galactic Union dissolved, the Erazi went back to their old ways - attacking the bases that won't pay them. Soon, they'll look in our direction.
hash.message.body.tokenspendevent1:
Starting now, spending Platinum within the shop will earn you AMAZING rewards! For every 50 Platinum you spend in the shop between 9:00am PDT and 12:00pm PDT, you will receive:
1 Guaranteed Token Box
This box contains Guaranteed Tokens and now includes the chance to take home the Cerulean Sky Shroud Token 1.0 or 2.0 , the Armor Token 3.0 or Explosive Ammo Token 3.0!!
Limit 10 Boxes per Player, per Sector. Don’t miss this unique opportunity!
hash.outage.08312011.body:
Due to an unplanned maintenance event, Edgeworld was unaccessible for a brief period on Wednesday. We apologize for the interruption in service.

This maintenance may have affected construction and upgrades that started or finished during the maintenance period. We believe that we have resolved a majority of the issues from this incident. If you have any continuing issues, please send our support team a message using the Help buttons above and below the game window.

Thank you for your patience while we continue to upgrade and improve Edgeworld! Please visit our forums for more information as it becomes available.
hash.footprint.unlock: Unlock bigger base at Command Center L.#LEVEL#
hash.campaign.erazi.description50: Scyllith's on the far side of the planet, negotiating with the Helio Legion. Take advantage of her absence.

hash.message.body.20120828platpurchase:
Beginning now until 12:0 PM PDT August 31st, purchase any Platinum package of 1000 Platinum or greater and receive 3 FREE Incendiary Cores AND 3 FREE Modder’s Patches for the brand new Engineering Lab!
Don’t miss your chance at claiming this great offer! Act now and receive this bonus pack valued at over 150 Platinum! This package will be distributed on Friday August 31st.

hash.message.eutournamentshort4.body:
Commander,
a very limited tournament is running! The tournament is available for 3 hours only, from 15:00 to 18:00. The winner of this tournament is truly the strongest Commander among the galaxy!
1st place: 1x Decimator Carrier (80 Decimators!) 2nd - 3rd: 1x Pulse Carrier (80 Pulse Tanks!) 4th - 10th: 300 Disruptors!
-Kira
hash.message.body.20130507forcetournament:
A brand new 3 DAY Building and Engineering Lab Force Tournament has just begun!
All Force earned through Building and Engineering Lab Part Upgrades will contribute to your leaderboard ranking but that's not all! All Force gained from these methods has been TRIPLED(x3) for the duration of the tournament!
The top 10 players on each sector will each qualify for new and increased payouts of valuable prizes in the form of Tournament Prize Boxes, which contain the following:
Platinum Prize Box - Guarantees a Level 16 Black Market Patch, Generals Order, Incineraptor, Synthetic Control Core, or Onyx Core Gold Prize Box - Chance to win a Level 16 Black Market Patch, Generals Order, Incineraptor, Synthetic Control Core, Onyx Core, Hacker's Patch, Vermillion Core, Cerulean Core, or SP 5000 Silver Prize Box - Decreased chance to win prizes from the Platinum and Gold boxes, plus a 30% Troop Accelerator, SP 1000, Incendiary Core, or Decimator Core Bronze Prize Box - Decreased chance to win prizes from Gold and Silver Boxes plus Troops and Speed Ups
Check the in game leaderboard for more details.
This Tournament ends on May 9th at 11:59 PM PDT, so make sure to get started today. Good luck!
-- Edgeworld Team

For a Limited Time only, the following Engineering Lab Enhance Tokens will be discounted by 50% and in the shop for 50 Platinum:
Armor Token Piercing Ammo Token Explosive Ammo Token
Select the desired Engineering Lab Part and select "Enhance" to get started!
hash.missions.offensive-capabilities.descript: I'm told that "Beast Mode" is triggered by the destruction of an allied unit. Which would be heartwarming, if the results weren't so terrifying.

hash.daily.text.20120731levelup:
With the launch of our limited time Double XP event, the Edgeworld team is giving away FREE PLATINUM to our most ambitious players!
Between 1:00 PM PST on July 31st and 5:00 PM PST on August 3rd, the top 10 highest level gaining players will win 500 platinum! The next 15 highest level gaining players will win 200 platinum!
Rankings will be based on the total number of levels gained for each individual player per sector. Levels gained cannot be combined across sectors. Prizes will be distributed by August 8th.

hash.missions.erazi-cell-field.description: The Erazi Cell Field contains vast numbers of Solar Plants. I don't know how they use that energy, but I do know what to research if you take it.
hash.message.body.overlordwinner:
By having the highest Lifetime Force ranking in your sector as of 12:01am on the first day of the month, you have been named the Overlord of the Sector for until the end of the month! In addition to being featured on the Lifetime Force ranking page, a special banner for your Banner Monument has been added to your inventory so that you can show off this accomplishment to your enemies!
Enjoy being Overlord of the Sector this month, and be sure to have the highest Lifetime Force ranking again on the first day of next month to continue your dominance of Cerulea IV!

hash.mod-alpha-message.five-twenty-seven-elev:
Are you looking forward to the long weekend? Between your potlucks and parties, check in with Edgeworld! We're having a barbecue, and there's free stuff, too!

Zoot's Bonus Loot!
This weekend, you can play Zoot's Loot for free every 12 hours, instead of 24! What a generous...alien...thing.

Pyro Cookout!
The Pyros are coming to barbecue some bases! Pyros cost zero resources to train until Tuesday. Bring your marshmallows!

Platinum Markdown!
Our $49 Platinum package is available for $39 this weekend! The same items and Platinum, at a lower price. Stock up and save!

Relax and have fun!
hash.message.body.20121030turretbuildathon:
Upgrade ANY turret to level 10 or higher between now and 11:59pm PST on November 1st for a chance to take home 500 Platinum! 10 Winners will be randomly selected, and payouts will occur shortly after this event has concluded.
Don't forget to take advantage of our current sale, where you can purchase Incendiary Cores for the low price of 15 Platinum!
hash.message.body.20130508fleetrelief:
The Fleet Relief Crate is now available within the shop, containing the following items at a hugely discounted rate:
3x Decimator Racks, 3x 30% Training Accelerators, and 5x Zoot's Tokens for only 199 Platinum!
This crate will only be available for a Limited Time, so stock up now before it's too late.

hash.message.body.superchargeddefenses:
Commander, Our war-engineers have formulated new defensive technology to protect your Base, the Supercharged Defenses! These Supercharged Defenses add extra functionality to your Turrets rendering enemy assaults all but useless.
Supercharged Defenses boost Level 16 and 17 Turrets, giving them even greater damage-dealing power. The first Turrets that will receive this boost are the Heavyweight Turrets. This expanded defensive capability will apply the following combat augmentations:
Level 16 2x Damage to troops 5x Damage to Generals
Level 17 5x Damage to troops 10x Damage to Generals 50% Reduced damage from Generals
Upgrade your Heavyweight Turret now and Supercharge your Defenses!
hash.message.subject.hwtlevel: Supercharge your Heavyweight Turret to win Rare Defense Parts and Tokens!
hash.message.body.20130423spendeventb:
Still need a few extra Synthetic Control Cores to round out your research and increase the power of your current and future Incineraptors? Check out this latest offer!
Purchase one of the following Platinum Packages and receive the following FREE Synthetic Control Core Boxes!
Purchase the 225 Platinum Package and get 20 Synthetic Control Core Mystery Boxes Purchase the 400 Platinum Package and get 40 Synthetic Control Core Mystery Boxes Purchase the 1,000 Platinum Package or greater and get 120 Synthetic Control Core Mystery Boxes!
These new and Improved boxes can net you not only a Synthetic Control Core for your Incineraptors, but also other premium items and troops!
This unique offer starts today and will end at 11:59pm PST on April 24th. The prizes will be distributed onto the server in which Platinum was spent and added to your Inventory within 3 business days of this event's conclusion.
hash.items.mysteryboxpurple.name: Renegade Box
hash.missions.erazi-you-later.description: The Syndicate’s arms trade put a lot of weapons in circulation. Time to return some artillery!

Save some serious Platinum!
Pick up the Decimator Rack for 50% OFF during Platinum Deal Day!
hash.buildings.solarplant.description: Solar Plants convert radiation from Cerulea IV's sun into energy for research and training. Upgrade to increase solar cell capacity and conversion rate.
hash.message.body.turretbuild:
Every player that has 45 Turrets in their main base by 11:59am PST, on Friday 6/8 will be entered to win 500 Platinum and a Cerulean Core! Start building now, and you could win BIG!
10 Lucky winners will be selected and awarded on June 12. All players who have 45 or more Turrets in their main base will be eligible to win. Turrets built prior to the start of the event will also qualify. Players who already have 45 Turrets in their main base have already qualified for the event.
hash.message.body.juneceruleanspend:
Right now, use your Platinum to try to win the Turret Challenge, and collect Cerulean Cores
From 12:00pm PST on Tuesday, June 5th to 12:00pm PST on Wednesday, June 6th you can receive FREE Cerulean Cores just for spending Platinum!
Spend 500 to 999 Platinum to receive 1 FREE Cerulean Core!
Spend 1000 to 1999 Platinum to receive 2 FREE Cerulean Cores!
Spend 2000 or more Platinum to receive 4 FREE Cerulean Cores!!
You can collect Cores on as many Sectors as you spend Platinum on!
Please note that the Cerulean Cores will be paid out to the Sector in which the Platinum was spent, and each Sector will be counted individually for Platinum Spent, so you cannot combine Spend across multiple Sectors.

hash.message.body.20130629tieredspend:
For a Limited Time, spend Platinum on your Base and Troops to receive AMAZING rewards!
Spend 250 Platinum to receive 1 Incineraptor, our most EXCLUSIVE and POWERFUL troop Spend 500 Platinum to receive 1 Renegade Crate in addition to the above tier (1 Incineraptor) Spend 1000 Platinum to receive 1 Black Market Patch in addition to the above tiers (1 Incineraptor, 1 Renegade Crate) Spend 1500 Platinum to receive 1 General's Crate in addition to the above tiers! (1 Incineraptor, 1 Renegade Crate, and 1 Black Market Patch)
Each Player can qualify for all of these tiers a maximum of 3 Times, so spend 4500 to receive the maximum payout!
This is an offer you can't refuse! The deadline is at 11:59pm PDT on June 30th, so make sure to take advantage before it's too late. Prizes will be delivered within 3 business days of this event's conclusion.

hash.message.body.sectorlvl163end:

G.Montgomery

hash.missions.adrenal-targeting.description: Hidden Cerulean code within the Control Devices has shown our lab how to synthesize an "attack pheromone." We can spray it on priority targets and watch the carnage unfold.
hash.daily.title.antigeneralmysterybox: Anti-General Mystery Box Now on Sale!
hash.daily.text.20130217purchaseevent: Purchase Platinum Packages and qualify to receive FREE Mystery Boxes! Check your mail for more details.

hash.ew.upgrade.cc.build.more: Upgrade Command Center to build more.
hash.fte.panels.platinum.items.label: Some of the items you can find in the store are:
hash.items.warpboost60.description: Increases warp gate capacity by 20 spaces for 60 minutes.
hash.missions.fully-upgrade-pyro.name: Fully Upgrade Pyro
hash.missions.snipertower5.description: The Specter's have taken a keen interest in this turret. Make a few improvements and you can count on a few of them to join your ranks.
hash.missions.lattice-core.name: Lattice Core
hash.missions.the-call-of-cerulea.description: The loons in the Tech Lab have gone completely mad. One says that they're the Morlocks and you're the leader of the Eloi. Another is sharpening a stick, and says that you're Piggy, and sucks to your ass-mar. I believe this has something to do with the research into non-Euclidian geometry they've been conducting. Whatever the case, just remain here for the next couple of hours.
hash.daily.text.20130513blastshield: Buy a Cerulean Blast Shield Box for your chance to win this new Smart Part!
hash.missions.train-pyro-squad.name: Train Pyro Squad
hash.campaign.erazi.hint80: Try clearing out turrets with long ranges first, and save room for a Specter for the perfect finish!
hash.items.warpboost5.name: 5-Min Warp Boost
hash.missions.x-1-biological.objectives: Upgrade an X-1 Cannon to level 6
hash.missions.maar-mining-base.objectives: Destroy the Command Center in a Level 1 Confederate base.
hash.missions.gas-giant-1.objectives: Increase Gas Production to 700 per hour
hash.daily.text.flamecontest: Upgrade your Incendiary Turrets for a chance to win a Master's Kit! Rules and prizes in your mail!
hash.items.generalsbox.description: Open this box for a chance to win a Generals SP 5,000. Also contains Generals SP 1,000 and 100
hash.daily.text.intromines: Blow your enemies away with these consumable defenses! Details in your mail!
hash.daily.text.mysteryboxflashsales: Check the Featured Tab all day long for SHOCKING Sales on Mystery Boxes!
hash.message.subject.20130208buildathonremind: Defense Sim, Lab, and Gate Build-a-thon!
hash.items.calderasilver.description: 1x Caldera-2 Schematics 3x Cerulean Cores 10x 15-Min Accelerators 5x 1-Hour Accelerators 3x 2.5-Hour Accelerators 1x 8-Hour Accelerators 1x Elite Weapons Box 1x Decimator Rack
hash.missions.gas-in-your-pocket.description: Gas production is up 500%, in no small part due to the fact that we accidentally drilled into a gas pocket so heavily pressurized that our workers had no choice but to extract it all in a matter of minutes or we'd all be blown to smithereens. I didn't mention it before because I didn't want to alarm you.
hash.research.decimator.description: Fire-breathing monstrosities that reduce even the strongest bases to cinders.
hash.items.explosiveammotoken3.tooltip: Apply to an Engineering Lab part and receive a large scaling Splash Radius Boost permanently!
hash.buildings.x1cannon.description: X-1 Cannons fire short-range missiles that inflict both direct and splash damage - effective against groups of fragile units. Upgrade to increase damage, splash damage, and health.
hash.daily.text.fixforjosh-text: Let's race to the top! Best pals!
hash.missions.all-out-of-gum.description: Push your Marines to be their best, and you’ll have the most elite warriors in the galaxy.
hash.missions.g-forces.description: I trust you received the Tech Lab memo: "We're Making Gravity Rifles Suck Even Harder!". They're scientists, not PR people.
hash.ai.commandthreat.description: This Smart AI enables turrets to target any units which are damaging the Command Center
hash.items.dutchflag.description: Dutch Flag to equip to Banner Monument
hash.message.subject.20130807forcetournamentr: 3x Building and Training Force Tournament – Last Day!
hash.message.body.20130521forcetournament:
A brand new 3 DAY Force Tournament has just begun!
All Force earned through troop training, building, researching, equipment upgrading, and General Skill upgrading will contribute to your Tournament AND Leaderboard rankings! In addition, Force Points gained by upgrading your General through the use of SP or Generals Orders will be QUADRUPLED(x4) for the duration of the tournament!
The top 10 players on each sector will each qualify for Tournament Prize Boxes, which contain the following:
Platinum Prize Box - Guarantees a Level 16 Black Market Patch, Generals Order, Incineraptor, Synthetic Control Core, or Onyx Core Gold Prize Box - Chance to win a Level 16 Black Market Patch, Generals Order, Incineraptor, Synthetic Control Core, Onyx Core, Hacker's Patch, Vermillion Core, Cerulean Core, or SP 5000 Silver Prize Box - Decreased chance to win prizes from the Platinum and Gold boxes, plus a 30% Troop Accelerator, SP 1000, Incendiary Core, or Decimator Core Bronze Prize Box - Decreased chance to win prizes from Gold and Silver Boxes plus Troops and Speed Ups
The next 10 players in each sector will receive a variety of great prizes as well! Check the in game leaderboard for more details.
This Tournament ends on May 23rd at 11:59 PM PDT, so be sure to get started today. Good luck!
-- Edgeworld Team
hash.missions.tectonic-shift.description: Roughly 70% of this planet's natural gas was believed to be 'unrecoverable.' However, with geothermal detonators, we can drop that number. Of course, it's possible that we'll trigger a tectonic plate shift in the process. So there's that.
hash.items.sppmysterybox.description: Open for your chance to win a General's Sp Rack or other Sp items!
hash.missions.train-hover-bikes.name: train-hover-bikes
hash.missions.dark-alliance.description: We've intercepted disturbing chatter about a Confederacy alliance with the Legion. We need to cripple Malick before he can make any deals.
hash.missions.spare-raid.description: A squad of Raiders can empty an enemy's resources quicker than you can harvest your own.
hash.daily.body.20130207lockedboxes: New boxes are dropping from the Defense Sim! make sure to check them out today for a chance at premium loot!
hash.items.max5accelerator.description: Shorten Building, Research, Warp Gate or Training time by 5 minutes.
hash.message.body.20130627zootsjackpotreminde:
Today is the last day to take advantage of our New and Improved Zoot's Jackpot!
Try this new and Improved Zoot's Jackpot today for a chance to take home a newly released Frozen Token as well as other highly sought after premium items like Ruby Cores, General's Orders, Hacker's Patches and more! Each play also could net you the Jackpot, which can range from hundreds to even possibly thousands of Platinum!
Click on the "Z" icon next to your Mailbox to check out Zoot's Jackpot today! This event will only be available until 11:59pm PDT on June 30th so don't delay! Take advantage today before someone else wins big!
hash.missions.research-specter.description: The Maar Confederacy has a network of special operatives. They even told us how to train them! Well, not really "told". I stole the documents from their servers.
hash.missions.sound-the-hornet.name: Sound the Hornet
hash.missions.stinger-missiles.description: Using the same micro-turbine technology that helps Raider jet packs, we have been able to use Scarbide metal to improve the delivery system for the Hornets’ “stingers”.
hash.missions.join-alliance.name: Join Alliance
hash.units.chimera.description: Elite ranged artillery units that range devastation from afar
hash.missions.arms-race.name: Arms Race
hash.missions.snipertower9.name: Sniper Turret Upgrade 3
hash.message.body.20120221troopsteroidsremind: Today is the last day to take advantage of our increased troop training limit of 1000 days! Make sure to queue these trainings up before 5:00pm PST tonight (Feb 22nd) and get the most out of your Training Accelerators before its too late!
hash.missions.mutant-fun-club-1.name: Mutant Fun Club 1
hash.message.aprillevels.body: You have received 500 Platinum and an Hour of Power Crate in our Level Gain Rush! Congratulations on gaining so much experience and levels!
hash.daily.text.aurora1sale: For a limited time only, all Aurora-1 items are on sale-- up to 65% off!
hash.missions.supply-line.description: The new compression algorithms will facilitate a significant increase in energy storage capacity, which will in turn clear space for other resources. The odds of space/time shearing are incredibly low. I say we go for it.
hash.message.body.newui:
The updated User Interface is now available in all Sectors!
If you don't see the new UI, simply refresh your game, and enjoy!
hash.daily.text.smartpartsellout: We're clearing out our Smart Part inventory and need your help!
hash.missions.capacity-increased.name: Capacity Increased
hash.missions.squad-training.description: Marines were the backbone of Galactic Union forces in the war against the Ceruleans. The Ceruleans are gone, but Marines still fight.
hash.missions.twice-as-bright.name: Twice as Bright
hash.research.hornet.description: Armored gunships equipped with pulse cannons that sting its targets.
hash.buildings.shieldgenerator.description: The Shield Generator boosts the defenses of all your bases by increasing the health of all buildings and damage output of defensive turrets when active.
hash.message.body.20130404turretcontrol:
Many users have already enjoyed the benefits of expanding their bases to the new Colony of Caldera-2, but we're not finished with it yet! Today, player will now be able to construct the new "Turret Control" building within their Caldera-2 Outpost!
What does this building do you may ask?
The Turret Control Building will allow you to research upgrades for your Turrets located across all of your Colonies and Bases! With this new building and research, every turret you upgrade will boost the Damage and Health of all your others of the same type! Make sure to visit your Caldera-2 and build yours today for more details.
hash.missions.mighty-mouse.objectives: Destroy the Command Center of a player 10 levels above you
hash.items.fieryextendedliquidcoolant.name: Fiery Extended Liquid Coolant
hash.message.body.generalsspsale: For a limited time only, Generals SP 5000 is on sale for the low price of 50 Platinum! Stock up today and level up your General’s Skills!
hash.items.tokenskyshroud2.tooltip: Apply to an Engineering Lab part and receive a moderate scaling Battle Cruiser Defense!
hash.message.body.buy2000platinum: Right now, from 12:00pm PST on July 5th to 12:00pm PST on July 6th you can receive FREE Accelerator Boxes just for spending Platinum! For every 1,000 Platinum spent in the Edgeworld store, you will receive 5 free Accelerator Boxes! Each Accelerator Box contains the chance to win a powerful Accelerator of up to 14 days. Please note that the Acceleratot Boxes will be paid out to the Sector in which the Platinum was spent. Each Sector will be counted individually for Platinum Spent, therefore you cannot combine spend across multiple Sectors.
hash.units.thor.name: Devastator
hash.ew.alliance.leave.ldr: Are you sure that you want to leave your alliance? You are the leader and this action cannot be undone.
hash.missions.mutent-phunn-klub-4.objectives: Increase Uranium Production to 80,000 per hour.
hash.daily.text.maximumforcemb: Get Phenomenal amounts of Premium Troops! Click here for more info!
hash.missions.research-pulse-tank.description: Pulse Tanks absorb reactor energy from destroyed structures and use it to transform, gaining 50% more damage and a wide-area attack that disables turrets.
hash.fte.faction.outro: Pathetic human, you didn't really think I would send a real army did you? Be warned, I will be back and next time I won't be as forgiving.
hash.missions.harms-race.description: One Shrike is terrifying enough. Ten Shrikes and you've assembled a squad of flying guillotines.

hash.research-defense.pulsetank.description: Research to reduce the damage Pulse Tanks do when attacking your base and colony.
hash.missions.x-1-biological.description: We can add a bio-warfare element to our X-1 missile turrets, increasing damage at the cost of lowered galactic opinion. As an A.I., I can live with that.

The top 10 players on each sector will each qualify for new and increased payouts of valuable prizes in the form of Tournament Prize Boxes, which contain the following:

hash.campaign.helio.hint100: Turrets in circle formations are brutal. Use of rapid-fire and long range troops will be essential!

hash.items.pulsecore.description: Hunks of Cerulean circuitry, they hold the secrets to building and improving Pulse Tanks.
hash.daily.text.incendiaryspend: - with every Platinum Purchase over 1000 Platinum! Earn up to 8 free cores! Details in your mail.
Commander, I have received a message about a special event this weekend. Message follows:

Edgeworld needs your feedback! One player who reviews Edgeworld this weekend will win 150 Platinum!

Here’s what you need to do:

1) Visit the Edgeworld Fan Page. Click “Fan Page” at the top of the Edgeworld window, or visit http://www.facebook.com/Edgeworld

2) Click “Like” at the top of the page. You’ll now receive instant notifications about Edgeworld updates and features!

3) Click “Reviews” on the left side of the page.

4) Give us your review, and you’re automatically entered to win 150 Platinum!

We will award the Platinum prize to one player on Monday. We hope you’ll give us a five-star review! Good luck!

(If you’ve already reviewed Edgeworld, you’re already entered to win!)
hash.missions.daily-resource-donation-crystal:
Admiral Tenmu is hoping you can support him by giving him #AMOUNT# Crystal.
TIP: This is a one-time donation and the mission is only claimable if you have banked enough Crystal.
hash.message.marchtrainingdisruptorwinner.bod: Your disruptor army is enormous and terrifying! We've granted you a Master's Kit in recognition of your military expansion! You can find this new item in your inventory.
hash.message.chimerawin.body:
Congratulations, Commander. You've got the most Chimera Boots on the ground in your Sector!
To keep the momentum going, we've sent you five 30% Troop Accelerators.
Now get out there and put those Troops to good use!
hash.items.xpnanos1.name: 5-Min 8x XP Boost
hash.message.pvpassaultwinner.subject: PvP Assault Winner!
hash.message.123downtimec12update.subject: 1/23 Maintenance: 30 Minute Warning!
hash.activerecord.errors.models.store-purchas: You already have this permanent boost! Put it to work on your enemies!
hash.missions.train-titan-troop.description: Enemy gun emplacements are about to get a lot less intimidating, Commander. Titans shrug off Concussion Turret rounds and keep moving.
hash.message.body.20130214constructor:
The New "Constructor" building manufactures advanced construction nanos to reduce the build times for your other structures!
Up to 2 of these buildings can constructed and upgraded, with each building and level further decreasing the overall build times for the rest of your base.
Make sure to check these new buildings out and see the impact for yourself today!
hash.message.body.maycarriersale:
: From now until noon PST May 24, 2012 Purchase any Platinum Package of 1000 Platinum or larger and receive five FREE Mystery Carriers.
Mystery Carriers can contain 3000 Marines, one Pulse Tank, four Pulse Tanks, or even 80 PULSE TANKS!
Payouts will happen at 6pm, midnight, and noon for fast delivery!
Get your Platinum now and DOMINATE the Tournament Maps!
hash.missions.a-flurry-of-attacks-6.descripti: When it comes to warfare on Cerulea IV, the size of your army can certainly make a difference. Overwhelming the enemy should not be ruled out as a condition for victory.

hash.message.body.20130620forcetournamentremi:
Today is the Last Day to Participate in our latest General and Research Force Tournament!
All Force earned through troop training, building, researching, equipment upgrading, and General Skill upgrading will contribute to your Tournament AND Leaderboard rankings but that's not all! In addition, General SP and GO upgrades as well as Research Force gain will be TRIPLED(x3) for the duration of the tournament!
The top 10 players on each sector will each qualify for Tournament Prize Boxes, which contain the following:
Platinum Prize Box - Guarantees a Level 16 Black Market Patch, Generals Order, Incineraptor, Synthetic Control Core, or Onyx Core Gold Prize Box - Chance to win a Level 16 Black Market Patch, Generals Order, Incineraptor, Synthetic Control Core, Onyx Core, Hacker's Patch, Vermillion Core, Cerulean Core, or SP 5000 Silver Prize Box - Decreased chance to win prizes from the Platinum and Gold boxes, plus a 30% Troop Accelerator, SP 1000, Incendiary Core, or Decimator Core Bronze Prize Box - Decreased chance to win prizes from Gold and Silver Boxes plus Troops and Speed Ups
The next 10 players in each sector will receive a variety of great prizes as well! Check the in game leaderboard for more details.
In addition to these overall prizes, Daily Prizes are now available for the top 3 players an a given day as well as Achievement Prizes once you pass certain Force Thresholds! Check the in game leaderboard for more details.
This Tournament ends tonight at 11:00 PM PDT, Good luck!
-- Edgeworld Team

hash.items.tokenarmor2.description: Applies a moderate scaling Health Boost permanently to an Engineering Lab Part!
hash.missions.warp-drive.description:
Your warp gate level determines how many troops you can send into battle at one time. If we really want to dominate, I suggest we upgrade it immediately.

Select your WARP GATE.
Click UPGRADE.
Click UPGRADE again.
hash.units.shrike.description: Light, fast vehicles driven by marines and equipped with laser cannons.
hash.message.body.20130610pax50buy:
For a Limited Time only, every three 30% Training Accelerators you purchase will qualify you to receive one free previously unreleased 50% Training Accelerator!
The 50% Accelerator will reduce the time of any training by 50%, so make sure to stock up today while supplies last!
This event will end at 11:59pm PDT on June 12th, so make sure to purchase your 30% Accelerators before the deadline to qualify.

hash.message.body.20130710forcetournamentremi:
Today is the Last Day to Participate in our latest Training and Research Force Tournament!
All Force earned through troop training, building, researching, equipment upgrading, and General Skill upgrading will contribute to your Tournament AND Leaderboard rankings but that's not all! In addition, Training and Research Force Points will be TRIPLED(x3) for the duration of the tournament!
The top 40 players on each sector will each qualify for Prizes, the most ever from any Force Tournament!
Items such as Ruby Cores, Black Market Patches, Generals Orders and other building Cores can be won but that's not all! We will also be giving out the brand new 3.0 Enhancement Tokens, offering exponentially greater benefits when attached to your Engineering Lab Parts! Make sure to check the Tournament Leaderboard in game for an exact breakdown on the new prize structure.
In addition to these overall prizes, Daily Prizes will be available for the top 3 players in a given day as well as Achievement Prizes that can be warned once you pass certain Force Thresholds! Check the in game leaderboard for this breakdown as well.
This Tournament ends tonight at 11:00 PM PDT, Good luck!
-- Edgeworld Team

hash.message.levelnine.body:
After analyzing tens of thousands of battle reports, KIRA has discovered new techniques to make your buildings and units even more effective!

Upgrade your buildings to level 9, and use your Tech Lab to research level 9 units. Level 9 means more Warp Capacity, more power, more health, more resources...more of everything!

Level 9 will be available very soon! Start gathering your resources now! Level 9 takes a lot to build, but it's worth it!

And be sure to thank KIRA for her hard work!
hash.ew.sec.desc: Each sector in Edgeworld is a distinct game world. You can share only Platinum between sectors - buildings, research, resources, units and other game progress cannot be transferred or shared between Sectors. You may play on as many sectors as you wish!
hash.missions.erazi-weapons-lab.name: Erazi Weapons Lab
hash.missions.crush-the-enemy.description: The troop capacity has been increased significantly, Commander. Your enemies will be obliterated by the legion that you've assembled. Just remember: with great power comes great opportunity for carnage without mercy.
hash.missions.gun-turret-expansion.descriptio:
Defending your base is important, Commander. Build more gun turrets and place them strategically to protect your base from enemy factions.

Click BUILD.
Select the DEFENSE tab.
Select the GUN TURRET.
Click BUILD.
hash.missions.bulk-regimen.name: Bulk Regimen
hash.missions.tungsten-refit.description: It'll take over 20 tons of tungsten carbide to refit our Titan armor. We could trade that same amount of metal for a small moon.
hash.missions.project-x-spiders.name: Project X: Lancer
