hash.message.body.20130118generalskillupevent:
Today is your last chance to participate in our latest event!
From now until 11:59pm PST tonight (January 23rd), all players who get upgrade one of their General's skills to Level 5 or higher will be entered for a chance to take home a General Sp Rack containing 30,000 SP for free!
5 Players who fulfill the requirements will also be chosen at random and be declared the winners! the conclusion of this event!

hash.message.body.20130531decimatordefensecor:
For this weekend only, we will be removing the Decimator Core Requirement needed for it's defensive Research! Make sure and take advantage of this event and increase your resilience towards Decimators before the next wave of enemies attack your base!
Visit your Defense Lab on your Main Base for more details, and begin your Decimator Defensive Research Today!
hash.missions.secret-ruin-base.description: The Erazi are secretly funding an elite military expedition into some ruins. It must be related to the Cerulean disappearence. Whatever they find, it's better off in our hands.

hash.missions.cerulean-automation.description: We've unlocked the secret to Cerulean manufacturing automatons. As an A.I., I'm outraged at how many of our own robots this will put out of work.
hash.items.teslaflag.description: Tesla Tower Flag to equip to Flag Monument
hash.message.body.20130327forcesystemupdate:
Version 2.0 of the Edgeworld Force Tournament System is now live and Lifetime Force will be continuously calculated for player actions even when Tournaments are not running.
Upgrading Buildings, upgrading Research, Spawning Troops, Upgrading Equipment, Upgrading General's Skills and PvP will now always award players with Lifetime Force.
Tournament scores will continue to only record select categories of Force depending on the Tournament Type. For example Buildings and Research Tournaments will only consider and calculate scores from Buildings and Research Force; Troop Training and Equipment Tournaments will only consider and calculate scores from Training and upgrading Equipment.
Retroactive Total Lifetime Force scores are now in process of calculation and an update will be provided when Total Lifetime Force scores for all players has been completed.
Thank you so much players for your continued support of Edgeworld!
hash.items.gas1m.name: 1,000,000 Gas
hash.daily.text.20130516troopresearchcorebox: Buy this Troop Research Core Box for a significantly improved chance to win Synthetic Control Cores and Onyx Cores!
hash.research.brawler.name: Berserker
hash.missions.battle-screech.description: Insectoid noises aren't random; it turns out there's a rhyme and reason to their screeches. We can use this to our advantage, but you might want to invest in some earplugs.

hash.message.body.20120726turrets:
With the new Level 13 Command Center, use your expanded base to build even more powerful turrets! From now until 12:00pm PDT on July 30th, build up your turret defenses for a chance to win Cerulean Racks!
All players who have at least the following number of turrets (base + Aurora 1) at event end will be entered to win a Cerulean Rack:
Incendiary Turrets - 21+ Sniper Turrets - 13+ Heavyweight Turrets - 13+
A total of 25 lucky winners from each turret type will be chosen. Additionally, 1 very lucky winner will be chosen from each turret type to win an Annihilator Crate, a 4,999 platinum item!
Prizes will be awarded by August 2nd, 2012.
Good luck, Commander!
hash.message.body.spendevent100813bonus:
We’ve added a BONUS TIER to today’s spend event!
Spend 500 Platinum in the Shop on October 8th between 12:00am PDT and 11:59pm and receive 1 Level 10 Vermillion Advanced Targeting Smart Part!
Limit 1 Per Player, Per Sector. This Prize will be paid out by October 10th, 2013.

hash.missions.pep-in-your-step.description:
While we couldn't use the Cerulean Core to directly upgrade the factory, we ground it up and added it the sentient Factory Workers’ coffee.
Now they work 15 hour shifts! I foresee no negative consequences for this! None at all.
hash.message.marchflamebogo.body:
Buy one Incendiary Core, get one FREE!
Maximize your defenses! Incendiary Turrets deal massive damage AND burn attacking units until they're gone! Stock up on Incendiary Cores this weekend, and we'll double them!
You'll receive a bonus Core for every Incendiary Core you purchase, now through midnight 3/25 PST (7am 3/26 UTC).
Bonus Cores will be granted after 3/26.

hash.missions.solar-flair-3.description: Free sunlight spilling everywhere, and all it's doing is keeping this desert parched.
hash.message.body.20130807forcetournamentremi:
Today is the Last Day to Participate in our latest Building and Training Tournament!
All Force earned through troop training, building, researching, equipment upgrading, and General Skill upgrading will contribute to your Tournament AND Leaderboard rankings but that's not all! In addition, Building and Training Force Points will be TRIPLED (x3) for the duration of the tournament!
The top 40 players on each sector will each qualify for Prizes, the most ever from any Force Tournament!
Items such as Ruby Cores, Black Market Patches, Generals Orders and other building Cores can be won but that's not all! We will also be giving out a box to the top players in each sector that is GUARANTEED to include Cerulean Alloys, Fireproof Shield Tokens or Hacker's Patches! The Fireproof Shield Tokens protect your turrets against damage from Bomba units! Make sure to check the Tournament Leaderboard in game for an exact breakdown on the new prize structure.
In addition to these overall prizes, Daily Prizes will be available for the top 3 players in a given day as well as Achievement Prizes that can be warned once you pass certain Force Thresholds! Check the in game leaderboard for this breakdown as well.
This Tournament ends tonight at 11:00 PM PST, Good luck!
-- Edgeworld Team

hash.message.body.20130412zootsjackpot:
Zoot's Jackpot has been adjusted to give you the best chance ever of getting an amazing reward!
Play today for a chance to win items such as Black Market Patch #16, Hacker's Patches, Builders Boxes, Vermillion Cores, Decimation Racks and more! Each play you make could also net you the Jackpot, which grows with every play!
Click on the "Z" icon next to your Mailbox to check out Zoot's Jackpot today! This event will only be available for a limited time so don't delay!
hash.message.body.20121211activeskills:
General Strom’s exo-armor has undergone a major upgrade and has two new powers at his disposal: Teleport and Ballistic Missiles. Armed with these two active skills, he is an even stronger force to reckon with!

The Teleport skill allows the General to instantly move to a new location on the enemy base. Once Teleport reaches level 10+, this skill can be charged to teleport not only the General, but also the troops around him!

Ballistic Missile allows you call in air support for the General, damaging all builds in a radius around Strom. When Ballistic Missile is level 10+, this skill can be charged to increase the size of the area of damage.

To unlock these skills, simply collect Skill Points from PvP attacks and spend them in the General’s Quarters on your base!
hash.itemupsell.namechange.title: Identity Theft
hash.message.body.20121204wheelgame:
Play Kira’s Wheel Game for a chance to win an exclusive mystery box: Elite Weapons Box!
Each Elite Weapons Box contains ONE brand new Engineering Lab part. These parts affect up to three attributes, such as the BURST FIERY DUAL BARRELS which affects rate of fire, multiple targets AND splash damage! There are a total of 40 parts in this box, and each one is a winner. Try your luck today!
These new parts will not drop from the Defense Simulator, and are only available from the Wheel Game. Hurry, the Wheel Game ends on Thursday, December 6th PST.

A level 11 Command Center in your Aurora-1 Colony allows you to start construction on your second Warp Gate.
Build and upgrade your second Warp Gate by Monday, May 14 to win!
You'll receive these items for your second Warp Gate:
Level 7: 1-Hour Accelerator
Level 8: 2.5-Hour Accelerator
Level 9: 8-Hour Accelerator
Level 10: 15-Hour Accelerator
Level 11: 1-Day Accelerator
Upgrades must be completed by noon PST May 14. Upgrade fast for maximum warp power!

hash.message.beginnersaleextra.body:
Welcome to Cerulea IV, Commander!
During your first week in Edgeworld, you have access to a special, beginner's discount on Platinum packages.

We're adding some extra items to that discount:

The 155 Platinum Package is now 25% off!

Also for new Commanders only, the 400 Platinum Package is 20% off and comes with an extra FREE KIRA'S GIFT!

KIRA's Gift is one of our highest-value and most desired mystery crates, granting you a random high-value item when opened.

These special offers are only good for 7 days from the date you first started playing Edgeworld. Act now and click 'Get Platinum' to make sure you don't miss out on big discounts and powerful items!

hash.message.level7gift.body:
While your fellow Commanders are racing to catch up to you and take advantage of our reduced building costs to upgrade their bases to level 7 and beyond, the Edgeworld team wants to acknowledge your achievement: you're already there!

Please accept this gift as recognition of your dedication and skill in Edgeworld.

We've granted you one or more 2.5-Hour Speedups, based on the overall progress of your base and Colony.

Use these items to take your base even further!

hash.message.body.20130813turretevent:
Win Rare Parts and Tokens for upgrading your Gun Turrets!
With the current 50% reduction in Gun Turret build times, now is your chance to earn Prizes by Leveling up your Gun Turrets!
Starting now, for each Gun Turret upgraded to Level 15, you will win a Turret Defense Prize Box that guarantees you one of the following items: a Level 1, 5 or 15 Cerulean Blast Shield, a Level 1, 5 or 15 Cerulean Meteoric Shield, or 1.0 and 2.0 Tokens! Limit 5 boxes per player.
For each Gun Turret upgraded to Level 17, you will earn one entry into a Platinum Sweepstakes!
10 Lucky Players will win 100 Platinum each! 3 Really Lucky players will win 500 Platinum each!
This event ends on August 14th, 2013 at 12:00pm PDT. Prizes will be awarded within 3 business days of the end of this event.

Vermillion Cores are on sale for the LOW PRICE of only 50 Platinum!
There has never been a better time to stock up on Vermillion Cores to complete your Level 15 and 16 builds! This is the lowest price Vermillion Cores have ever been, so make sure to take advantage before it's too late!
hash.message.body.ceruleanskyshroud:
The Cerulean Sky Shroud Mystery Box is now available in the shop for a limited time! The Cerulean Sky Shroud Smart Part increases your defenses against Battlecruisers when equipped! Don’t miss out, this New and Improved Box (Best Odds Ever) will only be available for purchase for a limited time!
This Mystery Box contains one of the following:
Level 5, Level 10 or Level 15 Sky Shroud part Hacker's Patch Sky Shroud Token 1.0 or 2.0 Accelerators
Pick up your Cerulean Sky Shroud Parts and Tokens today!

hash.message.body.20130617buyevent:
Want to get your hands on Edgeworld's fastest accelerators? Purchase Platinum today and receive FREE 99% Building Accelerators!
Simply purchase one of the following Platinum Packages before the deadline to qualify for your FREE Accelerators!
Buy the 225 Platinum Pack and get one 24-Hour Accelerators! Buy the 400 Platinum Pack and get one 99% Building Accelerator! Buy the 1000 Platinum Pack or greater and get THREE 99% Building Accelerators!
This unique offer starts today (June 17th) and will end at 11:59pm PDT on June 18th. You will only receive the Accelerators for the largest Platinum purchase made between these times. The prizes will be distributed onto the server in which Platinum was purchased and added to your Inventory within 3 business days of this event's conclusion!

Starting now, until 11:59 PM PDT September 9th, make any purchase of 65 Platinum or more from the store and receive 10 FREE Incendiary Cores, a 250 Platinum Value!

Ends: December 17, 2012 @ 11:59pm PST (7:59am UTC)

hash.message.body.20120913labtime:
For a limited time only, Engineering Lab upgrade times have been reduced by 95%! If you haven't uncovered the secrets of this building, there has never been a better time to check it out!
The Engineering Lab allows you to attach "parts" to your turrets which will greatly increase their power! Take advantage of this opportunity to upgrade your lab to max so you can improve the effectiveness of your base defenses!

There is a new Force Tournament starting today with AMAZING prizes! It will last for 4 DAYS and provide you with a 3x boost to Training and Building!
All Force earned through troop training, building, researching, equipment upgrading, and General Skill upgrading will contribute to your Tournament AND Leaderboard rankings but that's not all! In addition, Training and Building Force Points will be TRIPLED (x3) for the duration of the tournament!
The top 40 players on each sector will each qualify for Prizes, the most ever from any Force Tournament!
Items such as Ruby Cores, Black Market Patches, Generals Orders and other building Cores can be won but that's not all! We will also be giving out the Grand Prize Box from the last Wheel Game event that may contain Cerulean Alloys or new Fireproof Shield Tokens that protect your turrets against damage from Bomba units! Make sure to check the Tournament Leaderboard in game for an exact breakdown on the new prize structure.
In addition to these overall prizes, Daily Prizes will be available for the top 3 players in a given day as well as Achievement Prizes that can be warned once you pass certain Force Thresholds! Check the in game leaderboard for this breakdown as well.
This Tournament ends on July 29th at 11:00 PM PST, so be sure to get started today. Good luck!

hash.items.flag19.name: Banner Design #19
hash.message.20120803purchase5pd.body: Thank you for participating in our recent Platinum Purchase event. Pulse Destroyers have been added to your inventory.
hash.missions.creative-solutions.description: While we couldn’t think of a way to upgrade the Lancers themselves, we managed to make long, pointy sticks out of Scarbide to jab the Lancers while they’re in their cages. This enrages them, enhancing their combat performance. Simple. Effective.
hash.message.body.a12ndgatecontest:
Upgrade your Aurora-1 Command Center to 11, and build your second Warp Gate! Double your attacks!
You can earn free speedups by upgrading your new Warp Gate to level 7 or higher by Monday, May 14!
Bonus contest: Win 1000 Platinum!
As an extra gift to dedicated players, we're randomly choosing 5 players who upgrade their Aurora-1 second Warp Gate to 11, and sending them 1000 Platinum!
Upgrade your new Aurora-1 Warp Gate to 11 by noon PST on May 14 for your chance to win!
To aid your upgrading, for the duration of the event the Aurora-1 Schematic will be available for the reduced price of 199 Platinum and 8-Hour Accelerators at the reduced price of 29 Platinum.
hash.missions.legion-lodge.name: The Legion's War
hash.items.powerhour.name: Hour of Power Crate
hash.missions.warriors-way.description: We've found out what makes the Helio warriors so ferocious. They welcome death in battle, believing in a place of reward after death. While I don?t suggest letting the soldiers believe such silly things, we can artificially simulate this ferocity.
hash.missions.hornet-upgrades.description: Augmenting the Hornet's propulsion system and reverse thrusters will improve its maneuverability. Extending the range of its cannons will improve its lethality. I say we do both.
hash.message.body.memorialxp:
The Player in each Sector that gains the most levels between now until Monday, May 28th at 3:00pm PST will win 1000 Platinum! Five random players throughout the game who gain at least one level will also win 1000 Platinum!
In addition to attacking, you can gain XP by training troops and using troops to reinforce nodes on the Maps. Use your troops to get a leg up on the next Tournament!
To help you win the competition, All XP Boosts and Troop Accelerators are 25% off, and the 1 Million Uranium item is available for the low price of 5 Platinum. That’s a savings of 95%!!!
Conquer the Maps! Conquer your Rivals! Conquer your Sector, and win!
hash.message.body.resourceconverter:
Have too much of one type of resource? Short on another? No Problem!
Build the Resource converter and you can turn one type of resource into another as often as you like! Upgrade to be able to convert more resources at a time!
The Resource Converter is now available on both the HQ, and Aurora-1!
Master your supplies! Build the Resource Converter today!
hash.missions.nano-mining.description: We've programmed these crystal-harvesting nanites not to replicate more than necessary, so there's virtually no chance that they'll overrun our Command Center.
hash.items.tokenpiercingammo3.description: Applies a large scaling Damage Boost permanently to an Engineering Lab Part!
hash.message.body.vermillionarmorrelease:
Harnessing the power of the Vermillion Core, we have discovered a whole new class of Engineering Lab Parts!
The Vermillion Armor is a Smart Part that will give your Turrets an ultra powered defense when equipped.
The Vermillion Armor starts with twice the health and 8X the damage of the Cerulean Armor and uses the same patches to upgrade as its Cerulean counterparts. The VA gives your turrets super-powered Armor, Ultra Ammo Piercing and its Damage AI will target the highest powered troops first!
The war for Cerulea IV is spiralling out of control. Stay tuned for ways to acquire this new technology and rule the skies!
hash.items.mysterybox38.description: Contains a Level 15 Vermillion Advanced Targeting Smart Part!
hash.missions.reactive-plasma.description: Gun Turrets melt at 5168 degrees. Pyro plasma heats a target to 10,000 degrees. I'm sure you don't need an A.I. to do that math.
hash.missions.project-x-staging.objectives: Upgrade a Staging Area to Level 10
hash.message.pvpassaultwinner.body:
Congratulations, Commander! As you approach the Cerulean obelisks, they acknowledge your strength, and open up to reveal powerful boosts inside.

You received a 60-Minute Troop Energizer for being among the top PvP winners in this Sector.
hash.message.123downtimec12update.body:
This Sector will be down briefly for maintenance in approximately 1/2 hour. The downtime should be brief, but may disrupt any Boosts or Nanos that are active during the maintenance.

Watch our Twitter (http://www.twitter.com/Edgeworldgame) for immediate notifications of the start and end of this maintenance!
hash.buildings.platinumbuilding.name: Platinum Monument
hash.units.exploder.description: From the frozen wastes of Cerulea, these trained beasts carry powerful, and highly unstable, pulse cannons on their backs!
hash.daily.text.07312013token3: Every 250 Platinum that you spend will net you 5 3.0 Enhancement Token Mystery Boxes!
hash.message.body.20130131newmaprewards: New Rewards have been added to the Map! Make sure to check it out today by clicking on the "globe" icon near your missions tab and begin your conquest!
hash.missions.train-marines-squad.description: Marines were the backbone of Galactic Union forces in the war against the Ceruleans. The Ceruleans are gone, but Marines still fight.
hash.missions.candy-from-a-baby.name: Candy from a Baby
hash.daily.text.20130208terraknor: They're on the attack! Details in your mail.
hash.items.aurorasilver.name: Aurora-1 Silver Kit
hash.items.simdef25.name: Defense Sim Level +25
hash.items.mysterybox7.description: Open this box for a guaranteed Token 1.0, 2.0, or 3.0.
hash.missions.specter-gadget.description: Specter technology lets you strike from a distance, firing from behind heavily armored infantry.
hash.daily.text.20130214constructor: The New "Constructor" building utilizes advanced construction nanos to reduce your build times!
hash.ew.chat.alliance.first: You need to join an alliance first.
hash.engineeringlab.destroywarning:
Commander, if you destroy this item, it will be obliterated into space dust forever.

Are you sure you want to destroy it?
hash.message.body.pddgeneralsprack:
Save some serious Platinum!
Pick up the General SP Rack for 50% OFF during Platinum Deal Day!
hash.message.body.20130626decimatorcoresale: For a limited time only, Decimator Racks will be available for the ALL TIME low price of 50 Platinum, a whopping 50% Discount! Stock up today and gain that extra edge over your opposition!
hash.message.body.20120906incendiarynonpayerr:
For ONE MORE DAY, until 11:59 PM PDT September 9th, make any purchase of 65 Platinum or more from the store and receive 10 FREE Incendiary Cores, a 250 Platinum Value!
This is an extremely limited time offer valid ONLY on your first Platinum purchase - so act now if you haven't already! Incendiary Cores will be distributed by September 11th.
hash.missions.build-a-tesla-turret.descriptio: A fully upgraded Tesla Turret can strike 6 enemy units at once!
hash.items.pulsetank4.description: Instantly Trains 4 Pulse Tanks without using your Factory or any resources
hash.message.body.20130325renegadecratesale:
Renegade Crates are now on Sale for an all time low of 349 Platinum!
Make sure to check the featured tab of the shop and pick yours up before it's too late! This discount is only be available for a LIMITED TIME, so stock up today.
hash.units.thor.description: These elite artillery units outrange every other unit and almost all turrets. They also pack a fearsome punch.
hash.message.body.20130326buyevent:
Still need a few extra Synthetic Control Cores to round out your research and increase the power of your current and future Incineraptors? Purchase Platinum and receive FREE Synthetic Control Core Mystery Boxes!
Simply purchase one of the following Platinum Packages before the deadline to qualify for your FREE Synthetic Control Core Mystery Boxes which can contain exclusive Synthetic Control Cores, Scarbide Ingots, Bomba's, and other Troop Bundles!
Buy the 225 Platinum Pack and get 15 Synthetic Control Core Mystery Boxes Buy the 400 Platinum Pack and get 35 Synthetic Control Core Mystery Boxes Buy the 1000 Platinum Pack or greater and get 110 Synthetic Control Core Mystery Boxes!
This unique offer starts today (March 25th) and will end at 11:59pm PST on March 26th. You will receive free Mystery Boxes only for the first Platinum purchase made between these times. The prizes will be distributed onto the server in which Platinum was purchased and added to your Inventory within 3 business days of this event's conclusion.
hash.ew.under-siege.notice: Your base is currently being attacked by another Commander. Base functionality will be online in a few minutes.
hash.message.body.20120823ceruleannonpayerrem:
For ONE MORE DAY, until 11:59 PM PDT August 26th, make any purchase of 65 Platinum or more from the store and receive 5 FREE Cerulean Cores, a 200 Platinum Value!
This is an extremely limited time offer valid ONLY on your first Platinum purchase - so act now if you haven't already! Cerulean Cores will be distributed by August 28th.
hash.missions.increase-energy-production-2.ob: Increase Energy Production to 150,000 per hour.
hash.missions.cerulean-vr-tech.objectives: Upgrade a Staging Area to Level 8
hash.hero.skills.ratestrong.name: Rapid Fire
hash.items.ceruleanorganictargeting.name: Cerulean Organic Targeting
hash.daily.text.heliogreen: Get green! Destroy the most Helio bases to win! Rules in your mail.
hash.missions.sol-food.description:
Solar energy is used for research and some buildings.

Click BUILD.
Select RESOURCES.
Click the SOLAR PLANT.
Click BUILD.
hash.items.max1equipmentboost.description: Prevents breaking a Part during the upgrading process.
hash.ew.pending-attack.spider.title: TRANSMISSION SCRAMBLED
hash.message.body.20130531forcetournament:
A brand new 4 DAY Research and Building Force Tournament has just begun!
All Force earned through troop training, building, researching, equipment upgrading, and General Skill upgrading will contribute to your Tournament AND Leaderboard rankings, but that's not all! All Force gained from Research and Building will be TRIPLED(x3) for the duration!
The top 10 players on each sector will each qualify for Tournament Prize Boxes, which contain the following:
Platinum Prize Box - Guarantees a Level 16 Black Market Patch, Generals Order, Incineraptor, Synthetic Control Core, or Onyx Core Gold Prize Box - Chance to win a Level 16 Black Market Patch, Generals Order, Incineraptor, Synthetic Control Core, Onyx Core, Hacker's Patch, Vermillion Core, Cerulean Core, or SP 5000 Silver Prize Box - Decreased chance to win prizes from the Platinum and Gold boxes, plus a 30% Troop Accelerator, SP 1000, Incendiary Core, or Decimator Core Bronze Prize Box - Decreased chance to win prizes from Gold and Silver Boxes plus Troops and Speed Ups
The next 10 players in each sector will receive a variety of great prizes as well!
In addition to these overall prizes, Daily Prizes are now available for the top 3 players an a given day as well as Achievement Prizes once you pass certain Force Thresholds! Check the in game leaderboard for more details.
This Tournament ends on June 3rd at 11:00 PM PDT, so make sure to get started today. Good luck!
-- Edgeworld Team
hash.items.calderabronze.name: Caldera-2 Bronze Kit
hash.message.body.20120807Trainathon:
Starting now until 12:00pm PDT August 10th, train the new UNNAMED Unit for a chance to win Platinum!
All players who train at least 250 of the new UNNAMED Unit during the event period will be entered into a random sweepstakes to win 500 platinum!
A total of 15 lucky winners will be chosen! Troop totals are counted per sector and therefore cannot be combined across sectors. Prizes will be awarded by August 15th, 2012.
Good luck, Commander!
hash.missions.where-are-they.description: Plan your revenge! Use the MAP to find the Maar Level 1 base, and SCOUT their forces.
hash.daily.text.20130612forcetournament: Earn force for your chance to win valuable prizes! 3x Boost!
hash.promotion.093011.body:
Technology is the future! Improve your research, and you could win!

Research any troop to level 5, and you’re entered to win! The prizes get better as you improve your research:

Level 5: 15 Hour Accelerator
Level 6: 24 Hour Accelerator
Level 7: 2.5 Day Accelerator
Level 8: 4 Day Accelerator
Level 9: 7 Day Accelerator

One player in each Sector will be chosen for each level of research. Five winners per Sector total!

You have until Tuesday (10/4) to complete your research. Good luck!
hash.promotion.20110701.subject: Galactic Independence Day
hash.message.body.dailyprizesilver: You were 2nd place in your sector at 11:59pm PT last night and won a Silver Prize Box! Your reward has been added to your inventory.
hash.message.body.20130418level16buildathonre:
Today is the Last Day to qualify for FREE Black Market Patches!
Simply complete a Level 16 build of any structure and you will qualify to receive a FREE Black Market Patch, guaranteeing a successful Level 16 Engineering Lab Part Upgrade!
Each player can qualify multiple times, so every level 16 structure completed between now and 11:59pm PDT tonight will guarantee a FREE Black Market Patch!
Winners will be determined and prizes delivered within 3 business days of this event's conclusion. Level your buildings up and experience the awesome power of Level 16 today!
hash.daily.text.20130117troopqueuelimitv2: Troop Training queue has been raised for a Limited Time! Check your mail for details!
hash.missions.project-x-miniaturization.descr: The heavy armor and high-caliber cannons we used to mount on ground vehicles will now be usable on our air units. Progress is a wonderful thing, Commander.
hash.buildings.supplydepot.name: Supply Depot
hash.items.radialpiercingammo.name: Radial Piercing Ammo
hash.research.marine.description: Genetically modified human infantry unit equipped with assault rifles.
hash.daily.text.20130312buildathon: Upgrade your Defense Sim for a chance to win 1000 Platinum! Check your in game mail for more details.
hash.missions.project-x-staging.description: We're close to discovering a way to keep troops on high alert indefinitely, no sleep or food required. Even better, the process doesn't violate galactic rights laws. Technically.
hash.message.body.20130402forcetournamentremi:
Today is the Last Day to Participate in our latest Building and Research Force Tournament!
All Force earned through building, and research will contribute to your leaderboard ranking but that's not all! Force gained from any of these actions in our newest Outpost Caldera-2 will be TRIPLED (x3) throughout the duration!
The top 40 players on each sector will win valuable prizes such as Premium Troops, Mystery Boxes, Trophies, and much more!
This Tournament ends on April 4th at 11:00 PM PDT, so make sure to get started today. Good luck!
-- Edgeworld Team
hash.missions.man-machine-interface.name: Man-Machine Interface
hash.daily.text.20130720renegadecratesale: Renegade Crates are now on Sale for an ALL-TIME LOW PRICE of 249 Platinum!
hash.items.flag7.description: Banner to be equipped to Banner Monument
hash.missions.structural-upgrades.name: Structural Upgrades
hash.daily.text.titan: Deploy Titan units first to draw fire and absorb damage, leaving your other troops free to wreak havoc!
hash.missions.upgraded-arachnids.name: Upgraded Insectoids
hash.missions.dream-big.description:
One of our Researchers postulated that by using Scarbide Alloys in the barrel, we could shoot Bombas out of the Disrupter Cannons. While the experiment was unsuccessful, we were able to increase the shell’s payload.
That researcher had a LOT of cleanup to do.
hash.items.uranium1m.name: 1,000,000 Uranium
hash.items.mysteryboxw.description: Open for a chance to win a NEW Cerulean Spread Fire Smart Part, as well as Hacker's Patches and Troops!
hash.daily.text.20121105mysterybox: Check the featured tab of the shop to check out the new Vuclan, Frozen, and Decimator Mystery Boxes!
hash.missions.side-effects.description: The clathrate deposits we've discovered within the planet's mantle will increase our gas production, but there may be some minor annoying incovenient side effects like respiratory failure and death. Just wanted to let you know.
hash.units.pulsetank.name: Pulse Tank
hash.research-defense.decimator.name: Decimator Defense
hash.missions.daily-terraknor.name: Harness the Lancer
hash.items.mysterybox24.description: Contains the Cerulean Sky Shroud Part!
hash.daily.text.20121106wheelgame: Spin the Wheel for your chance to win a Renegade Crate, Cerulean Racks and more!
hash.message.subject.overlordwinner: You are this month's Overlord of the Sector!
hash.items.mysteryboxo.name: Ruby Core Mystery Box
hash.message.body.20130409forcetournamentremi:
Today is the Last Day to Participate in our latest Building and Research Force Tournament!
All Force earned through Troop Training and Engineering Lab Part Upgrades will contribute to your leaderboard ranking but that's not all! Force gained from any of these actions in our newest Outpost Caldera-2 will be TRIPLED (x3) throughout the duration!
The top 40 players on each sector will win valuable prizes such as Premium Troops, Mystery Boxes, Trophies, and much more!
This Tournament ends on April 11th at 11:00 PM PDT. Good luck!
-- Edgeworld Team
hash.daily.text.marchsectorresource: Prizes for Sectors with the most total Crystal, Gas, Energy, or Uranium! Details in your mail!
hash.items.ukflag.description: British Flag to equip to Banner Monument
hash.message.body.20130622dragoncorespend:
For a limited time only, spending Platinum will get you exclusive, untrainable Incineraptors and the Synthetic Control Cores to research and increase their power!
Every 500 Platinum you spend between now and 11:59pm PDT on June 23rd will net you one exclusive, untrainable Incineraptor and one exclusive Synthetic Control Core!
Each player can qualify for this offer a maximum of 10 times, sure make sure to take advantage of this great deal and spend 5000 to receive the maximum payout!
The payout for this event will occur within 3 business of this offer's conclusion!
hash.message.body.20130503resourceconverter: For a Limited Time Only, Resource Converter build times will be reduced by 80%! There has never been a better time to get your Resource Converter to Level 16 to take advantage of the powerful new, one-of-a-kind Orbital Strike Cannon turret, so be sure to upgrade your Resource Converter building today!
hash.missions.fix-whats-broken.description: We've unlocked new self-repair automations that can repair any issues with the manufacture machinery almost instantly. After centuries of trying to avoid machinery breaking down, this seems easier.
hash.message.body.05212013dailyforce:
Now you can win Force Tournament rewards EVERY DAY!
In addition to the normal Force Tournament prizes granted at the end of the tournament, amazing prizes will also be given to the top 3 players in each sector as of 11:59pm PST at the end of each day of the tournament. The top 3 ranked players will receive the following prizes:
1st Place: 1 Gold Prize Box 2nd Place: 1 Silver Prize Box 3rd Place: 1 Bronze Prize Box
Check your inbox and inventory each morning to see if you were in the top 3 spots and won a prize. Be sure to be in the top 3 in your sector each day to win even more great prizes!
hash.daily.title.20121115acceleratorsalemobil: Save up to 25% on Accelerators for a Limited Time! Visit the shop and stock up today!
hash.message.body.20130327calderawheel:
The all new Caldera-2 colony has been released!
Spin the wheel for your chance to take home a Caldera-2 Schematic and gain exclusive access! Other Premium Wheel Game prizes include Incineraptors, Hacker's Patches, and Black Market Patches 16s to be won so don't miss out!
This Wheel Game will only last for a Limited Time, so spin today before its too late!
hash.items.flag16.description: Banner to be equipped to Banner Monument
hash.message.body.20120904xpboostending:
Just an announcement that the exponential Building XP Boost Event will be ending soon!
There has never been a better time to level up your Command Centers, Barracks, Fleet Academies and Turrets. Better yet, now is the best time to bring your Aurora 1 bases up to spec!
Event ENDS at 5:00 PM PST on September 17th!
-- Edgeworld Team
hash.message.body.20130729zoots:
Try our new and Improved Zoot's Jackpot today for 2x the chances to win the Jackpot! Each play could net you the Jackpot worth thousands of Platinum! Take advantage of this event today before someone else wins big!
You can also take home premium items like Fireproof Shield Tokens, Cerulean Alloys, Ruby Cores, General's Orders and much more! Click on the "Z" icon next to your Mailbox to check out Zoot's Jackpot today!
hash.missions.you-are-what-you-eat.name: You Are What You Eat
hash.daily.text.20130426scarbidesale: Visit the featured tab of the shop and get yours today!
hash.daily.text.20130210alliancelottery: Win big for you and your Alliance by purchasing Platinum! Check your in game mail for more details.
hash.items.reinforcedexplosiveammo.name: Reinforced Explosive Ammo
hash.message.body.level12:
We are happy to announce the release of level 12! Using Cerulean Cores and Scarbide Ingots you will be able to improve your Buildings and Researches to level 12.
Having a level 12 Command Center will also allow you to build more Turrets for increased defense!
Additionally, having both a level 12 Command Center and a level 12 Barracks in your HQ will unlock a new Building, the Flight Academy. This building will allow you to build our new unit, the Chimera!
Don't get left in the dust! Upgrage your base to level 12 today!
hash.missions.fully-upgrade-hover-bike.name: Fully Upgrade Hover Bike
hash.items.energynanos1w.name: Energy Nanos (1 Week)
hash.missions.lead-the-charge.description: You can recruit Z'ratarian Rhinos by proving you can manufacture their specialized power armor.
hash.items.spiderbox.description: Open for a chance to win Incineraptors, special Cores or other valuable Items!
hash.missions.singularity-engine.description: These new Pulse Tank engines draw energy from a quantum singularity. Just *one* could power an entire industrial society. I guess we'll save applications like that for peacetime.
hash.missions.this-is-my-rifle-this-is-my-arm: This is my rifle, this is my arm
hash.message.body.20121015decimatorrelease:
Commander, the time has come to bring Ruin to your enemies.
Rolling out of Factories across Cerulea IV is the new Decimator! This fire-breathing monstrosity is a fusion of Cerulean Artifacts and Union Technology. This troop rips through barriers, melts metal, and can reduce even the strongest base to cinders!
Rip your targets to pieces, with the Decimator! Train yours today!
hash.message.body.spendeventprize: Thanks for participating in our most recent spend event, your prizes have been added to your inventory! Please refresh the game in your browser if you do not see the prizes in your inventory.
hash.items.crystalnanos1d.name: Crystal Nanos (1 Day)
hash.message.body.20130801forcetournament:
There is a new Force Tournament starting today with AMAZING prizes! It will last for 4 DAYS and provide you with a 3x boost to Generals and Training!
All Force earned through troop training, building, researching, equipment upgrading, and General Skill upgrading will contribute to your Tournament AND Leaderboard rankings but that's not all! In addition, Generals and Training Force Points will be TRIPLED (x3) for the duration of the tournament!
The top 40 players on each sector will each qualify for Prizes, the most ever from any Force Tournament!
Items such as Ruby Cores, Black Market Patches, Generals Orders and other building Cores can be won but that's not all! We will also be giving out the Grand Prize Box from the last Wheel Game event that may contain Cerulean Alloys or new Fireproof Shield Tokens that protect your turrets against damage from Bomba units! Make sure to check the Tournament Leaderboard in game for an exact breakdown on the new prize structure.
In addition to these overall prizes, Daily Prizes will be available for the top 3 players in a given day as well as Achievement Prizes that can be warned once you pass certain Force Thresholds! Check the in game leaderboard for this breakdown as well.
This Tournament ends on August 19th at 11:59 PM PST, so be sure to get started today. Good luck!
-- Edgeworld Team
hash.missions.nuke-or-nothing.description: Commander, we have enhanced our pulse tanks with shells that are actually low-yield atomic weapons. There are some inherent risks, but what?s a little radiation poisoning between friends?
hash.items.crystal1k.name: 1,000 Crystals
hash.missions.why-because-its-faster.name: Why? Because its faster
hash.missions.catching-rays.name: Catching Rays
hash.missions.train-hornets.name: Train Hornets
hash.items.mysteryboxred.name: Incineraptor and Core Box
hash.message.body.201212incendiarysale: Don’t have quite enough power to take down the Brawler? Now is your chance to beef up your base! Purchase Incendiary Cores for the low price of 20 Platinum until 11:59 pm PST, December 10th. They’ll never know what hit them!
hash.missions.seamless-construction.name: Seamless Construction
hash.missions.mallick-s-revenge.name: Malick's Revenge
hash.message.body.defensecontest:
Prove you have the strongest base by earning stars in the Defense Simulator! The player with the most total stars by 12:00pm PST, Monday, June 18 will win 500 Platinum and a Cerulean Core!
Additionally, five lucky players who earn at least one star will also win 500 Platinum! Every star earned is an additional chance to win!
Only the best score for each Battle Simulation will count toward the total score for this competition. Aim for the stars and win!
hash.message.body.20130121buyevent:
Purchase one of the following platinum packages between 10:00am PST today (January 21st) and 11:59pm PST on January 22nd and you'll qualify for the following bonus:
Buy the 225 Platinum Pack - Get 2 Hacker's Patches Buy the 400 Platinum Pack - Get 1 Renegade Crate Buy the 1000 Platinum Pack - Get 1 Renegade Crate and 5 Hacker's Patches! (100% Free Value!)
Please keep in mind that you can only qualify for one of these offers, so make sure you purchase the right package! Prizes will be distributed after the conclusion of this event.
hash.missions.lightning-shrike.description: The Shrike is like a viper – fast, furious, and full of venom.
hash.missions.pushing-the-envelope.descriptio: Greater Warp Gate technology is now available for the Aurora-1 Colony. I suggest you take this time to upgrade and maximize our efficiency
hash.items.mysterybox42.description: Contains One Level 10 Vermillion Ammo Delivery Smart Part!
hash.daily.title.buyonegetonepulse: Pulse Cores: Buy One Get One Free
hash.missions.lattice-core.description: The Maar Confederacy base "Lattice Core" is the largest Crystal storage site on Cerulea IV. Let's take what we can, and blast the rest into drifts of glittery dust.
hash.items.automaticdualbarrels.name: Automatic Dual Barrels
hash.skill.aoedamage.unlock: At level 10 click and hold to charge detonation and deal massive damage to a larger area
hash.message.body.20130830forcetournament:
A brand new 4 DAY Engineering Lab Part Upgrade and Training Force Tournament has just begun!
The 1st, 2nd and 3rd place finishers will receive the newest Engineering Lab Part, the Cerulean Sky Shroud! This powerful part will help you defeat Battlecruisers AND it comes already upgraded to Level 10!
All Force earned through troop training, building, researching, equipment upgrading, and General Skill upgrading will contribute to your Tournament AND Leaderboard rankings but that's not all! In addition, Engineering Lab Part Upgrade and Training Force Points will be TRIPLED(x3) for the duration of the tournament!
The top 10 players on each sector will each qualify for Tournament Prize Boxes, which contain the following:
Platinum Prize Box - Guarantees a Level 16 Black Market Patch, Generals Order, Incineraptor, Synthetic Control Core, or Onyx Core Gold Prize Box - Chance to win a Level 16 Black Market Patch, Generals Order, Incineraptor, Synthetic Control Core, Onyx Core, Hacker's Patch, Vermillion Core, Cerulean Core, or SP 5000 Silver Prize Box - Decreased chance to win prizes from the Platinum and Gold boxes, plus a 30% Troop Accelerator, SP 1000, Incendiary Core, or Decimator Core Bronze Prize Box - Decreased chance to win prizes from Gold and Silver Boxes plus Troops and Speed Ups
The next 10 players in each sector will receive a variety of great prizes as well! Check the in game leaderboard for more details.
In addition to these overall prizes, Daily Prizes are now available for the top 3 players an a given day as well as Achievement Prizes once you pass certain Force Thresholds! Check the in game leaderboard for more details.
This Tournament ends on September 2nd at 11:00 PM PDT, so be sure to get started today. Good luck!
-- Edgeworld Team
hash.missions.double-barreled.description: You have one Turret – great! But, what if there's more than one attacker?
hash.message.body.skyshroudmysterybox:
The newest Engineering Lab Part, the Cerulean Sky Shroud has been discovered! The Sky Shroud vastly increases your Defense against Battlecruisers! Open this box for a chance to rule the skies! This mystery box contains a chance to win Level 1, Level 5 and Level 15 Cerulean Sky Shrouds!
This box also contains a chance to win Hacker’s Patches, Decimators, 8 or 15 Hour Accelerators, Incendiary Cores or Racks, and the Sky Shroud Token 1.0 or 2.0!! Don’t miss this opportunity to be one of the first to get the Cerulean Sky Shroud!
hash.engineeringlab.equipinstructions: Which turret class would you like to equip that to, Commander?
hash.itmes.xpsim2.name: Defense XP x2
hash.message.20120731levelup500plat.body: Thank you for participating in our recent Level Up Contest. 500 platinum has been added to your account!
hash.message.123downtimec3update.body:
Congratulations! Maintenance has been completed in this Sector.
Thank you for your patience! We'll publish a list of updates and changes shortly, in our Announcements forum: http://community.kabam.com/forums/forumdisplay.php?
hash.items.mysterybox10.description: Open for a chance to win the Cerulean Sky Shroud, among other prizes!
hash.items.tokenpiercingammo2.name: Piercing Ammo Token 2.0
hash.daily.body.20130207turretrebalance: The Incendiary Turret has received a number of buffs and has had their build times reduced! Make sure to revisit these turrets and try them out!
hash.educate.20120312.body:
Welcome to Edgeworld, Commander!

A leader of your caliber will go far in the battle to dominate Cerulea IV!

To aid you in these first days, we are pleased to offer a special bonus for new Commanders only; take advantage of the Edgeworld beginner's sale and not only will you save 20% on our popular, 400 platinum package, you will also receive a FREE bonus Kira's Gift.

Kira's Gift is our most popular mystery crate and is not available for purchase in the Edgeworld store. Get your FREE bonus gift before its too late. This offer expires within 7 days of joining Edgeworld!

Click Here to save 20% and claim your FREE Kira's Gift with your first purchase!
hash.message.subject.20130426forcetournamentr: Research and Lab Tournament - Last Day!
hash.activerecord.errors.models.alliance-memb: You have already been invited to or requested to join this alliance.
hash.message.body.20130602c2sale:
For a limited time only, the Caldera-2 Colony is on sale in the Edgeworld Store for 399 Platinum!
Don't miss out on exciting and exclusive new additions such as the Turret Control Building and new Battle Cruiser Unit, available only within this new Outpost!
If you haven't already experienced this new content and Outpost what are you waiting for? Make sure to pick up your schematics and begin building today!
hash.missions.upgrade-marines.description: Use your Tech Lab to research improvements to your Marines.
hash.daily.text.20130726forcetournamentlongme:
All Force earned through troop training, building, researching, equipment upgrading, and General Skill upgrading will contribute to your Tournament AND Leaderboard rankings but that's not all! In addition, Training and Building Force Points will be TRIPLED (x3) for the duration of the tournament!
The top 40 players on each sector will each qualify for Prizes, the most ever from any Force Tournament!
Items such as Ruby Cores, Black Market Patches, Generals Orders and other building Cores can be won but that's not all! We will also be giving out the Grand Prize Box from the last Wheel Game event that may contain Cerulean Alloys or new Fireproof Shield Tokens that protect your turrets against damage from Bomba units! Make sure to check the Tournament Leaderboard in game for an exact breakdown on the new prize structure.
In addition to these overall prizes, Daily Prizes will be available for the top 3 players in a given day as well as Achievement Prizes that can be warned once you pass certain Force Thresholds! Check the in game leaderboard for this breakdown as well.
hash.missions.increase-gas-production-2.descr: Build more Gas Refineries, and upgrade them.
hash.missions.renegade-rampage.description:
The Maar Confederacy thinks they own this planet. Please teach them a lesson!

Click the Combat icon at the bottom of the screen.
Select FACTIONS.
SCOUT a Level 3 Maar base.
ATTACK the base.

I recommend sending ALL of our marines into battle, Commander!
hash.force.leaderboard.content: Check your mail for current Tournament Details
hash.daily.title.20130720forcetournament: 3x Training and Engineering Lab Force Tournament!
hash.items.aurorabronze.description: Kit Includes: 1x Aurora-1 Schematic 1x Pulse Core 1x Cerulean Core 5x 15-Min Accelerator 2x 1-Hour Accelerator
hash.missions.flare-captures.objectives: Upgrade a Solar Plant to Level 9.
hash.message.body.20130301spacedragonboxremin:
Today is the Last Day to win an exclusive and untrainable Incineraptor!
Simply purchase one of our new Incineraptor Mystery Box for a chance to take home this exclusive, new, and untrainable troop!
You can also win Sentinels, Berserkers, Devestators, or one of the new "Dragon Cores" necessary for Inceineraptor Research.
The Incineraptor can not be trained, and currently this Mystery Box is the only way to get one! This box will only be available for a few more hours, so visit the featured tab of the shop and stock up before its too late!
hash.items.heavyweightflag.description: Heavyweight Turret Flag to equip to Flag Monument
hash.message.bombawinner.body: Congratulations! You have been chosen as a winner in our Bomba Training Sweepstakes! We've provided you with a Combat Strategy item. Go forth and capture lots of combat data for us!
hash.ew.mobile.help.tip.title: Known Issues
hash.daily.title.20130627commandcenter: No Cerulean Cores for Command Center!
hash.recipes.ceruleaninflammableshield.name: Cerulean Fireproof Shield
hash.missions.tesla-optics.description: Improved optics on our Tesla Towers will let them track more enemy units. And kill them.
hash.daily.text.20130813turretevent: Upgrade your Gun Turrets today to win Valuable Prizes!
hash.message.100711winner.subject: Faction Counterattack Winner!
hash.missions.reach-for-the-heap-leach.descri: The heap leach method isn't just fun to say -- it's also fun to do. By spraying acid over piles of radioactive ore, we can increase our production significantly, and we can ensure that anyone who seizes this area from us acquires a territory soaked with radioactive acid.
hash.items.tokenmeteoricshield.name: Meteoric Shield Token
hash.items.basicdualbarrels.name: Basic Dual Barrels
hash.units.titan.description: Heavily armored combat walker designed for humanoids.
hash.missions.denied-coverage.description: In order to offset the cost of this Disruptor upgrade, we had to cancel all medical services, but I'm sure the troops understand.
hash.message.body.guaranteedtokenbox:
For a Limited Time Only, the Guaranteed Token Box will be available in the Shop! Open this box for a GUARANTEED Token 1.0, 2.0, or 3.0
Tokens include: Armor, Piercing Ammo, Explosive Ammo, Fireproof, Blast Shield, Meteoric Shield, Sky Shroud and the NEW Network Sabotage Token!
Equip the new Network Sabotage Token to deal even more damage to opposing Generals!
hash.missions.adrenaline-boost.name: Adrenaline Boost
hash.items.pax99accelerator.name: 99% Building Accelerator
hash.daily.text.tournamentmap: Check your mail for a list of available sectors!
hash.items.santabox.name: Gift Box
hash.player-feedback.name: James Holloway
hash.missions.sensory-augmentation.descriptio: This upgrade will augment the Disruptor's sensory array, and we've also made some adjustments to the cannon's bore. All told, it's a sleeker, stronger killing machine.
hash.message.body.calderasale199:
For a limited time only, the Caldera-2 Colony is on sale in the Edgeworld Store for ALL-TIME LOW PRICE of 49 Platinum!
Don't miss out on exciting and exclusive new additions such as the Turret Control Building and new Battle Cruiser Unit, available only within this new Outpost!
If you haven't already experienced this new content and Outpost what are you waiting for? Make sure to pick up your schematics and begin building today!
hash.missions.like-thermopylae-but-with-more-: Destroy the Command Center of a player 10 levels above you
hash.promotion.erazi250.body:
Commander, your devotion to crushing the Erazi Syndicate is commendable. The Maar Confederacy has sent Gas and Crystal to our base. They call it a 'Tax Rebate,' but I think they're just afraid of us destroying all their bases again!

Check your inventory using the Shop button to access these items.

You have received 20 million Crystal and Gas.
hash.daily.text.aprilfactions: 10 Commanders will win 500 Platinum and an Hour of Power Crate for launching attacks! Details in your mail and the forums!
hash.missions.hard-corps.name: Hard Corps
hash.daily.title.08162013mysteryboxred: Train Incineraptors with the SCC Mystery Box!
hash.items.raider100.name: Raider Platoon
hash.missions.density-boost.description: Our Rhino units requested stronger shoulder armor, Commander. If you deny them, I suggest not delivering the news in person. Send your least favorite aide.
hash.fte.combat.attack: Your marines can take them! Attacking a Faction base does not remove your Starter Protection.
hash.items.xpnanos2h2x.name: Combat Tactics
hash.missions.thank-you-kindly.description: Our latest round of Disrupter upgrades came from picking through the wreckage from the Maar Confederacy's latest attack. For an evil overlord, Mallick kind of sucks at his job.
hash.recipes.rarebox1b.name: Tier 1 Rare Part Box
hash.missions.mr-wizard.name: Mr. Wizard
hash.missions.denied-coverage.name: Denied Coverage
hash.missions.target-practice.description: Nothing like an easy victory to boost morale. Why not send your troops off on a little combative R&R?

hash.promotion.decembertwitter.body:
Edgeworld is giving out amazing gifts as we celebrate the 12 days of Alien Holidays!

Follow @EdgeworldGame on Twitter for your chance to win! We'll be selecting winners for 12 days, from December 25 to January 5.

You don't need to do anything special - just follow @EdgeworldGame, and watch our Tweets to see if you've received an alien gift!

All prizes will be sent January 6.
hash.ew.client.break: Commander, we have just received notice that Edgeworld has been updated and is ready for use. Please refresh the page to continue playing.

hash.itmes.simdef25.name: Defense Sim Level +25
hash.message.20120803purchase5mc.body: Thank you for participating in our recent Platinum Purchase event. Five Mystery Carriers have been added to your inventory.
hash.daily.text.flamebogo: Ends at midnight 3/26. Buy One Incendiary Core, Get One Free! FREE items awarded 3/28.
hash.message.14dayflash.body: Now on sale for a limited time! Save 60 Platinum on 14-Day Accelerators! There's no better value for your Platinum!
hash.daily.text.0926spendevent: For a limited time only, spending Platinum will earn you fantastic rewards!
hash.missions.crystal-method-2-test-test.obje: Increase Crystal Production to 1,500 per hour.
hash.missions.build-a-barracks.description: Barracks train infantry units that you can use to attack other faction and player bases.
hash.missions.project-x-hot-fusion.descriptio: Fund this project and every one of our Pyro flame projectors will be powered by a small-scale hot fusion reaction.There are a few negligible risks... Forget I mentioned it, it's nothing.
hash.items.uraniumbox.description: These crates contain between 250,000 and 20,000,000 Uranium.
hash.message.body.sniperintro:
Revolutionize your base defenses with our new Sniper Turret! Sniper Turrets: - Can hit any point on the base from any other point - Pack a punch more potent than any other turret - Features upgraded Health that helps it survive Bomba attacks
Begin building Sniper Turrets today if you have at least a Level 7 Command Center!
Also, don't forget to participate in our Sniper Turret Buildathon to win 500 Platinum and a Cerulean Core! Check your mail for details.
hash.items.heavyextendedarmor.name: Heavy Extended Armor
hash.daily.title.level13buildings: Upgrade to Level 13 and expand the size of your base! See your mail for details.
hash.items.dragoncore.promo: Bring the Incineraptor under your control and develop it with a Synthetic Control Core!
hash.daily.text.20121129newunit: Let the punches fly with this rough and tough troop!
hash.items.flag9.name: Banner Design #9
hash.message.body.20130421hackerspatchsale: Hacker's Patches are on Sale for a Limited Time Only! Check the featured tab of the store to get yours and start upgrading your Engineering Lab parts today!
hash.message.body.20130104buildingxpevent:
Starting today, all XP earned through Building has been significantly increased!
There has never been a better time to upgrade your defenses and complete your builds!
This Boost will only last until January 7th, so make sure to take advantage before its too late!
hash.daily.text.20130604wheelgame: Spin the Wheel for your chance to win Premium Enhancement Tokens and other great prizes!
hash.missions.legion-lodge.objectives: Destroy Command Centers in Level 6 Legion bases.
hash.daily.text.20130129moddersevent: For the next 24 Hours, the effect of Modder's Patches has been doubled! Check your mail for more details
hash.daily.text.20121203lvlupwinners: Congratulations to Kouichi & all our winners! See mail for full list.
hash.items.decimator20.name: Decimator Platoon
hash.daily.text.20130222spacedragons: The Incineraptors are dangerous and heading towards your base. Check mail for details.
hash.message.subject.20130612forcetournament: Engineering Lab and Building Tournament - 3x Boost!
hash.message.body.05212013generallat:
Level up your Generals and win!
Every time that you level up a General with a General’s Order between now and 11:00pm PST on May 23th, you will get a chance to take home an Incineraptor! TEN randomly chosen players who successfully level up one of their Generals will receive an exclusive, untrainable Incineraptor!
Prizes will be paid out to the winners by Monday, May 27th at 11:00pm PST.
hash.items.simdef20.description: Increases your level for a Simulator battle by 20.
hash.missions.commander-conquered.description: One of Malick's most trusted lieutenants is in charge of operations at this base. Leveling the Command Center and neutralizing all hostiles on the ground will give Malick something to seethe about.
hash.message.body.20130117sentinel:
Commander, the Fleet Academy has a new graduate!
The new Sentinel units descend on the battlefield in a suit of hyper-ablation power armor that helps them withstand large amounts of punishment. Once they reach the enemy their powerful grappling claws will rip and tear the structures apart.
Best of all, the Sentinels are an extension of Galactic Union technology, which means you will not need any special items to fabricate and train these units!
Train these new troops and show your enemies that the best offense is a good defense!
hash.items.blueprintbox.description: Chance to win a rare A1 Schematic in this box! This crate also contains other high level speedups for building up your new base
hash.missions.why-because-its-faster.descript:
We tried to use Scarbide as part of a liquid material we can add to the outside of our Shrikes to improve aerodynamics.
It did no such thing, but it did paint them red, so that’s something.
hash.daily.text.hardcoremysterybox: Win up to 5 Ruby Cores! Click here for more info!
hash.items.tokenmeteoricshield2.name: Meteoric Shield Token 2.0
hash.items.buildtoken3.name: Ruby Core
hash.message.body.20120907beginnersitems:
Commander, in order to assist with your galactic conquest, you have been provided with additional supplies containing the following:
10x 5-Min Accelerator 4x 15-Min Accelerator 2x 1-Hour Accelerator 1x 50,000 Crystals 1x 50,000 Gas 1x 50,000 Energy 1x 50,000 Uranium
Use them wisely and best of luck!
hash.missions.solar-leech.description: The more energy you leech, the more vulnerable you leave your enemy.
hash.missions.military-isotopics.name: Military Isotopics
hash.message.123downtimec3update.subject: 1/23 Maintenance Complete!
hash.items.decimatorcore.tooltip: Hunks of Cerulean circuitry, overclocked to meet the needs of building and improving Decimators.
hash.error.delete-barracks.training: No Barracks can be deconstructed while training units.
hash.message.body.20130609tieredbuy:
Commander, we have an incoming message from Zoot's black market network:
Hello my friend!
My people have located something that might interest you.
We found a platoon of mercenaries who's previous commander is how you say...Kaput. They are looking for a new employer, and I could give you a recommendation...if you can make it worth Zoot's while!
Purchase some Platinum and I could be convinced to send them your way!
Buy the 225 Platinum Pack and get 500 Shrikes and 250 Disruptors Buy the 400 Platinum Pack and get 1000 Shrikes and 500 Disruptors Buy the 1000 Platinum Pack and get 2000 Shrikes, 1000 Disruptors and 25 Decimators! Buy the 2500 Platinum Pack and get 3000 Shrikes, 1000 Disrupters and 80 Decimators!
This unique offer will end on June 10th at 11:59pm PDT. You will get the additional troops only for the first Platinum purchase you make between now and the deadline, so make sure to choose wisely! Prizes will be distributed within 3 business days to the server in which Platinum was purchased and added to your Inventory.
hash.daily.text.maybombabuildup: Win Platinum and items for training Bombas! Full Details in your mail!
hash.daily.text.20130602buyevent: Purchase Platinum, receive Free Cerulean Blast Shield Mystery Boxes! Check your mail for details
hash.items.mysteryboxm.description: Open this box to get a Ruby Core to upgrade your buildings to Level 17 and beyond!
hash.promotion.rhinowednesday.subject: Rhinos Ready to Tackle!
hash.daily.text.20130525buyevent: Purchase a Platinum Package to qualify for some FREE Rewards! Click for more info
hash.items.piercingammotoken4.tooltip: Apply to an Engineering Lab part and receive an extremely large scaling Damage Boost permanently!
hash.message.body.05162013forceachievement:
There are more ways than ever before to win FREE rewards from the Force Tournament!
Accumulate Force Points during Force Tournaments and get amazing rewards! In addition to the normal Force Tournament prizes, achieve each of these Force Point targets by the end of the Tournament to receive the following great items:
1,000 Points – 5-Min Accelerator 2,500 Points – 15-Min Accelerator 5,000 Points – 15-Min 8x XP Boost 7,500 Points – Control Device 10,000 Points – Pulse Core 20,000 Points – Mystery Carrier 30,000 Points – Incendiary Core 40,000 Points – 30% Training Accelerator 50,000 Points – Scarbide Ingot 75,000 Points – 24-Hour Accelerator 100,000 Points – Hacker’s Patch 125,000 Points – Vermillion Core 150,000 Points – Time Traveler's Crate 200,000 Points – Elite Weapons Box 300,000 Points – 2.5-Day Accelerator
Increase your Force Points today to get these incredible rewards!
hash.ew.campaign.bomba1.name: Bombas' Last Stand (25-10k)
hash.message.body.20121001turretgds: Upgrades Approved, Commander! Incendiary Turrets of level 6 and up and becoming more powerful! Gun Turrets, X-1 Cannons, Concussion Turrets and Tesla Towers of level 10 and up are also becoming more powerful! For more details on what to expect from your upgraded Turrets, CLICK HERE
hash.missions.bulk-bins.description:
A second barracks lets you queue up two different troop types to build.

Click BUILD.
Select the COMBAT tab.
Select the BARRACKS.
Click BUILD.
hash.engineeringlab.twoenhancementwarning: Parts can only have two active Tokens.
hash.promo.doa.title: PLAY DRAGONS OF ATLANTIS
hash.promotion.110711winners.body: Congratulations! You've won a prize in the Lancer Science Fair! Check the Shop for your prize! (Based on your level of Lancer Research)
hash.message.body.20130726commandcenter:
For a Limited Time Only, your Command Center build times have been reduced by 80% for each level! This reduction is in effect across your HQ, Aurora-1 and Caldera-2 bases!
This reduction in build times will end at 10am PST on September 13, so upgrade your Command Center today!
hash.message.subject.maycarriersale: Purchase Platinum for FREE Mystery Carriers!
hash.message.body.20130222incendiarysale:
Still haven't maxed out your defenses or need a few levels on your Sniper, Incendiary, Heavyweight, and Anti Tank turrets? Now is your chance to purchase Incendiary Cores and Racks at a HIGHLY discounted price! There has never been a better time to buy, so make sure to check the Daily Update and featured tab of the shop and stock up today!
Build up your turrets and teach those attackers a lesson they won't soon forget!
hash.fte.kira.gun.building: To see your build options click the GUN TURRET Icon.
hash.items.tokenexplosiveammo.name: Explosive Ammo Token
hash.items.renegadecrate.name: Renegade Crate
hash.message.aurora1.body:
The factions are jealous of your level 11 buildings. The Maar hungrily eye your technology, and prepare their soldiers and spies to strike.
We must construct additional defenses to secure our control of Cerulea IV! Commander, begin preparations for your first colony: Aurora-1!

Building Aurora-1 will unlock special upgrades, including:
  • New buildings and turrets to upgrade!
  • Train a new unit that fights to the end!
  • Shield Generator: boost the health of your main base!
  • An additional Warp every 30 minutes!

Read more about Aurora-1!
Get a leg up and save with the Aurora-1 Colony Kit, on sale now!
Be ready to build first thing on release day with the Aurora-1 Schematic, and waste no time with a selection of premium Accelerators and boosts!
Learn about Colony Kits in the Shop now!
hash.map.reinforce.instructions: Fortify your base by sending reinforcements to defend it.
hash.message.subject.juneceruleanspend: Spend Platinum to receive FREE Cerulean Cores!
hash.message.body.20130517hax24sale: For a limited time only, 24 Hour Accelerators will be only 50 Platinum! This sale will only be available for the next 24 hours, so visit the featured tab now!
hash.fte.kira.scout:
This is the scout view for the enemy base, Commander. If we attack now our rookie troops can gain some much needed experience.
Click attack to open the Warp Gate.
hash.units.sentinel.name: Sentinel
hash.missions.increase-resource-storage.descr: Supply Depots increase storage capacity for all resources. Upgrade them for greater storage.
hash.message.body.20121225winpulsetanks:
Starting today, every 100 Platinum spent will qualify you to receive 20 free Pulse Tanks! This Platinum must be spent, not simply just purchased to qualify.
There is no limit to the amount of Pulse Tanks you can receive, so make sure to stock up! This event ends on December 27th at 11:59pm PST (UTC-8). Pulse Tanks will be distributed within 5 business days of this event's conclusion.
hash.hero.skills.damagenormal.description: Medium damage boost multiplied by unit transport size
hash.items.asgflag.description: Alliance Shield Generator Flag to equip to Flag Monument
hash.message.subject.spendeventvermillionblas: Spend Platinum, Win the Blast Shield!
hash.missions.project-x-mining.name: Project X: Mining
hash.missions.build-a-tech-lab.name: Build a Tech Lab
hash.cutscene.maps.text1: We're not the only ones: our enemies have also acquired the Xirrus Zone Map. Brace yourselves for a brutal siege.
hash.message.body.20130110sectortourney: Map Tournaments have returned with new and improved prizes, and are set to begin in your sector sometime this week! The first batch will begin later today, and throughout the week more tournaments will begin. Make sure to keep an eye out for when the next tournament comes to your sector!
hash.cutscene.maps.text2: Reaching the Aurora-1 outpost, located in this frozen wasteland, will be difficult. Most of the ships we're sending won't make it back.
hash.cutscene.maps.text3: Get the perimeter secured and the base operational. We're still investigating, but we've intercepted some Maar chatter about a...a shield generator.
hash.missions.hive-program.name: HIVE Program
hash.daily.text.20130608forcetournament: Earn force for your chance to win valuable prizes! 3x Boost!
hash.missions.daily-terraknor.objective: Check in with Kira once a day.
hash.items.tokennetworksabotage2.description: Applies a moderate scaling General Defense to an Engineering Lab Part!
hash.missions.meta-hornology.name: Meta-Hornology
hash.items.mysteryboxd.name: Troop Research Core Box!
hash.missions.snipertower2.description: This upgrade makes perfect sense. A few minor tweaks and the result is nearly 20% more firepower.
hash.message.ewjunesurvey.body:
Hello,
Thank you for participating in our survey. Two Accelerator Boxes have been added to your inventory on your most recent sector. If these items have been added to the wrong sector, please contact Support with a support ticket, and we will be happy to move those items to whatever sector you want.
Best, The Edgeworld Team
hash.message.body.onyxcoremysterybox: Looking for Onyx Cores to train Battlecruisers in Caldera-2? Pick up an Onyx Core Mystery Box to win up to 20 Onyx Cores in just one box! Also win Battlecruisers, Accelerators, Incendiary Cores, Cerulean Cores and bundles of 1, 2, 5, 10 or 20 Onyx Cores! This box will be available for a limited time, so act now and start training an undefeatable fleet of Battle cruisers today!
hash.missions.train-marines.name: Train Marines
hash.daily.text.tieredspendevent: For the next 24 hours, we are giving away awesome prizes for spending Platinum! Click Here for details!
hash.message.subject.HWTBuildathon: Supercharge your Heavyweight Turret to win Rare Defense Parts and Tokens!
hash.ew.transfer-troops.no-colony:
This feature allows you to transfer troops between bases.
To use this feature you need a Colony with a Warp Gate and Staging Area
hash.engineeringlab.equipdescription: Equip Turrets with Parts to increase their stats and unlock special abilities. Collect Parts from victorious Defense Simulations.
hash.items.incendiarycore.description: Scavenged hunks of Cerulean minerals, containing materials used for building and upgrading your turrets!
hash.daily.text.mayaccelsale: 24-Hour Accelerators and 30% Training Accelerators: 25% OFF NOW!
hash.missions.enhanced-projectiles.name: Enhanced Projectiles
hash.items.DSGold.name: The rare prize won only by the greatest defenders. Open to reveal your prize of Defense XP Boosts, Level Boosts, or Incendiary Cores!
hash.missions.tank-carapace.name: Tank Carapace
hash.boosts.warp-capacity.name: Warp Capacity
hash.missions.death-ivory.name: Death Ivory
hash.message.body.20130613level17:
Level 17 has arrived, and with it some new additions! You will see a greater increase in the power of your Troops, Buildings, Engineering Lab Parts and Generals, a larger Base Size, and significantly increased Warp Gate capacities at Level 17, so it is essential that you start upgrading your base today!
Furthermore, in addition to being able to build more of most turret types, you can now build up to 4 Bunkers with a Level 17 Command Center! Garrison troops in these new Bunkers to fortify your base’s defenses!
In order to access these new levels, the Ruby Core has been released! The only way to get this new Core is to win it in the Wheel Game, so be sure to check out the Wheel Game today!
The war for Cerulea IV is escalating, capitalize on this new technology or become another statistic!
hash.ew.showdamagenumbers.tooltip: Turning off damage will increase performance.
hash.missions.project-x-solar.description: Don't be alarmed if it gets dark when this plant is upgraded. The new panels actually bend light around themselves. Kind of ironic, actually.
hash.missions.basic-upgrades.description: This time, we've upgraded by adding a snack bar, dance floor, and valet parking. Just kidding. A little Cerulean humor. We actually revamped the HVAC and rerouted some sewer lines. Then we installed some additional insulation. Nothing spectacular about this one.
hash.items.frozenbox.description: Open for a small chance to win a rare concussion equipment in this box! Also contains rare and basic equipment from levels 4-7
hash.game.error.connection.lost: You've lost your connection to the server, you will need to refresh the page to continue.
hash.items.mysteryboxpurple.description: Open for a chance to win one of the following: 1x Renegade Crate 1x 30-Min 8x XP Boost 1x Berserker 1x 2.5 Hour Accelerator 1x 1 Hour Accelerator 1x Zoot Token
hash.message.body.20120828engineeringlab: Have you wished that your Sniper Turrets could attack multiple targets at once, or that your Incendiary Turrets could have splash damage? Now you can! With the Engineering Lab, you can find new modification parts in the Defense Simulator and use the Lab to equip them to your various Turret types. In addition, you can upgrade them with resources for greater effect! More health? Further range? More damage? Splash damage? You can have all that and more! For full details on how to make the most of this great new feature, click Here Give your enemies a nasty surprise with the Engineering Lab. Build yours today!
hash.ew.event.group.invite: You've been invited to a group, would you like to continue?
hash.message.body.pdddecimatorcore: Save some serious Platinum! - pick up the Decimator Core for only 5 Platinum during Platinum Deal Day!
hash.daily.text.20130114concussionturretevent: Reduced build times and requirements for a limited time only. Please check your mail for details.
hash.items.ceruleanmeteoricbarrier.name: Cerulean Meteoric Shield
hash.items.acceleratorbox.name: Accelerator Box
hash.missions.flare-captures.name: Flare Captures
hash.daily.text.20130311buyevent: Purchase Platinum and receive Free Cerulean Armor Mystery Boxes! Check your mail for full details.
hash.message.marcharmydisruptors.body: Your disruptor army is enormous and terrifying! We've granted you an Hour of Power Crate in recognition of your military expansion! You can find this new item in your inventory.
hash.missions.titan-logistics.description: Marines have a soft spot for Titans - they look at them like big brothers. Titans don't have a soft spot for Marines. They don't have soft spots, period.
hash.common.platinum.description: Platinum is the galactic currency for buying items in the store
hash.message.body.20130316dragonspend:
While previous attempts have failed, we have finally found a way to tame and harness the power of a wild Incineraptor!
For every 1000 Platinum you spend between now and 11:59pm PDT on March 17th will net you one exclusive, un-trainable Incineraptor! The payout will occur on March 18th, still in time to utilize these units in the latest Total Force Tournament!
Each player can qualify and receive up to a max of 10 Incineraptors
Don't forget to check out the Synthetic Control Core Mystery Box in the featured tab of the shop. While the Incineraptors are strong on their own, just imagine the hidden power these Cores will unlock through increased research!

Get 1,180 Platinum worth of Accelerators for only 799! Includes:
10x 1 Hour Accelerator 8x 2.5 Hour Accelerator 5x 8 Hour Accelerator 3x 24 Hour Accelerator 1x 4 Day Accelerator 5x 30% Troop Training Accelerator
hash.missions.blast-from-the-past.description: Commander, I believe we can further increase the physical capabilities of our Rhino troops by splicing in DNA from a centuries-extinct Earth creature called? Oh, so THAT?S where their name came from!

hash.message.body.gforcemysterybox:
Open the G-Force Mystery Box to win 1,000 Troops! This Mystery Box can contain bundles of:
1,000 Incineraptors 1,000 Battlecruisers 1,000 Decimators Other Bundles of 1,000 Troops include: Sentinels, Disruptors, Shrikes, Titans, Specters, Pyros, Hornets, Bombas and Rhinos!
Purchase the G-Force Box today and instantly become a force to be reckoned with!

hash.message.body.20130426forcetournamentremi:
Today is the Last Day to Participate in our latest Research and Lab Force Tournament!
All Force earned through Engineering Lab Part Upgrades and from Offensive, Defensive, and Turret Control Research will contribute to your leaderboard ranking but that's not all! All Force gained from Engineering Lab Part Upgrade has been DOUBLED(x2) and Force gained from Research has been TRIPLED(x3)!
The top 10 players on each sector will each qualify for new and increased payouts of valuable prizes such as Premium Troops, Mystery Boxes, Trophies, and most importantly bragging rights over your Sector!
This Tournament ends on April 29th at 11:59 PM PDT, so make sure to get started today. Good luck!
-- Edgeworld Team
hash.items.eraziflag.name: Erazi Faction Flag
hash.message.subject.05242013barracksbatremin: Last Day to Upgrade your Barracks and Win!
hash.message.body.20130513basepackages:
From now on, you will have three base configurations to choose from when you move to a new sector: Basic, Advanced and Elite!
Basic: Includes Level 1 Buildings such as the Command Center, Crystal Mine, Gas Refinery, Warp Gate, Staging Area and Defense Simulator!
Advanced: Includes Level 5 Buildings such as the Command Center, Defense Lab, Tech Lab, Barracks, Warp Gate, Staging Area, Engineering Lab, 18 turrets and much more! Get 1,500+ levels of experience FREE!
Elite: Includes Level 8 Buildings such as the Command Center, Defense Lab, Tech Lab, Barracks, Warp Gate, Staging Area, Generals Quarters, 36 turrets and much more! Get 3,500+ levels of experience FREE!
Take advantage of these great offers when joining a new sector and get ahead of the competition today!
hash.missions.snipertower8.objectives: Upgrade Your Sniper Turret to level 8
hash.message.body.20121102decimatorbox:
Looking for a way to acquire Decimator Cores at a discounted rate? Look no further then the new Decimator Mystery Box!
This mystery box has a high probability to pay out premium items like Decimator Cores and Racks but don't delay! The Decimator Mystery Box will only be available for a Limited Time, so make sure to check the featured tab of the store to get yours today!
hash.message.body.20130729zootsreminder:
Today is the last day to take advantage of our New and Improved Zoot's Jackpot!
Zoot’s Jackpot currently has 2x the chances to win the Jackpot! Each play could net you the Jackpot worth thousands of Platinum! Take advantage of this event today before someone else wins big!
You can also take home premium items like Fireproof Shield Tokens, Cerulean Alloys, Ruby Cores, General's Orders and much more! Click on the "Z" icon next to your Mailbox to check out Zoot's Jackpot today!

hash.daily.text.newmysteryboxes: Check the Featured section of the store! Available until July 6th.
hash.daily.text.20130413forcetournament: Earn force for your chance to win Premium Prizes! 2x Build, Train, and Lab Boosts!
hash.message.body.hackerspatchmb1:
Get Ready for the upcoming 12-Hour FLASH E-Lab Force Tournament with the Hacker’s Patch Mystery Box!
You could win 10 Hacker’s Patches for the price of one!
This box guarantees you 1 Hacker’s Patch, but there is also a chance to win 2, 3, 5 or 10 Hacker’s Patches!
Get your Smart Parts upgraded in a flash!
This FLASH Force Tournament will begin at 12:00am PDT on October 15th and will end at 12:00pm PDT AND feature QUADRUPLED E-Lab Force Points!
hash.message.body.20130602vcoresale:
For a limited time only, Vermillion Cores are on sale for 25% OFF!
There has never been a better time to buy and complete your Level 15 and 16 builds! Make sure to take advantage of this great deal today!
hash.message.body.20130129videoforumevent: Want to win 500 Platinum or more? Here is your chance! Create a YouTube video that highlights how awesome the new General's Premium Abilities (Plasma Cannon, Magnetic Shielding, or Overdrive) are, and post the video in response to the thread below, along with your Character Name and Sector. Find out more HERE.

For a limited time only, you will receive one FREE 30% Training Accelerator for each one that you purchase! Players can receive up to 20 FREE 30% Training Accelerators in this way during this promotion.
This great deal will end at 11:59pm PST on July 27th, so be sure to stock up on 30% Training Accelerators today!
