hash.ai.spreadeffect.description: This Smart AI enables turrets to try to spread their inherent effect (ex. Concussion) to troops that don't have that effect (ex. Non-Concussed units)

hash.message.body.20130422forcetournament:
A brand new 3 DAY Total Force Tournament has just begun!
All Force earned through troop training, building, researching, equipment upgrading, General Skill upgrading and PvP will contribute to your leaderboard ranking but that's not all! All Force gained from any of these actions will be DOUBLED(x2) everywhere throughout the duration!
The top 40 players on each sector will win valuable prizes such as Premium Troops, Mystery Boxes, Trophies, and bragging rights!
This Tournament ends on April 25th at 11:59 PM PDT, so get started today. Good luck!
-- Edgeworld Team
hash.missions.mallick-s-base.description: The Maar never dreamed we'd be strong enough to attack the seat of their power. Let's give Malick's propaganda department something ugly to cover up.
hash.daily.banner3.title: COUNTDOWN: DESTRUCTION
hash.items.tokenexplosiveammo4.name: Explosive Ammo Token 4.0

hash.promotion.102711.subject: Daily Treat!
hash.missions.kleptology.description: Sure, any shambling mutant can crack a Supply Depot if you hand him a gravity blaster, but not everyone is born with the proper looting mentality.

hash.hero.skills.plasmacannon.name: Plasma Cannon
hash.dialogs.converter.error-resources: Please Select Two Resources For Conversion
hash.missions.meta-hornology.description: The Rhinos' aggression levels have dropped, so we've persuaded them that enemy troops have begun to question their masculinity. You may want to observe the ensuing carnage on your vid-screen, Commander.
hash.missions.laser-guided.description: We've developed a new guidance system for Shrike ordnance; it minimizes human error and can even predict enemy movements. No luck with weather forecasts, though.
hash.missions.air-spray.description: Shrike gangs are intimidating, especially when they're slicing through air at top speeds.
hash.missions.nuke-or-nothing.name: Nuke or nothing
hash.message.freeaurora.body: Your Platinum purchases have uncovered a treasure - the Aurora-1 Schematics! If you do not already have these Schematics, we've added a set to your inventory! Congratulations!
hash.message.body.20130102wheelgamereminder:
Today is the Last Day to spin the Wheel in our latest Kira's Wheel Game for a chance to take home one of the newly released Vermillion Cores!
Vermillion Cores are necessary to unlock the power of Level 15 buildings so spin the wheel and try your luck today!
The Wheel Game ends today (January 4th PST), so make sure to play now before you miss out!
hash.message.body.10kfaction:
The Factions Have noticed your accelerated growth, and called in reinforcements of their own.
The Factions now have Faction Bases all the way up to level 10,000!
In addition, the layout of Map Outposts will upgrade alongside the Node level all the way up to 10,000!
What are you waiting for? Get out there and show the Factions that no matter how big they get, you will always be stronger!
Sorry, Commander. This base is already under attack
hash.missions.a-flurry-of-attacks-3.descripti: Rival Commanders are racing to build their own colony bases. Upgrade the warp gate so we can overwhelm them with force and tear down those command centers in one shot!
hash.daily.title.20120913labtime: Engineering Lab Upgrade Times Reduced by 95% for a Limited Time!
hash.missions.crystal-method-3.name: Crystal Method 3
hash.items.tokenexplosiveammo3.tooltip: Apply to an Engineering Lab part and receive a large scaling Splash Radius Boost permanently!
hash.fte.kira.gunplacesucess:
Excellent work, Commander! That should keep our base safe from the enemy factions on the planet.
Speaking of the enemy, I am receiving a transmission from one of them.
hash.message.body.20120829zootsjackpotpayouts:
Starting now, all payouts in Zoot's Jackpot have been boosted - including higher Jackpot odds, Bonus Round payouts and prizes! Along with these changes, players will land on Skulls less often!
Play now and you could be our next Jackpot winner!

hash.items.simdef2x.name: Defense Sim Level x2
hash.missions.intel-sweep.description: Our networks have gathered intel about a dangerous new technology that the Maar are pursuing. Something that will change the war forever. We need more information.

hash.daily.text.skyshroudmysterybox: Open the Sky Shroud Mystery Box and rule the skies of Cerulea IV!!
hash.message.body.spend-turretprize: Between 3pm and 6pm, Spending Platinum will earn you great rewards! For every 100 Platinum you spend, you will receive one FREE Turret Prize Box! This Boxes guarantees you one of the following: a Level 1, 5 or 15 Cerulean Blast Shield, a Level 1, 5 or 15 Cerulean Meteoric Shield, or 1.0 and 2.0 Blast Shield or Meteoric Tokens! Limit 5 per Player, per Sector. Grab this deal while it lasts!

hash.daily.text.20130729zoots: Play Zoot's Jackpot for 2x the odds of getting the Jackpot!
hash.message.body.20130501ceruleanarmor:
Still looking to get your hands on more Cerulean Armor Smart Parts? Look no further then our newest Mystery Box! This Smart Part will provide your turrets a health boost but that's not all! This part will also update your turret's IFF systems to automatically target higher priority units who have the highest attack damage first above others!
The only way to get this item is through the new Cerulean Mystery Crate! This crate will not only will give you a chance to take home this new premium part, but can also net you other great items like General SP Racks and Hacker's Patches! Visit the featured tab of the store to get yours today!
hash.items.mysteryboxc.description:
Open to receive one of the following premium tokens!
Armor Token 2.0 Piercing Ammo Token 2.0 Explosive Ammo Token 2.0 Liquid Coolant Token Scope Token

The top 10 players on each sector will each qualify for new and increased payouts of valuable prizes in the form of Tournament Prize Boxes, which contain the following:
Platinum Prize Box - Guarantees a Level 16 Black Market Patch, Generals Order, Incineraptor, Synthetic Control Core, or Onyx Core Gold Prize Box - Chance to win a Level 16 Black Market Patch, Generals Order, Incineraptor, Synthetic Control Core, Onyx Core, Hacker's Patch, Vermillion Core, Cerulean Core, or SP 5000 Silver Prize Box - Decreased chance to win prizes from the Platinum and Gold boxes, plus a 30% Troop Accelerator, SP 1000, Incendiary Core, or Decimator Core Bronze Prize Box - Decreased chance to win prizes from Gold and Silver Boxes plus Troops and Speed Ups

hash.missions.activate-collars.description: Cerulean Controls Devices have two important functions: a resonance beacon to attract the creature, and a simple control element to subdue them.

hash.message.20120726turrets-annihilatorcrate: Thank you for participating in our recent Turret Buildathon event. One Annihilator Crate has been added to your inventory!
hash.items.makoflag.description: General Mako Flag to equip to Flag Monument
hash.missions.project-x-anger-serum.descripti: Many strategists have said that if there was a way to chemically induce and control Z'ratari battle-rage, they would be unstoppable in combat. Well, guess what?
hash.items.dragonrack.tooltip: Bring the Incineraptor under your control and develop it with a Synthetic Control Core!
hash.daily.text.20130721token3mb: Open this box for a chance to win a new Enhance Token 3.0!
hash.message.body.20130212wheelgame:
Play Kira’s Wheel Game for a chance to win a Cerulean Armor Smart Part, as well as other premium items like Cores and Troop Bundles!
Cerulean Armor Smart Parts will increase the damage and health of a turret, as well as provide a new targeting mechanic which will cause the turret to fire upon units with the highest attack value!
The Wheel Game ends on Thursday February 14th, so make sure to take your spins today!
hash.daily.text.20130224bombabox: Check out the Bomba Box and win troops every time! Check your mail for details.
hash.items.frozenscope.name: Frozen Scope
hash.message.subject.20130527zootsjackpot: Improved Bonus Play in Zoot’s Jackpot!
hash.promotion.twitter7500.body:
2011 is almost over, and we want to finish strong! Help us reach 7,500 Followers on Twitter! @EdgeworldGame

We'll have trivia, contests, and prizes throughout December, and a special giveaways when we hit our milestones!

Our first goal is 5000 Followers. We only need a few hundred more to make it, and we'll give a Cerulean Core to our 5,000th follower!

Will it be you? Follow @Edgeworld!
hash.message.body.07252013lifetimeforceshort: Lifetime Force now provides every player with a ranking and typically an associated bonus! Have the highest Lifetime Force ranking in your sector at 12:01am PST on August 1st to become the Overlord of your Sector! Check your in-game mail and Lifetime Force dialog for more information!
hash.hero.skills.troopformation.description: Order troops around the General to attack a specific building
hash.missions.increase-resource-storage.name: Increase Resource Storage
hash.hero.skills.damagenormal.name: Arsenal
hash.message.body.spendeventvermillionblastsh:
Pick up the new Vermillion Blast Shield and Dominate Decimators!
Spend the qualifying amount to earn the Following prizes:
Spend 100 Platinum to receive 1 Hacker’s Patch Mystery Box! Spend 300 Platinum to receive 1 General’s Crate + above prizes! Spend 500 Platinum to receive 1 Renegade Crate + above prizes! Spend 1000 Platinum to receive the Level 10 Vermillion Blast Shield + above prizes!
This deal will only be available for the next 24 hours so make sure you reach your Tier in time!
NOTE: Event ends at 12:00am PDT on October 17th. Prizes will be awarded by October 19th, 2013. Limit 1 Prize per Tier.
hash.missions.solar-skillet.description: If we can just recalibrate the length of those aggregated diamond nanorods, we can multiply our energy production significantly. But that entails risking incineration on the superheated solar panels. My calculations suggest it is worth the risk.
hash.message.body.06202013generalscrate:
The General’s Crate is new and improved, available for a limited time only!
The Crate now contains 5,000 Generals SP and a General’s Order GUARANTEED at a lower price! Be sure to pick up a few crates and level up your Generals today!
hash.fte.cutscene.first: For decades, the Ceruleans waged relentless war against the allies in the Galactic Union.
hash.missions.a-flurry-of-attacks.name: Strike First, Strike Hard!
hash.missions.crash-menagerie.description: Why waste ammo on enemies when you can stampede them?
hash.daily.text.20130124generalrelease: General Mako has arrived, and he's brought stolen technology! Check your mail for more details on these new abilities!
hash.daily.text.pulseSale: Save 20% on Pulse Cores & Incendiary Cores!
hash.message.subject.20130619spendevent: Spend Platinum, Get Black Market Patches!
hash.ew.suggest.kabamdotcom.fs: Flash does not support chat or keyboard entry in full screen mode. Enjoy full chat and keyboard functionality in widescreen HD on Kabam.com
hash.missions.things-that-go-boom-9.descripti: Having the most devastating units on Cerulea will not only secure you a place on the Territorial Map, but also in history.
hash.items.mysteryboxblack.description: Open for a chance to win the following: 1x Black Market Patch 1x Hacker's Patch 20x Pulse Tanks 1x Berserker 1x Decimator 20x Sentinels 150x Devastator
hash.items.decimator1.name: Decimator

hash.items.PulseRack.description: Save 20%! Buy a rack of 4 Pulse Cores and get one FREE!
hash.research.rhino.description: Armored alien that uses its powerful horn as a battering ram.
hash.message.1128winner.body: Congratulations! Your Alliance won 50 Platinum in our Alliance Harvest Contest! Refresh the game to see your updated Platinum total!
hash.message.body.20130521forcetournamentremi:
Today is the Last Day to Participate in our latest Force Tournament!
All Force earned through troop training, building, researching, equipment upgrading, and General Skill upgrading will contribute to your Tournament AND Leaderboard rankings! In addition, Force Points gained by upgrading your General through the use of SP or Generals Orders will be QUADRUPLED(x4) for the duration of the tournament!
The top 10 players on each sector will each qualify for Tournament Prize Boxes, which contain the following:
Platinum Prize Box - Guarantees a Level 16 Black Market Patch, Generals Order, Incineraptor, Synthetic Control Core, or Onyx Core Gold Prize Box - Chance to win a Level 16 Black Market Patch, Generals Order, Incineraptor, Synthetic Control Core, Onyx Core, Hacker's Patch, Vermillion Core, Cerulean Core, or SP 5000 Silver Prize Box - Decreased chance to win prizes from the Platinum and Gold boxes, plus a 30% Troop Accelerator, SP 1000, Incendiary Core, or Decimator Core Bronze Prize Box - Decreased chance to win prizes from Gold and Silver Boxes plus Troops and Speed Ups
The next 10 players in each sector will receive a variety of great prizes as well! Check the in game leaderboard for more details.
This Tournament ends tonight at 11:59 PM PDT, Good luck!
-- Edgeworld Team
hash.missions.loot-over-5-000-energy.name: Loot over 5,000 energy
hash.missions.crush-the-enemy.name: Crush the Enemy
hash.message.body.20121218highfactionbases:
The Maar, Erazi, and Helio factions have grown weary of constant, unrelenting defeat. They have spent months researching new technology and running hundreds of tests on unsuspecting Pyros. Now they are ready to reveal the fruits of their labor: shiny new bases!

To see if they have you stumped, or to simply remind them who's boss, you can challenge these factions either through the Combat menu!

Good luck, Commander - you just might need it!
hash.missions.trust-me.name: Trust me
hash.missions.form-raider-squad.description: Personality analysis shows that these candidates are committing robberies anyway. They might as well do it for us.
hash.message.body.20130205shieldgenerator2bui:
With the release of our newest Shield Generator, we will be holding a Shield Generator Build-a-thon!
For a Limited Time, upgrade your New Shield Generator between now and 11:59pm PST on February 7th for a chance to take home Platinum Prizes! The First 3 players who reach Level 15 with this new structure will each receive 1000 Platinum for their efforts, and 5 other random players who successfully complete a Shield Generator Upgrade to level 5 or higher will each take home 500 Platinum!
Check out your new Shield Generator in your main base today and make sure to get started!
hash.hero.skills.teleport.description: Click to teleport the General anywhere on the map. At level 10 click and hold to teleport General and surrounding troops.
hash.daily.text.20130412corrosiveturretevent: Reduced build times for a limited time only. Click here for details.
hash.items.mysterybox30.name: Master Blaster Mystery Box
hash.ew.mute.warn: This player's message will be muted for the remainder of this play session.
hash.items.commonalloy.description: Material necessary for Common Crafting Recipes
hash.message.body.201212missions: Need something to strive for? New missions have been added to include levels 9 and 10! Already met the requirements for these missions? Collect the rewards from the Missions panel at any time.
hash.message.body.ceruleannetworksabotage:
The most powerful and feared piece of technology in Cerulea is now available in the shop for a very limited time! Increase your turrets defense against invading Generals by equipping this E-Lab part and fend off your opponents!
This special deal will only be available for 24 hours so act fast and power up your turrets today!
Check the featured tab of the store to pick up your CNS!
hash.message.marchplatinumpromo.subject: Get your FREE Platinum!
hash.message.body.spend-ceruleanblastshield:
All day today we will be rolling out special Platinum Spend Events!
These special events will start at 9am PDT and end at 9pm PDT. Don’t miss out on this opportunity to earn amazing prizes! Prizes will be paid out no later than August 23rd.
For every 100 Platinum you spend from 9am to 12pm PDT you will receive one Cerulean Blast Shield! This part vastly increases your Turret Defense against Decimators so take advantage of this deal while it lasts! Limit of 3 Blast Shields per Player, per Sector.
Check in all day for bigger and better deals!
hash.missions.cold-shoulder.objectives: Upgrade a Staging Area to Level 7
hash.items.energybox.description: These crates contain between 250,000 and 20,000,000 Energy.
hash.message.body.20130528forcetournamentremi:
Today is the Last Day to Participate in our latest Total Force Tournament!
All Force earned through troop training, building, researching, equipment upgrading, and General Skill upgrading will contribute to your Tournament AND Leaderboard rankings! In addition, All gain from Tournament Force Categories will be DOUBLED(x2) for the duration!
The top 10 players on each sector will each qualify for Tournament Prize Boxes, which contain the following:
Platinum Prize Box - Guarantees a Level 16 Black Market Patch, Generals Order, Incineraptor, Synthetic Control Core, or Onyx Core Gold Prize Box - Chance to win a Level 16 Black Market Patch, Generals Order, Incineraptor, Synthetic Control Core, Onyx Core, Hacker's Patch, Vermillion Core, Cerulean Core, or SP 5000 Silver Prize Box - Decreased chance to win prizes from the Platinum and Gold boxes, plus a 30% Troop Accelerator, SP 1000, Incendiary Core, or Decimator Core Bronze Prize Box - Decreased chance to win prizes from Gold and Silver Boxes plus Troops and Speed Ups
The next 10 players in each sector will receive a variety of great prizes as well!
In addition to these overall prizes, Daily Prizes are now available for the top 3 players an a given day as well as Achievement Prizes once you pass certain Force Thresholds! Check the in game leaderboard for more details.
This Tournament ends on May 30th at 11:00 PM PST, so make sure to get started today. Good luck!
-- Edgeworld Team
hash.message.body.05242013platinumpackage:
There are NEW bonus items in the 225, 400, 1000, 2500 and 5000 platinum packages!
We have removed the Pulse Core, 15-Minute Warp Boost, 15-Minute Troop Energizers, Combat Tactics and Terraknor Box items and replaced them with Onyx Cores, Decimator Boxes, Builders Boxes and Incendiary Boxes!
Get the best bonuses ever for your platinum package purchases today!
hash.missions.command-center-improvements.des: Successful operation on Cerulea IV starts with a well-equipped Command Center. Well, actually, it starts with a brilliant Support A.I., but you already have that.
hash.daily.text.marcherazicontest: Destroy 50 Erazi bases this weekend for a chance to win one of 500 Erazi Smuggler's Crates!
hash.missions.double-barreled.name: Double-Barreled
hash.items.permanentadvancedweapons.name: Advanced Ammunition
hash.promotion.20110701.body:
The Galactic Union is gone, but not forgotten. This weekend, we celebrate our freedom from the Cerulean War, and the Commanders that made it possible!

--Platinum Sweepstakes--
Purchase a Platinum Package for your chance to win!
Twenty players who buy a $10 package will win 2x Platinum!
One player who buys a $100 package will win 5x Platinum!

--Alliance XP Contest--
Raise your flag and build your Alliance!
One Alliance in each Sector with the highest total XP gain this weekend will win a HAX-1 Speedup for every member of the Alliance. Work together to claim the big prize!

--Featured Commanders--
Look for the new Hoarder and Warlord's Wealth missions in your mission list, suggested by Katiyana!
Get some advice from one of our top players - visit the forums to read our interview with Jangoon!
Could you be our next Featured Commander?

Contest winners will be announced on July 5.
Full rules and details are in the forums! Visit the forums now!

hash.zootsjackpot.description:
<font color="FFD93F">How to Play Zoot's Jackpot:</font>
Click play to start the game.
After each round, you have a chance of landing on four types of tiles.
<font color="FFD93F">Prize:</font> you may choose to either CLAIM or RISK the prize to play the next row. Each row contains more valuable prizes and better Jackpot odds, but also has a higher chance of landing on a Skull.
<font color="FFD93F">Platinum:</font> you enter the Platinum Round. In the Platinum Round, you may choose 10 tiles. You win the total of all the Platinum contained in these 10 tiles!
<font color="FFD93F">JACKPOT:</font> you win the Progressive Platinum Jackpot! Every game play increases the Jackpot and each Jackpot win resets the counter.
<font color="FFD93F">Skull:</font> you receive a consolation prize and the game ends.
Each game costs 25 Platinum to play. Playing higher rows does not cost additional Platinum, but you run the risk of losing your prize.
The game ends after a prize is claimed, at the conclusion of a Platinum Round, after a Jackpot win or after landing on a Skull.

hash.message.body.20121116herobuyeventreminde:
Today is the Last Day to participate and take advantage of our latest event to acquire skill points for your General!
From now until 11:59pm PST tonight (November 18th), every 200 Platinum purchased will qualify you to receive an exclusive Generals Mystery Box which will guarantee to contain at least 100 Hero Skill Points but that's not all! Each box also comes with a chance to contain an item which can grant 1000 or even 5000 Skill Points!
Skill Points can be used to level up your General's abilities which can range from passive boosts to your base to more active boosts to your troops in combat. More information on this feature can be found on the forums, so check our official announcement for more details:
<link>
This event ends at 11:59pm PST TONIGHT (November 18th), so make your purchases now before the deadline! Results will be compiled and mystery boxes delivered on the day of this new release next week!

hash.promotion.110211.body:
We must improve our knowledge of the terrible Lancer! Upgrade your Lancer Research by Monday, and you could win! We're giving out one prize to a random player in each Sector for each level of Research: Level 1: Combat Skill
Level 2: Combat Tactics
Level 3: Combat Strategy
Level 4: Combat Strategy x2
Level 5: Combat Strategy x3
Level 6: Combat Strategy x4
Level 7: Combat Strategy x5
Level 8: Combat Strategy x5 + Warrior's Kit
Level 9: Combat Strategy x5 + Master's Kit Increase your Research to be eligible for higher prizes. (Also, fewer players have high-level Research, so your chances to win are better, too!) Prizes are awarded Monday, November 7. Good luck! Click on your Tech Lab and start your research!

hash.message.body.20130418forcetournament:
A brand new 3 DAY Building and Generals Force Tournament has just begun!
All Force earned through Building and Upgrading your Generals will contribute to your leaderboard ranking but that's not all! Force gained from these methods will also be DOUBLED (x2) throughout the duration!
The top 40 players on each sector will win valuable prizes such as Trophies, premium items, troops, and bragging rights over your enemies!
This Tournament ends on April 21st at 11:00 PM PDT, so get started today before you're left behind. Good luck!
-- Edgeworld Team
hash.message.body.04182013level16:
At long last, Buildings, Troops, Generals and Research can finally be upgraded to Level 16!
You will see a greater increase in the power of your Troops, Buildings and Generals, a larger Base Size, additional Levels of Research, and significantly increased Warp Gate capacities at Level 16, so it is essential that you upgrade your base today!
Additionally, upon upgrading your Resource Converter building to Level 16, you will also gain a brand new powerful turret called the Orbital Strike Cannon! This unique turret will hover over your Resource Converter and convert your existing resources into high-powered energy blasts that lay waste to your enemies! Please check the forums for more information on the Level 16 upgrades along with this brand new turret.
For a Limited Time only, Build Times for Level 16 Buildings are 50% OFF through 12pm PST on April 22nd! Wipe out your competition by rapidly upgrading all of your Buildings, Troops, Generals and Research to Level 16 today!

hash.promotion.erazi25.body:
Commander, your devotion to crushing the Erazi Syndicate is commendable. The Maar Confederacy has sent Gas and Crystal to our base. They call it a 'Tax Rebate,' but I think they're just afraid of us destroying all their bases again!

Check your inventory using the Shop button to access these items.

You have received 50,000 Crystal and Gas.
hash.message.marchalliance.body:
Take your Alliance to the top, and win Pulse Cores for every member!
Fight your way to the top of your Sector! We're looking for three Alliances in each Sector:
The most Power on the Alliance Leaderboard
The most Nodes controlled on the Map
The highest Map Score
If your Alliance is the highest in any of these three categories, you'll win a Pulse Core for every member!
Bonus! Win all three categories, and every member will receive a Pulse Rack instead! Can you pull it off?
We'll select the winners Wednesday, March 28, at noon PST (7:00pm UTC). Fight hard to be on top!

hash.Message.body.04302013generals:
All of the Generals are stronger than ever before!
From now on, each time that you apply a General’s Orders to a General, the General will get an increase in health and damage along with an improvement in the effectiveness of its premium active ability! Additionally, Generals that have at least 10 General’s Orders applied to them can now be deployed into battle simultaneously! Please check the forums for more information on this exciting new feature.
The General’s Orders mystery box is currently in the store, so be sure to get a few and try out these new features today!

hash.missions.capacity-upgrade.description: It's time to increase storage capacity once more. Currently, our supplies are jammed in there pretty tight. If a depot gets hit, we're in for some gorgeous fireworks.
hash.missions.nice-work-guys.description: We're not just celebrating the construction of a new factory; we're also happy to announce that there hasn't been an industrial accident in over sixteen minutes.
hash.items.mysterybox4.description: Open for a chance to win our most powerful part yet, the Cerulean Network Sabotage! This box can also contain Hacker’s Patches, 24 Hour Accelerators, Alloys, Incineraptors and Incendiary Cores!

hash.message.body.20130627forcetournament:
A brand new 4 DAY Engineering Lab Part Upgrade and Building Force Tournament has just begun!
All Force earned through troop training, building, researching, equipment upgrading, and General Skill upgrading will contribute to your Tournament AND Leaderboard rankings but that's not all! In addition, Engineering Lab Part Upgrades and Building Force Points will be TRIPLED(x3) for the duration of the tournament!
The top 10 players on each sector will each qualify for Tournament Prize Boxes, which contain the following:
Platinum Prize Box - Guarantees a Level 16 Black Market Patch, Generals Order, Incineraptor, Synthetic Control Core, or Onyx Core Gold Prize Box - Chance to win a Level 16 Black Market Patch, Generals Order, Incineraptor, Synthetic Control Core, Onyx Core, Hacker's Patch, Vermillion Core, Cerulean Core, or SP 5000 Silver Prize Box - Decreased chance to win prizes from the Platinum and Gold boxes, plus a 30% Troop Accelerator, SP 1000, Incendiary Core, or Decimator Core Bronze Prize Box - Decreased chance to win prizes from Gold and Silver Boxes plus Troops and Speed Ups
The next 10 players in each sector will receive a variety of great prizes as well! Check the in game leaderboard for more details.
In addition to these overall prizes, Daily Prizes are now available for the top 3 players an a given day as well as Achievement Prizes once you pass certain Force Thresholds! Check the in game leaderboard for more details.
This Tournament ends on June 30th at 11:00 PM PDT, so be sure to get started today. Good luck!
-- Edgeworld Team
hash.message.body.20121030incendiarysale:
Still haven't maxed out your Turrets? Now is your chance to purchase Incendiary Cores for the low price of 15 Platinum! This sale will only be available until November 1st, so make sure to get yours today!
Stack your Engineering Lab parts with maxed out turrets and make your base an invincible force!

The 1st place finisher will receive a Platinum Prize Box and the 2nd-20th place finishers will receive Gold and Silver boxes!
All Force earned through troop training, building, researching, equipment upgrading, and General Skill upgrading will contribute to your Tournament AND Leaderboard rankings but that's not all! In addition, Training and E-Lab Force Points will be QUADRUPLED (x4) for the duration of the tournament!

Platinum Prize Box - Guarantees Level 16 Black Market Patches, Generals Orders, Incineraptors, Synthetic Control Cores, or Onyx Cores Gold Prize Box - Chance to win Level 16 Black Market Patches, Generals Orders, Incineraptors, Synthetic Control Cores, Onyx Cores, Hacker's Patches, Vermillion Cores, Cerulean Cores, or SP 5000s Silver Prize Box - Decreased chance to win prizes from the Platinum and Gold boxes, plus 50% Troop Accelerators, SP 1000s, Incendiary Cores, or Decimator Cores Bronze Prize Box - Decreased chance to win prizes from Gold and Silver Boxes plus Troops or Speed Ups

As a show of appreciation to all of our players, we will be holding a VERY LIMITED TIME Platinum Sale!
This offer will only be available between 10:00am PST on September 28th and 10:00am PST on October 1st, so make sure to take advantage of the following reduced prices!
155 platinum for $17.90 instead of $19.90 240 platinum for $24.90 instead of $29.90 425 platinum for $39.90 instead of $49.90 1100 platinum for $79.90 instead of $99.90 3000 platinum for $199.90 instead of $249.90 6000 platinum for $299.90 instead of $399.90

hash.message.body.forceboxes:
Looking for a boost in the Training Force Tournament? We’ve got three new Troop Mystery boxes that will guarantee you a minimum amount of Force when opened!
The Use the Force Box contains a minimum of 10,000 Force Points when opened and has the chance for amazing Force amounts up to 500,000 Force Points! Open this box to unlock troops worth 10K, 25K, 50K, 100K, 250K or 500K Force! For the low price of 20 Platinum, you have the opportunity to blaze your way up the Force Tournament ladder in seconds!
Troops available include Pulse Tanks, Berzerkers, Decimators, Battlecruisers and Incineraptors!
We are also unveiling the 50K Force Box and the 100K Force Box that guarantees you big Force gains and elite troops!
The 50K Force Box guarantees you over 50,000 Force Points when opened and could include Berzerkers, Decimators and Incineraptors!
The 100K Force Box guarantees you over 100,000 Force Points when opened and could catapult you up to the top of the Leaderboard in no time!
These boxes are only available for a limited time so be sure to stock up today and eliminate your competition!
hash.research-defense.brawler.name: Berserker Defense
hash.items.kirasgift.name: KIRA's Gift
hash.message.body.pddgeneralscrate: Save some serious Platinum! - pick up the General's Crate for 25% OFF during Platinum Deal Day!
hash.message.subject.08162013incineraptors: Synthetic Control Cores on SALE! Train Incineraptors!
hash.message.eutournamentshort.subject: Show us your Strength, Commander!
hash.promotion.eraziassault.body:
The Maar Confederacy was pushed to the brink of destruction, but they've bounced back with surprising strength. Where are their resources coming from?

Governor Maalick of the Confederacy has publicly denounced the actions of the Erazi Syndicate, calling them the largest and most powerful criminal organization in the galaxy. (Which is completely true.)

The Maar Confederacy has created a program of subsidies, tax cuts, and bonus items for the Commanders who help them gain revenge on the Erazi Syndicate.

To win, destroy as many Erazi Command Centers as you can from 12:00 Saturday morning to 11:59 Monday night! (PST, 6am GMT).

Every Commander who achieves these goals will win these items - the Maar aren't leaving anything to chance.

10 attacks: 1000 Crystal and Gas

25 attacks: 50,000 Crystal and Gas

50 attacks: 100,000 Crystal and Gas

75 attacks: 250,000 Crystal and Gas

100 attacks: 1,000,000 Crystal and Gas

150 attacks: 4,000,000 Crystal and Gas

250 attacks: 20,000,000 Crystal and Gas

Details and full rules are in the forums! Show the Erazi your might!
hash.message.body.20121102vulcanbox:
Still looking to unlock and upgrade more equipment for your Engineering Lab? Here's your chance to win some powerful Dual Targeting Parts with our newest addition, the Vulcan Box!
Dual Targeting Parts will target more then one unit with each Turret attack. The amount of targets can be increased through upgrade levels, so imagine what these upgrades can do for your sniper turrets!
Some of these parts can contain more then one property, like Frozen Dual Barrels! This item will not only shoot multiple targets but can also freeze them in place! Make sure to check our the Vulcan Box today to get your hands on these Lab Parts but don't delay. The Vulcan Box will only be available for a Limited Time!
hash.daily.text.04022013fireproof: Buy a Cerulean Fireproof Shield Box for your chance to win this powerful equipment!
hash.missions.cerulium-munitions.description: We have the option of upgrading Titan weapons with reactive Cerulium. It's a good idea, and not just because explosions excite me.
hash.missions.unlock-specter-file-4.name: Unlock Specter File 4
hash.daily.title.20130613wheelgame: Improved Zoot's Wheel Game for Ruby Cores!
hash.items.flag4.description: Banner to be equipped to Banner Monument
hash.missions.headless-foreman.name: Acts of Defiance
hash.missions.supercompression.name: Supercompression
hash.missions.molten-uranium-dregs.descriptio: The new liquid core has improved the reactor's efficiency, and we've been spraying the leftover dregs of molten uranium in the garden, just to see what the results are. I mean, what's the worst that could happen?
hash.message.body.20120907defensesimxpboost:
We have adjusted the amount of XP gained from the Defense Simulator, so starting today you will receive much more XP from each Simulation! Make sure to take advantage of this opportunity to gain extra levels and earn more equipment for your Engineering Lab!
-- Edgeworld Team
hash.message.body.20130208terraknor:
Commander,
Remember when I told you that we had a safe and environmentally sound way of disposing of our research chemicals? About that...
The Terraknor may or may not have all died off due to some sort of chemical induced illness. We're lucky that the chemicals had a different effect on one of the other local creatures. They've become huge, and aggressive.
I call them "Lancers".
We should be able to use our old Control Devices to weaponize these new creatures, assuming we survive their initial assault. Get to the Defense Simulator. Break them.
hash.items.mysteryboxt.description:
Guaranteed to include one of the following enhancement tokens:
3.0 Piercing Armor Token 3.0 Armor Token 3.0 Explosive Ammo Token
hash.research-defense.disruptor.name: Disruptor Defense
hash.message.marchspendplatinum.body:
From 3/22 to 3/26, every 500 Platinum spent will earn you a FREE KIRA'S GIFT!
Wise Platinum use is the mark of a great Commander. KIRA is rewarding your strategy with a free KIRA's Gift for every 500 Platinum spent!
Just spend Platinum between now and midnight 3/26 PST (7am 3/27 UTC) to receive your free KIRA's Gifts! The more Platinum spent, the more Gifts you'll receive!
Visit the 'Get Platinum' page to view our Platinum packages! Each one comes with BONUS Platinum and items!
hash.message.body.20130807forcetournament:
There is a new Force Tournament starting today with AMAZING prizes! It will last for 4 DAYS and provide you with a 3x boost to Building and Training!
All Force earned through troop training, building, researching, equipment upgrading, and General Skill upgrading will contribute to your Tournament AND Leaderboard rankings but that's not all! In addition, Building and Training Force Points will be TRIPLED (x3) for the duration of the tournament!
The top 40 players on each sector will each qualify for Prizes, the most ever from any Force Tournament!
Items such as Ruby Cores, Black Market Patches, Generals Orders and other building Cores can be won but that's not all! We will also be giving out a box to the top players in each sector that is GUARANTEED to include Cerulean Alloys, Fireproof Shield Tokens or Hacker's Patches! The Fireproof Shield Tokens protect your turrets against damage from Bomba units! Make sure to check the Tournament Leaderboard in game for an exact breakdown on the new prize structure.
In addition to these overall prizes, Daily Prizes will be available for the top 3 players in a given day as well as Achievement Prizes that can be warned once you pass certain Force Thresholds! Check the in game leaderboard for this breakdown as well.
This Tournament ends on August 10th at 11:00 PM PST, so be sure to get started today. Good luck!
-- Edgeworld Team
hash.fte.panel.welcome.content: You'll be happy to know I'm the highest functioning AI this side of the Omega Nebula.
hash.missions.resonance-mining.description: It seems Ceruleans were able to detect crystal deposits by measuring reactions to sonic pulses. Very useful, provided you don't mind the entire compound shaking every hour or so.
hash.message.body.20130219renegadebox:
For a Limited Time only the New Renegade Mystery Box will be avilable within the shop! For 10 Platinum comes the chance to win a Renegade Crate, but that's not all! Other great items are available within including Berserkers, 8x XP Boosts, Accelerators and more!
Stock up today before this box leaves the store!
hash.items.specter100.name: Specter Platoon
hash.items.shieldedradialliquidcoolant.name: Shielded Radial Liquidcoolant
hash.missions.loot-over-1-000-gas.objectives: Loot over 1,000 gas from any faction's base.
hash.promotion.20120314.newusers.subject: Get your FREE Beginner's Crate!
hash.items.mysterybox21.description: This box has a chance to contain: Berzerkers, Sentinels, Incineraptors, Pulse Tanks and Bombas!
hash.missions.solar-flair-2.name: Solar Flair 2
hash.message.body.20130627zootsjackpot:
Frozen Tokens have been released, which can be attached to any of your Engineering Lab Parts and provide an immediate Concussion Effect! Use these tokens to Enhance and greatly reduce the threat of incoming attacks!
The only way to win these new tokens is through our latest version of Zoot's Jackpot!
Try this new and Improved Zoot's Jackpot today for a chance to take home a newly released Frozen Token as well as other highly sought after premium items like Ruby Cores, General's Orders, Hacker's Patches and more! Each play also could net you the Jackpot, which can range from hundreds to even possibly thousands of Platinum!
Click on the "Z" icon next to your Mailbox to check out Zoot's Jackpot today! This event will only be available until 11:59pm PDT on June 30th so don't delay! Take advantage today before someone else wins big!
hash.missions.come-fly-away.description: We have upgraded base telemetry by using the circuitry of a crashed Erazi Frigate. All we need are some thrusters and the Command Center can be repurposed into a starship.
hash.warning.turret.in-progress: You are building a turret! It will not fire until it's finished. You may want to speed it up to improve your defenses!
hash.promotion.level8.admiraltenmu.body:
There is more to this world than you know. The technology of the Ceruleans can be harnessed to enhance your buildings and units, taking their abilities to the next level.

This frequency isn’t secure, and I must be brief. All the secrets of Cerulean technology and level 8 research and upgrades will soon be revealed.

We are entering a new era of this planet-wide conflict. Good luck, Commander.

Respectfully,
Admiral Tenmu
hash.ew.campaign.new11.name: Strength in Numbers (3k-75k)
hash.missions.daily-battle-erazi.description: Executrix Scylith and her faction have been reported to making significant progress with their quantum genetic experiments. Defeat one of their bases and we might just learn what these are for.
hash.message.subject.04112013tcbuildathon: Last Day for Turret Control Build and Research Showdown!
hash.items.flag13.description: Banner to be equipped to Banner Monument

hash.message.body.20120924purchaseplatreminde: As a reminder, until 11:59pm PST TONIGHT (September 24th) you can enter to win 10,000 FREE PLATINUM by making a platinum purchase! Every 100 platinum purchased before the event end gives you an entry to win! There is no limit on the number of entries! Five lucky winners will be chosen on September 25th and platinum prizes will be distributed that same day!
hash.promo.ton.body: Join bloodthirsty vampires in a fight for supremacy!
hash.message.subject.lethalforcemb: Lethal Force Mystery Box on SALE!
hash.units.chimera.name: Chimera
hash.items.trainingoverdrive6.description: 6x the speed of all Training for 1 hour.
hash.message.body.maximumforcemb:
The Maximum Force Box contains massive amounts of troops that will provide you with Force when opened! Win the Grand Prize of 1,000 Incineraptors inside! Other Prizes include 50, 100 and 200 bundles of Premium Troops! This box can contain Pulse Tanks, Sentinels, Berzerkers, Decimators, Battlecruisers and Incineraptors!
BONUS: Starting now until 11:00pm PDT on 10/13/2013, purchasing Maximum Force Boxes will earn you prizes!!
Purchase 5 Maximum Force Boxes, receive 2 Maximum Force Boxes FREE!
Purchase 10 Maximum Force Boxes, receive 5 Maximum Force Boxes FREE!
Limit one prize per player, per sector. Prizes will be distributed by October 14th, 2013.
hash.missions.precision-scanners.description: With Cerulean warp scanners we can finally deploy larger and tighter troop formations without worrying that one soldier might materialize inside another.
hash.items.memorialdaycrate.tooltip:
100% of the proceeds will go towards the Iraq and Afghanistan Veterans of America charity!
Includes: 1x Decimator Rack 1x Vermillion Core 1x 30% Training Accelerator
hash.missions.research-titan.name: Research Titan
hash.items.mysteryboxh.name: Silver Prize Box
hash.missions.pain-chain.description: Back on Earth, hornets' stings were more painful than bees, and they could sting multiple times. Of course, they're all gone now, but their namesakes are also good at inflicting large-scale pain.
hash.message.subject.20130201generalsordermys: NEW and IMPROVED General’s Order Mystery Box!
hash.missions.arms-race.description: Scylith's techs are working on some new weapon culled from a raid on one of Malick's bases. She's only got one piece of the puzzle, but we can't let her figure it out before we do.
hash.missions.snipertower9.description: Complete this upgrade and the turret will be dishing out over 300% more damage than when you first built it. A wise investment, to say the least.
hash.items.ceruleanalloy.description: Material necessary for Cerulean Crafting Recipes
hash.items.shieldedautomaticdualbarrels.name: Shielded Automatic Dualbarrels
hash.ew.protection.tooltip.title: BASE PROTECTION
hash.daily.retention.kabam-tip: Get an edge on the competition with daily rewards at kabam.com!
hash.missions.assassin-s-den.description: I've decrypted the files we recovered from that Erazi Council meeting. They detail an assassination plot, and you're on the target list. Let's beat their hit squad to the punch.
hash.missions.cherry-bombs.name: Cherry Bombs
hash.fte.panels.platinum.header: Score! You have 10 Platinum in your bank. Platinum is the currency used to buy items from the store.
hash.missions.solar-bandit.objectives: Loot over 1,000 energy from any faction's base
hash.daily.text.zootspromo: For a limited time, Zoot has changed the odds to award more and more high value items! Play early and often to WIN!
hash.message.marchtrainingpulsetankwinner.bod: Your pulse tank army is enormous and terrifying! We've granted you an Hour of Power Crate and KIRA's Gift in recognition of your military expansion! You can find these new items in your inventory.
hash.activerecord.errors.models.player.insuff: Your Engineering Lab inventory is full.
hash.missions.morgan-test.description: At this rate, your great-grandchildren will still be digging for crystals. Upgrade or expand!
hash.missions.build-factory.name: Build Factory
hash.missions.shooting-gallery.objectives: Destroy 10 turrets in a Maar Confederate's base
hash.research-defense.specter.name: Specter Defense
hash.missions.build-supply-depot.description: Surplus resources are useless unless they're stored properly. Crystals lose integrity, gas evaporates, energy dissipates, and uranium has a half-life. I recommend building a Supply Depot.
hash.missions.increase-energy-production-2.de: Build more Solar Plants, and upgrade them.
hash.missions.core-elevators.objectives: Upgrade a Supply Depot to Level 9
hash.missions.a-flurry-of-attacks.objectives: Upgrade Colony Warp Gate to Level 2
hash.message.body.20121106wheelgame:
Spin the Wheel for a chance to win fabulous prizes such as Cerulean Racks, Incendiary Racks, Builder's Boxes and Speed-ups but that's not all! Collect all 5 Zoot Chips and you'll take home a Renegade Crate!
Check the Wheel for more details but don't delay! This game will only be available for an extremely limited amount of time, so spin today before its too late!
hash.research.exploder.name: Bomba
hash.message.body.20121207alliancemobile:
Join an Alliance for a chance to take home a free 24 Hour Accelerator! 50 winners will randomly be selected who qualify, so there's never been a better time to team up!
You must be in an Alliance by 11:59pm PST on Friday December 14th to gain successful entry into this event, so make sure to team up before it's too late!
hash.message.levelnineearly.subject: Early Contest Announcement
hash.message.body.20130802buyevent:
Want to get your hands on Edgeworld's fastest accelerators? Purchase Platinum today and receive FREE 99% Building Accelerators! These items will reduce the time remaining on any current build by 99%, effectively making the training instant!
Every 200 Platinum that you buy between now and 11:59pm PST on August 3rd gets you one 99% Building Accelerator!
You can recieve up to 10 99% Building Accelerators in this event. Payouts will be distributed onto the server in which Platinum was purchased and added to your Inventory within three business days of this event's conclusion.
hash.daily.title.20130602buyevent: Purchase Platinum, Free Blast Shield Boxes!
hash.items.bursthyperpiercingammo.name: Burst Hyper Piercing Ammo
hash.daily.text.20130208buildingevent: All Building XP amounts have been MASSIVELY BOOSTED for a limited time! See your mail for more details.
hash.message.body.20130612forcetournament:
A brand new 3 DAY Engineering Lab Part Upgrade and Building Force Tournament has just begun!
All Force earned through troop training, building, researching, equipment upgrading, and General Skill upgrading will contribute to your Tournament AND Leaderboard rankings but that's not all! In addition, Engineering Lab Part Upgrade and Building Force Points will be TRIPLED(x3) for the duration of the tournament!
The top 10 players on each sector will each qualify for Tournament Prize Boxes, which contain the following:
Platinum Prize Box - Guarantees a Level 16 Black Market Patch, Generals Order, Incineraptor, Synthetic Control Core, or Onyx Core Gold Prize Box - Chance to win a Level 16 Black Market Patch, Generals Order, Incineraptor, Synthetic Control Core, Onyx Core, Hacker's Patch, Vermillion Core, Cerulean Core, or SP 5000 Silver Prize Box - Decreased chance to win prizes from the Platinum and Gold boxes, plus a 30% Troop Accelerator, SP 1000, Incendiary Core, or Decimator Core Bronze Prize Box - Decreased chance to win prizes from Gold and Silver Boxes plus Troops and Speed Ups
The next 10 players in each sector will receive a variety of great prizes as well! Check the in game leaderboard for more details.
In addition to these overall prizes, Daily Prizes are now available for the top 3 players an a given day as well as Achievement Prizes once you pass certain Force Thresholds! Check the in game leaderboard for more details.
This Tournament ends on August 25th at 11:00 PM PDT, so be sure to get started today. Good luck!
-- Edgeworld Team
hash.items.reinforcedscope.name: Reinforced Scope
hash.message.body.20130115antitankturret:
Commander, we are receiving a resupply from the fleet. It’s the schematics for a new defensive structure!
Introducing the advanced and powerful Anti-Tank turret! This turret fires modified Electromagnetic Pulse rounds. These bullets are capable of frying the circuitry of mechanical units, such as those built in the Factory.
They have no effect, however, on the biological based units from the Barracks, or the units from the Fleet Academy, due to their hardened circuitry and failsafe redundancy systems.
Add a powerful new strategy to your defensive arsenal, with the Anti-Tank Turret! Build yours today!
hash.message.body.04172013spendevent:
Want to make sure that you can successfully upgrade your equipment to Level 15? Spend Platinum today and receive FREE Hacker’s Patches!
For every 200 Platinum that you spend between now and 11:59pm PDT on April 18th, you will receive one FREE Hacker’s Patch!
Each player can receive up to a total of 10 Hacker’s Patches from this event. The prizes will be distributed onto the server in which Platinum was spent and added to your Inventory within 3 business days of this event's conclusion.
hash.missions.slow-down.description: Remember, their attack slow the enemy's rate of fire. Use the Hornets in large numbers, and you can overrun enemy defenses while they're still scrambling to mount a counterattack.
hash.items.privatescrate.description: Contains over 500 Platinum in value! Including 1 Hour, 2.5 Hour, 8 Hour Accelerators, Lottery Tokens and more!
hash.items.decimatorbox.name: Decimator Box
hash.items.aurorabronze.tooltip:
1x Aurora-1 Schematic
1x Pulse Core
1x Cerulean Core
5x 15-Min Accelerator
2x 1-Hour Accelerator
hash.items.shieldedextendeddualbarrels.name: Shielded Extended Dualbarrels
hash.research-defense.hornet.description: Research to reduce the damage Hornets do when attacking your base and colony.
hash.buildings.generalsquarters.name: Generals Quarters
hash.missions.extractor-scarabs.objectives: Upgrade a Gas Refinery to Level 8.
hash.daily.text.platinumaurora: Get a FREE Aurora-1 Schematic when you buy 1,000 Platinum!
hash.missions.build-concussion-turret.descrip: Concussion turrets fire shockwave rounds that slow attackers to a crawl, on the rare occasions that they are not pulverized outright. I quoted that from the USI operations manual.
hash.missions.cerulean-vr-tech.description: This building will keep our troops plugged into VR modules instead of sleeping, eating or taking breaks. This will keep them sharp and obedient.
hash.daily.text.20130430boxoffer100: Buy 100 General's Order Mystery Boxes and qualify for a FREE General's Order!
hash.message.levelnineearly.body:
Our Level 9 announcement went out a little early. Level 9 isn't in the game quite yet, but we're putting the final testing and polish on it! As soon as Level 9 arrives, our Level 9 contests will begin.

Watch the Fan Page and forums, and you'll know as soon as we release the next level of upgrades and start our contests!

Facebook Fan Page

Edgeworld Forums

Thanks for your patience, and good luck!

Barry
Edgeworld Community Manager
hash.activerecord.errors.models.alliance.cool: Alliance regulations require a 72-hour cooldown period before you can create another new Alliance. Please try again later.
hash.message.20120711upgradefactory3.body: Thank you for participating in our recent Upgrade Factory event. A Pulse Rack has been added to your inventory.
hash.daily.text.20120823incendiarysale: For a limited time only, Incendiary Cores are on SALE! Get yours now!
hash.missions.build-tech-lab.description: I am currently devoting only 0.0001% of my memory to our scientific discoveries. This is because we have not made any. There’s a world of exploitable Cerulean technology out there.
hash.promotion.octobertwitter.body:
Want some free Pulse Cores and Incendiary Cores? We’re giving away cores every hour from 10am-6pm Pacific, Fri-Mon on Twitter! Follow our Twitter feed, @EdgeworldGame, to win!

Just write a Tweet about Edgeworld, include your name and Sector, and use the #Edgeworld hashtag, and you could win free Cores!
hash.missions.how-accomodating.name: Your Mighty Army
hash.items.armortoken3.description: Applies a large scaling Health Boost permanently to an Engineering Lab Part!
hash.missions.erazi-hideout.objectives: Destroy the Command Center in a Level 15 Syndicate base.
hash.message.body.20100810aurora1sale:
For a limited time only, the Aurora-1 Colony is on sale in the Edgeworld Store!
The Aurora-1 Schematic is on sale for 99 Platinum, over 65% off the normal price! To give yourself a head start in your new colony, the Aurora-1 Kits (which include helpful Speed Ups and Cores) are also on sale!
Expanding your base into the new Aurora-1 Colony helps strengthen your defenses and supports the fight for dominance over Cerulea IV. With additional Training queues and Warp Gates as well as an exclusive Bomba Unit, Aurora-1 is an essential expansion for every Commander.
But hurry-- this sale ends at 5:00 PM PST on August 13th, 2012.
See you in Aurora-1, Commander!
hash.message.body.20120807trainathon:
Starting now until 12:00pm PDT August 10th, train the new UNNAMED Unit for a chance to win Platinum!
All players who train at least 250 of the new UNNAMED Unit during the event period will be entered into a random sweepstakes to win 500 platinum!
A total of 15 lucky winners will be chosen! Troop totals are counted per sector and therefore cannot be combined across sectors. Prizes will be awarded by August 15th, 2012.
Good luck, Commander!
hash.message.body.20130529tieredspend:
For a Limited Time, spend Platinum on your Base to receive AMAZING rewards!
Spend 500 Platinum to receive 1 Incineraptor, our most EXCLUSIVE and POWERFUL troop! Spend 1000 Platinum to receive 1 Renegade Crate in addition to the above tier! (1 Incineraptor) Spend 1500 Platinum to receive 1 General's Crate in addition to the above tiers (1 Incineraptor, 1 Renegade Crate) Spend 2000 Platinum to receive 1 Black Market Patch, unlocking the highest power levels for your Engineering Lab Parts, as well as all of the above tiers (1 Incineraptor, 1 Renegade Crate, and 1 Black Market Patch!
This is an event you cannot refuse! Event ends on May 30th at 11:59pm PDT, and prizes will be delivered within 3 business days.
hash.message.marcharmypulsetanks.body: Your pulse tank is enormous and terrifying! We've granted you an Hour of Power Crate in recognition of your military expansion! You can find this new item in your inventory.
hash.missions.erazi-weapons-lab.objectives: Destroy the Command Center in a Level 25 Syndicate base.

hash.missions.not-on-my-watch.name: Not on my watch
hash.message.body.defenselaunch:
Test your base defenses and earn XP with our new Tower Defense Mode!
Build the new Defense Simulator and battle waves of Marines, Pulse Tanks, Bombas and more! Complete all the campaigns to show that your base is the best.
For further details, click Here.

Save some serious Platinum!
Pick up the Scarbide Rack for 50% OFF during Platinum Deal Day!

hash.research-defense.marine.name: Marine Defense
hash.message.body.namethethor:
Do you want to have an impact on Edgeworld?
We need YOU to help us find the perfect name for our newest Troop! Post your suggestions to the appropriate post on our Facebook Fan Page by 10:00am PST on Friday, August 10th and we’ll pick the 5 best names. The community can then vote on their favorite of the top 5 in a Facebook poll to finalize it’s name.
Everyone who participates by commenting on our Facebook post will be entered to win a Cerulean Rack!
To find our Facebook fan page, click HERE
hash.buildings.gunturret.description: Gun Turrets fire a stream of projectiles at enemies. Upgrade to increase range, damage, and health.
hash.ew.alli.beta: Alliances are in beta and more features are coming! Suggest ideas on the forums.
hash.units.spider.name: Lancer
hash.missions.jump-jets-mk-ii.description: Jump jets help our soldiers move and fight. Improvements will mean fewer overload accidents, which the Marines call "blast-offs".

Win big for you and your Alliance!
Starting today, every 100 Platinum purchased will enter you and your Alliance for a chance to win! The Lucky Winner will receive 10,000 Platinum but that's not all! Each member of the winner's alliance will each take home 100 Platinum!
This event ends on 11:59pm PST (UTC-8) on Feb 11th. The Winner and their alliance will be selected and announced within 3 business days of this event's conclusion.

hash.missions.greater-cerulium-plating.descri: Cerulium walls are ultra-dense and near-impenetrable. Our troops will not only survive the impact of Disruptor fire, they'll sleep through it.

hash.promotion.levelnine.body:
Level 9 will be here soon! Upgrade your buildings and units to level 9, and you'll be entered to win great prizes!

Level 9 Upgrade Contest!

Upgrade any building to level 9, or research any unit to level 9, and you're automatically entered to win! Five players will win a Master's Kit! More level 9s mean more chances to win!

Upgrade Your Command Center!

A level 9 Command Center isn't just a good idea - it's a chance to win big! One user with a Level 9 Command Center will win 1100 Platinum!

Instant Upgrade Bonus!

Use the 'Buy Now' button to instantly upgrade a building or research a unit, and you could win! Fifteen players will win a Warriors' Kit!

And yes: If you instant upgrade your Command Center to level 9, you're entered into all three contests!

Our contests will begin as soon as our level 9 update is out, and winners will be announced on Monday, 9/19!
hash.daily.text.20130215generalsordermysteryb: Purchase the Generals Orders Box for a chance to take home a Generals Order or Troop boxes today!

hash.message.body.hwtlevel:
Take advantage of Supercharged Defenses and level up your Heavyweight Turrets!
Supercharged Defenses have hit Cerulea IV, and now you can upgrade your Heavyweight Turrets to take advantage of this new defensive technology!
For each Heavyweight Turret upgraded to Level 17, you will win a Turret Defense Prize Box that guarantees you one of the following items: a Level 1, 5 or 15 Cerulean Blast Shield, a Level 1, 5 or 15 Cerulean Meteoric Shield, or 1.0 and 2.0 Tokens! Limit 5 boxes per player.
On top of that, for every Turret you upgrade to Level 17, you will be entered in a Platinum Sweepstakes.
10 Lucky Players will win 100 Platinum each! 3 Really Lucky players will win 500 Platinum each!
This event ends tomorrow August 30th, 2013 at 3:00pm PDT. Prizes will be awarded within 3 business days of the end of this event.

hash.missions.swarming-up-to-you.description: Stir up trouble for your enemies by mobilizing an entire nest of hell-bent Hornets.
hash.Message.subject.20130426buildtimesremind: Today is the last day to take advantage of the 75% reduction in all research times! Don’t miss this unique opportunity to bring your Unit and Turret researches up to Level 16!

hash.daily.text.20130201researchevent: All Research XP amounts have been MASSIVELY BOOSTED for a limited time! See your mail for more details.
hash.message.maarembargo.body:
The Maar Confederacy is striking back against the Commanders of Cerulea IV! They're shooting down any transport ship they can target, especially any ship carrying Advanced Ammunition or Advanced Armor. Our supplies of these powerful items are running out!

Advanced Ammunition and Advanced Armor will be removed from the Edgeworld store by the end of the month. Get yours before it's too late!

hash.missions.mind-link.description:
A breakthrough! Control Devices can be used for complex telepathic communication between lifeforms and their "owners". Combat control will now be close to perfect.
Well, as close as it gets when linking to a giant wasp...

We're looking for the strongest Alliances in Edgeworld!

Three Alliances in each Sector will receive an 8-Hour Accelerator for every member of the Alliance!

Think you can win it? Read the full tournament rules here!

hash.message.subject.20130430forcetournamentb: Building and Lab Force Tournament - Last Day!
hash.message.body.20121127lvlup:
Gain the most levels and win 500 platinum! We'll also award the next 15 highest level gaining players with 200 platinum. Level up between 12:00 PM PST on November 27th and 5:00 PM PST on November 30th and the winner could be you! Good luck, Commander.
Rankings will be based on the total number of levels gained for each individual player per sector. Levels gained cannot be combined across sectors. Prizes will be distributed by December 3rd.
hash.message.subject.20130507forcetournamentr: Building and Lab Force Tournament - Last Day!
hash.fte.panel.warp.title: Warp Gate Capacity
hash.daily.text.20130807forcetournamentlongme:
All Force earned through troop training, building, researching, equipment upgrading, and General Skill upgrading will contribute to your Tournament AND Leaderboard rankings but that's not all! In addition, Building and Training Force Points will be TRIPLED (x3) for the duration of the tournament!
The top 40 players on each sector will each qualify for Prizes, the most ever from any Force Tournament!
Items such as Ruby Cores, Black Market Patches, Generals Orders and other building Cores can be won but that's not all! We will also be giving out a box to the top players in each sector that is GUARANTEED to include Cerulean Alloys, Fireproof Shield Tokens or Hacker's Patches! The Fireproof Shield Tokens protect your turrets against damage from Bomba units! Make sure to check the Tournament Leaderboard in game for an exact breakdown on the new prize structure.
In addition to these overall prizes, Daily Prizes will be available for the top 3 players in a given day as well as Achievement Prizes that can be warned once you pass certain Force Thresholds! Check the in game leaderboard for this breakdown as well.
hash.message.body.20120803purchase:
Right now, from 12:00pm PDT on August 3rd until 12:00pm PDT on August 10th, all players that purchase at least 500 platinum in the store will get five FREE Mystery Carriers! Each Mystery Carrier contains either 3,000 Marines or between 1 and 80 Pulse Tanks! Players are limited to five free Mystery Carriers over the event period.
Additionally, during the event period, players will receive five FREE Pulse Destroyers for EVERY 2,000 platinum purchased! Each Pulse Destroyer contains four Pulse Tanks that are instantly trained without using your Factory or resources! There is no limit on the number of Pulse Destroyers earned.
Prizes will be distributed by August 15th.
hash.ew.beginner-base.deal3-des: Includes Level 8 Buildings such as the Command Center, Defense Lab, Tech Lab, Barracks, Warp Gate, Staging Area, Generals Quarters, 36 turrets and much more! Get 3,500+ levels of experience FREE!
hash.message.marchtraintroops.body:
Train a massive army, and win Crates! We want to find Commanders dedicated to expanding their armies and recruiting new troops. These Commanders could win Crates containing high-value items!
200 players who train at least 100 Rhinos will win a HELIO SALVAGE CRATE!
200 players who train at least 10 Lancers will win an ERAZI SMUGGLER'S CRATE!
100 players who train at least 10 Disruptors will win an HOUR OF POWER CRATE!
100 players who train at least 5 Pulse Tanks will win an HOUR OF POWER CRATE!

Units must be trained and in your staging area by end of day 3/25! (Midnight PST, 7am UTC). Good luck!
hash.items.hyperscope.name: Hyper Scope
hash.daily.text.20121121generalskillupevent: Upgrade one of your General's skills to Level 5 or higher for a chance to take home more Skill Points!
hash.message.body.20121121incendiaryturretbui:
Today is the Last Day of the Incendiary Turret Build-a-thon!
Upgrade an Incendiary Turret to Level 2 or higher before 11:59pm PST tonight (November 26th) to be entered for a chance to take home an Incendiary Rack! 5 winners at random will be chosen and paid out after the conclusion of this event.
Today is also your last chance to take advantage of our Incendiary Core and Rack Sale, so go to the featured tab of the shop and buy yours today!
hash.missions.the-more-the-merrier.name: The More the Merrier
hash.missions.loot-over-5-000-crystals.object: Loot over 5,000 crystals from any faction's base
hash.units.pulsetank.description: In Beast Mode, Pulse Tanks fire huge explosives. They go into Beast Mode for 12 seconds when a friendly unit dies.
hash.missions.maar-orbital-link.description: Malick will be back again if we can't stop the flow of Confederate soldiers and supplies onto Cerulea. With our recent attacks, the last Maar orbital drop site is vulnerable.
hash.message.body.20130604wheelgame:
With the release of our new Engineering Lab Part Enhancement System, here is your chance to get your hands on some premium tokens!
Simply Spin the Wheel for a chance to win fabulous prizes and Zoot Chips! Collect 5 Zoot Chips and you'll take home a Grand Prize box that is guaranteed to hold one of the following premium Enhancement tokens!
Armor Token 2.0 Piercing Ammo Token 2.0 Explosive Ammo Token 2.0 Scope Token Liquid Coolant Token
Check the Wheel for more details but don't delay! This game will only be available for an extremely limited amount of time, so spin now before its too late!
If you want more information on our newest Enhancement Token release, make sure to check your in game mail or our Official Forums!
hash.items.teslaflag.name: Tesla Tower Flag
hash.promotion.alliancemapjanuary2.body: Congratulations! Your Alliance expanded dramatically, with the highest map Score growth during our Alliance Map Tournament! Every member of your Alliance receives an 8-Hour Accelerator!
hash.message.body.20130410dragonboxreminder:
Today is the Last Day to win an exclusive and untrainable Incineraptor!
Simply purchase one of our new Incineraptor Mystery Box for a chance to take home this exclusive, new, and untrainable troop!
You can also win Sentinels, Berserkers, Devestators, and much more!
The Incineraptor can not be trained, and currently this Mystery Box is one of the only ways to get one! This box will only be available for a few more hours, so visit the featured tab of the shop and stock up before its too late!
hash.daily.text.20130530sniperturretevent: Reduced build times for a limited time only. Click here for details.
hash.message.body.20130710scarbidesale: Scarbide Racks will be on Sale for 75% OFF - our biggest discount ever! Visit the featured tab of the shop and get yours today!

hash.message.body.20130201generalsordermyster:
NEW and IMPROVED General’s Order Mystery Box!
With the release of the new and powerful addition of the Premium Skills, your Generals have never been stronger! Leveling up these new skills requires a Generals Order, and here is your chance to win some!
Simply purchase our new Generals Orders Box for an even better chance to take home this exclusive item, but that's not all!
We’ve also TRIPLED the chance to win 5 Generals Orders, and you also can receive other troop items like Berserkers, Disruptors, Pulse Tanks, and Incineraptors that all will provide XP when opened!
The only way to get these Generals Orders currently is through this Mystery Box, which will only be available for a Limited Time! Visit the featured tab of the store to get yours today!
hash.message.body.20130530sniperturreteventre:
Today is the Last Day to take advantage of the 75% reduced build times on Sniper Turrets!
Make sure to get building before its too late!

All Force earned through troop training, building, researching, equipment upgrading, and General Skill upgrading will contribute to your Tournament AND Leaderboard rankings! In addition, Training and Research Force Points will be TRIPLED(x3) for the duration of the tournament!
The top 10 players on each sector will each qualify for Tournament Prize Boxes AND the next 10 players will receive a variety of great prizes as well!
In addition to these overall prizes, Daily Prizes are now available for the top 3 players an a given day as well as Achievement Prizes once you pass certain Force Thresholds! Check the in game leaderboard for more details.

hash.message.body.09052013trainathon:
A new Battlecruiser Challenge is set to begin! We will be tracking Battlecruisers trained on each Sector between 12:00am PDT on September 7th and 11:59pm PDT on September 8th!
The top Player who trains the most Battlecruisers on each Sector will win 1,000 Platinum!
Furthermore, for every 5 Battlecruisers you train, you will earn a FREE Tier 3 Rare Part Box! Open these for a chance to win the ultra-rare Cerulean SkyShroud, Meteoric Barrier, Network Sabotage, Blast Shield, or other rare parts!
There is no limit on these rewards, so don't miss out! Make sure you load up on Onyx Cores, get your Defense Lab to level 15, then visit Caldera-2 and begin training today!
Winners will be paid out within three days of Event's end.
hash.daily.text.defenselab: Build the Defense Lab and use it to research tactics that make units attacking your base less powerful. Check your mail for more details.

hash.missions.assembly-upgrade.description: The upgraded assembly mechanism will enable us to produce even more armor and weaponry per day, Commander. The factory has also been re-armored, which will allow it to withstand our enemies while our turrets incinerate them.
hash.buildings.mine.description: The Neutron Mine explodes when an attacking unit comes within range, triggering a deadly explosion. These mines pack a fearsome punch!

hash.fte.kira.battle.success: Excellent work, Commander! As well as getting revenge on the Maar, we gained some valuable experience and even managed to recover some of the Maar resources!
hash.missions.miners-hack.description: Our mines have reached unprecedented production levels. The crystal dust will probably penetrate the miners' breathing-filters, but you can't make an omelet without breaking a few lungs.
hash.daily.text.20130219renegadebox: Win Renegade Crates, Berserkers, Accelerators and more! Check your mail for more details.
hash.missions.legion-lodge.description:
General Grod of the Helio Legion betrayed the Union to please his massive army.

We're strong enough to contain him, but we should train while we fight to keep our numbers high.
hash.message.instanttrain.body: Sometimes, you need an army, and you need it NOW. Instant Training works just like Instant Upgrade and Instant Research - just queue up the troops you want, click Buy Now, and they'll be ready for use immediately!
hash.daily.text.3xthursdayspendevent: We’re giving out 3x the rewards for spending Platinum all day!

hash.daily.text.colonies: Colonies have arrived! Build yours now and DOMINATE!
hash.daily.text.buy2000platinum: Spend 1,000 Platinum and receive 5 free Accelerator Boxes! Check your inbox for more details.
hash.buildings.constructorbuilding.descriptio: The Constructor manufactures advanced construction nanos which reduces the time it takes to build any structures.
hash.buildings.tankturret.description: The Heavyweight Turret boasts high health and fires upon multiple targets. Upgrade to increase health and number of targets.

hash.message.body.20130608forcetournament:
A brand new 4 DAY Training and Research Force Tournament has just begun!
All Force earned through troop training, building, researching, equipment upgrading, and General Skill upgrading will contribute to your Tournament AND Leaderboard rankings! In addition, Training and Research Force Points will be TRIPLED(x3) for the duration of the tournament!
The top 10 players on each sector will each qualify for Tournament Prize Boxes, which contain the following:
Platinum Prize Box - Guarantees a Level 16 Black Market Patch, Generals Order, Incineraptor, Synthetic Control Core, or Onyx Core Gold Prize Box - Chance to win a Level 16 Black Market Patch, Generals Order, Incineraptor, Synthetic Control Core, Onyx Core, Hacker's Patch, Vermillion Core, Cerulean Core, or SP 5000 Silver Prize Box - Decreased chance to win prizes from the Platinum and Gold boxes, plus a 30% Troop Accelerator, SP 1000, Incendiary Core, or Decimator Core Bronze Prize Box - Decreased chance to win prizes from Gold and Silver Boxes plus Troops and Speed Ups
The next 10 players in each sector will receive a variety of great prizes as well! Check the in game leaderboard for more details.
In addition to these overall prizes, Daily Prizes are now available for the top 3 players an a given day as well as Achievement Prizes once you pass certain Force Thresholds! Check the in game leaderboard for more details.
This Tournament ends on June 11th at 11:00 PM PDT, so be sure to get started today. Good luck!
-- Edgeworld Team
hash.message.body.20130401c2buy:
Still haven't expanded to Caldera-2 and increased your influence throughout your Sector? Here's your next chance to acquire this latest outpost!
Simply buy the 1000 Platinum Package or greater, and you'll qualify to receive the Caldera-2 Schematics for FREE!
Make sure to make your purchase before 12:00pm Noon PDT tomorrow on April 2nd to qualify. All schematics will be paid out following the conclusion of the event.
hash.items.onyxcore.tooltip: Salvaged from the Caldera Ruins, these advanced Cores are the only items capable of powering the Battle Cruiser
hash.items.tokenskyshroud2.description: Applies a moderate scaling Battle Cruiser Defense to an Engineering Lab Part!
hash.items.tokenliquidcoolant.tooltip: Apply to an Engineering Lab part and receive a small scaling Rate of Fire Boost permanently!
hash.message.body.20130213makegood:
Earlier this afternoon, due to issues with our external data center provider many kabam.com games including Edgeworld experienced an outage of approximately two hours. Though these issues were largely out of our own control, we deeply sympathize with the many players who were inconvenienced by the outage. Please find in your inventory: one Bomba Box and one of the NEW and Improved Kira's Gifts as a small token of appreciation to you, our players, for your patience and continued loyalty to Edgeworld.
We sincerely apologize to all of our affected players and will do our best to minimize these types of issues going forward. THANK YOU all for choosing to play our game!
- Edgeworld Team
hash.items.permanentadvancedarmor.description: Permanently increases the health of all your buildings and attacking units.
hash.message.body.20130129purchaseplatreminde: Today is the last day to participate in our Purchase Platinum Event! Every 100 platinum purchased will enter you for a chance to win 5,000 FREE PLATINUM so don't delay! All purchases must be made before 11:59pm PST tonight (January 31st) in order to qualify. Five lucky winners will be chosen and platinum prizes distributed within 3 business days after the conclusion of this event.
hash.missions.increase-gas-production-4.objec: Increase Gas Production to 2,000 per hour.
hash.missions.going-green.description: We've gone green with this upgrade, making an effort to reduce the energy needs of the Command Center while focusing on renewable sources like wind and sunlight. Just because we've rendered most of this planet uninhabitable doesn't mean we don't care about the environment.
hash.daily.title.20121005purchaseplat: Win HUGE prizes for purchasing platinum! See your mail for details.
hash.activemodel.errors.models.jobs.create-un: Sorry, Commander. You can't create those units because you don't have enough capacity.
