hash.message.body.20130430forcetournamentbrem:
Today is the Last Day to Participate in our latest Building and Lab Force Tournament!
All Force earned through Building and Engineering Lab Part Upgrades will contribute to your leaderboard ranking but that's not all! All Force gained from these methods has been TRIPLED(x3) for the duration of the tournament!
The top 10 players on each sector will each qualify for new and increased payouts of valuable prizes in the form of Tournament Prize Boxes, which contain the following:
Platinum Prize Box - Guarantees a Level 16 Black Market Patch, Generals Order, Incineraptor, Synthetic Control Core, or Onyx Core Gold Prize Box - Chance to win a Level 16 Black Market Patch, Generals Order, Incineraptor, Synthetic Control Core, Onyx Core, Hacker's Patch, Vermillion Core, Cerulean Core, or SP 5000 Silver Prize Box - Decreased chance to win prizes from the Platinum and Gold boxes, plus a 30% Troop Accelerator, SP 1000, Incendiary Core, or Decimator Core Bronze Prize Box - Decreased chance to win prizes from Gold and Silver Boxes plus Troops and Speed Ups
Check the in game leaderboard for more details.
This Tournament ends tonight at 11:59 PM PDT, Good luck!
-- Edgeworld Team
hash.items.tokennetworksabotage.description: Applies a small scaling General Defense to an Engineering Lab Part!
hash.message.body.20130327forcetournamentremi:
Today is the Last Day to Participate in our latest Total Force Tournament!
All Force earned through troop training, building, researching, equipment upgrading, General Skill upgrading and PvP will contribute to your leaderboard ranking but that's not all! Force gained from any of these actions in our newest Outpost Caldera-2 will be TRIPLED (x3) throughout the duration!
The top 40 players on each sector will win valuable prizes such as Platinum, Trophies, and other premium items troops!
This Tournament ends tonight at 11:00 PM PDT tonight. Good luck!
-- Edgeworld Team
hash.daily.text.hackerspatchmb: Try your luck with the Hacker’s Patch Mystery Box! Win 1, 2, 3, 5 or 10! Hacker’s Patches inside!
hash.daily.text.20130625ammodelivery: Buy a Cerulean Ammo Delivery Box for your chance to win this new Smart Part!
hash.missions.solar-bandit.description: Your enemies hardly look like environmentalists, so who are they kidding with those solar panels?
hash.research-defense.shrike.name: Shrike Defense
hash.message.marchflamespend.body:
Upgrade Incendiary Turrets now through Sunday for a chance to win a Master's Kit!
Unleash the fire of the Incendiary Core! Show us your mastery of flame, and you could win a Master's Kit!
We'll choose 100 players who upgrade their Incendiary Turrets between now and Sunday, 3/26, and grant them a Master's Kit! Every Incendiary Core used is a chance to win!
To enter, upgrade any of your Incendiary Turrets! Upgrading higher-level turrets gives you more chances to win!
Master's Kits will be sent out after Monday, 3/27.
hash.message.marchflamespend.subject: Get your FREE Master's Kit!
hash.items.italianflag.name: Italian Flag
hash.items.ceruleanarmorbox.description: This box contains legendary Cerulean Armor which boasts immense health boosts for your Turrets.
hash.missions.things-that-go-boom-5.name: Things that Go Boom 5
hash.daily.text.20130314forcetournament: Earn force for your chance to win Platinum, Trophies, and premium Troops!
hash.Daily.text.20130503resourceconverter: Resource Converter build times all reduced by 80%!
hash.daily.title.20120828engineeringlab: Customize and upgrade your turrets with this new building! See your mail for details.
hash.missions.nukes-ftw.objectives: Increase Uranium Production to 50,000 per hour.
hash.missions.gastronomical.description: Your enemy will need all that gas to rebuild after your attack. Don't leave them a single drop!
hash.message.body.meteoricmysterybox:
Purchase a Meteoric Mystery Box for a chance to win the NEW Cerulean Meteoric Shield! This Box also gives you the chance to win Generals Spp 5000, Hackers Patches, Battlecruisers and Accelerators!
The NEW Cerulean Meteoric Shield is a Brand New Smart AI Lab Part that increases your Turret Protection from Incineraptors! In addition to this smart AI, equipping this part will also significantly increase the Turret's Health as well as its overall Damage!
hash.alliance-territory-reward.subject: Territorial Gains
hash.ew.beginner-base.underline: Mouse over each package to see what else is included!
hash.items.xpsim30.name: Defense Sim XP x30
hash.message.body.07312013token3:
Spend Platinum to win 3.0 Enhancement Token Mystery Boxes! These boxes may contain the new superior Armor, Piercing Ammo and Explosive Ammo 3.0 Enhancement Tokens that are significantly more powerful than both the 1.0 and 2.0 tokens!
Every 250 Platinum you spend between now and 11:59pm PST on August 1st will net you 5 FREE 3.0 Enhancement Token Mystery Boxes! Each player can qualify and receive up to a maximum of 25 3.0 Enhancement Token Mystery Boxes for this promotion, so be sure to take advantage of this offer before it’s too late!
hash.message.marchsectorresourcecrystal.body: You've built a crystal castle! As a Sector, you have more total crystal collected than any other Sector. Every member of this Sector has been awarded a 2.5-Hour Speedup!
hash.missions.project-x-supply.objectives: Upgrade a Supply Depot to Level 10
hash.missions.room-for-one-more.description: With advances in lightweight Scarbide alloys, we created more room inside the Pulse Tank. Then we shoved a Rhino in there! He doesn't know how to drive, but the rest of the crew finds him…motivating.
hash.message.subject.05062013onyxcore: Onyx Cores are in the Store!
hash.missions.crystal-method-2-test-test.name: Crystal Method 2 - test, test
hash.items.encryptedboxb.description: Stolen items from the enemy which can include Cerulean and Vermillion Cores!
hash.fte.faction.warn-nameless: Perhaps you haven't heard, but Union negotiations have collapsed.
hash.promotion.20120312.body:
Welcome to Edgeworld, Commander!

A leader of your caliber will go far in the battle to dominate Cerulea IV!

To aid you in these first days, we are pleased to offer a special bonus for new Commanders only; take advantage of the Edgeworld beginner's sale and not only will you save 20% on our popular, 400 platinum package, you will also receive a FREE bonus Kira's Gift.

Kira's Gift is our most popular mystery crate and is not available for purchase in the Edgeworld store. Get your FREE bonus gift before its too late. This offer expires within 7 days of joining Edgeworld!

Click Here to save 20% and claim your FREE Kira's Gift with your first purchase!
hash.missions.perimeter-breach.objectives: Destroy the Command Center in a Level 500 Legion base.
hash.message.subject.20121024advancedweaponsc: New Advanced Weapons Mystery Crate - Limited Time!
hash.ew.chat.rules: Rules: Please respect the other players. No profanity, personal attacks, hate speech, spam or links allowed.
hash.message.body.05072013hackathonreminder:
Today is the last day upgrade your equipment parts and get a chance to win a Black Market Patch #16!
Each successful Equipment Part upgrade to Level 13 or greater between now and 11:00pm PDT on May 9th will give you a chance to take home a Black Market Patch #16! TWENTY randomly chosen players who successfully complete an equipment upgrade to Level 13 or higher will take home a Black Market Patch #16!
Prizes will be paid out to the winners by Monday, May 13th at 11:00pm PDT.
There has never been a better time to upgrade your equipment than right now!
hash.missions.terminal-interdiction.descripti: General Grod's mech units are preparing for a "terminal interdiction," meaning that they intend to scour this area of all life. If we hit them while they're preparing the invasion, we stand a chance.
hash.missions.legion-war-depot.name: Legion War Depot
hash.fte.cutscene.second: When the Cerulean home world was finally discovered, a coalition of Union forces prepared to unleash hell.
hash.message.body.20130507forcetournamentremi:
Today is the Last Day to Participate in our latest Building and Lab Force Tournament!
All Force earned through Building and Engineering Lab Part Upgrades will contribute to your leaderboard ranking but that's not all! All Force gained from these methods has been TRIPLED(x3) for the duration of the tournament!
The top 10 players on each sector will each qualify for new and increased payouts of valuable prizes in the form of Tournament Prize Boxes, which contain the following:
Platinum Prize Box - Guarantees a Level 16 Black Market Patch, Generals Order, Incineraptor, Synthetic Control Core, or Onyx Core Gold Prize Box - Chance to win a Level 16 Black Market Patch, Generals Order, Incineraptor, Synthetic Control Core, Onyx Core, Hacker's Patch, Vermillion Core, Cerulean Core, or SP 5000 Silver Prize Box - Decreased chance to win prizes from the Platinum and Gold boxes, plus a 30% Troop Accelerator, SP 1000, Incendiary Core, or Decimator Core Bronze Prize Box - Decreased chance to win prizes from Gold and Silver Boxes plus Troops and Speed Ups
Check the in game leaderboard for more details.

hash.missions.form-raider-squad.name: Form Raider Squad
hash.missions.project-x-shielding.description: With a [RESEARCH OBJECT X], it will be possible to modify Titan armor to project an inertial dampening bubble. It is easy to shrug off bullets that barely move.
hash.message.body.20130228trophybuilding:
New "Monument" Buildings are now available, using Platinum, Gold, Silver, and Bronze trophies to build and upgrade! Immortalize your past tournament triumphs into permanent structures within your base for all to see!
These buildings are not merely cosmetic, however, but can be powerful additions to your defense! Enemy troops who come in range of your Monuments will be forced to immediately switch fire and target the building, adding a new strategic element to base attack and defense!
Monuments require "Trophies" won from Force Tournaments and Contests to build and upgrade, so make sure to keep an eye out for your next chance to get your hands on some!
hash.common.name: Name
hash.message.body.20130413forcetournament:
A brand new 5 DAY Total Force Tournament has just begun!
All Force earned through troop training, building, researching, equipment upgrading, General Skill upgrading and PvP will contribute to your leaderboard ranking but that's not all! Force gained from building, troop training, and equipment upgrading will be DOUBLED (x2) throughout the duration!
The top 40 players on each sector will win valuable prizes such as Premium Troops, Mystery Boxes, Trophies, and most importantly bragging rights for your sector!
This Tournament ends on April 17th at 11:00 PM PDT so get started today. Good luck!
-- Edgeworld Team
hash.map.nodeclick.need-alliance: You need to be in an alliance to interact with this map.
hash.message.body.wrongmap:
In a previous message we had provided a link to a document with the results for the first round of the Tournament Maps.
It has come to our attention that the results were taken from a query shortly before the end of the Tournament and do not reflect the actual results.
Please rest assured that the true winners were awarded their prizes.
Thank you very much for your understanding.
hash.message.body.sectormergesround1:
We are happy to announce the first round of Sector Merges will take place this Friday starting at 11:00am PDT
The following Sectors will be merged together into the Serene Valley Nebula Sector. Aquila Seyfert
During the merge, these Sectors will be unavailable for play. We anticipate the Merge will take at most 12 hours. We will post on the forums when the merge is complete.
For further details about the upcoming Sector Merges, as well as a checklist of things you can do to prepare, please check the News and Announcements Section of our Official Forums!
hash.items.mysterybox8.name: Level 10 Meteoric Shield
hash.daily.text.guaranteedtokenbox: Open this box for a guaranteed Token 1.0, 2.0 or 3.0! Includes the brand new Network Sabotage Token!
hash.kira.no-completed-missions: You do not have any completed missions
hash.message.body.20130305mapupdate:
After an extended maintenance, the Map is back and better then ever! In order to show our appreciation for your patience while we addressed some issues with this feature, map rewards have been DOUBLED until Monday March 11th!
Get out there and stake your claim, before others beat you to it!
hash.daily.text.20100810aurora1sale: For a limited time only, all Aurora-1 items are on sale-- up to 65% off!
hash.daily.text.20130529tieredspend: Spend Platinum to receive awesome prizes such as General's Crates, Black Market Patches and More!
hash.kira-message.contest.six-seventeen.body:
Like a father, you have trained and taught your soldiers. Today, it’s time to recognize the hard work and dedication of all our leaders. Happy Commander’s Day!

Three special events are happening this weekend:

1) A special Edgeworld wallpaper has been prepared for you on the Fan Page! Visit our Fan Page and click ‘Like’ to learn how to get the exclusive Edgeworld wallpaper and Father’s Day card!

2) You can now form Alliances! Great alliances start with great commanders. On Monday, the leaders of the largest three Alliances will each receive 10 Zoot Tokens.

3) Visit the Forums this weekend to meet our first Featured Commander, and learn about how you can become a Featured Commander in the future!

Links to the Fan Page and the Forums are above and below the game window. Start recruiting for your Alliances, and enjoy your Commander’s Day!
hash.items.mysterybox20.name: Vermillion Armor
hash.missions.train-rhino-squad.description: Marines love going into battle behind a Rhino squad - less visibility but longer life span.
hash.message.warpgate11.body: Your rapid Warp Gate deployment has earned you a free 4-Day Accelerator! Congratulations!
hash.missions.solar-leech.objectives: Loot over 5,000 energy from any faction's base
hash.items.piercingammotoken2.description: Applies a moderate scaling Damage Boost permanently to an Engineering Lab Part!

hash.alliance-membership.rejected.subject: Declined
hash.message.body.20130709buyevent:
Want to get your hands on Edgeworld's fastest accelerators? Purchase Platinum today and receive FREE 99% Building Accelerators! These items will reduce the time remaining on any current build by 99%, effectively making the training instant!
Simply purchase one of the following Platinum Packages before the deadline to qualify for your FREE Accelerators!
Buy the 225 Platinum Pack and get "One" 99% Building Accelerator! Buy the 400 Platinum Pack and get "Two" 99% Building Accelerator! Buy the 1000 Platinum Pack or greater and get "Five" 99% Building Accelerators!
This unique offer starts today and will end at 11:59pm PST on July 10th. You will only qualify for the first Platinum purchase made between these times, so make sure to choose carefully. Payouts will be distributed onto the server in which Platinum was purchased and added to your Inventory within three business days of this event's conclusion.
hash.ew.alliance.msg.ldro: Only your alliance leader can message the entire alliance.
hash.missions.how-accomodating.description:
Building a barracks will allow you to train troops and engage in battles.

Click BUILD.
Select the COMBAT tab.
Select the BARRACKS.
Click BUILD.
hash.message.subject.20120821barrackstime: Reduced Barracks Upgrade Times - Ending Soon!
hash.missions.finders-reapers.description: Resources aren't going to harvest themselves. Time to employ a little industrial ingenuity.
hash.missions.things-that-go-boom-6.descripti: The Bomba is a savage fighter by nature-- capable of tearing enemies to shreds. If we could spend the time to hone this raw power, the advantages could be worth the effort.
hash.missions.daily-battle-erazi.objectives: Defeat an Erazi base of level #AMOUNT# or higher.
hash.items.spp100.name: Generals SP 100
hash.missions.power-clusters.description: Grod's military network is built around a series of "power clusters," including this base of operations. Destroy it, and you deal the Legion a crippling blow.
hash.missions.solar-cell-tuning.description: Cerulea's sun has unique features we haven't been compensating for. Our Solar Plants will be more efficient with a few changes. Also, bad news about that sunblock we've been issuing...
hash.map.intro-1.p2: You are now part of the territorial Warfare on Cerulea IV!
hash.missions.train-specters.name: Train Specters
hash.map.intro-1.p3: Each square on the map is a player base or an abandoned Galactic outpost.
hash.map.intro-1.p4: Controlling bases will give your alliance daily rewards, which are:
hash.message.20120702alliance3.body: Thank you for participating in our recent Alliance Power Gained Contest. One 2.5 Hour Accelerator has been added to your inventory.
hash.daily.text.08162013incineraptors: Synthetic Control Cores are in the Store and on SALE. Start training your Incineraptor army!
hash.daily.text.chimerarush: Build your Fleet Academy and Chimera to win Accelerators! Details in your mail!
hash.ew.mobile.login-option.already-have-kaba: I ALREADY HAVE A KABAM ID
hash.daily.text.05092013bannerbat: Build and upgrade the Banner Monument building today to win an exclusive, unpurchasable banner!
hash.daily.title.20130628defsimbat: Upgrade your Defense Simulator, Win Platinum!
hash.research.incendiaryturret.name: Incendiary Upgrade
hash.message.body.20130102level15:
Level 15 has arrived, and with it some new additions! All buildings and Turrets can now reach a new level of power, which also means a new level of Research at your Tech Lab, greatly increasing the power of your Troops! This also means a greater SPP cap at your Generals Quarter and greater Troop Capacity at your Warp Gates!
In order to access these new levels, the Vermillion Core has been released! Make sure to check the featured tab of the shop and get yours today!
The war for Cerulea IV is escalating, capitalize on this new technology or become another statistic!
hash.items.heavyextendedexplosiveammo.name: Heavy Extended Explosiveammo
hash.missions.x-file.description: I powered down for maintenence last night with 9,764,200 top secret files in my database. When I powered back up, the number was 9,764,201.
hash.buildings.defensesimulator.description: Defense Simulator allows you to test your base’s resilience against incoming enemy attacks. Damage incurred is only temporary. Upgrade your Simulator to unlock more levels!
hash.hero.skills.splashradiusstrong.name: Heavy Artillery
hash.missions.close-encounters.description: Close counts with horseshoes, hand grenades, and – most devastating of all – the X-1 Cannon. This miracle of military-industrial might spits explosive shells that damage anyone and everyone in the blast radius.
hash.missions.a-flurry-of-attacks-4.name: A Flurry of Attacks 4
hash.items.flag16.name: Banner Design #16
hash.missions.quite-roomy.description: The staging area upgrades are nearly finished. I just need you to sign off on this crazy little idea we had: spatial-distortion implants. The troops are all wedged in there, but if we rewire their brains, we can convince them there's plenty of room. Not sure how it'll affect combat performance, but either way, it'l be interesting, right?
hash.daily.text.05212013generallat: Level up your Generals and win an Incineraptor!
hash.missions.job-well-done.name: Job Well Done
hash.hero.skills.overdrive.name: Overdrive
hash.message.body.20121024stasiscrate:
The Stasis Mystery Crate contains some of the most rare and powerful concussion premium equipment for your Engineering Lab, such as the Frozen Scope and Frozen Dual Barrels!
The Engineering Lab part "Frozen Dual Barrels" will allow any equipped turret to target and concuss multiple troops with each shot fired!
The Stasis Mystery Crate can be purchased for 200 Platinum and will only be available for a LIMITED TIME, so make sure to visit the featured tab of the store to get yours today!
hash.daily.text.20120726turrets: Win prizes for building Incendiary, Sniper and Heavyweight Turrets! See your mail for details.
hash.daily.text.maximumforceevent: Purchase Maximum Force Boxes to receive Ruby Cores and Accelerators!
hash.research.raider.description: Fast alien infantry unit equipped with advanced suction packs capable of rapid resource extraction.
hash.items.mysteryboxwhite.name: Generals Orders Box
hash.daily.text.defenselaunch: Defend your Base for XP and Prizes! Details in your mail!
hash.missions.crystalnanos1d.description: Increase Crystal production by +300% for 24 hours.
hash.research-defense.marine.description: Research to reduce the damage Marines do when attacking your base and colony.
hash.fte.faction.attack.tip: Tip: Click the ground and drag it to change the view of the base
hash.items.tokenmeteoricshield.description: Applies a small scaling Incineraptor Defense to an Engineering Lab Part!

hash.message.body.20130409buyevent:
Want to get your hands on Edgeworld's fastest accelerators? Purchase Platinum today and receive FREE 99% Building Accelerators!
Simply purchase one of the following Platinum Packages before the deadline to qualify for your FREE Accelerators!
Buy the 225 Platinum Pack and get 3 8-Hour Accelerators! Buy the 400 Platinum Pack and get 1 99% Building Accelerator! Buy the 1000 Platinum Pack or greater and get 2 99% Building Accelerators!
This unique offer starts today (April 9th) and will end at 11:59pm PST on April 10th. You will receive your Accelerators only for the first Platinum purchase made between these times. The prizes will be distributed onto the server in which Platinum was purchased and added to your Inventory by 12:00pm PST on April 11th in time to use for the Force Tournament!
hash.missions.weaponize-uranium.description: Reactors process Uranium for weapons and advanced parts.
hash.message.body.may21tourneywinners:
Congratulations to all of the winners and thank you to everyone who participated in the first run of our new Tournament Map Feature.
The winners have been chosen and awarded. You can view a full list of winners for each Sector by clicking HERE
hash.message.subject.20130516troopresearchcor: Improved Troop Research Core Box on Sale!
hash.buildings.factory.name: Factory
hash.missions.nuke-it-out.description:
Uranium-powered weapons and vehicles are the might of our army!

Click BUILD.
Select RESOURCES.
Click the REACTOR.
Click BUILD.
hash.missions.wing-and-a-prayer.description: Turns out that letting soldiers sleep where they want was a terrible idea. Some of them apparently "crashed" on a Shrike's wings, which then launched, got shot down, and crashed. Long story short, we need a place for them to sleep. I suggest a Barracks.
hash.kira-message.contest.six-twenty-three.bo:
Commander, I am ready to offer new missions and rewards, but I have no extra missions in my database. I need your help!

Visit the forums and give me your ideas for new missions! The best mission will be added to Edgeworld, and available for all players. Your name will go down in history!

A link to the forums is beneath the game window. Go there to get all the rules and details!
hash.message.body.20121019spendfordecimator:
Haven't had a chance to try out one of the new Decimator Units? Here's your chance!
For every 100 Platinum you spend between 10:00am PST on October 19th and 11:59pm PST on October 22nd, you will be entered for a chance to take home 100 Decimators!! There is no limit to the amount of times you can enter, and ten lucky winners will be selected and paid out after the conclusion of the event!
hash.map.reinforce.title: BASE FORTIFICATION
hash.missions.loot-over-5-000-crystals.name: Loot over 5,000 crystals
hash.items.tokenarmor3.tooltip: Apply to an Engineering Lab part and receive a large scaling Health Boost permanently!
hash.promotion.102911.body:
The Lancers are here, and they're eating your base! Research and train these monsters, and create a Lancer attack force of your own!

Log into the game and check your Daily Missions to receive 8 Salvage Boxes each day, now through Monday!

Visit our Forums to participate in our Halloween costume and art contest!

We also have a Trick-and-Treat thread going, with Platinum prizes for participating!

It's all happening this Halloween weekend in Edgeworld!
hash.missions.crystal-method-3.description: These crystals took millennia to form, and it's taking you almost as long to excavate them. Alright, maybe that's an exaggeration. But you could pick up the pace by upgrading your mines.
hash.daily.text.dax4sale: The 4 Day Accelerator now on sale for only 150 Platinum!

All Force earned through troop training, building, researching, equipment upgrading, General Skill upgrading and PvP will contribute to your leaderboard ranking but that's not all! All Force gained from any of these actions will be DOUBLED(x2) everywhere throughout the duration!

hash.research.spider.description: Massive Cerulean wasp-like lifeforms. They do 10x damage against Tesla towers, and are immune to Incendiary burning.

hash.items.rename.description: Don't like your name? Change it, but don't ask how.
hash.message.body.20121025decimatorwinners:
Congratulations, you have been randomly selected as a winner for our Decimator Spend Event! 100 Decimators have been inserted onto your Main Base!
Thank you for your participation, and we hope you will continue to enjoy Edgeworld!
hash.message.body.june2012platsale:
For a VERY LIMITED TIME, we will be holding our second ever Platinum Sale!
From 10:00am PDT, June 28th until 10:00am PDT, July 1st you will be able to purchase Platinum Packages at reduced prices.
65 platinum for $8.90 instead of $9.90 155 platinum for $17.90 instead of $19.90 225 platinum for $24.90 instead of $29.90 400 platinum for $39.90 instead of $49.90 1000 platinum for $74.90 instead of $99.90 2500 platinum for $174.90 instead of $249.90 5000 platinum for $259.90 instead of $399.90
Use platinum to strengthen your base and crush your opponents!

hash.hero.skills.empgrenade.name: EMP Grenade
hash.missions.project-x-mining.objectives: Upgrade a Crystal Mine to Level 10.
hash.message.body.ceruleanzoot:
Now that the race is on to reach level 12, Ancient technological artifacts such as the Cerulean Core are becoming rarer and rarer.
Zoot feels your pain, and is opening up his personal stockpiles to the Commanders of Cerulea IV for a limited time!
From Friday, June 8th at 11:00 am PST to Monday, June 11th at 3:00 pm PST the Zoot’s Loot minigame has been supercharged! Cerulean Cores will have a MASSIVE drop rate!!!!
Zoot’s Stockpiles (and generosity) are limited, so act fast!
hash.ew.group.sess.mute: Mute future invites from this player
hash.message.body.pdddecimatorcrate: Save some serious Platinum! - pick up the Decimation Crate for 50% OFF during Platinum Deal Day!
hash.message.body.20130204lvlup:
Gain the most levels and win 500 platinum! We'll also award the next 15 highest level gaining players with 200 platinum. Level up between 10:00 AM PST on February 20th and 5:00 PM PST on February 2nd and the winner could be you! Good luck, Commander.
Rankings will be based on the total number of levels gained for each individual player per sector. Levels gained cannot be combined across sectors. Prizes will be distributed by February 25th.
hash.messages.mass-assignment.subject: Maps Mostly Restored
hash.items.rhino1.name: Rhino

hash.items.auroragold.description: Kit includes: 1x Aurora-1 Schematic 3x Pulse Core 15x 15-Min Accelerator 5x 1-Hour Accelerator 2x Scarbide Ingot 2x Cerulean Core
hash.missions.legion-academy.description: The Helio are training new troops right here on Cerulea IV. Say the word, Commander, and we'll turn their daily marching drills into an exciting live-fire exercise.
hash.daily.banner2.desc: Map a banner to an in-game action by prefixing the url with ACT:
hash.message.vday24h.winner: Congratulations! You've received a KIRA's Gift as thanks for giving a Platinum Gift on Valentine's Day!
hash.ew.campaign.new15.name: Incineraptor Invasion (5k-270k)
hash.message.body.20121114corrosivebuildathon:
Today is the last day and your last chance to participate in our Corrosive Turret Build-a-thon! Every player that builds at least 1 Corrosive Turret in their main base by 11:59pm PST tonight (November 16th) will be entered for a chance to win an Incendiary Rack! 10 Lucky winners will be selected and awarded.
Additionally, every player that has at least 6 Corrosive Turrets in their main base by 11:59am PST on November 16th will be entered for a chance to win 500 Platinum! 5 Lucky winners will be selected and awarded for this tier!
Make sure to check out the new Corrosive Turret, and get started building today! Winners be be chosen and prizes awarded after the conclusion of this event.
